Uyu muhanzi aheruka gushyira hanze amafoto y’izi nkweto ze avuga ko zigiye kujya hanze mu minsi ya vuba. Mu miterere y’izi nkweto, zigaragara ko ari umweru ariko zikaba zirimo imirongo myinshi yigoronzoye ndetse n’imbere hakaba hasongoye.
Nyuma yo kwerekana izi nkweto benshi bazigereranyije n’ibitunguru abandi bavuga andi magambo menshi, yatumye abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bacika ururondogoro.
Umwe mu bakoresha Twitter yanditse ati “Ubu rero ngiye kwishyura $ 800 ngura ibitunguru bakase?”
Abandi bagereranyije izi nkweto n’amakaloni abandi batera urwenya bazigereranya na Viennetta ice cream itakiboneka muri Amerika. Umwe ati “Kanye West akumbuye cyane Viennetta ice cream, none yagerageje kuyikora mu nkweto na none.”
Ntabwo igihe zizamurikirwa n’ibiciro byazo birajya hanze gusa ubusanzwe inkweto ze ziba zigura hagati y’ama-euro 200 na 1000. Izi nkweto nshya za Kanye West zizaba zitwa YZY x D Rose yazikoze ku bufatanye na Derrick Rose uzwi cyane muri Basketball.
Uko agapfukamunwa kabaye umudeli ujyanishwa n’imyenda ku bashaka kurimba (Amafoto)
Umwaka wa 2020 ni umwaka wari witezweho kuba umwaka w’icyerekezo ndetse Isi yose ijya kuwinjiramo abantu bari bafite amashyushyu yo kureba uko umwaka w’icyerekezo uzaba umeze.
Ibyari byitezwe siko byagenze! Kuko ugitangira icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahise cyugariza Isi maze umwaka wari witezweho kuba uba uw’amata n’ubuki usharirira benshi nk’umuravumba.
Umuhanzi Danny Vumbi niwe waririmbye ati ‘nta gihoraho nk’impinduka!’. Hari abatakaje akazi kubera iki cyorezo abandi babura ababo, mbese n’umwaka waratunguranye uzana ikintu gikomeye kizajya cyibukwa mu binyejana byose.
Niwo mwaka bwa mbere mu mateka abantu bategetswe kuguma mu ngo wasohoka ugahura n’ingorane; abandi bagasabwa gukaraba buri kanya aho bageze hose nk’aho bagiye gufata amafunguro; mbese ni uw’akumiro.
Agapfukamunwa ntikari kazwi na benshi uretse abakora muri serivisi zibasaba kwipfuka amazuru kugira ngo birinde kuba bakwandura indwara z’ubuhumekero abandi bakumvaga nk’umugani.
Mu 2020 yaba abari basanzwe bambara agapfukamunwa ndetse n’abatari basanzwe bakazi batunguwe no kumva ko noneho bibaye itegeko kukambara mu gihe umuntu agiye mu bantu benshi.
Abakunda kurimba mu gushaka uburyo bagomba kwambara aka gapfukamunwa kandi ntibibicire uburyo bashakaga kwambara; batangiye kujya bakambara bajyanishije n’imyambaro aho umuntu asigaye ajya kudodesha umwambaro wo guserukana mu birori cyangwa ahandi akibuka ko agomba gushyiraho n’agapfukamunwa bijyanye.
Christelle Kabagire usanzwe ari umunyamideli ndetse wanagiye akora ibiganiro bitandukanye bijyanye nabyo, yabwiye IGIHE ko udupfukamunwa twaje mu buryo butunguranye bigatuma abantu batangira gushaka uburyo badusanisha n’imyambaro bagiye kurimba.
Ati “Agapfukamunwa kaje hari utundi dusanzwe dukoreshwa amasaha atandatu(Surgery Mask). Byatumye hatangira gukorwa udupfukamunwa dutandukanye dukozwe mu myenda no mu bindi. Mbere na mbere muri iki gihe cy’icyorezo aho dusabwa kwambara udupfukamunwa ubanza kureba uwo mwenda ugiye kwambara.”
“Uhita ureba niba kwambara agapfukamunwa nirinze nkanarimba. Hari ukuntu nshobora kwambara udupfukamunwa dufite ibara rimwe cyangwa se nkambara nk’akumukara kajyana n’ibara iryo ariryo ryose.
Yakomeje agira ati “Agapfukamunwa gafite irindi bara ricanye bisaba kwambara ibintu bijya kujyana nako. Niyo icyorezo cyarangira bizaterwa n’abantu kuba bareka kwambara agapfukamunwa. Ibitaramo biri kubera ku mbuga nkoranyambaga muri iki gihe by’imideli bisigaye bigaragaramo imyambaro ijyanishijwe n’udupfukamunwa. Mbona iyo umuntu yambaye agapfukamunwa kajyanye n’ibyo yambaye aba yarimbye neza.”
Yagiriye inama abantu yo kujya bareba imyambaro bagiye bakwambara mbere yo guhitamo agapfukamunwa kagiye kujyana nayo.
Ati “Hari ukuntu ukwambara agapfukamunwa wirinda hakabaho no kukambara wibuka no kujyanisha n’ibyo wambaye. Kugira ngo ntibibe akavuyo. Icyo nashishikariza abanyarwanda ni ukwambara agapfukamunwa ureba uti aka karaza kujyana n’umwe mu myambaro nambaye?”
Niyitanga Olivier washinze inzu ihanga imideli ya Tanga Designs we yavuze ko n’ubwo abanyarwanda bari kwitabira kwambara udupfukamunwa batujyanishije n’ibyo bambaye(bikaryohera amaso) hari abagifite imyumvire yo kumva ko tugomba kuba duhendutse.
Ati “Mu Rwanda bari kwitabira kwambara udupfukamunwa ariko ntabwo ibyo kujyanisha udupfukamunwa byari byatera imbere neza cyane. Ntabwo abantu barabyumva cyane. Nko hanze ho byafashe indi ntera hari ako mperutse kubaza kuri internet bambwira ko kagura $ 5 000. Kari gakoze mu bintu bihenze. Hari bamwe inaha bacyumva ko kagomba kugura 500 Frw kandi bakajya bakambara mu birori n’ahandi.”
Yavuze ko ariko n’ubwo hari abantu batarabyumva, hari impinduka byazanye mu myambarire ndetse no mu buryo bw’ubukungu hakagira abahanga imideli babibyaza amafaranga.
Ubu mu Rwanda bitewe n’uko umuntu yifite ashobora kubona agapfukamunwa ka make nka 500 Frw, 1000 Frw, 1500 Frw, 2000 Frw ndetse hari n’uduhenze tugura amafaranga abarirwa mu 10 000 y’amanyarwanda.
Reba amafoto mu bihe bitandukanye y’abantu bambaye udupfukamunwa bajyanishije.
Ambara uberwe! Imyenda 10 abasore bakwambara muri iki gihe cy’impeshyi.
Abahanga mu kurimba, basobanura neza ko kwambara neza, bijyana n’ibihe kandi n’aho umuntu agiye. Niba umuntu agiye mu nama, ntabwo agomba kwambara nk’ugiye mu musangiro n’inshuti cyangwa se kuruhuka. Ibi ni yo mpamvu habaho umwambaro wagenewe ikintu runaka, ku buryo utabona uwambaye ingozi ari muri siporo.
Mu mico itandukanye, impeshyi ifatwa nk’igihe cy’ibiruhuko, aho abantu bafata akanya, bakajya ku mazi n’ahandi, bakumva akayaga bashyira ubwenge ku gihe.
No ku banyarwanda ni uko bimeze, aho usanga akenshi mu mpera z’icyumweru, bifashisha uyu mwanya, bagatembera mu bice nyaburanga bitatse u Rwanda.
Iraguha Prosper ni umucuruzi w’imyenda mu Mujyi wa Kigali, asobanura ko muri ibi bihe, benshi mu banyamujyi, bamugana bashaka imyenda yo gutemberana mu mpera z’icyumweru.
Mu myenda umuntu ashobora kwambara muri ibi bihe, iyo yajyana gutembera no kuruhura umubiri nko mu mpera z’icyumweru cyangwa iyo yakwirirwana mu rugo.
Ingero z’imyenda y’abagabo wakwambara muri ibi bihe.
Perezida Kagame na Madamu Jeannette Kagame mu myambaro ya Moshions: Ibyishimo kuri Turahirwa wayihanze (Amafoto).
Ni imyenda yihariye, guhera ku yo yise Inkingi, Ingoma yanjye, Intsinzi, Utopia, Rafiki, Ruheru n’indi.
Moses Turahirwa ni umusore w’imyaka 28 umaze kwandika izina rikomeye mu guhanga imideli mu Rwanda ku buryo benshi bamwirahira. Imyenda ye irangwa n’uko iba yifiteho ikirango cy’imigongo, umutako nyarwanda wo hambere.
Mu 2015 yashinze inzu y’imideli ayita Moshions. Ni igitekerezo yagize biturutse ku gushaka gukora imyambaro ifite umwihariko wa Kinyafurika by’umwihariko mu Rwanda. Izina Moshions, ni impine y’izina rye ry’irikirisitu “Moses” yongeyeho ijambo ryaturutse ku “Fashion” [“Mo” ya Moses na “shion” ya Fashion].
Yatangiye kwikorera nyuma y’igihe yerekana imyenda y’abandi bakoreshaga ibitenge bakavuga ko ari imyambaro ya kinyafurika, we yiha intego yo kugaragaza umwihariko w’u Rwanda.
Ubwo IGIHE iheruka kumusura yatangaje ko “Nagerageje gukoresha nk’umwitero mu buryo bugezweho, nkoresha imigongo itakwa mu nzu n’ayo masaro ubona bataka ku myenda, ku buryo tugira wa mwimerere w’u Rwanda ariko noneho mu myambarire.”
Ubu aho wajya hose wambaye umwenda wakozwe na Moshions, byakorohera uwo ariwe wese kuwutandukanya n’indi, akabona byoroshye umwihariko wawo.
Uyu musore yatumye benshi bagira ibihe byiza, magingo aya mu bukwe imyambaro ye niyo isigaye yiganje, benshi bakarimba ariko banajyanisha n’umuco nyarwanda; by’umwihariko bakishimira ko ibyo bambaye bibahesha icyubahiro ku bwo kuba byarakorewe mu Rwanda.
Turahirwa washinze ’Moshions’ yagizwe Ambasaderi wa PSG.
Uyu musore yinjiye mu mikorere na PSG biturutse ku masezerano u Rwanda ruherutse kugirana n’iyi kipe yo kujya yambara imyambaro yanditseho amagambo ‘Visit Rwanda’ mu rwego rwa kwamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda no kumenyekanisha ibindi byiza bitatse igihugu.
Yanditse kuri Instagram agaragaza ko yishimiye kuba ari umwe mu batoranyijwe, ashimira RDB na Visit Rwanda kuba ariwe bahisemo.
Ati “Ntewe ishema n’ibyaranze impera z’icyumweru bidasanzwe hamwe na ALL - Accor Live Limitless na PSG ndetse nishimiye gutoranywa nk’umwe mu bagiye kuba aba Ambasaderi babo. Ndashimira cyane RDB na Visit Rwanda ku buranga bankoreye. »
Turahirwa yaratoranyijwe biturutse ku Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, cyamuhaye PSG na ALL nk’umwe mu banyarwanda bamaze kwiteza imbere kandi bafite izina rikomeye mu Rwanda mu ruhango rw’imideli.
Uyu musore mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize yagiye mu Bufaransa mu ifatwa ry’amashusho azajya hanze mu minsi iri imbere yo kwamamaza iyi kipe ndetse na Sosiyete ya ALL.
Ubufatanye bwa PSG na RDB buzafasha abakurikirana iyi kipe n’Isi muri rusange kumenya ubwiza bw’u Rwanda, umuco n’udushya twaruhangwamo kimwe n’ibicuruzwa birukorerwamo.
Nk’uko bikubiye mu masezerano y’impande zombi, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino ya Shampiyona.
U Rwanda rwiteze ko binyuze muri ubu bufatanye, abakinnyi ba PSG n’ibindi byamamare mpuzamahanga, bizabafasha gusura u Rwanda, bakabona ibyiza bitatse igihugu cy’imisozi igihumbi uhereye ku bijyanye n’ubugeni, umuco, siporo, muzika, ubukerarugendo, amafunguro n’ubwiza bw’igihugu muri rusange.
Ikindi ni uko icyayi cy’u Rwanda n’ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bitangwa kuri Parc des Princes mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Hazajya habaho kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’Abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Paris Saint Germain ni imwe mu makipe akomeye ku Isi, aho ikinamo Umunya-Brésil Neymar waciye agahigo ko kuba umukinnyi uhenze mu mateka ya ruhago ubwo yagurwaga avuye muri FC Barcelone mu 2017.
Ivumburamatsiko kuri Fred Lyon wambika benshi mu byamamare nyarwanda.
Ubusanzwe yitwa Fred Ndicunguye, amaze imyaka ibiri n’igice akora akazi ko gucuruza imyambaro itandukanye, inkweto n’ibindi. Akundwa na benshi kuko agira imyambaro igezweho.
Ubaze umubare w’ibyamamare ntiwawurangiza kuko uhereye kuri Bruce Melodie, Shaddy Boo, Queen Cha, Safi Madiba, Dj Toyxxk, Marnaud n’abandi benshi.
IGIHE yamwegereye imuganiriza byinshi abantu bashobora kumwibazaho ndetse n’uko yatangiye gukora ubucuruza bw’imyenda bwaje gutuma yiharira isoko mu gukorana n’ibyamamare.
Avuga ko gucuruza yabitangiye kuva kera yiga muri kaminuza mu Bushinwa, akaza kubona ko ari impano ye.
Ati “Ni ibintu byari bisanzwe bindimo. Nkiri muri kaminuza nabwo nari umucuruzi, hari ukuntu ushobora kuba ukora aka kazi ariko nta biro ugira, rero niko nakoraga. Nabikoze nkiri mu ishuri mbona byavamo umugati.”
“Aho nasoreje kaminuza naratangiye, abantu baramenya nanjye icyo bakeneye ndakimenya. Nize mu Bushinwa, ibijyanye n’ubushabitsi mpuzamahanga. Aho nigaga nakundaga gutembera mu masoko atandukanye ugasanga ni njye uhorana ibintu bishya, bikaba ngombwa ko bagenzi banjye banyifashisha, nkagenda mbibonamo inyungu nke ndabikomeza kuko nabonaga ari impano yanjye.”
Yemeza ko atatangiye gukora agamije kwambika abantu imyenda gusa ahubwo yari afite na gahunda yo gukora ikintu cyiza gituma umuntu yambara ibijyanye kandi akaberwa.
Ati “Naje nje gukemura ikibazo cyo kwambika abantu ntabwo naje gukora ubushabitsi gusa ahubwo kwari ukugira ngo abantu mbambike. Iyo ushaka kwambika umuntu ntabwo umwambika imyenda ngo agende yambaye ibirenge. Umwambika inkweto, ipantalo, ishati, amadarubindi byaba ngombwa ukamwambika n’isaha.’’
Avuga ko ashaka gutangira kujya agurisha n’imyambaro ya Made in Rwanda.

Muri iki gihe akorana bya hafi na Bruce Melodie, ndetse n’imyambaro yari yambaye aririmba muri East Africa’s Got Talent yari yayambitswe n’uyu musore.
Ati “Urebye Bruce Melodie wa mbere y’uko mfungura iri duka n’uw’ubu baratandukanye. Asigaye yambara bigezweho kandi bimubereye. Yambara imyambaro y’abanyamujyi. Nizo mpinduka nazanye kugira ngo ibintu abahanzi mpuzamahanga babona ku Isi bibashe kugera no ku bahanzi bacu. Imyambaro ntabwo iba ihenze. Guhera ku bihumbi icumi iwanjye ushobora kwambara.”

Miss Akiwacu Colombe yitabiriye Paris Fashion Week (Amafoto).
Paris Fashion Week iri mu bikorwa byo kumurika imideli bikomeye ku Isi, ku buryo buri munyamideli wese mu bihugu bitandukanye aba yifuza umunsi umwe kuzagaragara atambuka imbere y’abitabiriye iki gikorwa.
Uretse kuba ari igikorwa gikomeye ni kimwe mu bihemba neza kandi ukigiyemo akaba yabasha kumenyana n’abandi bantu bakomeye muri uru ruganda bikaba byamufungurira andi marembo.
Iki gikorwa ngarukamwaka kuri iyi nshuro cyabaye guhera ku wa 23 Nzeri kugeza ku wa 1 Ukwakira 2019. Akiwacu Colombe yabaye umwe mu bamurika imideli basaga ijana babashije kwitabira. Uyu mukobwa we ari mu banyamideli biyerekanye ku munsi wa nyuma.
Imyambaro yamuritswe muri iki gikorwa yari iy’abadozi b’imyenda bibumbiye muri Global Fashion Collective.
Miss Akiwacu Colombe yabwiye IGIHE ko kumurika imideli muri iki gikorwa byari akarusho kuri we, by’umwihariko ku mwuga asanzwe akora wo kumurika imideli.
Ati “Kugira ngo njyemo nitabiriye itoranya ry’abanyamideli barankunda. Byari byiza cyane ku mwuga wanjye wo kumurika imideli, ikindi ndishyurwa gusa ndanabikunda.”
Paris Fashion Week ni kimwe mu birori bimurikirwamo imideli bikomeye ku Isi, iri mu cyiciro kimwe na London Fashion Week, Milan Fashion Week na New York Fashion Week.
Iki gikorwa cyatangiye guhera mu 1973 bigizwemo uruhare na French Fashion Federation.
Miss Akiwacu yaherukaga ibikorwa nk’ibi muri Kamena 2019, aho yitabiriye imurika ry’imisatsi rigamije kwamagana ivangura rikorerwa abafite imisatsi y’injwiri mu Mujyi wa Paris mu gace ka Place de l’Opéra.
Iki gikorwa cyari cyateguwe na Murielle Kabile usanzwe akora imisatsi y’ubwoko butandukanye.
Iki gikorwa cyo kumurika imisatsi cyiswe “Don’t Touch My Hair”, cyakozwe mu rwego rwo kwamagana abantu bakora mu misatsi y’abafite injwiri nk’uburyo bwo kubendereza cyangwa kubirataho, ibintu bifatwa nk’ivanguraruhu.
Akiwacu Colombe amaze imyaka ine mu Bufaransa, amaze kwimariramo ibyo kumurika imideli ndetse ni kimwe mu bimutunze n’ubwo afite akandi kazi ka buri munsi akora.
Uyu mukobwa yari aherutse kuza mu Rwanda muri Nzeri 2019, aho, nyuma y’ubukangurambaga yagiye akora mu buryo butandukanye.
Akiwacu yatowe nka Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2014 ubwo iri rushanwa ryatangiraga gutegurwa na Rwanda Inspiration Backup ikibikora kugeza n’ubu.
Umusore uzahagararira u Rwanda muri ‘Mister Africa 2019’ yamenyekanye.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 20 yashyizwe mu bazatoranywamo uhiga abandi mu buranga muri Afurika mu irushanwa risanzwe rizwi cyane nka Mister Africa International ritegurwa na House of Twitch yo muri Nigeria nk’uko Promise Adebayo ukuriye iyi sosiyete itegura irushanwa yabitangarije IGIHE.
Umwaka ushize u Rwanda rwagombaga guserukirwa na Nshongore wabaye Mister Elegancy Rwanda 2018, ariko ntiyabasha kwitabira.
Ibirori ny’ir’izina byo kwambika ikamba umusore uzahiga abandi muri Mister Africa 2019, bizaba ku wa 1 Ukuboza 2019.
U Rwanda rumaze kwitabira iri rushanwa kabiri, ubwa mbere byari mu 2015 ubwo Turahirwa Moses yabaga Igisonga cya mbere cya Rudasumbwa ndetse no mu 2017 ubwo Ntabanganyimana Jean de Dieu yahigikaga bagenzi be akegukana ikamba rya Mister Africa International 2017.
Umwaka ushize ikamba rya Mister Africa International ryatwawe na Calisah Jiwa wo muri Tanzania. Yakurikiwe na Ibrahim Alton Mansaray wo muri Sierra Leone, Chuckie Ihebuzor wo muri Nigeria, Jason Asare Akoto wo muri Ghana na Makala Nganda Courtez wo muri Cameroon.

Kim Kardashian yahinduye izina ry’imideli ye nyuma yo kotswa igitutu n’Abayapani.
Tariki 2 Kamena 2019 nibwo Kim Karashian yamuritse imyambaro y’imbere igaragaza imiterere y’abagore ayita “Kimono”.
Bikimara kumenyekana ko yise iyi myambaro atyo, ntibyishimiwe na benshi biganjemo abo mu Buyapani bifashishije imbuga nkoranyambaga bakamwamaganira kure bavuga ko ari gusuzugura umuco wabo.
Ubusanzwe Kimono ni umwambaro wubashywe mu muco w’Abayapani wambarwa mu birori bikomeye nk’ubukwe, gushyingura n’indi minsi mikuru.
Nyuma y’iki gitutu, Kim Kardashian, yemeje ko agiye gushaka irindi zina risimbura Kimono yambuwe n’abayapani.
Abinyujije kuri Twitter na Instagram, Kim Kardashian yatangaje ko yamaze guhindura izina ry’iyi mideli ayita ‘SKIMS’.
Ati “ Abakunzi banjye n’abankurikira mbakuraho ibitekerezo byinshi. Numva ibitekerezo byabo kandi nishimiye ko bampaye ibitekerezo ku mideli yanjye mishya. Nyuma yo kubiha agaciro nishimiye kubatangariza ku mugaragaro SKIMS.”
Kardashian yavuze ko umuhango wo kwerekana iyi mideli uzaba tariki 10 Nzeri 2019.
Tariki 2 Kamena 2019 nibwo Kim Karashian yamuritse imyambaro y’imbere igaragaza imiterere y’abagore ayita “Kimono”.
Bikimara kumenyekana ko yise iyi myambaro atyo, ntibyishimiwe na benshi biganjemo abo mu Buyapani bifashishije imbuga nkoranyambaga bakamwamaganira kure bavuga ko ari gusuzugura umuco wabo.
Ubusanzwe Kimono ni umwambaro wubashywe mu muco w’Abayapani wambarwa mu birori bikomeye nk’ubukwe, gushyingura n’indi minsi mikuru.
Nyuma y’iki gitutu, Kim Kardashian, yemeje ko agiye gushaka irindi zina risimbura Kimono yambuwe n’abayapani.
Abinyujije kuri Twitter na Instagram, Kim Kardashian yatangaje ko yamaze guhindura izina ry’iyi mideli ayita ‘SKIMS’.
Ati “ Abakunzi banjye n’abankurikira mbakuraho ibitekerezo byinshi. Numva ibitekerezo byabo kandi nishimiye ko bampaye ibitekerezo ku mideli yanjye mishya. Nyuma yo kubiha agaciro nishimiye kubatangariza ku mugaragaro SKIMS.”
Kardashian yavuze ko umuhango wo kwerekana iyi mideli uzaba tariki 10 Nzeri 2019.
Paul Böger yabwiye IGIHE ko nyuma yo gusoza amashuri yisumbuye aribwo yaje mu Rwanda mu imenyereza ry’umwaka umwe mu kigo cy’ibidukikije mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Binyuze muri iryo menyereza yakoze mu 2015, yashituwe n’uruganda rw’imideli mu Rwanda avuga ko yari amaze imyaka myinshi mu bijyanye n’uru ruganda ariko muri icyo gihe ku nshuro ye ya mbere yahisemo gutangira guhanga imyambaro ye ikozwe muri Made in Rwanda bivuye mu bitekerezo bye.
Ati “Byaranshimishije cyane gukora imyambaro ivuye mu bitekerezo byacu ariko noneho ari iya ‘Made in Rwanda’.”
Mu 2016 avuga ko byamushimishije gukora imyambaro yishimiwe na benshi ndetse agenda yakira inyunganizi nziza zimwereka ko yagize igitekerezo cyiza.
Böger yahisemo gukorana n’abakora ibijyanye n’imyambaro bo mu Rwanda ndetse inzu ihanga imideli ye ayita ‘Izuba Clothing’.
Mu 2016 yashyize hanze imyambaro yahanze ya ‘Made in Rwanda’ anayimurika mu imurikagurisha rya Shaban Masengesho ryabereye muri Mainz.
Nyuma yo gukora imyambaro ayijyana iwabo mu Budage akayibika mu bubiko ahafite, iyo amaze kuyigezayo atangira kuyicuruza ku rubuga rwa internet kuri 
Uyu musore amaze kwitabira ibikorwa bitandukanye mu Budage n’ibindi bihugu bihana imbibi amenyekanisha umudeli we wihariye wa ‘Made in Rwanda’ akavuga ko benshi mu bazungu bagenzi be babyishimira.
Avuga ko abantu benshi batita cyane ku ho imyenda yabo yakorewe ndetse n’uwayikoze gusa ngo kuri we ni ingenzi cyane kubivuga no kugaragaza aho imyambaro yaturutse n’uri kuyikora.
Yahisemo guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda kuko yabonye imyambaro myinshi yo mu Rwanda iva hanze.
Ati “Amaduka n’amasoko yo mu Rwanda aba yuzuyemo ibyaturutse hanze y’u Rwanda mu bihugu by’ibituranyi cyangwa byinshi byaturutse i Burayi, Aziya cyangwa Amerika. Ariko imyambaro yo mu Rwanda ntabwo icuruzwa mu Burayi. Ntewe imbaraga n’ubukangurambaga nasanze mu Rwanda bwa ‘Made in Rwanda’ nasanze byaba inzira nziza yo kumenyekanisha iyi myambaro ku rwego rw’Isi.”
“Hari isoko rinini mu bijyanye no gukora no gucuruza imyambaro, nshaka ko imyambaro ya ‘Made in Rwanda’ igaragara cyane mu Burayi cyane cyane muri Budage iwacu.”
Avuga igitekerezo cyo kwita iduka rye ‘Izuba’ cyaturutse ku kuba izuba rirasa buri munsi, akaba ashaka ko iduka rye rikomeza kuba nk’izuba.
Mu myaka itanu iri imbere ashaka kuzaba amaze gufatisha isoko ry’imyambaro ye mu Rwanda. Intego ye ni ukugira ububiko bw’imyambaro ye mu Rwanda no mu Budage.
Imyambarire igezweho mu banyamujyi b’abanyabirori (Amafoto).
Akenshi usanga ibijyanye n’imyambarire ari ibihe byisubiramo, bisa nk’aho nta kintu gishya kigihangwa ahubwo imyambaro yakanyujijeho mu bihe bya kera ariyo yongera kwadukanwa n’ikindi gisekuru.
Ingero ni nyinshi zihari ariko dufatiye ku nkweto ya DH yamamaye mu bihe byo hambere, abakurikirana bazi neza ko iyi mu minsi ya vuba yagarutse mu yindi sura ya ‘All Star Converse’ yongera guhararwa na benshi mu rubyiruko ndetse na n’ubu yambarwa n’abatari bake barimo n’ibyamamare.
Nta gishya mu myambarire ahubwo biba ari nko kongera kwiyibutsa ibyo abakurambere bakunze kurimba bikagenda bihererekanywa uko imyaka yahise.
IGIHE yakusanyije imwe mu myambarire igezweho muri iki gihe cyane cyane mu banyamujyi ariko igenda ituruka ku mico y’ahandi bitewe n’ibiba bigezweho mu myambarire y’ibyamamare.
Gutebeza ishati igice kimwe (Half Tuck)
The Guardian itangaza ko iyi myambarire yamamaye cyane kuva mu 2013 ikaza gusa nk’aho icogora kugeza aho muri uyu mwaka yongeye kwigarurira imitima ya benshi.
Ni imyambarire igezweho muri iki gihe mu banyamujyi, iyi usanga benshi mu rubyiruko bayikunda cyane.
Kuva mu muhanda usanga abenshi bambaye muri ubwo buryo, aho ishati itebezwa igice kimwe ikindi kigasigara kirereta. Biragoye kugenda metero zirenze 300 utarahura n’uwarimbye muri ubwo buryo cyane mu duce duhuriramo abantu benshi.
Biba akarusho rero iyo ugiye mu bitaramo kuko kuva ku bahanzi kugera mu bafana babo usanga baserutse muri uwo mwambaro. Ibi bigaragaza ko iyi myambarire ikunzwe bidasubirwaho.
Kwambara agakapu ko mu rukenyerero (Waist Bag)
Kwambara ukarenzaho agakapu nabyo biri mu bigezweho cyane muri iki gihe. Wikipedia igaragaraza ko udukapu twambarwa mu rukenyerero Abanyamerika batwita Fanny Pack, Belt bag cyangwa Belly bag mu gihe Abongereza bo batwita Bum Bag.
Mu mateka, utu dukapu abantu batwambaraga bashaka kwirinda ibisambo. Utu dukapu twafatanywaga n’imikandara mu mico itandukanye guhera mu bihe byo hambere.
Mu myaka yo mu 1980 nibwo utu dukapu twongeye gukorerwa ivugurura ndetse dushyirwa mu kinyamakuru cya Vogue kizwiho kwandika ku byerekeye imideli.
Mu 2012 abahanga imideli batandukanye bongeye kutwadukana batwise ‘Belted Satchels’ cyangwa se ‘Hands-Free Bags’ bashaka kuzana imyambaro ihenze y’abakunda kurimba.
Mu Bufaransa utu dukapu batwita Banana Bags, muri Espagne bakatwita Kidney Bags naho mu Butaliyani ho batwita Marsupio.
Mu 2018, The Boston Globe yatangaje ko udukapu tunitwa ‘Fanny Packs’ twagarutse muri Vogue dufite indi myihariko tuzanywe n’abahanga imideli bakomeye barimo Gucci, Prada na Louis Vuitton.
Twambawe n’ibyamamare bitandukanye birimo Kim Kardashian, Rihanna, Jaden Smith na Russell Westbrook. Uretse kutwambara mu rukenyerero utu dukapu hari n’abatwambara batunyujije mu gatuza tukamanuka tukanyura mu kwaha no mu mugongo.
Ubwoko bw’udukapu dukunzwe kwambarwa turimo utwa Supreme, Adidas na Fila n’utundi.
Kwambara Jean Jacket (Denim Jacket/Trucker Jacket) na Hoodie
Mu myambarire igezweho mu Rwanda muri iki gihe harimo no kwambarira Jean Jacket (ikoti rimeze nk’ikoboyi) inyuma y’umupira w’imbeho, urubyiruko rwinshi cyane cyane i Kigali n’abandi basirimu bari mu bakunda kurimba muri ubu buryo.
Kwambara gutya mu Rwanda byatangiye kwamamara cyane mu ntangiriro za 2019 nyuma y’uko mu mwaka ushize habanje kugerwaho kwambara Jean Jacket nabyo bigaca ibintu.
Hari n’amakoti yitwa ‘Hooded Denim Jacket’ yo afite ishusho y’umupira w’ingofero ufatanye na Denim cyangwa se Jean Jacket.
Jean Jacket yatangiye kwambarwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu kinyejana cya 19, yakunzwe n’ab’ingeri zose ukajya wambarwa n’abagabo n’abagore.
Uyu mwambaro wahanzwe n’uruganda rw’imyenda rwa Levi Strauss & Co. ruri mu zikomeye muri Amerika.
Imikandara ya Cinture Donna
Ni imikandara miremire yambarwa hagamijwe kurimba, uwambaye arawuzengurutsa yawugeza imbere akawureka ukarereta igice kinini ukenda kugera ku mavi.
Mu Karere ka Afurika y’Iburasirazuba iyi mikandara yamamaye cyane guhera mu 2018 biturutse ku ndirimbo yakoreshejwemo mu mashusho ya Sauti Sol na Nyashinski bise ‘Short N Sweet’ yagiye hanze muri Gicurasi umwaka ushize.
Iyi ndirimbo imaze kurebwa n’abasaga miliyoni 13 mu mwaka n’amezi asaga abiri imaze hanze.
Uyu na wo ni umwe mu myambaro abanyamujyi benshi usanga baserukana mu minsi ya none.
Ubundi wasangaga mu minsi ishize umukobwa akenshi agenda yitwaje igikapu kinini mu ntoki; iyo yabaga yasohokanye n’abandi wasangaga bibangamye, ariko muri iki gihe siko bimeze ahubwo benshi bitwaza udukapu duto duhekwa.
Utu dukapu tuba turimo ibintu nkenerwa birimo ibyo bakwifashisha mu kwiyitaho ku isuku, telefoni, indahuzo (chargeur) n’utundi dukoresho twa ngombwa umuntu ashobora gukenera mu rugendo.
Kuri benshi usanga utu dukapu baradusimbuje amasakoshi yari asanzwe amenyerewe cyane.
Ni udutambaro twambarwa mu mutwe duharawe na benshi muri iki gihe. Durags zatangiye kwambarwa mu kinyejana cya 19 n’abakozi b’Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afurika b’abakene ndetse n’abakoreshwaga uburetwa bashaka kurinda imisatsi yabo ngo itandura.
Mu 1930 Durags zatangiye kwambarwa nk’uturinda musatsi, nyuma y’icyiswe Black Power Movement mu 1960 ihinduka kimwe mu mirimbo mu Banyamerika bakomoka muri Afurika.
Zanambarwaga n’abaraperi n’abakinnyi b’imikino itandukanye cyane ab’igitsinagabo bo mu myaka itandukanye.
Mu 2000, kwambara Durags mu ruhame byabaye nk’ibitakigezweho mu bice bimwe ariko zigumana ubwamamare bwazo ahandi.
Umuraperi A$AP Ferg yongeye guhesha agaciro Durags mu myaka yashize bikubitanye no kugaruka kw’inyogosho benshi bazi nka ‘Waves’, Durags zongera kugira agaciro gakomeye mu muryango w’Abanyamerika bafite inkomoko muri Afurika.
Kwambara Durags muri Amerika byagiye biteza impagarara cyane, hari nk’ubwo mu 2001 abakinnyi ba Shampiyona y’Umupira w’Amaguru yo muri Amerika bigeze kubuzwa kuzambara zo na bandana.
No mu mashuri yisumbuye bigeze kubuzwa kuzambara; nko mu Ishuri ryisumbuye rya John Muir riherereye i Pasadena muri California ryarabikoze mu ntangiriro za 2019 abanyeshuri barigaragambya mu mutuzo.
Iyi myigaragambyo yakozwe n’Ihuriro ry’abanyeshuri b’abirabura. Aba banyeshuri bakoze imyigaragambyo bashinja ubuyobozi bw’ishuri kuvuga ko ‘Kwambara Durags bizatuma abanyeshuri bacengerwa n’imico y’amabandi’ gusa umuyobozi w’ishuri we yireguye avuga ko ataribyo ahubwo babikoze kubera ‘Indangagaciro z’ishuri z’uko bagomba kwitwara ku ishuri’.
Athleisure ni uburyo bw’imyambarire aho imyenda isanzwe ikoreshwa muri siporo, abantu bayambara bagiye mu kazi, ku ishuri cyangwa ibindi birori.
Niba ukurikirana umuziki, indirimbo Safi Madiba yahuriyemo na Meddy bise ‘Got it It’ igaragaza neza uko uyu mugabo wahoze muri Urban Boyz aseruka yambaye amatiriningi atukura.
Iyi myambarire nayo igezweho cyane muri iki gihe by’umwihariko cyane ko ari mu gihe cy’impeshyi, kwambara gutya ni uburyo bwo gusubira mu bihe byo hambere ukajyanisha n’inkweto za siporo.
Abamaze gusobanukirwa n’ibijyanye n’imyambarire usanga aribo bambara muri ubu buryo cyane cyane.
Iyi nayo ni imyambaro igezweho muri iki gihe, ni amapantalo asa nk’acikaguritse ariko akaba asohoka mu ruganda ariko akozwe. Ashobora kuba acitse ku ivi, ku kibero cyangwa ahandi.
Urubuga rwa Apparelsearch rugaragaza ko uyu mwambaro watangiye gukoreshwa ukanamamara cyane kuva mu kinyejana cya 20, mu myaka ya 1980 kugeza mu 2000.
Mu ntangiriro za 2010 nibwo yongeye kwambarwa cyane ku migabane itandukanye.
Guhera mu 2017 uyu mwambaro benshi biganjemo urubyiruko batangiye kuwambara cyane bitandukanye n’indi myaka kugeza na n’uyu munsi n’umwe mu y’abanyabirori.
Iyi myambaro y’abakobwa nayo iri mu igezweho mu banyamujyi. Ni ipantalo z’abakobwa ziba zizamutse ugasanga zambariwe zikagera mu mayunguyungu.
Ni umwe mu myambaro igezweho mu bakobwa muri Kigali ntiwatera metero 100 utarahura n’umukobwa uyambaye.
Ipantaro nk’izi z’abahungu zirahari ariko mu Rwanda ho ntabwo zamamaye cyane nk’iz’abakobwa.
Iyi myenda yoroheye cyane ikorwa na ‘Off White’ ya Virgil Abloh ufite ababyeyi bo muri Ghana ariko wavukiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akaba ari naho akorera ibikorwa bye bitandukanye bijyanye no guhanga imyenda.
Iyi myenda nayo ni myiza ku muntu ukeneye kwambara bijyanye n’igihe cy’impeshyi kuko yoroheye kandi ikaba igufasha iyo hari izuba ryinshi.
Ni yo umuhanzikazi Queen Cha aheruka guserukana ku rubyiniro ubwo yari mu gitaramo cya  cyabereye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 29 Kamena.
Ni amadarubindi asa nk’aho aribwo ari gukundwa na benshi cya mu Rwanda, nyamara yatangiye kwamamara cyane mu 2018 cyane muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika biturutse kuri Kanye West.
Ibyamamare byayambaye birimo Kendall na Kylie Jenner, Bella na Gigi Hadid, Kim Kardashian, Kanye West n’abana b’ibyamamare barimo Zoe Kravitz, Kaia Gerber na Hailey Baldwin.
Aya madarubindi yamamaye ubwo Kim Kardashian yayambaraga mu gace k’ikiganiro cyo muri Mutarama 2018 cya ‘Keeping Up With the Kardashians’ gikorwa n’uyu mugore.
Icyo gihe yavuze ko umugabo yamwoherereje ubutumwa amubuza kwambara amadarubindi manini ahubwo amwoherereza amafoto yaya ya ‘Tinny’ amubwira ko ariyo agomba kwambara.
Icyo gihe mu binyamakuru bitandukanye birimo E! Channel, Independent na HuffPost mu nkuru nyamukuru zabo habanzaga izivuga kuri aya madarubindi, ahita yamamara atyo.
Kanye West ntabwo ariwe wahimbye aya madarubindi ahubwo icyo yakoze ni ukuyamenyekanisha kuko yakozwe na Adam Selman uhanga imideli wanahanze iyambawe n’abarimo Rihanna, Beyoncé na Lady Gaga.
High Heels ni zimwe mu nkweto abanyamujyi benshi bakunze kwambara, zambarwa ku makanzu cyangwa se ku mapantalo. Ni inkweto zihora imbere mu bijyanye n’imyambarire y’abagore kuko akenshi nizo bambara iyo bagiye mu birori bikomeye.
Iza Batzuzhi zikorwa n’inzu y’imideli ya Batzuzhi yo mu Butaliyani ni zo zigezweho muri iki gihe.
Ni inkweto ndende usanga zifite talon ndende ndetse uzirebeye kure ubona ko zifite ubugenge mu kuzigenderamo.
Izi nkweto zifite imiterere itandukanye ndetse ziza mu mabara anyuranye. Uzambaye aba muremure bitewe n’uko ziba zitereye mu kirere.

Covid-19: Pfizer-BioNTech ishaka uburenganzira bwo gutanga urukingo rwa Gatatu.
Pfizer-BioNTech yavuze ko igeragezwa ryakorewe muri Israël ryagaragaje ko urukingo rwa Gatatu rwa Coronavirus rutanzwe nyuma y’amezi atandatu cyangwa 12 umuntu ahawe inkingo zombi za Covid-19, rwongerera umubiri abasirikare inshuro eshanu kugeza ku 10, bityo ukagira ubushobozi bwo kurwanya virus zihinduranyije cyane nk’iyitwa Beta yagaragaye bwa mbere muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Ibi bigo kandi byatangaje ko uru rukingo rwa Gatatu ruzabasha guhangana na virus ya Delta yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Buhinde iri kwibasira abatuye Isi, ifite ubukana kurusha izindi virus zose ziriho kugeza ubu.
Pfizer-BioNTech yavuze ko ariko iteganya no gukora urukingo rwihariye rugenewe kurwanya virus ya Delta kuko imaze kuzahaza abatuye Isi cyane muri Afurika no muri Aziya ndetse yatangiye no kugera i Burayi no muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ibi bigo byombi Pfizer na BioNTech bifite gahunda yo gusaba uburenganzira ibigo bishinzwe ubuvuzi, birimo Ikigo gishinzwe Ibiribwa n’Imiti cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, FDA n’Ikigo gishinzwe Ubuvuzi cy’i Burayi, EMA, bwo gutanga urukingo rwa Gatatu ku baturage nyuma yo kurugerageza bagasanga rufite ubushobozi bwo kurinda Covid-19 yihinduranyije.
FDA ndetse n’ibigo bishinzwe kugenzura indwara no kuzirinda byo muri Amerika byo byahise byerekana uruhande bihagazeho, bivuga ko ababishinzwe bazabanza kugenzura ngo barebe niba koko abantu bakeneye urukingo rwa Gatatu.
Bongeyeho bati “Abanyamerika biteje inkingo ebyiri za Covid-19, ubu ntabwo bakeneye urukingo rwa Gatatu rwo kubongerera ubudahangarwa. Tuzategura gutanga urukingo rwa Gatatu igihe siyansi izaba yerekana ko rukenewe koko.”
Kugeza ubu inkingo za Coronavirus zimaze gukorwa zikanemezwa n’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima, OMS, ni Pfizer-BioNTech ndetse na AstraZeneca, ariko izi nkingo zagaragaje ko zidafite ubushobozi buhagije bwo kurinda Coronavirus zihinduranyije ziri kwibasira Isi mu nkubiri ya Gatatu.
Abantu 14 bishwe na COVID-19 mu Rwanda, abayikize ni 984.
Minisante yatangaje ko abitabye Imana bazize COVID-19 kuri uyu wa Kane barimo abagabo batandatu n’abagore umunani.
Yakomeje iti “Twihanganishije imiryango y’abagore umunani b’imyaka 89 (Rulindo), 82 (Musanze), 74 (Rubavu), 74 (Rutsiro), 63 (Musanze), 58 (Nyamasheke), 43 (Karongi), 37 (Kigali) n’abagabo batandatu b’imyaka 95, 65 (Nyagatare), 58 (Musanze), 55, 49 (Kigali) 27 (Rubavu) bitabye Imana.’’
Abarwayi bashya babonetse uyu munsi ni 911 basanzwe mu bipimo 8.350. Kuva muri Werurwe 2020 hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 1.700.200, byasanzwemo abarwayi 45.950.
Itangazo rya Minisante ryerekanye ko abarwayi bashya biganje mu Mujyi wa Kigali wabonetsemo 326, Rubavu [70], Nyamagabe [63] mu gihe Uturere twa Gisagara, Ruhango, Bugesera, Gatsibo na Nyabihu nta murwayi wahabonetse.
Abarwayi bakize mu masaha 24 bo biyongereyeho 984 bituma abamaze gukira baba 30.191. Abakiri kwitabwaho ni 15.238 barimo 71 barembye.
Abagera ku 392.077 ni bo bahawe urukingo. Abantu 252.580 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa COVID-19 rwa AstraZeneca barimo 572 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Nubwo umubare w’abarwayi bakira uri kuzamuka, abaturage basabwe gukomeza kwirinda ikwirakwira ryacyo cyane ko mu Rwanda habonetse ubwoko bushya bw’iki cyorezo.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel, yatangarije RBA ko hari ibimenyetso bifatika by’uko ubwoko bushya bwa Coronavirus buzwi nka Delta bwageze mu Rwanda, bikaba bifite aho bihuriye n’ubwiyongere bukabije bw’ubwandu n’impfu by’icyo cyorezo biri kuboneka mu gihugu.
Magingo aya Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima, OMS, rivuga ko Delta yagaragaye bwa mbere mu Buhinde ari bwo bwoko “buhanganyikishije” ugereranyije na Alpha yabonetse bwa mbere mu Bwongereza, Beta yagaragaye bwa mbere muri Afurika y’Epfo na Gamma yabonetse muri Brésil.
Abaturarwanda barasabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza atangwa n’inzego z’ubuzima mu gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo, arimo kwambara agapfukamunwa neza, guhana intera, gukaraba intoki kenshi cyangwa gukoresha umuti wica udukoko igihe cyose wakoze aho abandi bakoze. Barasabwa kwirinda kwikorakora mu maso, ku zuru no ku munwa ndetse bakishyurana bakoresheje ikoranabuhanga aho bishoboka hose.
Ubwiyongere bwa Covid-19 bugiye gutuma leta ishora miliyari 4 Frw mu byuma bitunganya umwuka.
Kugeza ejo ku itariki 6 Nyakanga hari abarwayi ba Coronavirus bagera ku 15.325 ndetse 67 muri bo bararembye mu gihe mu ntangiriro za Kamena abarembye batageraga no ku 10.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’igihugu kigura imiti n’ibikoresho byo kwa muganga, RMS, Harerimana Pie, yavuze ko kuba u Rwanda rugiye gutumiza ibi byuma atari uko umwuka uhari udahagije ahubwo ari ukwirinda ko hazagira abawubura igihe abandura Covid-19 bakomeje kwiyongera.
Mu kiganiro na The East African yagize ati “Kugeza ubu dufite umwuka uhagije ariko tugiye gutumiza ibindi byuma bikora umwuka […] Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yafashe icyemezo cyo kugura ibyo byuma ndetse muri iki cyumweru bizaba byageze mu gihugu.”
“Impamvu twabitumije, niba urugero ibitaro bifite abarwayi ba Coronavirus barembye bikoresha amacupa y’umwuka [cylindre] 200, tugomba kuba dufite nibura andi 300 asaguka yo gukoresha muri ibyo bitaro gusa.”
Mu igenzura ryakozwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima na RBC ryashyizwe ahagarara ku itariki 23 Nyakanga 2020, rigaragaza ko mu Rwanda hari ibyuma bikora umwuka bigera kuri birindwi bitunganya amacupa y’umwuka hafi 7000 ku kwezi rimwe rifite litiro 50 mu gihe ku munsi hakorwa 230.
Gusa uyu mubare ushobora kurenga aho ku munsi hashobora gukorwa amacupa y’umwuka 335 rimwe rifite litiro 50. Naho mu kwezi hakaba hakorwa umwuka ujya mu macupa 10.800.
Sosiyete zitanga iyi serivisi yo gukora umwuka ni Oxymat, Inmatec, Airsep, Craft na Amico.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hari ibigo nderabuzima 508, ibitaro by’Uturere 37, iby’Intara bine n’ibindi bitaro bikuru 8.
Harerimana Pie yavuze ko bifuza ko muri buri bitaro haba ibyuma bikora umwuka bihoraho kuko hamwe na hamwe bagenda bahazana amacupa arimo umwuka bavomye ahari ibyo byuma biwukora.
Bwa mbere mu Rwanda abantu 16 bishwe na COVID-19 mu munsi umwe, abayikize ni 816.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa 7 Nyakanga 2021 abishwe na COVID-19 bakuwe mu duce dutandukanye tw’igihugu.
Itangazo rya Minisante rikomeza riti “Twihanganishije imiryango y’abagore barindwi b’imyaka 91 (Ngororero), 73, 58 (Rubavu), 61, 36, 19 (Kigali), 58 (Musanze) n’abagabo icyenda b’imyaka 73, 62, 44 (Rubavu), 71 (Ngororero), 69, 35 (Musanze), 59 (Nyagatare) 52, 47 (Kigali).’’
Abahitanywe na COVID-19 batumye umubare w’abamaze kwicwa n’iki cyorezo kuva cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 bagera kuri 507.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere mu Rwanda habonetse umubare munini w’abahitanwe na COVID-19 [16] mu munsi umwe kuko abenshi baherukaga kuboneka ari 12, batangajwe ku wa 6 Nyakanga 2021.
Kuri uyu munsi, abarwayi 760 ni bo banduye COVID-19 mu bipimo 7.846 byafashwe. Abarwayi bashya babonetse muri Kigali: 330, Musanze: 65, Kamonyi: 52, Gicumbi: 38, Rubavu: 37 mu gihe Uturere twa Gisagara, Ruhango, Kirehe na Ngoma nta bwandu bushya bwahabonetse.
Kuri ubu mu gihugu hose abamaze kwandura COVID-19 ni 45.039 mu bipimo 1.691.850 bimaze gufatwa.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu hakize abarwayi 816 byatumye abakize bagera ku 29.207 mu gihe 15.325 bakirwaye, muri bo 67 bakaba barembye.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira COVID-19 bitangiye mu Rwanda, abaturage 392.003 bahawe urukingo. Abantu 252.008 ni bo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 45 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Abagore bitabira serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro mu Rwanda bageze kuri 64%.
Muri ubu bushakashatsi bwakozwe mu 2019/2020, NISR, igaragaza ko abagore 34% bifuza kuzongera kubyara nyuma y’igihe runaka, naho 3% ari ingumba, mu gihe 10% bifuzaga kubyara mu gihe cya vuba, 2% bo nta mwanzuro bafashe.
Abaturage by’umwihariko abagore baganiriye na RBA, bavuze ko zimwe mu mpamvu zatumye bafata icyemezo cyo kurekeraho kubyara ari uko ubuzima bugoye mu bijyanye no kubona ubushobozi cyangwa imibereho.
Uwitwa Uhoranimpuhwe Ruth utuye mu Karere ka Rwamagana, avuga ko we n’umugabo we bafite abana babiri aho umwe afite imyaka icyenda, undi umwaka n’igice, bombi bavuga ko bafashe icyemezo cyo kuboneza urubyaro.
Ati “Ubu ngubu nafashe agashinge k’amezi atatu, nta kibazo rero njyewe biramfasha.”
Bamwe mu batuye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ubuzima bugoye ari nayo mpamvu bahisemo kuboneza urubyaro abandi bifungisha burundu kubera ko ikiguzi cy’umwana kiri hejuru cyane.
Umwe yagize ati “Icyatumye mboneza urubyaro, abana batandatu mu Mujyi wa Kigali, inzu ndayikodesha no kubahahira ibyo kurya […] ni abo nta bandi. Impamvu yatumye mfata icyemezo cyo kuboneza, ba Se twaratandukanye, ubu ninjye ubarera njyenyine ariko ubu no kubatunga bimaze kunanira kubera ko nta mikorere.”
Mugenzi we yagize ati “Njyewe naraboneje! Mfite agapira k’imyaka itanu mu kuboko kwanjye, ngomba kuboneza kuko ba bana batatu, Imana imbabariye rwose nanarekera abo ngabo.”
Hirya no hino mu gihugu mu bigo nderabuzima hari serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro zihatangirwa ndetse hakaba n’izindi zitangwa n’abajyanama b’ubuzima ku buryo ababyeyi baje kwisuzumisha inda ndetse n’abaje gukingiza abana bose bakangurirwa kuboneza urubyaro ku bushake.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo Nderabuzima cya Nyagasambu, Bihibindi Jean Christophe, avuga ko byibuze nka 60% by’abakanguriwe bahita bafata umwanzuro.
Ati “Abatashye bataboneje, iyo amaze kwemera uburyo yazakoresha amaze kubyara, iyo yabyaye bwa buryo arabutahana.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ariko hari n’abavuga bati njyewe nazaza nje gukingiza noneho muri gahunda yo gukingiza, tugira uburyo bwo kwigisha ababyeyi noneho ababishaka bagataha uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro.”
Ni ibyo kwishimira?
Abahanga mu birebana n’ubwiyongere bw’abantu n’iterambere ryabo, bemeza ko ibi biterwa n’izamuka ry’imyumvire igihugu gikeneye kubakiraho iterambere ry’abagituye, bitewe n’uko ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abaturage butakijyanye n’ubushobozi bw’igihugu.
Ibi kandi ngo bigira ingaruka mbi ku mibereho y’abaturage muri rusange.
Impuguke mu birebana n’Ubwiyongere bw’Abaturage n’Iterambere ryabo akaba n’Umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Dr. Ignace Kabano, avuga ko iki kigero cy’abagore baboneza urubyaro ari ikigero igihugu cyakwishimira bitewe n’inyungu zirimo.
Yagize ati “Igihugu kibaho kigizwe n’abaturage, iterambere ryabo cyangwa ibyo igihugu kinjiza [umusaruro mbumbe w’igihugu] bituruka ku bikorwa cyangwa imirimo y’abaturage. Igihe abaturage batangiye kuringaniza imbyaro bagana mu cyerekezo cy’ibikenewe mu muryango, ni inyungu ku gihugu. Ni ibyo kwishimira muri rusange.”
“Ikindi cya kabiri, bigaragaza ko abaturage, izo serivisi zibafasha kuringaniza urubyaro bazigeraho ni ukuvuga ngo ushatse kwifungisha abona iyo serivisi. Ushatse gushyira intera hagati y’urubyaro n’urundi cyangwa inda n’indi arayibona.”
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko hakurikijwe uburumbuke mu Rwanda, abagore bo mu mijyi, nibura umwe abarirwa abana 3.4, naho uwo mu cyaro bakaba 4.3.
Ni mu gihe mu 2005 umugore ugejeje igihe cyo kubyara yabarirwaga abana batandatu, mu 2014/2015 uwo mubare wari ugeze ku bana 4.2 ku mugore naho mu 2019/2020 bagera ku bana bane ku mugore.
Iyi mibare yerekana kandi ko abatagerwaho na serivisi zo kuboneza urubyaro bavuye kuri 39% mu 2005, bagera kuri 14% mu 2019/2020. Abagore bakoresha uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro mu 2019-2020 bari 64%.
Huye: Mu bagera ku 127 banduye Covid-19, abarenga 60 bari mu Murenge umwe.
Byavuzwe kuri uyu wa Gatatu ubwo urugaga rw’abikorera bo mu Karere ka Huye batangizaga ubukangurambaga bwihariye bwo gukumira Covid-19 hashyirwaho n’abahwituzi muri buri gace.
Umuyobozi w’urwo rugaga, Kayitasire Egide, yavuze ko bashaka ko bo nk’abikorera ari bo bafata ingamba mbere na mbere zo kwirinda Covid-19 no kuyirinda abandi.
Ati “Turashaka ko tutazajya dutegereza abaza kuduhwitura cyangwa abaza kureba ko twubahiriza amabwiriza, ahubwo ni twe twishatsemo ibizubizo kugira ngo tubyikorere ndetse dushyireho n’abahwituzi mu bikorera bagenzi bacu bashinzwe kureba uwo begeranye, niba ashyira mu bikorwa ingamba zafashwe zo kwirinda iki cyorezo.”
Yavuze ko buri gace gakorerwamo ubucuruzi gafite umuhwituzi wako uzajya ureba niba hari abatubahiriza amabwiriza, yabona hari abayarengaho nkana inshuro nyinshi bagafatirwa ibihano birimo no gufungirwa.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Huye, Sebutege Ange, yavuze ko kugeza ubu imibare y’abanduye Covid-19 muri Huye yiganje mu mirenge itatu yo mu mujyi ariko umwe muri yo wihariye umubare munini.
Ati “Ubu mu Karere dufite abanduye Covid-19 bagera ku 127 muri bo 94 bari mu mirenge itatu. 60 bari mu Murenge wa Tumba, 22 bakaba mu Murenge wa Ngoma, hanyuma 12 bakaba mu Murenge wa Mbazi.”
Sebutege yavuze ko nko mu Murenge wa Ngoma mu banduye 12 abagera ku munani ari abo mu Kagari kamwe ka Matyazo.
Ati “Urumva ko bisaba umwihariko wa buri gace n’umwihariko wa buri kintu umuntu akora kugira ngo aho uri, ukorera cyangwa ushakira ubuzima wirinde.”
Yakomeje avuga ko mu bantu 127 bose bagaragaraho ubwandu bwa Covid-19 abarenga 70 bayanduye mu minsi ine ishize, bityo bari gukora ubukangurambaga kugira ngo imibare y’abandura idakomeza kuzamuka.
Yavuze ko isesengura bakoze ryagaragaje ko Umurenge wa Tumba ugaragamo ubwandu bwa Covid-19 kurusha indi byatewe n’uko abawutuye n’abawukoreramo biraye bakarenga ku mabwiriza yashyizweho yo kwirinda.
Kugeza ubu mu Karere ka Huye hari ibigo bibiri byafunzwe kuko basanze abakozi babikoramo bose baranduye. Kimwe gikoramo abantu barindwi naho ikindi ni batandatu.
Sebutege yavuze ko kuri ubu abajyanama b’ubuzima bari gusura ingo zose bareba niba hari umuntu ufite ibimenyetso bya Covid-19 bakamusaba kujya kwipimisha.
Hafashwe ingamba ko iyo hari urugo rubonetsemo uwanduye, abarurimo bose basabwa kwishyira mu kato kugira ngo babanze basuzumwe.
Bamwe mu bakorera ubucuruzi mu duce twiganjemo Covid-19 babwiye IGIHE ko na bo bari gukora ibishoboka byose ngo birinde barinda n’abakiriya babo kuko iyo imibare izamutse bibagiraho ingaruka mbi.
Hitayezu Pascal ati “Ingamba turi kuzubahiriza kandi twongereye imbaraga kuko iyo imibare y’abanduye izamutse bitugiraho ingaruka nyinshi, kuko iyo bavuze ngo funga urabikora kandi ukwezi kuzashira ukishyura nyir’inzu. Iyo badufungiye hari n’ibicuruzwa byangirika birmo nk’amata n’ibindi.”
Kugeza ubu mu duce icyorezo cya Covid-19 kigaragaramo cyane mu Karere ka Huye, hafashwe ingamba zihariye zo kugikumira zirimo kuba bafunze insengero zose, abacuruzi bakorera icyarimwe bagabanyijwe ku kigero cya 50%.
Abantu 12 bishwe na COVID-19 mu munsi umwe, abayanduye mu Rwanda ni 883.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa 6 Nyakanga 2021 abishwe na COVID-19 babonetse mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu; barimo abagore bane b’imyaka 80 mu Rutsiro, abafite imyaka 77, 76 b’i Kigali, uwa 69 w’i Ruhango n’abagabo umunani b’imyaka 91 muri Gakenke, abafite imyaka 88, 83 mu Rutsiro, ufite imyaka 82 w’i Karongi, abafite imyaka 77, 66, 51 muri Kigali n’uwa 63 wo mu Bugesera.
Kuri uyu munsi, abarwayi 883 ni bo banduye COVID-19 mu bipimo 6.492 byafashwe. Abarwayi bashya babonetse muri Kigali: 257, Musanze: 94, Gicumbi: 46, mu gihe Uturere twa Gisagara na Ngoma ho nta murwayi wahabonetse.
Kuri ubu mu gihugu hose abamaze kwandura COVID-19 ni 44.279 mu bipimo 1.684.004 bimaze gufatwa.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri hakize abarwayi 554 byatumye abakize bagera ku 28.391 mu gihe 15.397 bakirwaye, muri bo 57 bakaba barembye.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira COVID-19 bitangiye mu Rwanda, abaturage 392.003 bahawe urukingo. Abantu 251.963 ni bo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 244 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Abantu icyenda bahitanywe na Covid-19, abarenga 800 barayandura.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko abahitanywe na Covid-19 mu masaha 24 yashize ari abagore bane barimo uw’imyaka 82 y’amavuko i Kigali, uw’imyaka 76 w’i Rubavu, uwa 62 i Karongi, 57 mu Ruhango n’abagabo batanu b’imyaka 79, 72, 52 na 51 b’i Kigali n’uwa 64 i Rubavu.
Abarwayi bashya 811 babonetse mu bipimo 6.766 byafashwe mu masaha 24 yashize bituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura mu Rwanda uba 43.396 mu bipimo 1.677.512 bimaze gufatwa kuva muri Werurwe 2020.
Muri Kigali ni ho habonetse abanduye benshi bangana na 338, Musanze 95, Rusizi 47, Kamonyi 38 mu gihe mu turere dutandatu nta murwayi mushya wabonetsemo. Utu ni utwa Bugesera, Gisagara, Rutsiro, Nyagatare, Rwamagana na Nyamasheke.
Mu masaha 24 yashize, hakize abarwayi 231. Muri rusange abamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro ni ku 27.837. Abakirwaye ni 15.080 barimo 62 barembye.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze gukingirwa abantu 391.970 kuva ibi bikorwa byatangira ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021.
Abantu 251.719 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa COVID-19 rwa AstraZeneca barimo 244 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Batanu bishwe na Coronavirus mu Rwanda, abayanduye ni 889.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko batanu bishwe na Coronavirus kuri uyu wa 4 Nyakanga 2021, ari abagore babiri b’imyaka 67 na 36 n’abagabo batatu b’imyaka 63, 58 na 32 bo mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Abarwayi bashya 889 babonetse mu bipimo 6.889 byafashwe mu masaha 24 yashize bituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura mu Rwanda uba 42.585 mu bipimo 1.672.746 bimaze gufatwa kuva muri Werurwe 2020.
Minisante yagaragaje ko ubwandu bwinshi bwiganje muri Kigali ahabonetse abanduye 309, Musanze [99], Gicumbi [63], Bugesera [56], Rubavu [52] mu gihe mu Karere ka Kirehe nta murwayi mushya wahabonetse.
Mu masaha 24 yashize, nta murwayi wakize byatumye umubare w’abamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro no gukirira mu ngo zabo uguma ku 27.606.
Kugeza uyu munsi, abarwayi 14.509 barimo 61 barembye ni bo bakiri kwitabwaho.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze gukingirwa abantu 391.954 kuva ibi bikorwa byatangira ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021. Abantu 251.475 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 14 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Ibitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal byakeje intambwe yatewe mu myaka 27 ishize.
Dr Kalimba yabigarutseho kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 4 Nyakanga 2021, ku munsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27, mu butumwa yageneye Abanyarwanda n’abandi bose bagana ibitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal.
Yagize ati “Tuboneyeho gusubiza amaso inyuma tukishimira ibyagezweho mu ishami ry’ubuzima n’ubuvuzi muri rusange ariko by’umwihariko kuri twebwe hano ku bitaro byitiriwe Umwami Faisal.”
Yakomeje agira ati “N’ubwo urugendo rukiri rurerure, ibyagezweho ni byinshi ari umubare w’abaganga n’ubushobozi bwabo ndetse n’ibikoresho nkenerwa mu buvuzi dutanga na serivisi zose muri rusange. Ibi byagezweho kubera ubufatanye n’umuhate wa leta yacu.”
Dr Kalimba avuga ko kugira ngo ibi bitaro n’urwego rw’ubuzima rukomeza kwiyubaka muri rusange bisaba ko Abanyarwanda batahiriza umugozi umwe mu guhashya icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Ati “Nashishikariza abatugana bose ndetse n’Abanyarwanda muri rusange gukomeza kwitwararika kugira ngo duhangane n’iki cyorezo kugira ngo dushobore kukinesha ni ukubahiriza amabwiriza twese tuzi atangwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima.”
Ibi bitaro bifite abaganga b’inzobere 40 mu basaga 80 bahari.
Ibitaro byitiriwe umwami Faisal, Kigali byashinzwe hagati ya 1987 na 1991 hifashishijwe ikigega cya Arabia Sawudite gishinzwe iterambere (SFD).
Ni ibitaro kuri ubu by’ikitegererezo biri ku rwego rw’Akarere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba aho bitanga ubuvuzi bwihariye, harimo gusuzuma indwara no kuvura byihariye.
Covid-19: Ko imibare ikomeje kwiyongera, aho ibitanda, Oxygène n’ibindi bikoresho ntibiza kuba iyanga?
Abasobanukiwe gato ntabwo ubwoba bwabo bugarukira kuri Guma mu Rugo, burakomeza bukagera no kwa muganga. Ese iyi mibare ikomeje kwiyongera, u Rwanda ruraza gushobora guhangana na yo? By’umwihariko rufite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose ngo abarembye cyane bitabweho cyangwa rurahinduka iciro ry’imigani nk’aho duherutse kubona abarwayi bahabwaga serum na bya byuma bibongerera umwuka, bakoherezwa mu modoka cyangwa mu rugo kurwarirayo kubera ko ibitanda byabaye bike?
Mu kwezi kwa Gatandatu gushize konyine, mu Rwanda habonetse abarwayi bashya ba Covid-19 11267, barimo 95 yahitanye. Ni imibare myinshi ugereranyije n’amezi yabanje.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Daniel Ngamije aherutse gutangaza mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru, ko uko kwiyongera kw’imibare kwajyanye n’ukwiyongera kw’abaremba ndetse n’abicwa n’iyo ndwara. Mu gihe nta gikozwe ngo ubwiyongere bugabanuke, abaremba cyangwa abapfa bazakomeza.
Muri iyi nkundura ya gatatu y’ubwiyongere bwa Covid-19, umuntu yakwibaza niba u Rwanda rufite ibikenewe byose ngo rubashe guhangana na yo.
Minisitiri Ngamije yavuze ko mu barwayi bose ba Covid-19 u Rwanda rufite, 95 % bari kuvurirwa mu rugo mu gihe 5 % ari bo bari mu bitaro. Ibyo ntibyavanaho ko ibitaro nka Kanyinya byari byarafunzwe kubera kumanuka kw’abandura, byongeye gufungura imiryango mu gihe ibya Nyarugenge na byo imibare yatumbagiye ikava kuri 20 ubu bakaba basaga 125.
Niba ibitaro byatangiye kuzura abagera kwa muganga ari 5 % by’abarwayi, hagezeyo 20 % hacura iki?
Mu bihugu nka Kenya mu minsi yashize mu bitaro bya Kisumu Hospital ahari gukurikiranirwa abarwayi ba Covid-19, kubera ubwiyongere bukabije butewe n’ubwoko bushya bwa Delta, abarwayi bakeneye kongererwa umwuka barenze ubushobozi bw’igihugu bitabaza ubufasha bw’abasirikare b’Abadage kugira ngo abarwayi barengerwe.
Si ho gusa kuko no mu Buhinde ubwo Delta yagaragaraga bwa mbere abarwayi biyongereye cyane mu buryo buteye impungenge ndetse abakenera umwuka baba benshi cyane bituma bitabaza za bomboni zo mu magaraje y’imodoka mu kuramira ubuzima bw’abaturage bwari mu kaga.
Kugeza ubu imibare y’Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye igaragaza ko muri Afurika Delta igeze ku kigero cya 25% nko muri Uganda , mu barwayi bashya abasanganwa ubu bwoko bangana na 97% naho muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo biri ku kigero cya 79% by’abandura.
U Rwanda rwiteguye rute?
Kuva icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyagera mu Rwanda, rwakomeje kugihagurukira ndetse hashyirwaho n’ibigo byahariwe gukurikirana abarwayi ba Covid-19 gusa birimo Kanyinya, Gatenga n’ibitaro by’Akarere bya Nyarugenge.
Nubwo ibitaro bya Kanyinya byari byarahagaze kwakira abarwayi, byongeye gutangira gukora nyuma yo kubona ko icyorezo cyongeye gukaza umurego. Ubushobozi kandi bwarongerewe kuko byibuze kuri buri bitaro by’akarere hari umuntu ushinzwe gufasha abarwayi barembye ndetse n’ibitanda bifite ibyangombwa bishobora gufasha abantu barembye.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC), Dr Nsanzimana Sabin aherutse kuvuga ko ibitaro byose byo mu Rwanda bifite ahantu hashobora kuvurirwa abarwayi bari hagati ya bane na batanu barembye cyane.
By’umwihariko nka Kibungo bafite ahakwakirirwa abarwayi bagera kuri 35 mu gihe Karongi naho bagiye kugira ahashobora kwakirirwa abagera kuri 50.
Uretse ibi kandi abakurikiranirwa mu rugo bagenzurwa n’abajyanama b’Ubuzima mu mudugudu ngo hato badatarabuka bagakongeza imbaga.
Kuri ubu mu Rwanda habarurwa ibitanda 500 byiteguye kwakira abarwayi barembye ba Covid-19, muri byo 180 bishobora kwakira abafite ibimenyetso bikomeye cyane, ni ukuvuga abakenera kongererwa umwuka [ICU].
Mu kiganiro n’Abanyamakuru kuri uya wa Kabiri tariki ya 29 Kamena 2021, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Daniel Ngamije yijeje ko igihugu gifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abarwayi bafite ibimenyetso byoroheje ndetse n’abafite ibimenyetso bikaze (abarembye) ariko ko Leta iri mu rugamba rwo kongera ubushobozi.
Ati “Turacyafite ubushobozi buhagije ndetse n’umwuka iyo hari uwukeneye dufite imashini zifite gutuganya umwuka abarwayi bakeneye. Leta iri gushyira ingufu mu kongera ibitanda, imashini zabasha gukora ku buryo twakuba nka kabiri cyangwa gatatu ubushobozi dufite ubu. Abarwayi baje kwa muganga nta n’umwe utarahawe ubutabazi bukwiriye.”
Nubwo ibihugu bituranye n’u Rwanda nka Kenya, Uganda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo byamaze kugerwamo n’ubwoko bushya bwa COVID-19 buzwi nka Delta, Minisitiri Ngamije yavuze ko hari gukorwa ubushakashatsi bugamije gutahura niba mu Rwanda naho bwaba bwarahageze.
Yagize ati “Ubushakashatsi burakorwa, niba iy’Abahinde iri mu bihugu duturanye, nta gitangaza ko yaba iri no mu Rwanda. Iyi virusi ifite uburyo yihishe kugira ngo ibashe kubaho, birashoboka ariko icya ngombwa ni ugushyira mu bikorwa ariya mabwiriza yatanzwe. Icya mbere ni ukwirinda, aho gutinda kuri ibi bya virusi nshya.”
Yasabye Abaturarwanda gukomeza kubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho zo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19, birinda gukorera ku gitsure cy’ubuyobozi ahubwo bakabigira ibyabo kugira ngo icyorezo kibashe gutsindwa.
Batanu bishwe na COVID-19, abayanduye biyongeraho 884.
Abitabye Imana ni abagore batatu b’imyaka 76 bo mu Karere ka Rubavu, ufite 57 wo mu Mujyi wa Kigali n’uwa 31 w’i Muhanga ndetse n’abagabo babiri barimo uw’imyaka 73 w’i Huye n’ufite 49 w’i Kigali.
Itangazo rya Minisante ryo kuri uyu wa Gatanu ryerekanye ko abanduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda ari 884 biganjemo abo muri Kigali ahabonetse 179. I Rusizi ni 81, Kamonyi ni 67, Bugesera 47 mu gihe mu Turere twa Rwamagana na Nyabihu nta murwayi wahabonetse.
Kuva Coronavirus yaboneka mu Rwanda, hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 1.657.913 byasanzwemo abanduye 40.798.
Kuri uyu munsi nta murwayi wakize byatumye abakirwaye baguma kuri 27.272. Abagera kuri 13.073 ni bo bakirwaye barimo 43 barembye. Abantu bamaze kwicwa na Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni 453.
Abamaze gukingirwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni 391.888. Abantu 251.350 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa Coronavirus rwa AstraZeneca barimo 211 bayihawe uyu munsi.
U Bushinwa bwashyizwe ku rutonde rw’ibihugu bitakirangwamo malaria.
Kuva mu myaka ya 1940, abantu miliyoni 30 barwaraga malaria buri mwaka muri iki gihugu. Ibintu byatumye gishyira imbaraga mu kuyirwanya cyivuye inyuma, gitera kenshi imiti yica udukoko ahantu hose, gitanga inzitiramibu zirimo umuti ndetse no gutanga imiti ivura malaria.
Amakuru dukesha BBC ni uko u Bushinwa ubu bumaze imyaka ine yikurikiranya nta murwayi wa malaria bubona, ibintu byabuhesheje uburenganzira bwo kwemezwa nk’igihugu kitakirangwamo malaria.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa OMS, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yavuze ko kugira ngo u Bushinwa bubashe guhashya burundu iyi ndwara iterwa n’umubu wa Anophèle, byabusabye imbaraga zikomeye none nyuma y’imyaka myinshi buyirwanya bwabashije kuyihashya.
Kuri uyu wa 01 Nyakanga 2021, ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa, CPC, ryizihije imyaka 100 rimaze rishinzwe ndetse rinagejeje u Bushinwa ku iterambere mu mpande zose harimo n’ubuzima.
Umuvugizi wa Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri iki gihugu, Wang Wenbin, yavuze ko guverinoma y’u Bushinwa n’iri shyaka byakoze ibishoboka kugira ngo birinde abaturage.
Ati “CPC na guverinoma y’u Bushinwa, kuva kera byashyize imbere inyungu z’abaturage, zirabarinda mu bijyanye n’ubuzima, umutekano ndetse n’ubukungu. Guhashya malaria burundu ni umusanzu ukomeye u Bushinwa butanze ku byerekeye ubuzima ndetse n’iterambere ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu.”
OMS yatangaje ko u Bushinwa bubaye igihugu cya 40 mu bihugu bitakirangwamo malaria ku Isi, mu gihe ahandi ikomeje kuzahaza abantu ndetse iri shami ritangaza ko mu mwaka wa 2019 abagera kuri miliyoni 229 bayirwaye abandi 409.000 bagapfa. 94% by’abayanduye bose ni abo muri Afurika.
Kugira ngo igihugu kijye mu mubare w’ ibihugu bitarangwamo malaria, cyandikira OMS kikayereka ko kimaze imyaka ine ikurikirana kitagaragaramo umurwayi n’umwe wayo ndetse kikerekana ibimenyetso n’uburyo gishobora kwitwara mu gihe yaba igarutse mu gihugu.
Ibihugu biheruka gushyirwa kuri uru rutonde ni Argentine, Algérie ndetse na Uzbekistan.
Malaria ni indwara izahaza uyirwaye, igira ibimenyetso birimo umuriro, kubabara umutwe, kumva ukonje mu mubiri ndetse no gucika intege. Kugeza ubu iravurwa igakira nubwo hari abo igihitana.
Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka hageragejwe urukingo rwayo rwakozwe n’itsinda ry’abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Oxford mu Bwongereza, rugaragaza ko rufite ubushobozi bwo kurinda iyi ndwara ku rugero rwa 77% mu igeragezwa ryakorewe muri Burkina Faso.
Uru rukingo ntabwo ruremezwa kuko basigaye kurugerageza mu bindi bihugu bine bya Afurika.
Mu mwaka wa 2019, Nigeria ni cyo gihugu cyari gifite imibare myinshi y’abanduye ndetse bagahitanwa na malaria, igakurikirwa na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Tanzania, Burkina Faso, Mozambique na Niger.
Umubare w’abishwe na malaria mu Rwanda muri 2020 wagabanutseho32% kuko abahitanywe na yo ari 148 mu gihe muri 2019 bari 218.
RBC igaragaza ko uturere twa mbere twagaragayemo abarwayi benshi ba malaria muri 2020 ari Nyamasheke, Rusizi, Kayonza, Gisagara, Gasabo, Kamonyi, Rwamagana, Bugesera, Ruhango na Muhanga.
Bwa mbere mu Rwanda abantu 10 bishwe na COVID-19 mu munsi umwe, abayanduye ni 867.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa 1 Nyakanga 2021 abishwe na COVID-19 barimo abagore bane b’imyaka 86, 81 b’i Rubavu, abafite imyaka 72 na 62 b’i Burera n’abagabo batandatu b’imyaka 89, 65, 56, 51, 46 bo muri Kigali n’ufite imyaka 25 wo mu Karere ka Rulindo.
Abahitanywe na COVID-19 batumye umubare w’abamaze kwicwa n’iki cyorezo kuva cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 bagera kuri 448.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere mu Rwanda habonetse umubare munini w’abahitanwe na COVID-19 [10] mu munsi umwe kuko abenshi baherukaga kuboneka ari icyenda, batangajwe ku 21 Mutarama 2021.
Kuri uyu munsi, abarwayi 867 ni bo banduye COVID-19 mu bipimo 9.047 byafashwe. Abarwayi bashya babonetse muri Kigali:208, Kamonyi: 74, Rubavu:73, Gicumbi:66, Musanze:46, Rusizi:46, Burera:46 mu gihe Uturere twa Nyaruguru, Ruhango, Gatsibo na Nyagatare nta bwandu bushya bwahabonetse.
Kuri ubu mu gihugu hose abamaze kwandura COVID-19 ni 39.914 mu bipimo 1.650.629 bimaze gufatwa.
Kuri uyu wa Kane nta murwayi wakize byatumye abakize baguma ku 27.272 mu gihe 12.194 bakirwaye, muri bo 37 bakaba barembye.
Mu gihe ubwiyongere bw’abandura n’abahitanwa na Coronavirus buzamuka, hakajijwe ingamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo zirimo ko isaha ntarengwa yo kugera mu rugo ari saa Kumi n’Ebyiri z’umugoroba.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira COVID-19 bitangiye mu Rwanda, abaturage 391.870 bahawe urukingo. Abantu 251.139 ni bo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 875 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Barindwi bishwe na Coronavirus mu Rwanda, 849 barayandura.Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko barindwi bishwe na Coronavirus kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 30 Kamena 2021, ari abagore bane b’imyaka 76 (Musanze), 58 (Kirehe) 58 na 51 (Kigali) n’abagabo batatu b’imyaka 85 (Kamonyi), 82 na 75 (Karongi).
Abarwayi bashya 849 babonetse mu bipimo 10.167 byafashwe ituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura mu Rwanda uba 39.047 mu bipimo 1.641.582 bimaze gufatwa kuva muri Werurwe 2020.
Kuri uyu munsi ubwandu bwinshi bwagaragaye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ahasanzwe abarwayi 199, Muhanga [96], Rubavu [95], Gicumbi [64], Musanze [54], Rulindo [40]. Uturere twa Ngoma na Nyabihu ni two tutabonetsemo umurwayi n’umwe.
Mu masaha 24 yashize, nta murwayi wakize byatumye umubare w’abamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro no gukirira mu ngo zabo uguma ku 27.272.
Kugeza uyu munsi, abarwayi 11.337 barimo 39 barembye ni bo bakiri kwitabwaho.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze gukingirwa abantu 391.805 kuva ibi bikorwa byatangira ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021. Abantu 250.264 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 738 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro. Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, kwambara udupfukamunwa mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi mu nsisiro cyangwa ahatuye imiryango myinshi.
Gahunda ni Gera mu rugo saa Kumi n’ebyiri #Bosebabireba- CP Kabera.
Amabwiriza mashya yatangajwe ku wa Kabiri, tariki ya 29 Kamena 2021, agena ko ingamba nshya zigomba gushyirwa mu bikorwa guhera tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 2021 mu “Mujyi wa Kigali no mu Turere twa Burera, Gicumbi, Kamonyi, Musanze, Nyagatare, Rubavu, Rutsiro na Rwamagana”.
Aya mabwiriza agena ko ingendo zibujijwe guhera “Saa Kumi n’ebyiri za nimugoroba kugeza saa Kumi za mu gitondo”. Ni mu gihe ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa Kumi n’imwe za nimugoroba.
CP John Bosco Kabera wari mu kiganiro kuri RBA yavuze ko gahunda abantu bose by’umwihariko abo muri ibyo bice bakwiye kubahiriza ari ukugera mu ngo zabo ku isaha yateganyijwe.
Ati “Kuri bose rero, gahunda ni gera mu rugo saa Kumi n’ebyiri bose babireba.”
CP Kabera kandi yihanije abantu batangiye kuvuga ko isaha ya saa Kumi n’ebyiri [18h00], yashyizweho, ari kare cyane bityo bakaba bashobora kuzafatirwa mu duce batuyemo banze kujya mu ngo zabo ngo kuko butari bwira.
Ati “Polisi ntabwo izihanganira abantu batangiye kuvuga ko kugera mu rugo saa Kumi n’ebyiri za nimugoroba ari kare cyane bityo bakaba bateganya kuzava mu kazi cyangwa aho bakorera bagorobereza muri Quartier ngo ku bo bategereje ko bwira bakabona kujya mu ngo zabo.”
“Ntabwo Polisi izabyemera! Abantu barakangurirwa kureka gukora ingendo zitari ngombwa.”
Uretse amabwiriza areba uturere umunani n’Umujyi wa Kigali, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko ibindi bice bisigaye by’igihugu, ingendo zibujijwe guhera saa Kumi n’ebyiri za nimugoroba kugeza saa Kumi za mu gitondo. Ni mu gihe ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa Kumi n’imwe za nimugoroba.
Muri rusange n’ubwo hari ingamba zo gukumira ikwirakwira ziba zashyizweho, Abanyarwanda bakangurirwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima asaba gukaraba amazi meza n’isabune, kwambara neza agapfukamunwa, kwirinda gukora ingendo zitari ngombwandetse no guhana intera mu gihe habayeho guhura.
Bane bishwe na Coronavirus mu RwandHagiye kwitabazwa Ibitaro by’Intara kubera ubwinshi bw’abandura n’abazahazwa na Covid-19 i Rubavua, naho 36 barembejwe nayo.
Abitabye Imana ni abagore babiri barimo uw’imyaka 104 w’i Kigali n’uwa 66 w’i Rubavu, n’abagabo babiri barimo uw’imyaka 58 w’i Rubavu n’uwa 57 w’i Huye.
Umubare w’abakirwaye wageze ku 10.495 barimo 36 barembye; mu gihe abamaze kwandura icyo cyorezo mu gihugu ubu ari 38.198 ubariyemo 814 bashya babonetse mu masaha 24 ashize.
Umujyi wa Kigali ni wo wagaragayemo abarwayi bashya benshi (187) naho Nyabihu ni ko karere rukumbi katabonetsemo umurwayi mushya.
Raporo ya Minisante igaragaza ko nta murwayi wakize uyu munsi bigatuma umubare w’abakize ukomeza kuba 27.272; naho ibipimo 10.103 byafashwe byatumye ibimaze gufatwa bigera ku 1.631.415.
Abagera ku 391.785 ni bo bamaze gukingirwa COVID-19 mu Rwanda. Muri bo 249.526 bahawe dose ya AstraZeneca habariwemo na 400 bayifashe uyu munsi.
Minisante iributsa Abaturarwanda gukomeza kwirinda bubahiriza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima.
Kuva muri Werurwe, abasaga 1700 ni bo bamaze kwandura COVID19 muri Rubavu, aho abasaga 60% banduye mu kwezi kumwe gusa kwa Kamena 2021.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA, Guverineri Habitegeko yavuze ko kugeza ubu abarwayi ba Covid-19 barembye baboneka i Rubavu bagiye kujya boherezwa kuvurirwa ku bitaro bya Kibuye.
Avuga ko kuri ubu i Rubavu hakomeje kugaragara ubwiyongere bukabije bw’abandura Covid-19, ndetse ikabazahaza bakaba bari hafi kurenga ubushobozi bw’Ibitaro bya Gisenyi byabakiraga.
Akarere ka Rubavu kari mu twugarijwe bikomeye n’ubwandu bwa Covid-19 bushya aho nko mu Cyumweru gishize hagaragaye abantu bashya banduye iki cyorezo barenga 400.
Muri rusange imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yo ku wa 27 Kamena 2021, igaragaza ko kuva muri Werurwe 2020, abantu 36.627 ari bo bamaze kwandura Covid-19 mu bipimo 1.614.429 bimaze gufatwa hirya no hino mu gihugu.
Inzego zirimo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima zikomeje gusaba Abaturarwanda gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo bubahiriza amabwiriza arimo kwirinda kwihuriza ahantu hafunganye ari benshi kuko byorohereza Coronavirus gukwirakwira.
U Rwanda rurakoza imitwe y’intoki ku ntego yo kubaka ivuriro muri buri kagari.
Muri gahunda ya Guverinoma y’imyaka irindwi (NST1), harimo umuhigo w’uko buri kagari muri 2 148 turi mu gihugu, kazaba gafite ivuriro rito rizwi nka ‘Poste de Santé’ bitarenze muri 2024.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Daniel Ngamije yatangaje ko uwo muhigo uri hafi kweswa, igisigaye akaba ari ukongera serivisi zitangirwa kuri ayo mavuriro y’ibanze.
Yabitangaje kuri iki Cyumweru ubwo hamwe n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa SC Johnson, ikigo cyo muri Amerika kizobereye mu gukora imiti n’ibindi bikoresho byifashishwa mu buvuzi, Dr Dr Herbert Fisk Johnson III ndetse n’umuyobozi w’Umuryango SFH Rwanda, Manasseh Wandera basuraga ivuriro ry’ibanze rya Saruhembe mu Murenge wa Mahama, Akarere ka Kirehe bakanakurikira igikorwa cyo gukingira Covid-19 abaturage barengeje imyaka 60.
Iryo vuriro riherereye mu birometero bike uvuye ku rubibi rw’u Rwanda na Tanzania, ni rimwe mu mavuriro y’ibanze agera kuri 64 yubatswe ku nkunga ya SC Johnson binyuze muri SFH Rwanda.
Minisitiri Ngamije yavuze ko bakeneye abafatanyabikorwa nk’abo babafasha gushyira mu bikorwa gahunda Guverinoma yiyemeje, yo kugeza ubuvuzi kuri bose.
Ati “Gukorana n’umufatanyabikorwa nk’uriya uza tugashyira hamwe twese, tugatanga abakozi, tugatanga ibikoreho, tugatanga imiti, bakadufasha mu bijyanye no kubaka twese tugashyira ingufu hamwe, ni ibintu bishimishije bituma tugenda twongera ubushobozi kugira ngo abantu bacu bavurwe ku gihe kandi neza.”
Dr Ngamije yavuze ko kubera abafatanyabikorwa nk’abo, gahunda yo kubaka amavuriro y’ibanze mu tugari twose tw’igihugu, iri hafi kugerwaho.
Ati “Mu gihugu hose utugari tudafite postes de santé ntabwo ari twinshi. Nk’aha mu karere ka Kirehe ni tune gusa, utundi twose twarazibonye. Biraguha ishusho y’uko bihagaze no mu tundi turere. Imibare isigaye ntabwo ari minini. Ntabwo ari utugari tugeze kuri 50 mu gihugu hose tutari twabona izi serivisi. Icyo dushaka gushyiramo ingufu cyane cyane ni ukugira ngo aho batarazibona bazibone ariko n’abazibonye dutange serivisi yuzuye.”
Icyakora nubwo amavuriro y’ibanze akomeje kubakawa, Dr Ngamije yavuze ko imbaraga ziri gushyirwa mu kuzongerera ubushobozi kugira ngo zibashe gutanga serivisi nyinshi zikenerwa n’abaturage.
Yavuze ko kuri ubu amavuriro mato ari kubakwa guhera umwaka ushize “afite serivisi zose abaturage baba bakeneye kugira ngo tubarinde urugendo rugana ku kigo nderabuzima kuko hari igihe usanga ikigo nderabuzima kiri kure.”
Muri izo serivisi ziri kongerwa mu mavuriro mato harimo nk’ububyaza, ubuvuzi bw’amaso, ubw’amenyo n’ibindi.
Nibura ivuriro ry’ibanze, ribarirwa guha serivisi z’ubuvuzi abaturage bari hagati y’ibihumbi bitanu n’ibihumbi birindwi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa SC Johnson, Dr Herbert Fisk Johnson III, yashimiye ubufatanye buri hagati y’ikigo ayoboye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda mu kugeza ubuvuzi bw’ibanze ku baturage, ashimangira ko bazakomeza gutanga uwo musanzu.
Uretse kubaka amavuriro y’ibanze no gushyiramo ibikoresho, icyo kigo kinafasha Leta y’u Rwanda mu zindi gahunda nko gutanga imiti yo guhashya malaria, kurwanya Covid-19 aho giherutse gutanga inkingo za Pfizer ibihumbi 60 n’ibindi.
Kubaka amavuriro y’ibanze ku rwego rw’utugari no kwegereza serivisi z’ubuzima abaturage, ni umwe mu myanzuro 13 yafatiwe mu Mwiherero wa 15 w’abayobozi wabaye mu 2018.
Ni mu gihe raporo zitandukanye za Minisiteri y’Ubuzima zerekana ko 83% by’indwara zivurwa, usanga zivurirwa ku rwego rw’utugari n’imirenge kuko ari zo nzego zegereye abaturage.
Abantu icyenda bahitanywe na Coronavirus mu Rwanda.
Muri raporo ngarukamunsi ya Minisante hagaragajwe ko mu masaha 24 ashize abamaze kwandura bageze ku 36.627 kubera 741 bashya babonetse, naho abakize biyongeraho 113 bagera ku 27.090.
Abarwayi bashya babonetse uyu munsi biganjemo abo muri Kigali (217), mu gihe Rulindo ari ko karere rukumbi katabonetsemo umurwayi mushya wa Coronavirus.
Hafashwe kandi ibipimo bishya 7.863 bituma umubare w’ibimaze gufatwa uba 1.614.429. Abakirwaye bo ni 9.117 barimo 26 barembye.
Ijanisha ku bahitanwa n’icyorezo ryagumye kuri 1,1%, iry’abandura rirazamuka rigera ku 9,4% naho iry’abakira riramanuka rigera ku 73,9%.
Abagera ku 391.675 ni bo bamaze gukingirwa mu Rwanda. Muri bo 248.718 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri ya AstraZeneca, barimo 174 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Minisante irasaba Abaturarwanda gukomeza kwirinda icyorezo bubahiriza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima, cyane cyane birinda kwihuriza ahantu hafunganye ari benshi kuko byorohereza Coronavirus gukwirakwira.
Menya ibihugu 11 bimaze kubonekamo Delta Plus, Virus ya rurangiza ya Covid-19.
Ubu bwoko bushya bwakangaranyije Isi ubundi bwahawe izina rya B.1.617.2.1 cyangwa AY.1 ariko bumenyekana ku rya Delta Plus.
Inzobere mu buzima zikomeje gucukumbura ngo zimenye niba ubu bwoko bwa Delta Plus bwaba bufite umwihariko mu kwandura vuba kurusha ubwabonetse mbere bwa Alpha n’ubwa Delta nubwo ngo hakiri kare kumenya nyir’izina ingaruka zose zishobora guterwa n’iyi virus nshya.
Delta Plus imaze kugaragarara mu bihugu 11 aho abayanduye benshi bamaze kuboneka muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
U Bwongereza ni cyo gihugu cya kabiri gifite abanduye benshi. Aba mbere bagaragaweho n’iyi virus mu Bwongereza bivugwa ko bari baherutse gutemberera mu bihugu bya Nepal na Turikiya.
U Buhinde buza ku mwanya wa gatatu mu kugira umubare munini w’abamaze kwandura Delta Plus aho bagera kuri 40 nk’uko leta y’icyo gihugu yabitangaje ku wa Gatatu w’iki cyumweru.
Ibindi bihugu umunani bimaze kugaragaramo ubwo bwoko bushya bw’agakoko ka Coronavirus buzwi nka Delta Plus ni Canada, u Buyapani, Nepal, Pologne, Portugal, u Burusiya, u Busuwisi na Turikiya.
Umubare w’abamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda warenze ibihumbi 35.
Muri raporo ngarukamunsi yo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, Umujyi wa Kigali ni wo wabonetsemo abarwayi benshi (343), naho Bugesera, Kirehe, Nyagatare na Rwamagana nta murwayi wahabonetse.
Itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara rivuga ko abamaze gukira icyo cyorezo ari 26.977 ubariyemo 112 bakize uyu munsi, naho abakirwaye ni 7.637.
Hagaragajwe kandi ko abamaze guhitanwa n’icyorezo bageze kuri 404 kubera babiri biyongereho, mu gihe abarembye babaye 26.
Abaturarwanda 391.625 bamaze guhabwa urukingo rwa Coronavirus, ibipimo bimaze gufatwa mu mezi 15 imaze igaragaye mu Rwanda byo ni 1.594.197 habariwemo na 10.585 byafashwe mu masaha 24 ashize.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima iributsa Abaturarwanda gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza y’inzego z’ubuzima haba abakingiwe n’abatarakingiwe, kandi bakirinda guhurira ahantu hafunganye ari benshi kuko byagaragaye ko biha icyuho icyorezo.
Igiciro cyo kwipimisha Covid-19 kigiye guhinduka.
Ubusanzwe kwipimisha Covid-19 bikorwa mu buryo bubiri. Hari ikizamini gifatwa cyihuta cyizwi nka “Antigen Covid-19 rapid test” cyishyurwa 10.000 Frw. Icyo umuntu apimwa mu mazuru ibisubizo bikaboneka mu minota itarenze 30 cyangwa iri hasi yayo.
Hari ikindi cyitwa “PCR” gifatwa mu kanwa, cyo kiba kigamije gucukumbura ngo kirebe ko umuntu adafite ubwandu bwa Covid-19, ibisubizo biboneka nyuma y’amasaha 24, umuntu akishyura 47.200 Frw.
Umuyobozi wa RBC, Dr. Sabin Nsanzimana, ubwo yaganiraga na KT Radio, yavuze ko leta iri hafi kugabanya ikiguzi cyasabwaga mu gihe cyo kwipimisha Coronavirus.
Ati “Twasoje kugirana ibiganiro na sosiyete zitunganya ibikoresho byifashishwa mu gupima Covid-19 ku buryo byatuma ikiguzi cyo kwipimisha kigabanuka kikagera nibura hagati y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda 5000 na 6000.”
Dr Nsanzimana yashimangiye ko mu gihe ibi byaba bimaze gushyirwa mu ngiro, u Rwanda rwabasha kongera imibare y’abantu bipimisha icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Nubwo kandi umuyobozi wa RBC atatangaje igihe nyir’izina bizashyirirwa mu bikorwa, ariko yavuze ko hari amahirwe menshi ko serivisi yo kwipimisha Covid-19 yakongerwa mu zitangwa n’ubwisungane mu kwivuza bwa Mutuelle de Santé.
Kuva Covid-19 yagera mu Rwanda, hamaze gufatwa ibipimo 1.583.612 aho muri byo abantu 34.143 basanzwe baranduye.
Icyo abaganga bavuga ku bandura Covid-19 kandi barahawe urukingo.
Ni ibintu abahanga mu birebana n’inkingo bemeza ko nta mpungenge biteye, bitewe n’uko nubwo bayirwaye hari ubudahangarwa umubiri wabo uba ufite ku buryo badashobora kuremba nk’abatarakingiwe.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr. Ngamije Daniel, aherutse kubwira RBA, ko mu bantu basuzumye harimo abasaga 35 banduye kandi bari barakingiwe, ndetse bamwe baranakingiwe inkingo zombie, ariko ko icya ngombwa ari uko uwakingiwe ataremba.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ariko ntabwo usanga yazanye ibimenyetso mpuruza ngo usange yagiye kwa muganga.Nta n’umwe turajyana mu bitaro yarembye, bivuze ngo urukingo rufite akamaro tugomba kurwitabira ariko tukanamenya ko uwakingiwe agomba kwitwararika kugira ngo atandura ngo yanduze n’abandi.”
Ibivugwa na Minisitiri w’Ubuzima kandi bishimangirwa n’umuganga unafite inararibonye kuko amaze imyaka irenga 45 muri uyu mwuga, Dr. Muyombano Antoine, uvuga ko urukingo rwongerera umubiri ubudahangarwa ku buryo iyo virusi iwugezemo abasirikare bayirwanya.
Yagize ati “Iyo umuntu yakingiwe ni kimwe no kumuha ka gakoko bashegeshe bamazemo uburozi, ariko basigiye ubushobozi bwo kurinda indwara. Gukingira rero ni kimwe n’urukingo rw’iseru, ni kimwe no gutera umwana agakoko gatera iseru ariko batse bwa bushobozi kugira ngo bagasigire ububasha bwo kurinda ya ndwara umubiri.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Rero iteka iyo uhuye n’ako gakoko ukamenya ko ugomba kwirwanaho ugasa n’aho wohereza ba basirikare bawurinda, ni kimwe no kuvuga ko umuntu aba ari aho aryamiye amajanja umwanzi yaza noneho ukirwanaho.”
Asobanura uburyo hari abantu batatu bamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 kandi bari barakingiwe, Dr Muyombano avuga ko nta gitangaza ko uwakingiwe ashobora guhitanwa n’izindi ndwara zidakira zirimo SIDA n’izindi.
Ati “Umwana wakingiwe iseru ashobora guhitanwa n’indwara y’umutima ibyo si ibintu twahakana ariko ntabwo ashobora guhitanwa n’indwara y’iseru, iyo afite umubiri ufite ubushobozi bwo kurwanya n’izindi ndwara.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni ukuvuga ko niba urukingo rugeze mu mubiri washegeshwe n’izindi ndwara ari kanseri, ari SIDA ari indwara y’umutima , ari indwara y’impyiko yapfa azize iyo ndwara, kuko nubwo yaba yarakingiwe ariko ntabwo aba yarakingiwe kuri izo ndwara maze kuvuga.”
Kugeza ubu kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira Coronavirusi mu Rwanda bitangiye ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021, abagera ku 391.058 ni bo bamaze guhabwa inkingo za Covid-19 zo mu bwoko bwa AstraZeneca na Pfizer.
Leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo urukingo rugere ku bantu benshi bashoboka, nibura 60%. Mu gihe aba bantu bazaba barakingiwe, inzego zishinzwe ubuzima zivuga ko ari bwo ibintu bishobora kuzasubira mu murongo byahozemo Covid-19 itaraza.
Ni iki kiri gutera ugutumbagira kw’imibare y’abandura n’abahitanwa na Covid-19?
Ni kenshi muri raporo ya buri munsi ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ishusho ya Covid-19, abantu bagiye bakangarana babonye umubare munini w’abanduye bashya ariko uretse ku wa 23 Kamena 2021, nta wundi munsi abanduye bigeze bagera kuri 900.
Raporo ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko mu Cyumweru kimwe, ni ukuvuga kuva ku wa 17 Kamena -23 Kamena 2021, abantu bamaze kwandura Covid-19 ni 4085.
Ni muri iki Cyumweru kandi hagiye hagaragara abanduye benshi umunsi umwe kuko nko ku wa 21 Kamena handuye abantu 622, ku wa 22 Kamena handura abantu 861 mu gihe mu masaha 24 yo ku wa 23 Kamena 2021, habonetse abarwayi bashya 964.
Ibi bivuze ko muri iyi minsi itatu ishize ari iy’amateka mashya ya Covid-19 mu Rwanda kuko urebye n’umubare w’abamaze kwicwa n’iki cyorezo muri iyo minsi itatu ni 15.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yabwiye IGIHE ko kugeza ubu abarwayi bangana na 96%, bari kwitabwaho bari iwabo mu ngo naho abandi basigaye bari mu bigo byita ku barwayi ba Covid-19 [Treatment Centers] bya Nyarugenge na Kanyinya.
Iyi mibare hari icyo isobanuye
Muri rusange uko imibare y’abandura yiyongera ni ko n’abarwayi bakenera kwitabwaho biyongera kuko ubu abarwaye bose ni 6.129 barimo 12 barembye. Ni mu gihe umubare w’abakira uri kugabanyuka kuko bakize mu masaha 24 yashize hakize abantu 22 gusa.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel yavuze ko impamvu ziri gutuma imibare y’abandura n’abahitanwa na Covid-19 yiyongera zishingiye cyane ku kudohoka kw’Abanyarwanda ku bijyanye no kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho hagamijwe kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’iki cyorezo.
Ati “Muri iyi minsi ishize, imibare y’abandura Covid-19 ndetse n’abajyanwa mu bitaro yongeye kuzamuka, zimwe mu mpamvu zibitera ni uko habayeho kudohoka kwa benshi ndetse no kudakurikiza ingamba zo kwirinda.”
Leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje gukora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo urukingo rugere ku bantu benshi bashoboka, nibura 60% y’Abanyarwanda bose. Mu gihe aba bantu bazaba barakingiwe, inzego zishinzwe ubuzima zivuga ko ari bwo ibintu bishobora kuzasubira mu murongo byahozemo Covid-19 itaraza.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira Coronavirusi mu Rwanda bitangiye ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021, abagera ku 391.058 ni bo bamaze guhabwa inkingo za COVID-19 zo mu bwoko bwa AstraZeneca na Pfizer.
Covid-19 itembera mu mwuka; abantu baragirwa inama
Minisitiri Dr Ngamije avuga ko uburyo iki cyorezo cyandura n’uko gikwirakwira muri rusange buteye inkeke ari na yo mpamvu abaturage basabwa kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho n’inzego zishinzwe ubuzima.
Ati “Tugomba gufata ingamba zikaze kurushaho ndetse tukanazishyira mu bikorwa uko bikwiye tutararengwa n’iki kibazo nk’uko byagiye bigaragara no mu bindi bihugu.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ubushakashatsi bumaze kwemeza ko iyi virusi itembera mu mwuka kandi igakwirakwira mu bantu igihe bari ahantu hafunganye kandi hatageramo umwuka wo hanze uhagije, bityo haba harimo urwaye akanduza abari kumwe na we ahumetse, avuze cyangwa se akoroye.”
Abarwayi batatu mu bakingiwe Covid-19 yarabahitanye mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi wa RBC, Dr Sabin Nsanzimana, yabwiye TV1 ko abarwayi batatu bahitanywe na Covid-19 bari baranduye indwara zikomeye zirimo kanseri.
Yagize ati “Hari abantu batatu bahawe urukingo rwa Covid-19 bitabye Imana ariko nta gikuba cyacitse kuko bari basanzwe bafite uburwayi bukomeye. Urugero umwe muri bo yari afite kanseri yo ku gipimo cyo hejuru, undi nawe yari afite indwara y’umutima.’’
Yasobanuye ko urukingo ruha umubiri w’uwaruhawe ubudahangarwa kuri Covid-19 ariko ntirwamubuza guhitanwa nayo.
Yakomeje ati “Ntitwavuga ko bahitanywe nayo kuko izo ndwara zari zibarembeje.’’
