Dr Nsanzimana yavuze ko abantu bakwiye gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda kuko guhabwa urukingo bidakuraho ko umuntu yakwandura cyangwa ngo yanduze mugenzi we.
Ati “Twagaragaje imibare ko abantu 400 bakingiwe Covid-19 banduye, icyo bahuriyeho bose ntibaremba, icyiciro cyabo kinini bari barafashe urukingo rwabo rwa mbere bategereje urwa kabiri. Guhabwa urukingo rwa kabiri kandi ntibiguha ubudahangarwa ijana ku ijana ko Covid-19 utahura nayo, nta rukingo rwizewe ijana ku ijana turabona ku buryo abantu bakwirara.”
Yasabye abadohoka ku mabwiriza yo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 bagatera ishoti ibyo kwambara agapfukamunwa bitwaje ko bakingiwe kwitwararika kuko bashobora kwandura no kwanduza abandi nubwo nta bimenyetso bagaragaza cyangwa ngo barembe.
Amakuru y’abantu bakingiwe ariko bakitaba Imana yatangajwe mu gihe ubwandu bwa Covid-19 bukomeje kwiyongera ku kigero cyo hejuru.
Imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yo ku wa 22 Kamena 2021, yerekanye ko uwo munsi gusa habonetse abarwayi 861 mu bipimo 7.624 mu gihe abarwayi bane bahitanywe n’iki cyorezo mu masaha 24.
Kuva ibikorwa byo gukingira Coronavirus mu Rwanda bitangiye ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021, abagera ku 391.001 ni bo bamaze guhabwa inkingo za COVID-19 zo mu bwoko bwa AstraZeneca na Pfizer.
Ibyamenyekanye kuri Delta, ubwoko bwa Coronavirus yihinduranya buteye Isi impungenge.
Ubwabonetse mu Bwongereza bwiswe Alpha, ubwo muri Afurika y’Epfo bwitwa Beta, mu gihe ubwabonetse mu Buhinde bwahawe izina rya Delta.
Nubwo bwose bufatwa nk’ubwihinduranya muri rusange, ubushakashatsi butandukanye bwerekanye ko hari itandukaniro mu buryo bwo gukwirakwira, kurembya no kwica abandura.
Ubwiswe Delta bwagaragaye bwa mbere mu Buhinde mu Mpera za 2020 bushyirwa ku isonga mu kwandura vuba ndetse bitekerezwa ko ari bwo ntandaro y’impfu n’ubwandu bya COVID-19 bibarirwa mu bihumbi bimaze iminsi biboneka muri icyo gihugu buri masaha 24.
OMS igaragaza ko kugeza ubu Delta imaze kuboneka mu bihugu 74, biturutse ku koroshya ingamba kwa bimwe byafunguye imipaka.
Uretse kuba igenda ikwirakwira mu bihugu byinshi vuba, ubushakashatsi bw’Abongereza bwerekanye ko inandura byihuse ku gipimo cya 40% ugereranyije na Alpha yahabonetse bwa mbere, nayo bigaragazwa ko yandura ku gipimo kiri hagati ya 43% na 90% ugereranyije n’izindi.
Magingo aya hagaragazwa ko abarenga 91% mu banduye COVID-19 mu Bwongereza basanganywe Delta.
Ntabwo haranzurwa icyaba gitera uko kwandura ku muvuduko uri hejuru kwa Delta, gusa Biorxiv iheruka kumurika inyigo igaragaza ko utunyangingo twayo twihuriza hamwe kugira ngo tubone imbaraga zo kwinjira mu mubiri neza.
Ikindi cyagaragaye kuri Delta ni uko abayanduye baremba vuba kandi ibimenyetso byayo bikagaragara cyane mu buryo butandukanye n’ibyagaragaye ku banduye Coronavirus icyaduka mu mpera za 2019.
Abaganga bo mu Bushinwa baherutse gutangaza ko 12% by’abanduye Delta muri icyo gihugu baremba bakagaragaza n’ibimenyetso bikomeye mu minsi itatu cyangwa ine, mu gihe kuri Coronavirus isanzwe abaremba muri iyo minsi baba bari hagati ya 2% na 3%.
Ibyo biniyongeraho kuba abashakashatsi bo mu Bwongereza baherutse kwerekana ko n’ibimenyetso byayo bigenda bihindagurika ugereranyije n’ibisanzwe bizwi, bikaba byaba icyuho cyo kuyikwirakwiza ku bakiri bato batajya bagaragaza ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus n’ubusanzwe.
Prof Tim Spector wari uyoboye ababukoze yavuze ko ibimenyetso basanganye abenshi mu banduye Delta ari ukuribwa umutwe, kumagara mu muhogo, kugira umuriro no gutoha amazuru cyane.
Gukorora no gutakaza ubushobozi bwo kumva impumuro byo ntibyakunze kuboneka.
Inyigo yakorewe ku barwayi 19.543 ba COVID-19 barimo 377 bajyanywe mu bitaro muri Ecosse, yo yerekanye ko uwanduye Delta afite ibyago byo kurwarira mu bitaro zikubye inshuro ebyiri ugereranyije n’abandi.
Ubwo bushakashatsi bwanerekanye ko dose imwe y’urukingo nta gikomeye isobanuye ku wanduye Delta, kuko nibura nyuma y’ibyumweru bitatu ahawe iya Pfizer imurinda kuremba ku gipimo cya 33%. Uwanduye Alpha we imurinda 50%.
Icyakora uwahawe dose ebyiri zayo we aba afite uburinzi bukomeye kuri Delta nubwo butaba bungana n’ubwo ku bundi bwoko.
Hagaragazwa ko nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri umuntu ahawe dose ya kabiri ya Pfizer imurinda kurembywa na Delta ku gipimo cya 79%. Ni mu gihe kuri Alpha ho aba afite uburinzi bwa 92%.
Mu bwoko butandukanye bwa Coronavirus yihinduranya, OMS ivuga ko Delta ari yo “virus iteye impungenge”.
Hari amakuru y’uko ibihugu by’u Burayi byo biri kwitegura gutanga dose ya gatatu mu kurinda abaturage babyo kugarizwa n’ubwoko bushya bwa Coronavirus zihinduranya.
Bwa mbere mu Rwanda abantu 861 banduye COVID-19 mu munsi umwe.
Itangazo rya Minisante ryo kuri uyu wa 22 Kamena 2021 ryerekanye ko abantu 861 basanzwemo COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus bagaragaye mu bipimo 7.624. Ibi byatumye umubare w’abamaze kwandura uba 32.296 mu bipimo 1.564.486 bimaze gufatwa kuva muri Werurwe 2021.
Abarwayi bashya biganje mu Mujyi wa Kigali, ahabonetse 388 ndetse aka gace kari mu turi kubonekamo abanduye benshi. Uyu munsi, i Rubavu habonetse 83, Musanze ni 61, Burera [50], Kamonyi [47], Rutsiro [35], Rwamagana [27], Nyanza [24], Gicumbi [23] na Gakenke [23].
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere mu Rwanda hagaragaye abarwayi benshi [861] mu munsi umwe. Umubare munini uheruka wabonetse ku wa 21 Kamena 2021 ubwo abantu 622 basanganwaga ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo cyugarije Isi.
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri kandi abantu bane barimo abagore babiri b’imyaka 56 na 42 n’abagabo babiri b’imyaka 67 na 52 bahitanywe na COVID-19 i Kigali, bituma umubare w’abamaze kwicwa n’iki cyorezo ugera kuri 392.
Minisante yavuze ko abarwayi umunani ari bo bakize COVID-19, abamaze gusezerwa mu bitaro baba 26.712. Abagera ku 5.192 ni bo bari gukurikiranirwa mu ngo zabo mu gihe abandi bari kwitabwaho kwa muganga. Abarembye ni 10.
Abantu 247.402 ni bo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa COVID-19 (AstraZeneca) mu gihe abakingiwe bose mu Rwanda ari 391.001.
Ibimenyetso bya COVID-19 birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro. Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Mu gukomeza kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kwitwararika no kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune no kwambara udupfukamunwa n’amazuru mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi.
Abarwayi 40 ba Covid-19 bari kongererwa umwuka, batandatu bararembye.
Bigaragazwa n’uko mbere ya Kamena, mu bitaro bya Nyarugenge byubatswemo ahantu ho kwita ku barwayi ba Covid-19, hari harwariyemo abantu bagera kuri 20 ariko kuri ubu bakaba bageze ku 100.
Minisitiri Dr Ngamije, yabitangaje mu kiganiro kuri RBA, cyasobanuriwemo ingamba zashyizweho na Guverinoma hagamijwe kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19.
Yavuze ko ufatiye urugero rwo ku munsi w’ejo hashize, abarwayi bashya banduye Covid-19, barenze 600, ibintu bitigeze bibaho.
Ati “Ni ishusho y’uko icyorezo kiri gukwirakwira mu bantu batandukanye, mu byiciro bitandukanye. Hashize ibyumweru bitatu aho twatangiye kubona imibare ikomeza kuzamuka,hafatwa ibyemezo ariko biza kugaragara ko hakanewe gufatwa ibindi bikomeye kurushaho.”
Minisitiri Dr Ngamije yavuze ko uretse kuba imibare y’abandura bashya yaragiye igaragara mu Mujyi wa Kigali, mu hantu hatandukanye nko mu masoko n’ahandi hahurira abantu benshi ariko muri iyi minsi itatu ishize mu bice bya Nyagatare, Kirehe na Ngoma mu Burasirazuba naho hagaragaye abantu banduye.
Yavuze ko kugeza ubu bitewe n’umubare w’abandura ukomeje kwiyongera ari ko n’abarembye na bo biyongereye kuko nk’ubu mu bitaro hari abagera kuri 40 barembye ku buryo bari kongererwa umwuka.
Ati “Umuntu arongera akanabibonera cyane cyane mu barwayi dusanga kwa muganga babaye bashyizwe mu bitaro kubera ko bafite ibimenyetso bikaze kurushaho, umuntu arabibonera ku Bitaro bya Nyarugenge, aho twakirira abarwayi ba Covid-19 barembye.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bitatu twavuye ku barwayi 20 twari dufite mu bitaro bya Nyarugenge ubu tugeze ku 100, abari gukurikiranwa by’umwihariko bari guhabwa umwuka ni 40 na ho harimo nka batandatu barembye cyane. Ni ikigaragara ko icyorezo gihari, abantu bakwiriye gufata ingamba zikomeye.”
Kugeza ubu imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yo ku wa 21 Kamena 2021, igaragaza ko abarwayi bakiri kwitabwaho byihariye baba abarwariye mu bitaro n’abari mu ngo zabo ari 4343.
Minisitiri Dr Ngamije yavuze ko ubwiyongere bw’abandura ahanini buturuka ku kuba abantu bakomeje kugaragaza ukudohoka gukomeye ahanini biturutse ku kuba barabonye inkingo zaje, ibikorwa byo gukingira byaratangiye, bakeka ko icyorezo cyamaze gutsindwa burundu.
Yavuze ko iyo abantu bubahirije amabwiriza mu gihe kitarenze ibyumweru bibiri icyorezo kiba cyamaze gucika intege ari na yo mpamvu buri munyarwanda wese akwiye kugira uruhare mu kubahiriza amabwiriza ashyirwaho hagamijwe ubwirinzi.
Minisitiri Ngamije yavuze ko abari kwicwa n’iki cyorezo ari abo mu ngeri zitandukanye, baba abakiri bato ndetse n’abakuze cyane ko nko muri batandatu yahitanye kuri uyu wa Mbere harimo uruhinja.
COVID-19: Hashyizweho Guma mu Karere, amasaha ntarengwa y’ingendo ashyirwa saa Moya.
Iyi nama yateranye kuri uyu wa Mbere, tariki ya 21 Kamena 2021, yayobowe na Perezida Paul Kagame muri Village Urugwiro.
Mu byemezo bikomeye byayifatiwemo harimo ko ingendo zibujijwe guhera saa Moya z’ijoro kugeza saa Kumi za mu gitondo mu gihe ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa Kumi n’Ebyiri z’ijoro.
Aya mabwiriza mashya yemejwe nyuma y’aho ubwandu bukomeje gukaza umurego mu gihugu. Uhereye nko ku wa 11 Kamena ukageza ku wa 20 Kamena 2021, mu gihugu hose hari hamaze kuboneka ubwandu bw’abantu 3153.
Mu mabwiriza mashya harimo ko ingendo zibujijwe guhera saa Moya z’ijoro kugeza saa Kumi za mu gitondo. Ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa Kumi n’ebyiri.
Ikindi kandi ni uko ingendo hagati y’Umujyi wa Kigali n’Intara ndetse n’ingendo hagati y’uturere tundi tw’igihugu zirabujijwe cyereka ku mpamvu za serivisi z’ubuzima cyangwa se izindi serivisi z’ingenzi. Icyakora imodoka zitwaye ibicuruzwa zemerewe kugenda mu turere twose ariko ntizitware abantu barenze babiri.
Mu zindi mpinduka zabayeho ni uko inama zikorwa imbonankubone zizakomeza gusa umubare w’abitabira ntugomba kurenga 30% y’ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu bw’aho bateranira.
Abitabiriye inama kandi bazajya basabwa kugaragaza ko bipimishije Covid-19.
Ku bijyanye n’ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nk’ubusabane n’ibirori bitandukanye byaba ibibera mu ngo cyangwa ahandi hose, birabujijwe.
Imihango y’ubukwe nayo yafatiwe ingamba nshya, uhereye ku gusaba no gukwa, ishyingirwa rikorewe imbere y’ubuyobozi bwa leta n’irikorewe mu nsengero, byasubitswe.
Ni mu gihe ubusanzwe ubukwe bwari bwemewe ariko bukitabirwa n’umubare muto ungana na 30% by’ubushobozi bw’aho bwabereye kandi nabyo bigakorwa abitabiriye bose bipimishije.
Ku bikorwa by’inzego za leta, bizakomeza ariko buri rwego rurasabwa gukoresha abakozi b’ingenzi batarenze 15% by’abakozi bose abandi bagakorera mu rugo ariko bakagenda basimburana.
Restaurant na Café zo zizakomeza gukora ariko ntizirenze 30% by’ubushobozi bwazo bwo kwakira abantu. Zemerewe kandi kwakira abakiliya kugeza saa kumi n’ebyiri za nimugoroba.
Ku rundi ruhande, restaurant zizagenwa na RDB zizajya zisaba abazigana kwerekana ko bipimishije Covid-19.
Ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byo bizakomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19. Muri ibyo bikorwa harimo amahoteli, abashinzwe kuyobora ba mukerarugendo na serivisi zo gutwara ba mukerarugendo.
Ingamba nshya ku guhangana na COVID-19 zizatangira gushyirwa mu bikorwa ku wa Gatatu, tariki ya 23 Kamena 2021 mu gihe zizongera kuvugururwa nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri hashingiwe ku isesengura ry’inzego z’ubuzima.
Abanyarwanda bibutswa ko ari ingenzi gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19 arimo gusiga intera hagati y’umuntu undi, kwambara neza agapfukamunwa n’amazuru no gukaraba intoki n’amazi n’isabune.
COVID-19: Perezida Kagame yayoboye Inama y’Abaminisitiri idasanzwe yitezweho ingamba nshya.
Abagize Guverinoma bayobowe n’Umukuru w’Igihugu bateranye ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 21 Kamena 2021, muri Village Urugwiro.
Itangazo ry’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu, Village Urugwiro ryanyujijwe kuri Twitter rigira riti “Kuri iki gicamunsi muri Village Urugwiro, Perezida Kagame ayoboye inama idasanzwe y’Abaminisitiri yo kwiga ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo n’ingamba za Covid-19.”
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye mu gihe hari hashize iminsi icyenda habaye 
Iyo nama yanzuye ko ingendo zibujijwe guhera saa Tatu z’ijoro kugera saa Kumi za mu gitondo mu gihe ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa Mbili z’ijoro.
Izindi mpinduka zagaragaye ni uko “imodoka zitwara abantu mu buryo bwa rusange (bisi) zemerewe gutwara abantu batarenze 50% by’umubare zagenewe gutwara.”
Imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ya buri munsi igaragaza ko nibura kuva ku wa 19 Mata kugeza ku wa 19 Kamena 2021, imibare y’abandura yazamutse ku rwego rukomeye ku buryo muri Mata ku munsi handuraga abantu babarirwa munsi ya 60 ariko kuri ubu hakaba hari kwandura ababarirwa hagati ya 200 na 400.
Nk’ubu mu minsi ine ishize, ni ukuvuga kuva ku wa 17 Kamena kugeza ku wa 20 Kamena 2021, abamaze kwandura iki cyorezo ni 1638. Ni ukuvuga ko umubare muke w’abanduye ku munsi bari 296 mu gihe abenshi bari 451.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima kandi igaragaza ko abamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo muri iyo minsi ari batandatu. Ni ukuvuga ko nta munsi ushira Covid-19 itishe Umunyarwanda.
Muri rusange mu mezi abiri gusa, umubare w’abanduye Covid-19 wiyongereyeho 6583 mu bipimo 283.800, wavuye kuri 23.934 ugera kuri 30.517.
Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka ni bwo icyorezo cya Covid-19, cyaherukaga kugira ubukana, ibintu byatumye hafatwa ingamba zikarishye zirimo kuba ku wa 18 Mutarama 2021, Umujyi wa Kigali warashyizwe muri gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo.
Icyo gihe hafashwe izindi ngamba zirimo kongera gufunga bimwe mu bikorwa, kugabanya amasaha y’ingendo ndetse abaturage bose basabwa kugabanya ingendo bakoraga, bagasigara bita ku za ngombwa gusa.
Ubushakashatsi bukomeje kwisukiranya bugaragaza ibiba ku mubiri w’uwanduye Covid-19.
amakuru mashya ku gakoko gatera iki cyorezo, SARS-COV-2 agaragaza ko abagezwemo n’iyo virus bahura n’ibibazo byinshi mu mibiri yabo, aho ako gakoko gatuma abasirikare barwaniriraga umuburi bahindukira bakaba ari bo bawurwanya maze bikagira ingaruka ku ngirabuzimafatizo no ku nyama ziwugize nk’uko byagaragajwe n’abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Yale.
Ubu bushakashatsi bwakorewe ku bantu 194 bapimwe bagasangwamo icyorezo cya Covid-19. Bwerekanye ko abasirikare abo bantu bari basanganwe ari bo bahindukira bakadukira intungamubiri zagombaga gufasha umuntu wigeze kwandura icyo cyorezo bakazangiza aho kurwanya indwara mu mubiri nk’uko ubusanzwe babiwugirira.
Aba basirikare bahindura inshingano zabo bagakora akazi ko kurwanya umubiri aho kuwurinda, byagaragaye ko bibasira cyane abantu banduye Covid-19 ugereranyije n’abatarayanduye, bigatuma ubudahangarwa bw’abanduye icyo cyorezo buba ku gipimo cyo hasi cyane hanyuma ugasanga gukira kwabo bifata igihe kirekire cyane kuko umubiri wabo uba ufite intege nke zo kwiyirukanamo virusi.
Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bwanakorewe ku mbeba aho baziteye abasirikare bwite bo mu mubiri w’umuntu wanduye maze bugaragaza ko zishobora kwandura byoroshye icyo cyorezo bikaba bituma haboneka impungenge abo basirikare bateza mu mubiri w’umuntu nubwo hagikenewe gukorwa ubushakashatsi bwimbitse kuri iyi ngingo kugira ngo hatangazwe nyir’izina ingaruka zishobora guterwa n’abo basirikare bwite baba bari mu mubiri.
Abagore batatu b’i Kigali bishwe na COVID-19, abayanduye ni 296.
Abantu batatu bitabye Imana ni abagore b’imyaka 75, 54 na 42, bose bo mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Batumye umubare w’abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 mu Rwanda uba 382.
Abarwayi 296 basanganywe Coronavirus babonetse mu bipimo 7.196. Umujyi wa Kigali ni wo wabonetsemo abanduye benshi bagera kuri 166, Rubavu [38], Musanze [32], Burera [15] mu gihe Uturere twa Kamonyi na Muhanga habonetse umunani.
Guhera muri Werurwe 2020 abamaze kwandura Coronavirus bose ni 30.813 mu bipimo 1.551.520 bimaze gufatwa.
Minisante yatangaje ko mu masaha 24 ashize hakize abarwayi 126, bituma abamaze gukira bose baba 26.704. Abakirwaye ni 3.727 barimo 11 barembye.
Abantu bamaze gukingirwa guhera muri Werurwe 2021 ni 390.777. Barimo 246.789 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa COVID-19 (AstraZeneca).
Imibare irivugira: Amezi abiri y’ubwiyongere bwa COVID-19 bwafashe indi ntera mu Rwanda.
Usubije amaso inyuma muri ayo mezi abiri ashize, uwo munsi habonetse abantu 46 banduye iki cyorezo giterwa na Coronavirus mu bipimo 3605 byari byafashwe.
Umubare w’abakize kuri uwo munsi wari 167, mu gihe umwe ari we wahitanwe na Coronavirus. Muri rusange abari bamaze gusanganwa iki cyorezo kuva cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 bari 23.934 mu bipimo 1.260.524 byari bimaze gufatwa mu gihe 326 bari bamaze guhitanwa nacyo.
Muri iki gihe, Covid-19 yongeye kuzamuka bikabije aho umubare w’abayandura, abakenera ubuvuzi buhambaye bwo gushyirwa ku mashini zibongerera umwuka babaye benshi.
Mu mezi abiri gusa, umubare w’abanduye Covid-19 wiyongereyeho 6583 mu bipimo 283.800, wavuye kuri 23.934 ugera kuri 30.517.
Umubare w’abarwayi bari kwitabwaho wo wavuye ku 1.200 ugera ku 3560 mu gihe abarembye bo bikubye kabiri bava kuri batandatu baba 13. Abitabye Imana bo biyongereyeho 53 bava kuri 326, ubu ni 379.
Ku wa 19 Mata 2021, agace kabonetsemo abarwayi benshi kari Huye yari ifite umunani, Kigali [7], Ngoma na Nyanza [5], Rubavu na Muhanga [2], mu gihe i Musanze na Kamonyi nta murwayi wahabonetse.
Imibare yakomeje kuzamuka cyane kuko ku wa 19 Kamena 2021, abarwayi 469 basanzwemo Covid-19 mu bipimo 8928. Nka Kigali gusa yabonetsemo 192, Rubavu [111], Musanze [29], Kamonyi [26] na Muhanga yabonye 23.
Imibare yo ku wa 18 Kamena 2021 yatangajwe n’Umuyobozi w’Ibitaro bya Nyarugenge bivurirwamo abarwayi ba Coronavirus, Dr Abimana Deborah, yerekanye ko abarembye bikubye kane mu cyumweru, mu gihe 40% by’abarwariye muri ibi bitaro bari ku mashini zibongerera umwuka.
Ibi bitaro bifite ibitanda bisaga 130 bishyirwaho indembe za COVID-19 kandi byose byaruzuye. Ubu bwiyongere bwatangiye kurenga ubushobozi bwabyo, hari no gutekerezwa uko Ibigo Nderabuzima bya Gatenga na Kanyinya byari bimaze amezi arenga atanu bitakira abarwayi byakongera kwifashishwa.
Impuguke mu Kurwanya no gukumira Indwara z’ibyorezo, Dr Ndahindwa Vedaste, yabwiye RBA ko kwiyongera kw’abandura COVID-19 biterwa no kwirara.
Yagize ati “Covid-19 imaze igihe kirekire ku buryo hari abaturage bacitse intege ariko virusi yo ntiyigeze icika intege. Turabibona ko igenda yiyuburura ikagaruka ifite ubukana bukomeye.’’
Yavuze ko abaturage bakwiye kubahiriza ingamba zifatwa mu guca ingufu Coronavirus.
Yakomeje ati “Iyo umuturage atabikoze hari ingamba zikomeye zifatwa kuko nta wareka ngo icyo cyorezo gikomeze cyiyongere. Iyo rero hafashwe izo ngamba wenda ikomeye cyane ni imwe twita guma mu rugo, nta we uba abyifuza ari na Leta ubwayo kuko bigira izindi ngaruka haba ku buzima bw’abantu n’ubw’igihugu muri rusange.”
Ubwiyongere bwa Coronavirus bwatumye hafatwa ingamba zikakaye
Ubwiyongere bw’imibare ya Coronavirus buhuzwa n’impamvu zitandukanye zirimo no kudohoka ku ngamba zo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo. Nko mu Karere ka Rubavu, iyi mibare yatumbagiye nyuma y’urujya n’uruza rw’abantu rwakurikiye iruka ry’Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo ryatumye Abanye-Congo babarirwa mu bihumbi bahungira mu Rwanda.
Imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yerekana ko icyorezo cyongeye gukwira mu gihugu hose ndetse muri Kamena ho cyakajije umurindi.
Imibare ya vuba yerekana ko nko ku wa 10 Kamena handuye 112, tariki 15 Kamena baba 298, ku wa 17 Kamena ni 422, ku wa 18 Kamena babaye 451 mu gihe ku wa 19 Kamena 2021 bari 469.
Mu minsi itanu itandukanye ya Kamena gusa habonetse abarwayi 1.752 bashya ba Coronavirus, ni imibare iruta iy’ababonetse muri Gicurasi yose kuko bari 1.738.
Inshuro nyinshi, inzego z’ibanze n’iz’umutekano zikunze gufatira abantu mu birori byo kwishimisha, abahindura ingo utubari n’ibindi bikorwa bitemewe.
Ubwiyongere bwa COVID-19 bwatumye kuva tariki ya 17 Kamena 2021, Rubavu ishyirwa muri Guma mu Karere ndetse ingendo zirakumirwa kuva saa Moya kugeza saa Kumi za mu gitondo.
Ni ingamba zatangajwe na Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu zikubiyemo amabwiriza agamije gukumira ikwirakwira rya Covid-19 muri Rubavu n’imirenge ikora ku mipaka y’ibindi bihugu.
Mu mezi abiri ashize, abantu bari bamaze gukingirwa Coronavirus mu Rwanda mu bikorwa byatangiye ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021 bari 349.702, ubu ni 390.339 bakingiwe.
Abakingiwe bagirwa inama yo kutirara no kudohoka ku ngamba zo kwirinda kuko na bo bashobora kwandura, bakananduza abandi. Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, RBC, giheruka kugaragaza ko ubwandu bushya bwatumbagiye ku gipimo cya 275%, ndetse abantu 400 mu bakingiwe basanzwe baranduye.
Abantu 451 banduye Covid-19 mu Rwanda.
Ni umunsi wa kabiri wikurikiranya abanduye bagera kuri 400, kandi ubwandu bwinshi bwiganje mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Umuntu umwe niwe wahitanye n’icyo cyorezo, bituma abo kimaze guhitana kuva kigeze mu Rwanda bangana na 378.
Mu banduye kuri uyu wa Gatanu abenshi babonetse i Kigali ahabonetse abarwayi 219, Kamonyi 37, Gicumbi 37, Rubavu 32, Musanze 27, Rulindo 19, Burera 17 na Bugesera 10.
Umuntu umwe niwe wakize, bivuze ko abamaze gukira babaye 26 393. Abakirwaye ni 3277 barimo 16 barembye.
Inkingo 390 339 nizo zimaze gutangwa zirimo 448 zatanzwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu. Abantu 246,476 nibo bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca.
Ibintu bitatu byo kwirinda muri iki gihe Covid-19 iri gukaza umurego.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko Covid-19 yandurira cyane ahantu hari abantu benshi, ahantu hatuma abantu begerana ndetse n’ahantu hafunganye kandi hatinjira umwuka wo hanze.
Abahanga mu bijyanye n’indwara zandura by’umwihariko iz’ibyorezo bagaragaza ko ibyago byo kwandura Covid-19 birushaho kwiyongera iyo ahantu hari abantu benshi, begeranye kandi hafunganye.
Ni mu gihe kandi Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ivuga ko n’ubwo amabwiriza yakoroshywa abaturage basabwa gushishoza bakamenya niba aho bagiye kujya hatateza ibyago byo kwandura Covid-19.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ushinzwe Ubuzima bw’Ibanze, Dr Mpunga Tharcisse, yavuze ko akenshi za restaurants n’ahandi hantu hakirirwa abantu bagirwa inama yo gukorera ahantu hafunguye cyangwa hanze.
Ati “Abantu bagirwa inama yo kuba niba bagiye muri restaurants cyangwa muri hoteli gufata ibyo kurya cyangwa kunywa kujya basaba kwakirirwa hanze. Buriya nk’ahantu usanga bakirira abantu hanze, hafunguye kandi hisanzuye, biba bigoye kuba abantu bakwanduzanya, ntabwo ari kimwe nko kuba abantu bari ahantu hafunganye mu cyumba.”
Icyorezo cya Covid-19 gikomeje gukaza umurego mu Rwanda no mu Karere ruherereyemo, aho uretse kuba imibare y’abandura ikomeje gutumbagira i Kigali, i Kampala n’i Nairobi naho ni uko bimeze.
Nko mu Rwanda, imibare ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima ku wa 17 Kamena 2021, igaragaza ko abantu 422 aribo bayanduye mu bipimo 5770 byafashwe. Ibi byatumye umubare w’abamaze kuyandura kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu gihugu ugera kuri 29597.
Umusore w’imyaka 19 wo mu mujyi wa Kigali yitabye Imana azize icyorezo cya Covid-19, bituma umubare w’abamaze guhitanwa n’iki cyorezo ugera kuri 377.
Abantu banduye kuri uyu wa Kane abenshi bagaragaye i Kigali kuko habonetse 176, Rubavu 36, Rutsiro 29, Kamonyi 29, Burera 27, Musanze 24, Rulindo 24 na Gakenke 14.
Hakize abarwayi icyenda uyu munsi, bikaba byatumye umubare w’abamaze gukira iki cyorezo uba 26 392. Abakirwaye ni 2 828 mu gihe abarembye muri abo ari 9.
Muri rusange abamaze gukingirwa mu Rwanda ni 389 891 barimo 59 babonye urukingo uyu munsi. Abantu 246,289 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 1,082 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro. Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, kwambara udupfukamunwa mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi mu nsisiro cyangwa ahatuye imiryango myinshi.
Umuburo ku bakunda gukoresha “makeup”.
Makeup zisigwa ku maso n’ingohe zizwi nka ‘mascara’, zishobora guhangana n’amazi ku buryo umuntu atazivanaho ayakoresheje ahubwo bisaba amavuta.
Ni cyo kimwe n’amoko atandukanye ya ‘lipstick’ na ‘foundation’. Byose ubushakashatsi bwasanze biba byifitemo ibinyabutabire bishobora gukururira uwabyisize kurwara kanseri.
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe mu maduka atandukanye yo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika no muri Canada, bwagaragaje ko nibura kimwe cya kabiri cy’izo makeup ziba zigizwe n’ikinyabutabire cyitwa Fluorine, cyifitemo uburozi bwa PFAS butera kanseri.
Izi makeup kandi ngo zishobora gushegesha ubushobozi bw’ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri, gutuma abagore babyara abana bafite amagarama make ndetse n’ibyago bya kanseri ku bice bimwe na bimwe by’umubiri bikiyongera.
Abakoze ubushakashatsi bakangurira za leta kuburira abaturage bazo, bakagira amakenga mu ikoreshwa ry’izi makeup kuko ngo inganda zizikora zitajya nibura zinandikaho ubutumwa buburira abakiliya.
Ishusho ya Covid-19 mu mwaka imaze mu Rwanda: Uturere tune ntiturapfusha umuntu n’umwe.
Nubwo ariko imibare yiyongereye, ntabwo ari mu gihugu hose hari ikibazo kuko iyo urebye imibare itangwa na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima usanga Umujyi wa Kigali ariwo wugarijwe cyane kurusha utundi duce tw’igihugu kubera ko muri icyo cyumweru kimwe gusa handuyemo abanya-Kigali 510, barenga kimwe cya gatatu cy’abayanduye bose muri icyo gihe.
Uretse i Kigali, Uturere twa Rubavu na Musanze natwo ntitworohewe kuko muri iyo mnnsi irindwi, i Rubavu handuye 191, imibare yazamutse kubera iruka ry’ikirunga ryatumye abantu bahura ari benshi mu gihe Musanze yo ari 126.
Uku kuzamuka kw’imibare y’abandura Covid-19, kwatangiye tariki 8 Kamena 2021, aho uwo munsi abanduye barenze ijana, ibintu byaherukaga kuba ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka, ndetse bikagaragaza kwirara kw’abaturage badakurikiza amabwiriza yo kwirinda iki cyorezo.
Mu kiganiro Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel, aheruka kugirana na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda yavuze ko abantu nibakomeza kwitwara nabi icyorezo kiziyongera ku buryo byaba ngombwa ko hafatwa izindi ngamba zikomeye kugira ngo kibagabanuke.
Yongeyeho ati “Turacyari ku gipimo, nitukirenga biratangira kuba bibi. Gusa turacyafite ubushobozi bwo gutuma abantu batagumya kwandura. Biraterwa n’imyitwarire. Imyitwarire ya buri wese mu gusangira izo nshingano.”
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima, RBC, giherutse gutangaza ko kiri gukora isuzuma ryimbitse ku mpamvu y’ubu bwiyongere bwa Covid-19, kugira ngo barebe ko haba hataraje Coronavirus yihinduranyije yagaragaye mu Bwongereza, Afurika y’Epfo, Brésil cyangwa mu Buhinde, kuko zo zikwirakwira vuba kuruta isanzwe.
Uretse kuzamuka kw’imibare y’abandura ariko, imibare y’abihitanwa n’iki cyorezo si myinshi cyane ugereranyije n’iy’abandura kubera ko kuva Ukwezi kwa Kamena kwatangira hamaze kwandura abarenga 1600 ariko abamaze gupfa ni 19.
Uturere tune mu Rwanda ntiturapfamo umuntu n’umwe azize Covid-19
Mu gihe cy’umwaka urenga Covid-19 igeze mu Rwanda, Imibare ya RBC, igaragaza ko Coronavirus imaze guhitana abagera kuri 372 mu gihugu hose.
Muri aba 273 ni abo mu Mujyi wa Kigali gusa, 55 mu Majyepfo, 21 mu Burengerazuba, 15 mu Burasirazuba naho 8 ni abo mu Majyaruguru.
Akarere ka Nyarugenge niko kamaze gupfusha benshi kugeza ubu, aho hamaze gupfa bagera ku 134 bangana na 3% by’abayirwaye bose muri aka Karere, kagakurikirwa n’aka Gasabo kamaze gupfusha 74 naho aka Kicukiro kamaze gupfusha 65.
Uturere tutarapfamo umuntu n’umwe azize Coronavirus harimo Burera na Gakenke two mu Majyaruguru, Ngoma yo mu Burasirazuba na Rutsiro yo mu Burengerazuba.
Abantu bari hagati y’imyaka 60 na 69 nibo bamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 ari benshi ugereranyije n’iyindi myaka kuko hamaze gupfa 87 bangana na 5% by’abayirwaye bari muri iyo myaka.
Akarere ka Nyarugenge ni ko kamaze kwanduramo benshi kuva iki cyorezo cyagera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020, aho gafite abagera ku 4.397 banduye Coronavirus, mu gihe akanduyemo bake ari aka Nyabihu kamaze kwanduramo abagera kuri 82.
Abamaze kwandura cyane ni abantu bari hagati y’imyaka 30 na 29, bagera ku 7.488.
Imibare ya RBC kandi yerekana ko abagabo ari bo banduye ari benshi kuruta abagore aho bangana na 58. 18% mu gihe gihe abagore bo bangana na 41. 82%.
Abagore bamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 ni 134 mu gihe abagabo bo ari 238.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda abantu 28.614 banduye Coronavirus, muri bo 26.393 barayikize abandi 372 irabahitana mu gihe 1.859 bakiyirwaye.
Abamaze gukingirwa kugeza ubu ni 389.658 barimo 242.624 bahawe dose ebyiri z’urukingo rwa Astrazeneca n’abandi 147.624 bahawe urwa Pfizer.
Hagiye kwifashishwa ikoranabuhanga mu gutahura abatizanya ibisubizo bya Covid-19
Zimwe mu ngamba zashyizweho na Leta y’u Rwanda ni uko ahantu hateraniye abantu bagomba kuba bipimishije, urugero ni nko mu mahoteli aba agomba kwakira 30% y’abantu akwiye kwakira baje mu birori cyangwa inama ariko bipimishije.
Umunyarwanda yaravuze ngo abarinzi bajya inama n’inyoni zijya izindi. Hari abantu baba basabwa kwipimisha ariko ugasanga hipimishije umuntu umwe, abandi bagakoresha cya gisubizo cye.
Mu kiganiro cyanyuze kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, Minisitiri w’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yavuze ko havumbuwe ko hari abantu basangizanya ibisubizo bya Covid-19.
Ati “Hari ibintu bibabaje, kubona abantu bababwira ko bagomba kwipimisha kugira ngo barebe ko ari bazima ariko bagashaka uko bahererekanya igisubizo n’umuntu umwe bahinduranya amazina, kugira ngo babone uko bitabira bwa bukwe.”
Yakomeje avuga ko hari ahantu byagiye bigaragara, bikaba byaratumye hagiye gushyirwaho ikoranabuhanga rizajya ritahura abakora ubwo buriganya.
Ati “Hari aho byagaragaye ko abantu bahana ibisubizo bagashaka kwerekana ko bapimwe, ibyo byaramenyekanye. Hagiye gushyirwaho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga ku buryo utazaza ngo ubeshye ko wipimishije utarabikoze.”
“Kuko iyo wipimishije uba ufite kode y’izina ryawe. Hari uburyo rero bugiye gukorwa ku buryo niba werekanye ko wipimishije bizaba aribyo koko.”
Iri koranabuhanga rigiye gushyirwaho mu gihe Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye ku wa 12 Kamena 2021, yavuze ko abantu bazajya bahurira hamwe mu ruhame muri hoteli cyangwa ubusitani bwabugenewe bazajya baba ari 30% by’abagenewe kwakirwa aho ndetse banipimishije Covid-19.
Akenshi hazagamo babiri, batatu barwaye: Dr Ngamije avuga ku mpamvu RwandAir yahagaritse ingendo muri Uganda
Hashize iminsi Uganda yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 aho ubwandu buri ku kigero cya 18%, ibi bikaba byaratumye hanafatwa ingamba zikomeye muri iki gihuguhu zo kwirinda.
Kuba muri iki gihugu bugarijwe n’icyorezo, byagize ingaruka ku Rwanda kuko hari abantu bavagayo barwaye, bakaba intandaro yo kugikwirakwiza mu gihugu.
Nyuma yo gusuzuma iki kibazo hafashwe ingamba z’uko ingendo RwandAir yakorerega muri Uganda zaba zihagaze kuko byari byagaragaye ko hari abaza mu ndege barwaye.
Mu kiganiro cyanyuze kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, Dr Ngamije Daniel, yavuze ko kimwe mu byatumye Covid-19 yiyongera harimo n’abaturuka muri Uganda, bikaba byaragarajwe n’abazaga na RwandAir bapimwa bagasanga barwaye.
Ati “Byaratangajwe ku mugaragaro ko hari ubwiyongere bukabije bwa Covid-19 muri Uganda, hari Abanyarwanda bakoreragayo imirimo itandukanye bari gutaha bamwe bagaca inzira zisanzwe ariko iyo usuzumye ubasangamo.”
“Abataha mu ndege iva Uganda iza inaha, twagiye tubona kenshi hazamo babiri, batatu barwaye muri kiriya cyumweru gishize, ari nacyo gituma hafashwe icyemezo cyo guhagarika RwandAir kujyayo.”
Yakomeje avuga ko mu rwego rwo kwirinda ubu abava muri Uganda babanza gushyirwa mu kato.
Ati “Undi muntu uzajya uba avuyeyo azajya amara iminsi irindwi mu rugo yiheje, aho yaba yanyuze hose azajya amara iyo minsi aho twamuteganyirije kugira ngo tumusuzume turebe niba adafite ubwandu butari bwagaragara, nyuma y’icyo gihe niba butagaragaye atahe ajye mu rugo.”
“Nibumugaragaraho nabwo tumenye icyo dukwiye kumufasha kugira ngo adakwirakwiza ubwandu mu bandi bantu.”
Itangazo RwandAir yashyize hanze rivuga ko ingendo zibaye zihagaritswe kugeza mu gihe kitazwi, gusa abagenzi bagizweho ingaruka n’izo mpinduka bakaba bemerewe guhinduza amatike yabo ku buryo bazayabyaza umusaruro ubwo zizaba zasubukuwe.
Ingamba nshya zo kwirinda Covid-19: Amasaha y’ingendo yagabanyijwe.
Ni ingamba zatangajwe nyuma y’aho mu gihugu hongeye kugaragara izamuka ry’ubwandu bwa Covid-19, aho mu minsi 11 hari hamaze kugaragara abarwayi 899.
Ingamba nshya zatangajwe n’Inama y’Abaminisitiri zizatangira gukurikizwa ku wa 14 Kamena 2021, zimare ibyumweru bibiri.
Kimwe mu bintu bishya biri muri aya mabwiriza mashya, ni uko ingendo zibujijwe guhera saa tatu z’ijoro kugera saa kumi za mu gitondo. Itangazo ry’ibyemezo by’Abaminisitiri rikomeza rigira riti “ibikorwa byose byemerewe gukomeza bizajya bifunga saa mbili z’ijoro”.
Izindi mpinduka zagaragaye kuri iyi nshuro ni uko “imodoka zitwara abantu mu buryo bwa rusange (bisi) zemerewe gutwara abantu batarenze mirongo itanu ku ijana (50%) by’umubare zagenewe gutwara.”
Abatwara bisi basabwe kugenzura ko abagenzi bahana intera kandi bagatwara gusa abambaye agapfukamunwa.
Ibikorwa by’inzego za Leta bizakomeza gukora ariko bikoresha abakozi b’ingenzi gusa batarenze 30% abandi bakorere mu rugo ariko bakazajya basimburana mu biro.
Ku bijyanye n’insengero, naho hari impinduka zatangajwe aho umubare w’abemerewe kuzijyamo wagabanyijwe ukavanwa kuri 50% ugashyirwa kuri 30%.
Itangazo rigira riti “ Insengero zahawe uburenganzira bwo gukora kuko zuzuje ibisabwa mu kwirinda Covid-19, zemerewe kwakira abantu ku kigero kitarenze 30% by’ubushobozi bwazo”.
Ni mu gihe kandi Restaurant na Café zizakomeza gukora ariko zitarengeje 30% by’ubushobozi bwazo bwo kwakira abantu zemerewe. Zemerewe kwakira abakiliya kugeza saa mbili z’ijoro mu gihe ubusanzwe zafungaga saa tatu z’ijoro.
Ku rundi ruhande, iri tangazo rivuga ko “ibikorwa bya siporo y’umuntu ku giti cye n’izikorerwa hanze abantu bategeranye bizakomeza, hubahirizwa ingamba zo kwirinda Covid-19”.
Ikindi kandi ibigo “bikorerwamo imyitozo ngororamubiri (gyms) bizakomeza gukora ariko ntibirenze 10% by’ubushobozi bwabyo bwo kwakira abantu, hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda Covid-19”. Minisiteri ya Siporo ni yo izatanga amabwiriza arambuye agomba kuzajya akurikizwa kuri iyi ngingo.
Ibijyanye n’imihango y’ubukwe
Imyanzuro y’Inama y’Abaminisitiri igena ko “ishyingiranwa rikorewe imbere y’ubuyobozi bwa leta no mu nsengero ryemerewe kwitabirwa n’abantu batarenze 30 kandi bikabanza kumenyeshwa ubuyobozi bw’inzego z’ibanze”.
Ikindi kandi ibikorwa byose bihuriza abantu muri hoteli, mu busitani cyangwa ahandi hashobora kubera amakoraniro mu buryo bwa rusange, ntibigomba kurenza 30% by’ubushobozi bwo kwakira abantu bw’aho bateraniye. Ibyo byose ariko bigomba gukorwa hubahirijwe ingamba zo kwirinda Covid-19.
Gusa “abitabiriye icyo gikorwa bagomba kuba bafite icyemezo cy’uko bipimishije Covid-19 iminsi itatu mbere y’uko icyo gikorwa kiba”.
Iyi myanzuro mishya ivuga ko ubusabane n’ibirori bitandukanye bibera mu ngo byo “birabujijwe”.
Ntacyo amabwiriza yashyizwe hanze avuga ku bukwe bwo gusaba no gukwa buherutse gukomorerwa nyuma y’igihe buhagaritswe.
Abaturage basabwe gukomeza kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda Covid-19 zirimo gusiga intera hagati y’umuntu n’undi, kwambara agapfukamunwa no gukaraba intoki. Ku batazabyubahirizwa, “bazafatirwa ibihano”.
U Rwanda ruri kugenzura ko rutinjiriwe n’ubwoko bwa Covid-19 bwagaragaye mu Buhinde
Ibi yabitangarije mu kiganiro cyabaye kuri uyu wa 12 Kamena 2021, hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga cyatumiwemo impuguke zitandukanye zirimo Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RBC, Dr. Sabin Nsanzimana; Umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda akaba n’Umushakashatsi, Prof Dr Leon Mutesa; uharagarariye Ikigo gishinzwe Kurwanya Indwara muri Amerika, CDC, Dr. Aimee Geissler ndetse na Dr. Emmanuel Musabeyezu impuguke mu ndwara z’ubuhemekero.
Prof Leon Mutesa yavuze ku ngamba zafashwe zo gusuzuma byimbitse ibipimo by’abantu bavuye mu bihugu byagaragayemo virus zihinduranyije yagize ati “Twakoze ubushakashatsi bwitwa Sequencing, aho ugenda ukareba muri twa turemangingo ndangasano [RNA], ukareba akanyuguti ku kanyuguti.”
“Tumaze gukora ibipimo bigera hafi 331.000 mu bantu tuzi koko baturutse mu bihugu birimo izi virus zihinduranyije. Muri bo twasanze harimo abantu 31 bafite ubwoko bwa Coronavirus bwihinduranyije butandukanye bwo mu Bwongereza no muri Afurika y’Epfo.”
Yakomeje avuga ko nubwo izo virus bazibonye, abazigaragaweho bose bari baturutse hanze y’u Rwanda bafatiwe ku kibuga cy’indege bashyirwa mu kato batarahura n’abandi, ubu baravuwe barakira.
Nubwo ariko batageze mu bantu, Prof Mutesa, yavuze ko RBC iticaye ngo yeme ahubwo yagiye mu baturage gupima n’abandi benshi, kugira ngo ibipimo byabo bikorerwe isuzuma ryimbitse ‘sequencing’, harebwe niba itarabageramo. Ibyo bikorerwa ahantu hari kugaragara ubwandu bwinshi bwa Covid-19.
Gusa kugeza ubu ibipimo by’aba bantu ntibiraboneka kuko gukora ibi bizamini ntabwo iri ibintu bihita bikorwa ako kanya muri Laboratoire, ahubwo bisaba ko RBC ifatanya n’amatsinda yo hanze y’u Rwanda bakorana kugira ngo bikunde biboneke kuko bisaba ubushobozi buri hejuru.
Mu Rwanda muri rusange hari kugaragara ubwiyongere budasanzwe bwa Coronavirus, kuko mu minsi 11 gusa hamaze kwandura abantu 899.
Prof Mutesa yongeyeho ati “Kugeza ubu virus yo mu Buhinde ntabwo iraboneka mu bo twapimye. Turakomeza izo ngamba twashyizeho zo gushakisha. Gusa icyo zose zihuriyeho ni uko zandura vuba kandi zikongera umubare w’abantu banduye.”
Dr Sabin Nsanzimana yavuze ko mu Mujyi wa Kigali ariho hari kugaragara ubwandu bwinshi kandi hakomeje gupimwa abantu batandukanye, ndetse no mu Karere ka Rubavu kubera abantu benshi baturutse muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, bahunga iruka rya Nyiragongo.
Yongeyeho ati “RBC, abashakashatsi ndetse n’izindi nzobere mu buvuzi, turi gushyira imbaraga nyinshi mu bushakashatsi bushingiye ku buzima, ndetse twanashyizeho ishami rishya rishinzwe ubushakashatsi, guhanga udushya no kugaragaza imibare ishingiye kuri siyansi.”
Icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kwiyongera mu Rwanda, kandi kugeza ubu hamaze gukingirwa abagera ku 390.000 bangana na 6%, bigaragaza ko hakiri umubare munini w’abantu badakingiye ariyo mpamvu abantu bakangurirwa gukomeza kwirinda kuko byagaragaye ko n’abakingiwe hari abafatwa n’iyi virus nubwo bo ntacyo ibatwara ariko baba bashobora kuyanduza abatarakingiwe.
Perezida Kagame yayoboye Inama y’Abaminisitiri yitezwemo ingamba nshya zo kwirinda Covid-19.
Ubutumwa bwatangajwe n’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu buvuga ko iyi nama iza kwiga ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo n’ingamba zo kurwanya Covid-19.
Iyi nama ibaye mu gihe hashize iminsi irenga irindwi ubwandu bwongeye kuzamuka mu gihugu.
Uhereye nka tariki 5 Kamena, habonetse ubwandu 49, bigeze ku itariki ya 6 Kamena haboneka ubwandu 34 n’umuntu umwe wapfuye, ku wa 7 Kamena habonetse abantu 62 banduye, bigeze ku wa 8 Kamena haboneka 127 n’abantu bane bapfuye.
Ubwandu bwakomeje kwiyongera umunsi ku wundi aho ku wa 9 Kamena bwari 114 n’umuntu umwe wapfuye, bigeze ku wa 10 Kamena abanduye na bwo bariyongera baba 112 n’umuntu umwe wapfuye.
Mu gihe kirerekire, hongeye kuboneka abanduye barenga 200 aho mu bizamini byafashwe ku wa Gatanu tariki 11 Kamena bari 202 mu gihe abapfuye bo ari babiri.
Kuva ku itariki 1 Kamena 2021, mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara ubwandu bwa Covid-19 ku bantu 899 mu minsi 11 gusa.
Muri iyi minsi kandi ni na bwo hagaragaraye impfu nyinshi ku munsi umwe, zari enye, zaherukaga kugaragara nanone ku wa 15 Mata 2021. Ni mu gihe ubwandu burenze 200 bwaherukaga kugaragara ku wa 05 Mata 2021 kuko uwo munsi hari habonetse abantu 202 banduye.
Kuva icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyagaragara mu Rwanda, hamaze kugaragara ubwandu 27.863 mu gihe abapfuye bo ari 368. Abamaze gukira ni 26.351 naho abakirwaye ni 1.153.
Babiri bishwe na Coronavirus mu Rwanda, 202 barayandura.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko babiri bishwe na Coronavirus kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 11 Kamena 2021, ari abagabo babiri b’imyaka 66 na 65 bo mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Abarwayi bashya 202 babonetse mu bipimo 5927 byafashwe bituma umubare w’abamaze kwandura mu Rwanda uba 27.862 mu bipimo 1.493.767 bimaze gufatwa kuva muri Werurwe 2020.
Mu masaha 24 yashize, nta murwayi wakize byatumye umubare w’abamaze gusezererwa mu bitaro no gukirira mu ngo zabo uguma ku 26.341.
Kugeza uyu munsi, abarwayi 1153 barimo batandatu barembye ni bo bakiri kwitabwaho.
Kugeza ubu mu Rwanda hamaze gukingirwa abantu 389.389 kuva ibi bikorwa byatangira ku wa 5 Werurwe 2021. Abantu 239.022 bamaze guhabwa doze ya kabiri y’urukingo rwa AstraZeneca barimo 288 bayihawe uyu munsi.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo inkorora, ibicurane, guhumeka bigoranye n’umuriro. Yandura binyuze mu matembabuzi aturuka mu myanya y’ubuhumekero.
Abaturarwanda basabwa gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza ya Leta hitabwa cyane cyane ku gukaraba intoki kenshi n’amazi n’isabune, kwambara udupfukamunwa mu gihe umuntu avuye mu rugo cyangwa ahuye n’abantu benshi mu nsisiro cyangwa ahatuye imiryango myinshi.
Ibyago ku bakora siporo bakoresheje imbaraga z’umurengera.
Urwaye iyi ndwara aba asigaje imyaka mike yo kubaho ku Isi, ku buryo nyuma y’uko igaragaye, aba afite amahirwe yo kubaho hagati y’umwaka umwe n’itanu ndetse abayimarana imyaka icumi cyangwa irenga bangana na 10%.
Abashakashatsi bo muri Kaminuza ya Sheffield mu Bwongereza, bavuze ko umuntu adakwiye guhagarika siporo, ariko ko abazikoresha imbaraga nyinshi bafite ibyago byo kwandura MND, kuko mu bantu 300 bakora siporo mu buryo ndengakamere, nibura umwe muri bo aba ayirwaye.
Iyi ndwara ishobora guterwa n’utunyangingo tugize umubiri wawe cyangwa se ikizana bitewe n’uburyo ubayeho cyangwa ibyo wahuye nabyo. Gusa ubu bushakashatsi bwagaragaje ko siporo zikoreshwa imbaraga nyinshi zishobora kuba imwe mu mpamvu zo kwandura iyi ndwara, nubwo bitaramenyekana neza.
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe ku bakinnyi b’umupira w’amaguru bo mu Butaliyani, bwerekanye ko baba bafite ibyago byo kwandura iyi ndwara inshuro esheshatu kuruta abandi basanzwe.
Mu Bwongereza naho hari abakinnyi bagaragaweho iyi ndwara barimo Rob Burrow, wamenyekanye muri Rugby, Stephen Darby wakinnye umupira w’amaguru muri Liverpool, Bradford City na Bolton Wanderers ndetse na Doddie Weir wakinaga Rugby.
Umwe mu bashakashatsi, Dr Johnathan Cooper-Knock, yavuze ko hari isano rinini hagati y’iyi ndwara ya MND na siporo umuntu akora akoresheje imbaraga nyinshi.
Ati “Twafashe umwanzuro ko imyitozo ikoreshejwe imbaraga nyinshi ari imwe mu mpamvu zitera Motor Neurone Disease. Imibare myinshi y’abakinnyi bakomeye barwaye MND igaragaza ko itari ibintu byapfuye guhurirana gusa.”
Volleyball: Gisagara na RRA zegukanye irushanwa ryo Kwibuka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni irushanwa ryatangiye ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 25 Kamena 2021, ritangizwa n’Ishyirahamwe ry’Umukino wa Volleyball mu Rwanda ‘FRVB‘, mu rwego rwo Kwibuka abakinnyi, abatoza, abakunzi n‘abandi bose babarizwaga mu muryango mugari wa Volleyball ariko bazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ku nshuro yaryo ya mbere, ni irushanwa ryakiniwe muri Kigali Arena.
Iri rushanwa ryari ryitabiriwe n’amakipe asanzwe akina mu cyiciro cya mbere mu Rwanda ndetse hazamo n’amakipe yatumiwe yo mu bihugu by’abaturanyi nka Kenya, arimo Kenya Ports Authority (mu bagabo), mu gihe mu bagore hari hajemo ikipe ya Nairobi Water.
Ku manywa hari habanje gukinwa imikino ya ½ mu bagore no mu bagabo. Mu bagore, Rwanda Revenue Authority yari yasezereye Kenya Water iyitsinze amaseti 3-0 mu gihe mu bagabo Gisagara VC yasezereye UTB VC iyitsinze amaseti 3-2, REG VC yo isezerera APR VC iyitsinze amaseti 3-1.
Mu bagore, ikipe ya Rwanda Revenue VC ndetse na APR VC ni zo zaje guhurira ku mukino wa nyuma. Umukino warangiye ikipe ya Rwanda Revenue Authority ari yo yegukanye igikombe, naho umwanya wa gatatu wegukanwa na Nairobi Water itsinze UTB WVC amaseti 3-2.
Mu bagabo ikipe ya Gisagara VC nyuma yo gutsinda UTB VC muri ½ mu mukino wari ugoranye ku maseti 3-2, yaje guhurira ku mukino wa nyuma na REG VC yari yasezereye APR VC. Ni umukino wakinywe saa kumi n’ebyiri z’ijoro.
Umukino waje kurangira ikipe ya Gisagara VC ari yo yegukanye igikombe itsinze REG amaseti 3-1, iza no guhabwa sheki ya miliyoni ebyiri z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda kimwe na Rwanda Revenue, mu gihe iza kabiri zahawe miliyoni imwe, naho iza gatatu zihabwa ibihumbi 500.
Ikipe ya UTB VC ni yo yari ibitse igikombe cy’umwaka ushize ariko uyu mwaka yosoreje ku mwanya wa gatatu.
Iri rushanwa ryakurikiranywe n’abayobozi bo mu nzego zitandukanye barimo Ambasaderi Uyisenga Charles, Makuza Bernard wahoze ari Perezida wa Sena n’Umunyamabanga Nshingabikorwa wa CNLG, Dr. Bizimana Jean Damascène.
APR FC yasinyishije Nsengiyumva, Karera na Mugisha Bonheur
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ni bwo ubuyobozi bwa APR FC bwasinyishije aba bakinnyi uko ari batatu ndetse Niyonzima Olivier Seif’ na we yongera amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri nyuma 
Umukinnyi wo hagati mu kibuga Nsengiyumva Ir’shad uzwi nka Pogba wakinaga muri Marines FC, yasinye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri kimwe na Mugisha Bonheur wari intizanyo ya Heroes FC muri Mukura Victory Sports.
Undi mukinnyi wasinyiye Ikipe y’Ingabo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ni myugariro wo hagati, Karera Hassan, wasinye imyaka ibiri aguzwe muri Kiyovu Sports nyuma y’uko yari yatijwe imyaka ibiri muri AS Kigali.
Aba bose biyongereye kuri Nsabimana Aimable waguzwe muri Police FC, Kwitonda Alain ‘Bacca’ waguzwe muri Bugesera FC na Mugisha Gilbert wavuye muri Rayon Sports.
APR FC izongera guhagararira u Rwanda muri CAF Champions League nyuma y’uko yegukanye Igikombe cya Shampiyona ku nshuro ya kabiri yikurikiranya idatsinzwe.
Nyirinkindi Saleh mu muryango usohoka muri Kiyovu Sports.
Ubusanzwe, umwaka w’imikino mu Rwanda mu mupira w‘amaguru urangira ku wa 4 Nyakanga. Bisobanuye ko hashize iminsi itandatu urangiye.
Bamwe mu bakinnyi basoje amasezerano yabo, bakomeje ibiganiro n’andi makipe yifuza kuzabakinisha mu mwaka utaha w’imikino nubwo hataramenyekana igihe shampiyona izatangirira.
Nyirinkindi Saleh ‘Mbappé’ ni umwe mu basoje amasezerano muri Kiyovu Sports ariko nta bushake bwo kuyongera agaragaza nubwo ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe bwifuza kumugumana.
Ni umwe mu beza baca ku ruhande mu bakina mu gice cy’ubusatirizi mu Rwanda. Ubusanzwe azwiho kwihuta mu gihe afite umupira ku kirenge ariko akaba n’umwe mu bagora cyane ba myugariro.
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uyu mukinnyi uko ashobora kuba yaregerewe n’andi makipe arimo Rayon Sports FC na AS Kigali FC izasohokera u Rwanda muri CAF Confederation Cup kuko iyi kipe na yo ifite benshi basoje amasezerano.
Ubuyobozi bwa Kiyovu Sports buvuga ko umutoza mukuru, Haringingo Francis, atarabugezaho amazina y’abakinnyi yifuza kugumana nk’uko Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’iyi kipe, Munyengabe Omar, yabibwiye IGIHE.
Ati "Nyirinkindi Saleh yarangije amasezerano. Umutoza ntaraduha abo yifuza ko twongera amasezerano."
Nyirinkindi yazamukiye mu Irerero rya APR FC (APR FC Academy) ariko ntiyabona umwanya uhoraho wo gukina, bituma atizwa muri Marines FC mu gihe cy’imyaka ibiri, ayisoje aca muri Mukura VS ayikinira imikino itatu ya CECAFA Kagame Cup mbere yo kwerekeza muri muri Kiyovu Sports yari amazemo imyaka ibiri.
Mbere y’isozwa rya CECAFA ya 2019 yabereye mu Rwanda, Nyirinkindi yifujwe na Gor Mahia yo muri Kenya ariko amahitamo ye aba Kiyovu Sports.
Muri uyu mwaka w’imikino, yatsindiye Kiyovu Sports igitego kimwe, anatanga imipira itanu yavuyemo ibitego mu mikino 12 yabashije gukina, cyane ko umukino wa mbere wa Shampiyona ikipe yatsindiwe i Rubavu ibitego 2-1 na Rutsiro FC, atawukinnye.
Nyirinkindi yari yahamagawe mu Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Abatarengeje imyaka 23 (U23) yagombaga kujya gukina CECAFA muri Ethiopia.
Ku wa Gatanu, FERWAFA yasohoye itangazo rivuga ko iyi Kipe itazitabira aya marushanwa kubera ubwiyongere bw’icyorezo cya Covid-19 buri mu karere u Rwanda ruherereyemo.
Ni umusore ukiri muto ndetse ufite impano idashidikanywaho n’abakurikirana umupira w’amaguru mu Rwanda, ariko mu myaka itatu ishize yagiye avugwaho kutitwara neza hanze y’ikibuga nubwo inshuti ze za hafi zihamya ko ubu yahindutse.
Mukamana wakiniye AS Kigali y’Abagore yerekeje mu Bufaransa.
Mu 2017 ni bwo Mukamana Clèmentine yavuye muri AS Kigali Women Football Club yerekeza muri Kigoma Women Football Club yo muri Tanzania.
Bitewe n’uko umukinnyi yavugaga ko gukina hanze y’u Rwanda bizamufasha kuzamura urwego, Ubuyobozi bwa AS Kigali WFC bwabyumvise vuba bumworohereza kujya ku rwego rwisumbuyeho.
Muri Tanzania yahakinnye umwaka umwe gusa ahita yerekeza muri Kenya ariko n’ubundi bigizwemo uruhare n’iyi kipe irebererwa n’Umujyi wa Kigali.
Uyu mukobwa ukina mu mutima w’ubwugarizi, yahise akomereza urugendo rwe mu Bufaransa aho aherereye i Paris aho amaze amezi abiri.
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko yatangiye imyitozo mu batarabigize umwuga kuko izo azakoramo igeragezwa hari ibitaruzuzwa neza.
Mbere yo kujya muri AS Kigali Women FC, Mukamana yari avuye muri Remera Rukoma Women Football Club akigera muri iyi kipe iterwa inkunga n’Umujyi wa Kigali, ahita abona amahirwe yo kujya ahamagarwa mu Kipe y’Igihugu y’Abagore.
Abangavu b’u Rwanda bakubitiwe ahareba i Nzega mu mukino wa mbere w’Igikombe cy’Isi.
Ku wa Gatanu, tariki ya 9 Nyakanga 2021, ni bwo hatangiye imikino ya nyuma y’Igikombe cy’Isi cy’abakobwa batarengeje imyaka 20.
Umukino wa mbere w’u Rwanda wabereye mu nzu y’imikino ya Schuttersveld mu Mujyi wa Rotterdam, ruhura n’u Buholandi buri mu rugo.
Ikipe y’Igihugu ntiyahiriwe n’uyu mukino warebwe n’abakozi ba Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi barimo Ambasaderi Nduhungirehe Olivier kuko yatsinzwe amaseti 3-0 (6-25, 5-25, 6-25).
Uyu mukino wabanjirijwe n’undi wo muri iri tsinda rya mbere, aho Brésil yatsinze Argentine amaseti 3-0 (26-24, 26-24 na 26-24).
Ikipe y’u Rwanda irasubira mu kibuga kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ikina na Brésil saa munani n’igice mbere y’uko u Buholandi bukina na Argentine saa kumi n’imwe n’igice.
Ku Cyumweru, tariki ya 11 Nyakanga 2021, ikipe y’u Rwanda izakina na Argentine saa munani n’igice naho ikipe y’u Buholandi ikine na Brésil saa kumi n’imwe n’igice.
Muri uyu mujyi wa Rotterdam ni ho hari kubera imikino yo mu itsinda C ririmo Turukiya, u Burusiya, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Thailand.
Imikino yo mu itsinda B ririmo u Bubiligi, Serbia, Dominican Republic na Puerto Rico ndetse n’itsinda D ririmo u Butaliyani, Pologne, Belarus na Misiri, yose iri kubera mu mujyi wa Kortrijk mu Bubiligi mu nzu y’imikino ya Sportcampus Lange Munte.
Amavubi U-23 na Scandinavia WFC zikuye mu marushanwa ya CECAFA.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 9 Nyakanga 2021, ni bwo Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru mu Rwanda, ryashyize ahagaragara ibaruwa igenewe abanyamakuru, ivuga ko aya makipe yombi yari guhagararira igihugu mu mahanga, atacyitabiriye.
Ryagize riti “Bitewe n’ubwiyongere bwa COVID-19 mu Rwanda n’akarere ruherereyemo by’umwihariko, bikajyana n’uko haba haramaze kugaragara ubwoko bwa COVID-19 yihinduranyije bwa ‘Delta’;”
“Hashingiwe kandi ku ngamba nshya ziheruka gushyirwaho na Guverinoma zerekeye gukumira COVID-19 zirimo gufunga ibikorwa bimwe mu gihugu no guhagarika ibikorwa by’imikino abantu bakina bakoranaho ndetse hagahagarikwa ingendo hagati y’intara n’Umujyi wa Kigali.”
FERWAFA yakomeje ivuga ko yamenyesheje CECAFA ko Amavubi U-23 atazitabira imikino izabera muri Ethiopia hagati ya tariki ya 17 n’iya 31 Nyakanga mu gihe kandi na Scandinavia WFC itazitabira imikino yo gushaka itike ya CAF Women Champions League muri Zone ya CECAFA, izaba hagati ya tariki ya 17 n’iya 31 Nyakanga 2021 muri Kenya.
Guhagarika kwitabira aya marushanwa bije bikurikira ihagarikwa ry’amarushanwa y’imbere mu gihugu haba muri Basketball na Volleyball.
Amavubi yari amaze iminsi akora imyitozo kuri Stade Amahoro, aho mu bakinnyi bari bitabiriye umwiherero harimo n’abavuye i Burayi.
Muri tombora yabaye ku wa Gatatu, Scandinavia WFC yari yisanze mu itsinda rya Gatatu (C) aho iri kumwe na FAD yo muri Djibouti na Vihiga Queens yo muri Kenya.
Manzi Thierry yerekeje mu ikipe nshya yo muri Georgia.
Ku i saa Kumi n’ebyiri zo kuri uyu wa 9 Nyakanga 2021 ni bwo Manzi Thierry yahagurutse ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cy’Indege cya Kigali i Kanombe, yerekeza muri Georgia, aho yasinyiye FC Dila Gori imyaka itatu.
Uyu mukinnyi wo hagati mu bwugarizi, yari amaze imyaka ibiri ari Kapiteni wa APR FC, aho yayifashije kwegukana Ibikombe bibiri bya Shampiyona idatsinzwe n’Igikombe cy’Intwari cya 2020.
FC Dila Gori yo muri Georgia, Manzi Thierry yerekejemo, kuri ubu iri gukina irushanwa ry’u Burayi rya UEFA Europa Conference League, aho yaraye itsinzwe umukino ubanza yanyagiwemo na MSK Žilina yo muri Slovakia ibitego 5-1.
Umukino wo kwishyura muri iri jonjora rya mbere, uzabera muri Georgia ku wa 15 Nyakanga 2021.
Manzi Thierry yakiniye Marines FC na Rayon Sports yamazemo imyaka ine mbere yo kwerekeza muri APR FC mu 2019.
Ni umwe mu bari bagize Rayon Sports yatwaye Shampiyona ya 2016/17 n’iya 2018/19, inagera muri ¼ cya CAF Confederation Cup mu 2018.
UEFA yacanweho umuriro, irashinjwa gushakishiriza u Bwongereza ngo bwegukane EURO.
U Bwongereza bwasezereye Danemark bigoranye, ku bitego 2-1 mu mukino wa ½ wabaye ku wa Gatatu, buzahura n’u Butaliyani ku mukino wa nyuma uzaba ku Cyumweru, tariki ya 11 Nyakanga, saa Tatu z’ijoro.
Ikiganiro cya Televiziyo ‘El Chiringuito’ kivuga kuri siporo yo muri Espagne, cyashinje UEFA gushakishiriza u Bwongereza kugira ngo buzegukana Igikombe cy’u Burayi cy’uyu mwaka.
Umunyamakuru Roberto Morales wari wagitumiwemo, yavuze ko irushanwa ry’uyu mwaka ari ryo ribi bitabiriye kandi ritakabaye ribera mu Bwongereza kubera ‘Brexit’ [kwikura mu Muryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi k’u Bwongereza].
Josep Pedrerol wari uyoboye El Chiringuito, yamubajije niba atekereza ko UEFA yateguye irushanwa muri ubwo buryo kugira ngo u Bwongereza bugere ku mukino wa nyuma.
Umunyamakuru yasubije ati “Ku bwanjye, ni irushanwa riteye isoni rya mbere dukoze. Riri ku rwego rwo hasi. Hari imikino yabereye mu mijyi itari iyo mu Burayi, none n’umukino wa nyuma uzabera mu gihugu cyikuye muri EU.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Byose byarateguwe. Bakiniye buri mukino mu rugo uretse umwe gusa. Ni ibintu byakorewe u Bwongereza, icyaburaga gusa ni ubufasha bwa penaliti bahawe.”
Penaliti itavugwaho rumwe ni iyo Raheem Sterling yakoreweho n’abakinnyi ba Danemark barimo Mathias Jensen, umusifuzi w’Umuholandi Danny Makkelie arayemeza ndetse birangira Harry Kane yinjije igitego cy’intsinzi.
Ikinyamakuru La Gazzetta dello Sport cyo mu Butaliyani, cyanditse ko u Bwongereza bwahawe penaliti imbere ya Danemark kugira ngo UEFA yiture Minisitiri w’u Bwongereza, Boris Johnson, ku ruhare rwe mu guhagarika European Super League.
Corriere dello Sport yo yanditse ko UEFA isa n’irwanya u Butaliyani muri iri rushanwa mu gihe iri ku ruhande rw’u Bwongereza.
Iki kinyamakuru cyatangaje ko ‘icyaha cy’umupira w’amaguru cyakozwe’ ubwo u Bwongereza bwahabwaga penaliti kuri Danemark kandi nta muntu wari wabonye ko mu kibuga hari imipira ibiri.
Umunyamakuru wa beIN Sports, Tancredi Palmeri, we yanditse kuri Twitter ati “It’s diving home’, ashaka kumvikanisha ko Raheem Sterling yigushije mu rubuga rw’amahina bigafasha u Bwongereza gusatira igikombe.
Ikinyamakuru Berlingske cyo muri Danemark cyanditse ko nta penaliti yari gutangwa mu gihe Ekstra Bladet, cyo cyanenze umufana w’u Bwongereza watunze urumuri mu maso y’umunyezamu Kasper Schmeichel mbere y’uko penaliti iterwa.
Uretse se w’umunyezamu wa Danemark, Peter Schmeichel, n’abahoze ari abatoza mu Bwongereza; José Mourinho na Arsène Wenger, bose bavuze ko nta penaliti yari ikwiye gutangwa.
José Mourinho aganira na TalkSPORT, yagize ati “Ntabwo yari penaliti, ntizigera iba na penaliti. Ikipe nziza yatsinze, u Bwongereza bwari bukwiye gutsinda. Bwakinnye neza ariko iriya ntiyari penaliti.”
Arsène Wenger we yabwiye beIN SPORTS ati “Nta penaliti. Sinumva impamvu batasabye umusifuzi ngo ajye kubyirebera. Sinzi impamvu abakoresha VAR batamusabye kubireba.”
Muri uyu mukino wavugishije benshi, u Bwongereza bwahawe penaliti yavuyemo igitego cya kabiri ku munota wa 14 muri 30 y’inyongera.
U Bwongereza bwaherukaga kugera ku mukino wa nyuma w’irushanwa rikomeye ubwo bwegukanaga Igikombe cy’Isi bwakiriye mu 1966.
Afrobasket 2021: Cap-Vert yiyongereye mu bihugu bigize itsinda ry’u Rwanda.
Ku wa Kane ni bwo habaye umukino wahuje Uganda na Maroc mu itsinda E ryo gushaka itike ya Afrobasket 2021 izabera mu Rwanda.
Uyu mukino utarabereye igihe kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19, watsinzwe na Uganda ku manota 77-65, ikatisha itike nk’ikipe ya kabiri inyuma ya Misiri ndetse izaba iri mu itsinda D hamwe na Sénégal, Cameroun na Sudani y’Epfo muri Afrobasket 2021.
Gutsindwa kwa Maroc byatumye ibura itike mu buryo budasubirwaho kuko yasoje imikino yayo ifite amanota arindwi ku mwanya wa gatatu mu gihe Cap-Vert ya kane n’amanota atandatu, isigaje umukino umwe izahuramo na Uganda ku wa 15 Nyakanga, kandi ikaba izayijya imbere nubwo yawutsinda.
Cap-Vert yahise ibona itike nk’ikipe izazamuka ari iya gatatu mu itsinda E ryo gushaka itike ndetse muri Afrobasket 2021, izaba iri mu itsinda A hamwe n’u Rwanda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na Angola.
Ikipe y’u Rwanda yatangiye kwitegura iyi mikino, aho abakinnyi batandukanye b’imbere mu gihugu bakora imyitozo inyuranye ibafasha kuguma ku rwego rwiza nyuma y’uko Shampiyona ya Basketball yabaye ihagaze kubera ubwiyongere bw’ubwandu bwa COVID-19.
Amatsinda ya Afrobasket 2021 izabera i Kigali:
Itsinda A: U Rwanda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Angola na Cap-Vert.
Itsinda B: Tunisia, Centrafrique, Misiri na Guinée.
Itsinda C: Nigeria, Côte d’Ivoire, Kenya na Mali.
Itsinda D: Sénégal, Cameroun, Uganda na Sudani y’Epfo.
Niyonzima Seif wavugwaga muri Rayon Sports, yumvikanye na APR FC.
Niyonzima Olivier yari amaze iminsi avugwa muri Rayon Sports nyuma y’uko ibiganiro byo kongera amasezerano muri APR FC bitagenze neza.
Bivugwa ko uyu mukinnyi wo hagati mu kibuga, yifuzaga ko APR FC imuha miliyoni 25 Frw n’umushahara wa miliyoni 1 Frw ku kwezi nk’uko byagenze kuri Manishimwe Djabel bavanye muri Rayon Sports mu myaka ibiri ishize.
Hagati aho, yari yagiranye kandi ibiganiro n’ubuyobozi bwa Rayon Sports, bikavugwa ko impande zombi zari zamaze kumvikana miliyoni 15 Frw ku masezerano y’umwaka umwe.
Mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, tariki ya 9 Nyakanga 2021, ni bwo Niyonzima wari mu mwiherero w’Ikipe y’Igihugu y’Abatarengeje imyaka 23 yitegura CECAFA, yagiye kugirana ibiganiro n’ubuyobozi bwa APR FC.
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko yemeye kongereye amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri ndetse bivugwa ko yahawe miliyoni 20 Frw.
Niyonzima ni umwe mu bakinnyi bafashije APR FC gutwara ibikombe bibiri bya Shampiyona biheruka idatsinzwe.
Yayigezemo muri Nyakanga 2019, avuye muri Rayon Sports, aho yari amaze imyaka ine nyuma yo kuva muri Isonga FC.
Yabaye umukinnyi wa gatanu wongereye amasezerano mu Ikipe y’Ingabo nyuma ya Manishimwe Djabel, Nizeyimana Djuma, Rwabuhihi Aimé Placide na Niyomugabo Claude.
UECL: Rwatubyaye yafashije ikipe ye gutsinda umukino wa mbere, ikipe ya Nirisarike n’iya Manzi ziratsindwa.
Mu ijoro ryakeye ni bwo hatangiye gukinwa imikino ibanza y’iijonjora rya mbere ry’irushanwa rya UEFA Europa Conference League riri kuba ku nshuro ya mbere.
FC Shkupi yo muri Macedonia y’Amajyaruguru, ikinamo Rwatubyaye Adul, yari yakiriye Llapi yo muri Kosovo ziri kumwe mu itsinda rya gatatu, mu mukino yitwayemo neza igatsinda ibitego 2-0.
Rwatubyaye yatsinze igitego cya kabiri mu minota y’inyongera ku mupira uteretse wari utewe na Alvarez mu gihe Kire Markoski yari yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa 36 w’umukino.
Mu wundi mukino wo muri iri tsinda, Urartu FC yo muri Armenia ikinamo Nirisarike Salomon, yari yasuye Maribor FC muri Slovenia, ihatsindirwa igitego 1-0.
Myugariro w’Umunyarwanda Nirisarike Salomon yakinnye iminota yose y’uyu mukino mu gihe uwo kwishyura uzabera muri Armenia tariki ya 15 Nyakanga 2021.
FC Dila Gori yo muri Georgia, yerekezwamo na Manzi Thierry wakiniraga APR FC, mu mpera z’iki cyumweru, na yo ntiyahiriwe n’umukino ubanza kuko yanyagiwe na MSK Žilina yo muri Slovakia ibitego 5-1.
Byiringiro Lague yerekeje mu Busuwisi mu ikipe nshya.
Ku wa Kane tariki ya 08 Nyakanga 2021, nibwo uyu musore ukina aca ku ruhande mu busatirizi, yafashe indege imwerekeza ku mugabane w’i Burayi mu Busuwisi.
Nubwo ikipe Lague yasinyiye yakomeje kugirwa ibanga, amakuru IGIHE yamenye ni uko uyu musore azakinira Neuchatel Xamax ikina muri shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri mu Busuwisi.
Shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri muri iki gihugu, izwi ku izina rya Challenge League. Stade y’iyo kipe yitwa La Maladière yakira abantu ibihumbi 12 bicaye neza.
Mu mwaka ushize w’imikino mu Busuwisi, Neuchatel Xamax yasoje shampiyona iri ku mwanya wa cyenda mu makipe icumi akina shampiyona y’icyiciro cya kabiri muri iki gihugu. Ni ikipe yiganjemo abakinnyi b’abenegihugu.
Iyi kipe yamubengukiye mu mikino ya CHAN iheruka kubera muri Cameroun nubwo uyu musore atakinnye imikino yose abanzamo ariko umukino umwe gusa yabanjemo wahise umuhesha ayo mahirwe.
Byiringiro Lague w’imyaka 21 y‘amavuko, yageze muri APR FC avuye mu Intare FC nayo yagezemo avuye muri Vision FC yamureze kuva ari umwana muto.
Muri uyu mwaka w’imikino, mu mikino 13 ya shampiyona ikipe ye yakinnye nk’izindi, uyu musore yayitsindiye ibitego 11. Gusa ni umusore wagiye atsindira APR FC ibitego aho rukomeye, cyane cyane nko ku mukino wahuzaga ikipe y’Ingabo na mukeba wayo, Rayon Sports FC.
Undi mukinnyi wa APR FC ushobora kwerekeza ku mugabane w’i Burayi, ni Manzi Thierry wamaze gusinyira amasezerano y’imyaka itatu FC Dila Gori yo mu Cyiciro cya mbere muri Georgia. Iyi kipe ya Manzi iri mu ziri gukina irushanwa rishya rya UEFA Europa Conference League.
Pasiteri Ndolimana Emmanuel wasigiwe Etincelles Fc yeguye ku buyobozi.
Inkuru yo kwegura kwa Pasiteri Ndolimana Emmanuel yamenyekanye kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki ya 8 Nyakanga 2021.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa Etincelles FC, Kabanda Innocent, yemereye IGIHE aya makuru, avuga ko Pasiteri Ndolimana asimburwa n’uwari amwungirije mu gihe hari gutegurwa ikipe y’umwaka utaha.
Ati “Nibyo twakiriye ibaruwa [ya Pasiteri Ndolimana] isezera ku buyobozi bw’ikipe kubera umwanya muke n’akazi kenshi. Ubu ikipe iraba iyobowe na Ndagijimana Enock, Visi Perezida ushinzwe Ubukungu mu gihe hataratorwa undi, tunategura uko ikipe yakwiyubaka duhereye mu gushaka umutoza mushya uzatoza ikipe mu mwaka w’imikino utaha.”
Nkuko amakuru IGIHE yamenye abyemeza, kumusimbura haravugwa Ndaribumbye Vincent wigeze kuyiyobora mu myaka yashize akayigeza ku mwanya wa kane ndetse bikayihesha itike yo gukina Igikombe cy’Agaciro.
Pasiteri Ndolimana Emmanuel yeguye ari muri Libéria, ari naho amaze iminsi arimo gukorera mu bihugu by’u Burengerazuba mu mishinga yo gufasha kuvura abafite ibibazo by’ubuzima.
Andi makuru ari kuvugwa muri iyi kipe, aravuga ko Bisengimana Justin umaze umwaka umwe muri Rutsiro FC, ashobora kuyerekezamo.
Ntibahabwa agaciro bakwiye; ibyihariye ku bitwa ba "Kanyamayayi" b’amakipe ya ruhago.
Kuba abakozi bashinzwe ibikoresho mu makipe y’Igihugu mu byiciro bitandukanye ni byo byatumye Tuyisenge Eric uzwi nka Cantona agura imodoka yo kugendamo mu gihe Baziki Peter yubatse inzu abanamo n’umuryango we.
Ubusanzwe mu Rwanda, benshi basuzugura akazi ko gucunga ibikoresho by’ikipe, kwitwa Kit-Manager w’ikipe runaka, nyamara benshi ntibarasobanukirwa neza aka kazi ndetse n’akamaro gafitiye abagakora kuko ari akazi nk’utundi.
Abagakora babita ’Kanyamayayi’, izina bamwe bumva nk’irisuzuguritse nyamara akazi ko gucunga ibikoresho mu makipe by’umwihariko ay’igihugu atari buri wese ushobora kukabona cyane ko abagakora bahamya ko ari akazi kiyubashye.
Inshingano za ba Kit-manager mu makipe zirimo gucunga neza ibikoresho byose by’ikipe, gukorera isuku ibikoresho byose by’ikipe no gutegura ibikoresho bikenerwa ku mikino ikipe ikina.
Gusa kugeza magingo aya, aka kazi gakorwa n’abasa n’abasuzuguritse, rimwe na rimwe badahabwa agaciro bakwiye. Icyibazwaho ni icyo aba bakozi bakura muri aka kazi.
IGIHE yaganiriye n’ukora akazi ko gucunga ibikoresho mu makipe y’Igihugu y’ingimbi (U17, U20 na U23), Tuyisenge Eric ndetse na Hakizimfura Ayubu ushinzwe ibikoresho bya AS Kigali. Bombi bahamya ko ari akazi bubaha kandi kamaze kubageza kuri byinshi mu buzima bwabo.
Ikindi aba bombi bahurizaho, ni uko umukozi uba ushinzwe ibikoresho mu ikipe yagakwiye kuba ahabwa agaciro gakwiye kuko akora akazi gakomeye ashobora kwangiza isura y’ikipe mu gihe atujuje inshingano ze uko bikwiye cyangwa agahesha isura nziza ikipe na none bitewe n’uburyo yitwaye mu kazi ke.
Kuri Tuyisenge Eric uzwi nka Cantona, ahamya ko mu gihe amaze akora aka kazi yigeze no gukora mu Isonga FC, hari byinshi amaze kugeraho kandi byiza nubwo hari bamwe batagaha agaciro.
Ati “Mu by’ukuri bamwe ntabwo bazi agaciro k’akazi dukora, ariko dukora akazi keza kandi katunga umuntu. Nkanjye rwose kamaze kungeza kuri byinshi, nk’ubu naguze imodoka kandi mu mafaranga nakuye muri aka kazi.”
Yakomeje avuga ko hari ibyo ajya yunganiramo umubyeyi we, kandi abikesha aka kazi bamwe basuzugura.
Ati “Hari byinshi nkorera umubyeyi wanjye kandi bisaba amafaranga. Nambara neza mu mafaranga nkura muri aka kazi, mfite n’ibindi nkora kandi mu mafaranga nakuye muri aka kazi. Njye nashimira cyane FERWAFA yakampaye, nkasobanurira abagasuzugura ko katabona uwo ari we wese.”
Cantona nk’uko bakunda kumwita, iyo uganiriye n’abakinnyi batandukanye bamutangira ubuhamya ko nta ngeso mbi agira ndetse ngo bamwe bajya babura ibintu iyo bagiye mu mwiherero ariko bagasanga Tuyisenge Eric yabibatoreye akabibaha.
Mu bindi Cantona yishimira kandi aratira abantu ni uko amaze gutambagira ibihugu bitandukanye kandi akajyana n’Ikipe z’Igihugu z’ingimbi ndetse akaba yaragiye mu Gikombe cy’Isi cy’abari munsi y’imyaka 17 mu 2011.
Uretse uyu musore kandi, undi mugabo ushinzwe ibikoresho mu Ikipe y’Igihugu y’u Rwanda ‘Amavubi’, Baziki Peter, na we ahamya ko hari byinshi amaze kugeraho kandi akesha akazi ke nko kuba yarubatse inzu kandi mu mafaranga yakuye mu kazi k’Amavubi no kuba amaze gutembera ibihugu bitandukanye.
Hakizimfura Ayubu umaze imyaka itandatu akora aka kazi muri AS Kigali, yahamije ko ugakoze neza katunga umuryango we, ariko na none agaruka ku gaciro gake gahabwa abagakora.
Ati “Ni akazi katunga umuryango wawe mu gihe ugakoze neza ukakubaha. Ntabwo duhembwa ibya mirenge ariko iyo ucunze neza ibyo uhabwa ushobora kwibeshaho kandi neza ntawe usaba.”
Yakomeje agaruka ku kamaro kanini aba bakozi bafitiye amakipe yabo, ariko katabonwa na benshi.
Ati “Buriya Kit-manager aba ari umuntu ukomeye mu kipe. Nkanjye ngomba kuba nzi imyenda dukenera mu myitozo n’iyo tuzakenera mu mukino runaka. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba kuba bifite isuku byose kandi hari n’igihe abakoresha badahita baguha amafaranga bigasaba ko rimwe na rimwe wisaka ugakora mu yawe ngo akazi kawe kagende neza.”
Hakizimfura yongeyeho ko abakora aka kazi, bashobora kunganira umutoza mu bijyanye n’abakinnyi ikipe ishobora kwifashisha.
Ati “Buriya abakinnyi bambara mbareba. Hari igihe umukinnyi akubwira ati mpa uyu mwambaro kugira mpishe igikomere mfite, icyo gihe njye nshobora kuburira umutoza nkamubwira nti kanaka ntabwo ameze neza 100%. Bisaba kuba ukunda akazi kawe ariko bikanajyana n’ubunyangamugayo bw’umuntu.”
Hakizimfura yasoje avuga ko abakora aka kazi badahabwa agaciro gakwiye mu makipe bakoramo.
Ati “Ariko hamwe n’ibyo byose usanga hari amakipe adaha agaciro ababa bashinzwe ibikoresho kandi Kit-manager ashobora kubura ku mukino, bikaba ibibazo ku ikipe. Gusa hari abatoza babaha agaciro uhereye no kuri AS Kigali mbereye umukozi.”
Hakizimfura Ayubu uretse kuba ari umukozi muri AS Kigali, yamaze imyaka 12 akora aka kazi muri APR FC anaba umukozi ushinzwe ibikoresho muri Atraco FC kuko yari n’umukozi wayo mbere y’uko isenyuka.
Umutoza Ruremesha Emmanuel watoje amakipe arimo Kiyovu Sports, Musanze FC, Etincelles FC, Gicumbi FC, Atraco FC, Rayon Sports FC na Gorilla FC yasojemo amasezerano muri uyu mwaka, ahamya ko kugira kit-manager usanzwe ubizobereyemo bifasha cyane umutoza.
Ati "Kit-manager arafasha cyane mu ikipe. Ni umuntu w’ingenzi cyane. Biterwa n’imyaka aba amaze mu ikipe n’ukuntu aba ajijukiwe n’iby’umupira. Iyo atinze mu ikipe hari ubwo amenya amakosa y’abakinyi bakorera hanze y’ikibuga kukurusha."
Abandi bakora aka kazi ni Munyaneza Jacques uzwi nka Rujugiro usanzwe ari n’umufana wa APR FC, akaba afatanya na Baziki Peter mu Ikipe Nkuru y’Igihugu ‘Amavubi’, na we akaba amaze kugera kuri byinshi birimo ikibanza yaguze mu mafaranga yagakuyemo.
Premier League: Mu mwaka utaha w’imikino, abakinnyi 161 ntibazakinira amakipe bahozemo.
Isoko ry’igura n’igurisha ry’abakinnyi ku Mugabane w’i Burayi, ryatangiye ku wa 9 Kamena, rizafunga ku wa 31 Kanama 2021 ndetse amakipe y’inkwakuzi yatangiye kugura abakinnyi azakoresha mu mwaka utaha w’imikino wa 2021/2022.
Kugeza ubu mu Bwongereza, abakinnyi 161 ni bo batazakinira amakipe babarizwagamo. Harimo bamwe batijwe, abandi bararekurwa mu gihe abandi basoje amasezerano yabo bahita bishakira ahandi berekeza.
Muri aba bakinnyi bo mu makipe 17 muri 20 akina Premier League, hari abamaze kubona amakipe mu gihe abandi bakomeje gushakisha.
