Bashimye ibyagezweho biyemeza kubisigasira: Ubutumwa bw’ibyamamare ku munsi wo #Kwibohora27.
Kuri iyi nshuro u Rwanda rwizihiza uyu munsi ku nshuro ya 27 Abanyarwanda mu nzego zitandukanye bishimira ibyiza igihugu cyagezeho nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Uyu munsi abantu batandukanye bagaragaza imbamutima zabo, bamwe mu byamamare baganiriye na IGIHE bagaragaje ko bishimiye aho u Rwanda rugeze kandi biteguye gukomeza kurwubaka.
Mu butumwa bwabo bikije ku gushima ingabo zitangiye kubohora igihugu no kugiteza imbere.
Nyampinga w’Umurage 2021, Ishimwe Sonia, yifurije Abanyarwanda umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora abibutsa ko bakwiye guharanira kwiyubaka.
Ati “Imyaka 27 irashize u Rwanda rubohowe. Turazirikana umunsi twaharuriwe inzira nshya ubwo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yahagarikwaga. Abatubohoye bari bazi neza ko kwibohora ariryo pfundo ry’ibyishimo, natwe biduha inshingano zo gukomeza gukora.”
Umuhanzi akaba n’umwanditsi w’indirimbo, Semivumbi Daniel [Danny Vumbi], yavuze ko ukwibohora nyakuri Abanyarwanda bakwiriye ari ukugena inzira nziza abato bazanyuramo.
Ati “Ubutumwa nagenera Abanyarwanda ni uko kwibohora by’ukuri ari ugutegura inzira abato bazanyuramo mu bihe bizaza hagamijwe kudasubira inyuma ku ntambwe imaze guterwa. Twese duharanire uburenganzira bukwiriye umunyagihugu mu gihugu cye duteza imbere u Rwanda rwacu.”
Umukinnyi wa Filime, Niyitegeka Gratien uzwi nka Seburikoko, yasabye Abanyarwanda gufatanyiriza hamwe mu guhangana n’icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyugarije Isi n’u Rwanda.
Ati “Mu gihe twizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 ni ingenzi kuzirikana ko igihugu cyugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.”
“Turwane urugamba rwo kurengera ubuzima bwacu n’ubw’abandi. Dukurikize, tunakangurira abandi kubahiriza ingamba zo kurwanya Covid-19. Niryo shimwe rikwiye guhabwa Intwari zarwaniye igihugu muri iki gihe.”
Urubyiruko rwasabwe kudakerensa amahirwe rwahawe
Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2009, Bahati Grace, yasabye urubyiruko aho ruri ku Isi hose guharanira icyateza imbere igihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Ndifuriza buri Munyarwanda wese umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27.”
“Ndakangurira buri wese aho ari hose ku Isi, cyane cyane urubyiruko dore ko ari rwo mbaraga z’igihugu, kwirinda icyadusubiza inyuma icyo ari cyo cyose. Duharanire kubaho neza twirinda gushyira imbere inyungu zacu, ahubwo dushaka icyateza imbere igihugu cyatwibarutse.”
Umuraperi Abayizera Grace wamamaye nka Young Grace, yashimiye Inkotanyi ubutwari zagize bwo kubohora u Rwanda, asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyagezweho.
Ati “Turashimira Ingabo z’Igihugu ku butwari n’ubwitange zagize mu rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda. Ndasaba urubyiruko gusigasira ibyagezweho no guharanira gukomeza kwigira.”
Ikinyarwanda cyasabiwe umwihariko ku Banyarwanda baba hanze
Umuhanzikazi Teta Diana yifurije Abanyarwanda umunsi mwiza wo kwibohora ndetse asaba abatazi ikinyarwanda kucyiga kuko ari ikirango cyabo.
Ati “Ndifuriza Abanyarwanda aho bari hose Umunsi mwiza wo Kwibohora. Dufite igihugu cyiza, giteye ishema kurata no mu mahanga.”
Yakomeje avuga ko “abatazi Ikinyarwanda bacyige, ni wo musingi w’ibindi byinshi twifuza kubaka imbere.”
Umukinnyi wa Filime, Uwihoreye Jean Bosco Moustapha [Ndimbati], yagarutse ku butwari bwaranze Inkotanyi ndetse asaba Abanyarwanda kurinda ibyagezweho.
Ati “Kwibohora ni umunsi ukomeye cyane kuko hari ababohoye igihugu ku bw’ubwitange! Buri Munyarwanda akwiye kubiha agaciro, akumva ko ari ikintu gikomeye.”
“Abanyarwanda bareke dusigasire ibyagezweho kugira ngo Kwibohora kwacu kutazasubira inyuma. Dukwiye kubiraga abana n’abuzukuru bacu kugira ngo bazature mu gihugu cyiza.”
Umukinnyi wa Filime, Mugisha Clapton, wamamaye nka Kibonge yasabye Abanyarwanda gukomeza kurinda no gusigasira ibyagezweho.
Ati “Ndasaba Abanyarwanda gukomeza gukunda igihugu, kugikorera no kukirwanira ishyaka kuko cyaduhaye ijambo.Twaribohoye. Hanyuma natwe dusigasire ibyagezweho dukomeza gukorera u Rwanda rwacu.”
Umuhanzi Emmy ukorera umuziki we muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yibukije Abanyarwanda ko kwibohora ari igihe cyiza cyo gusubiza amaso inyuma no gukomeza iterambere.
Yagize ati “Kwibohora ni igihe cyiza cyo gusubiza amaso inyuma tukibuka aho igihugu cyavuye naho kigeze ubu, kugira ngo bidutere imbaraga zo kwiyubaka no kubaka ejo hacu hazaza heza.”
Bagaragaje ko “umugore” ari uw’agaciro mu iterambere ry’igihugu
Umuhanzikazi Uwayezu Ariel uzwi nka Ariel Wayz, yavuze ko anyuzwe n’uburyo u Rwanda rwiyubatse cyane rugaha ijambo umugore.
Yagize ati “Kwibohora27 kuri njye bisobanuye kwibuka ibitambo byose byatanze ngo igihugu cyacu kibe kiri aho kiri ubu, ibi bintera umurava wo kugira umusanzu ntanga mu kubaka ejo hazaza h’igihugu cyanjye.”
“Nk’umukobwa ukiri muto ni iby’agaciro gakomeye kuba mu gihugu aho umugore yahawe ijambo, nishimiye kuba mu gihugu aho abaturage bafite uburenganzira bungana. Nshimishijwe no kuba mu Rwanda rwibohoye.”
Nyampinga w’u Rwanda wa 2016, Mutesi Jolly, yatanze u Rwanda imyato asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyo igihugu kimaze kugeraho.
Ati “U Rwanda rurishimira ibyiza rwagezeho, igihugu gitekanye muri Afurika, igihugu gifite umwanya wa kabiri mu biri ku isonga muri Afurika, kiri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu koroshya ishoramari muri Afurika, kiri ku mwanya wa cyenda mu guha ijambo umugore.”
“Igihugu kiri mu bifite ubuyobozi bwiza ku Isi, igihugu cya karindwi ku Isi mu gucunga umutekano wo kuri internet muri Afurika, igihugu cyiza cyiyubatse kandi gikataje mu iterambere.”
Yakomeje asaba urubyiruko kurinda ibyagezweho no gutanga umusanzu warwo mu iterambere ry’u Rwanda.
Rita Kagaju yasohoye album ye ya mbere yahurijemo abahanzi bakomeye.
Iyi album uyu mukobwa yayise ‘Sweet Thunder’ igizwe n’indirimbo 18. Izi ndirimbo zirimo iyitwa ‘Intro’, ‘Mean It’, ‘Have’ , ‘Always’ yahuriyemo na Jali, ‘Ndeka’, ‘Loving’ yakoranye na Mazimpaka Prime, ‘Good Times’ yakoranye na Andy Bumuntu & Kevin Skaa, ‘X’ na ‘Ok’ yakoranye na Kivumbi King, ‘Hey’, ‘Done and Through’ yakoranye na Angel Mutoni na ‘Try’ ye na B-Threy.
Hari kandi ‘Better’ yakoranye na Kenny Sol, ‘Ne T’inquiète Pas’ , ‘Close’, ‘Grateful’ yakoranye na Jumper Keellu, ‘I’ll Be Here’ ndetse na ‘You’ ye na Mike Kayihura basubiyemo mu buryo bwa Acoustic.
Izi ndirimbo ziri kuboneka ubu ku mbuga zicururizwaho nka Spotify, iTunes, YouTube n’izindi.
Rita Kagaju yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi album yahisemo kuyita ‘Sweet thunder’ ashaka kugaragaza ishusho ye nk’umuhanzikazi ariko ashaka no kugaraga inkuru 16 ziyiriho. Avuga ko ari itangiriro z’ibyo yifuzaga.
Ati “Iyi album ni itangiriro ry’ibyo nifuza gukora mu muziki munyarwanda. Ni intambwe yanjye ya mbere kandi nashakaga gukora umuziki utandukanye n’usanzwe uzwi mu Rwanda. Indirimbo zose ziriho zirihariye. Ndabararikira Kumva imvange y’Ikinyarwanda n’izindi nganzo mvamahanga kuko ni kimwe mu bintu nagerageje gukora kuri Iyi album.”
Yavuze ko amasomo yagiyemo muri Amerika umwaka ushize atazabangamira ibikorwa bye bya muzika. Ateganya kugaruka mu Rwanda mu mpera z’uyu mwaka.
Indirimbo zirimo ‘No offense’, ‘Send flowers’, ‘Gukunda’, na ‘Jamaa’ zamenyekanye cyane z’uyu mukobwa ntabwo ziri kuri iyi album, kuko igizwe n’izindi nshya.
Ange Rita Kagaju afite ubuhanga mu kuririmba n’umwihariko wo kuba abasha kubijyanisha no kucuranga gitari, bidasanzwe ku bakobwa benshi mu Rwanda.
Ni umukobwa w’imyaka 21 , uvuka mu Karere ka Rwamagana mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba. Avuka mu bana icyenda akaba ari uwa karindwi.
Yatangiye kuririmba mu 2015 yiga mu wa Gatatu w’amashuri yisumbuye. Yasoje amashuri yisumbuye mu 2018 mu ishami ry’Imibare, Ubugenge n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi mu ishuri rya Rwamagana Lutheran School.

Mu myambaro y’amabara ya gisirikare, abarimo ibyamamare basuye ahatangirijwe urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda.
Mu rwego rwo guhugura Abanyarwanda by’umwihariko urubyiruko, ku mateka yaranze urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda, Sosiyete itembereza ba Mukerarugendo, ‘MB Simba Safaris Rwanda LTD’, yateguye urugendoshuri rwibanze kuri aya mateka.
Ni urugendo rwitabiriwe n’abantu batandukanye biganjemo abafite amazina akomeye mu myidagaduro y’u Rwanda.
Bamwe mu bazwi bifatanyije n’urundi rubyiruko muri uru rugendo harimo; Muyoboke Alex, David Bayingana, Ntalindwa Diogene benshi bazi nka Atome, Kirenga Saphina uzwi muri sinema nyarwanda, Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim n’abandi batandukanye.
Mu gutangira uru rugendo, abarwitabiriye wabonaga bagaragaza amatsiko adasanzwe yo kumenya uko urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiye, icyakora rwagiye kurangira buri wese afite amatsiko y’igice cya kabiri cyarwo kizaba mu Ukwakira 2021.
Iby’uru rugendo ntabwo byari ibintu byoroshye bitewe n’ibihe Igihugu kirimo byo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Covid-19.
Muyoboke Alex uri mu bateguye uru rugendo, yabwiye IGIHE ko bafite ibyishimo by’uko ibyo batekereje byagezweho, anashimira buri rwego rwababaye hafi.
Ati “Si ibintu byari byoroshye ariko turashimira inzego zose zagize uruhare mu kugira ngo iki gikorwa gikunde. Uyu munsi twasuye igice cya mbere cy’Urugamba rwo kwibohora, ubutaha tuzagenda twihugura no ku bindi bice.”
Igice cya mbere cy’ahabereye urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu, uru rubyiruko rwasuye ni ku mupaka wa Kagitumba utandukanya u Rwanda na Uganda.
Muri aka gace hagaragara amateka y’uburyo Ingabo za RPA zatangije urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu ariko zikagorwa cyane no kubura abari abayobozi babo ba mbere kubera imiterere y’aho hantu.
Igihe ingabo za RPA zageraga i Kagitumba tariki ya 1 Ukwakira 1990, Maj. Gen. Fred Rwigema wari uyoboye urugamba, yasobanuye mu magambo make impamvu yarwo, avuga ko mu mateka y’u Rwanda ubuyobozi bubi ari bwo bwazanye amacakubiri n’ibindi bibazo byose byayogoje igihugu, kandi ko nta wundi wabibohora Abanyarwanda, uretse Abanyarwanda bakunda igihugu.
Iki gihe yasabye abarwanyi bari umwe kwiyambura inyenyeri za gisirikare bari bavanye muri Uganda bazita mu mazi, abizeza ko izo bazakorera muri urwo rugamba arizo zizaba ari izabo.
Yahise atanga amabwiriza y’uburyo urugamba rugiye kugenda ubundi aha amahirwe uwumva atiteguye ko yakwisubirira muri Uganda.
Nyuma y’umunsi umwe urugamba rutangiye, ku wa 2 Ukwakira 1990 Maj. Gen. Rwigema yahise agwa ku rugamba i Kagitumba ho mu Karere ka Nyagatare arashwe n’imodoka yari itwaye ingabo za Leta zasakiranye n’iza RPA.
Nyuma y’urupfu rwa Rwigema, Maj Gen Paul Kagame yahise ava muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika (USA) aho yari yaragiye kwiga, maze akomeza kuyobora urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda.
Aka gace uru rubyiruko rwasuye kabitse kandi amateka y’abandi basirikare bari bakomeye muri RPA batahiriwe n’iminsi ya mbere y’urugamba barimo Major Peter Bayingana na Major Chris Bunyenyezi.
Nyuma yo gucengerwa n’amateka y’Igihugu cyabo, uru rubyiruko rwakomereje urugendo rwabo ku nkengero z’Ikiyaga cya Muhazi (Muhazi beach resort), aho bataramiye mu ndirimbo zo kwibohora.
Bacurangirwaga na DJ Diallo ndetse na Dj Rugamba umuziki bumvaga bifashishije ama Ecouteurs, ibimenyerewe nka Silent Disco.
Usibye aba bavangaga imiziki na David Bayingana wari umushyushyarugamba, Cyusa Ibrahim nawe yasusurukije abarenga 60 bitabiriye uru rugendo.
Urugamba rwo kubohora Igihugu rwamaze imyaka irenga ine kuko rwarangiye tariki 4 Nyakanga 1994 ubwo ingabo zari iza RPA zabohoraga u Rwanda zikanahagarika Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi.
Quentin Terantino ari kurebana ay’ingwe n’umukobwa wa Bruce Lee umushinja gushinyagura.
Iyi filime imaze imyaka ibiri igiye hanze ntabwo yavuzweho rumwe ikijya hanze kubera igice kirimo kigaragaza Brad Pitt ukina ari Cliff Booth akubita Mike Moh ukina ari Bruce Lee.
Benshi babifashe nko gutesha agaciro no gushinyagurira uyu mugabo wabaye igihangange muri sinema ziganjemo izirimo imikino njya rugamba. Yitabye Imana mu 1973.
Bamwe mu batarashimishijwe no kugaragazwa kwa Bruce Lee gutya muri iyi filime harimo n’umukobwa we Shannon Lee, wabifashe nko kubahuka no gushinyagurira se.
Aka gace katumye mu Bushinwa banga iyi filime ndetse bifuza ko gakurwamo. Ariko Tarantino wayoboye iyi filime yanze ko gakurwamo avuga ko n’ubundi mu buzima busanzwe Bruce Lee yari ‘umuntu w’ibikabyo ukunda kwishyira hejuru’.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na “The Joe Rogan Experience” ubwo yamamazaga agatabo gashamikiye kuri iyi filime, Quentin Terantino yavuze ko yumva koko umukobwa wa Bruce Lee ko afite ishingiro ariko akihaniza abandi bamugizeho ikibazo.
Ati “Nshobora kubyumva impamvu umukobwa we afite ikibazo. Ni umubyeyi we. Nabyumva pe.”
Agatabo kiswe ‘Hollywood’ gashamikiye kuri iyi filime igaragaza Bruce Lee akubitwa na Cliff Booth yiswe ‘‘Once Upon a Time… in Hollywood” kagiye hanze ku wa 29 Kamena 2021.
Safi Madiba yasohoye indirimbo ‘Remember me’ yifashishijemo umunyamideri wo muri Eritrea.
Uyu muhanzi nubwo atifuje kuvuga amafaranga byamutwaye kugira ngo uyu munyamideri yemere kujya mu mashusho y’indirimbo ye, yavuze ko bitari ibintu byoroshye cyane ko asanzwe ari umukobwa uzwi iwabo wagize umwuga ibijyanye no kumurika imideri.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE ubwo yari akimara gusohora iyi ndirimbo, Safi Madiba yagize ati “Ubusanzwe yitwa Febuven Temesghen, iwabo bamuzi nk’umunyamideri ukomeye, ninayo mpamvu nanjye namwiyambaje mu gufata amashusho y’indirimbo yanjye.”
Avuga ku ndirimbo ye nshya, Safi Madiba yagize ati “Iyi ndirimbo yanjye nshya rero ni impano nageneye abakunzi banjye muri ibi bihe by’impeshyi, ndabizi ko muri ibi bihe baba bashaka umuziki mushya kandi mwiza, ni muri urwo rwego nabatekerejeho.”
Safi Madiba yanavuze kandi ko yishimiye kongera gusohora indirimbo nyuma y’iminsi ahugiye mu bikorwa bya ‘Nukuri Music’ sosiyete yashinze ifasha abahanzi bakizamuka.
Ati “Mu minsi ishize nari ndi kwita cyane kuri Nukuri Music, hari ibyo nari mpugiyemo ariko ubu bimaze kujya ku murongo ninayo mpamvu navuze ngo reka nsohore indirimbo yanjye nshya.”
Kugeza ubu uyu muhanzi yamaze kwemeranya imikoranire na ‘Darcy Muhoza’ nawe utuye muri Canada, uyu akaba aherutse gusohora indirimbo yitwa ‘Too fun’.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya ya Safi Madiba yakozwe mu buryo bw’amajwi na Element, mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yatunganyijwe n’umusore witwa Lievain Rucyaha.
Amasomo Kenny Sol yigiye kuri Bruce Melodie mu mwaka bamaranye.
Mu masaha make ashize, Kenny Sol yasohoye ‘Haso’ indirimbo ye ya mbere nyuma yo gutandukana na Bruce Melodie ikanaba iya nyuma bakoranye.
Nubwo batandukanye ariko nanone ku rundi ruhande Kenny Sol yavuze ko hari byinshi yigiye kuri Bruce Melodie.
Mu byo yamwigiyeho, Kenny Sol yabwiye IGIHE ko harimo gukunda umurimo no guharanira kwigira abandi bakaza bakunganira.
Ati “Bruce Melodie akunda ibyo akora, akunda akazi ke! Wenda reka nguhe urugero mu minsi ishize ubwo hadukaga Covid-19 nta bitaramo bigoye gukora amashusho y’indirimbo, niwe watweretse twese ko ari ibintu bishoboka!”
Yakomeje avuga ko hari imapanuro Bruce Melodie yigeze kumuha nubu zikimufashije, ati “Hari umunsi yigeze kumbwira ko umuntu wa mbere ugomba gukunda ibyo akora ari njyewe ubwanjye, abandi bakaza ari ukunyunganira!”
" Murabizi ibintu byagiye bimubaho, kenshi yakundaga kumbwira ko iyo aba umuntu ucika intege aba yarabiretse ariko kutazicika ni byo byamugize uwo ari we!"
Nubwo ari byinshi yigiye kuri Bruce Melodie, Kenny Sol ahamya ko mu mwaka yamaranye n’uyu muhanzi ibi ari bimwe mu by’ingenzi yahamya ko yamukuyeho.
Kenny Sol akomoza ku kuntu yakiriye gutandukana na Bruce Melodie bari bamaze umwaka bakorana ndetse akaba n’umuhanzi yakuze arota kuzakorana nawe.
Kenny Sol yavuze ko nubwo yatandukanye na Bruce Melodie ariko nta gikuba cyacitse kuko ari ibintu baganiriye mbere yuko biba.
Ati “Buriya Bruce Melodie yagiye kubitangaza tumaze igihe twarabiganiriye ndetse twaranabifasheho umwanzuro! Nta cyantunguye ndetse nta n’icyambabaje, ni amasezerano yari arangiye kandi yatwerekaga impamvu zikomeye zitatuma dukomezanya ahubwo ko buri wese yaba yirwarije.”
Kenny Sol yavuze ko atababajwe no gutandukana na Bruce Melodie, ahubwo ngo yishimiye igihe bamaranye n’ibyo babashije gukorana.
Ati “Sinavuga ko byambabaje, ni urugendo nyine, buri kintu kigira iherezo narabyakiriye! Gusa nishimira igihe twamaranye, nigeze kuvuga ko inzozi zanjye zari ugukorana nawe indirimbo kandi byarabaye n’ubu iracyakunzwe. Ndamushimira cyane kandi ndabizi ko ninongera kumukenera azanyumva.”
Uyu muhanzi yahishuye ko kugeza ubu ari kwikorana umuziki bityo ko igihe haboneka umuntu wifuza ko bakorana nta kabuza ari ibintu baganira.

Uko Safi Madiba yafashe icyemezo cyo gukura Ama G The Black mu ndirimbo "Caguwa"
Icyemezo cyo gukurwa muri iyi ndirimbo Ama G The Black agifata nk’ubuhemu yakorewe na Safi Madiba bari bamaze iminsi bacuditse bikomeye.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Ama G The Black abajijwe uko yisanze atari muri iyi ndirimbo, yasobanuye uko yayitakajeho imbaraga ariko akaza kuyikurwamo.
Yagize ati “Safi Madiba twaraye ijoro turi kuyandika muri Bridge Record. Naherutse tuyandika nongera kubona bari kuyifatira amashusho i Gikondo.”
Icyo gihe uyu muraperi avuga ko yahamagaye Safi Madiba bari inshuti byihariye muri Urban Boys, amubaza impamvu yamusimbuje Jay Polly mu ndirimbo "Caguwa" batanamumenyesheje.
Safi Madiba ngo ntabwo yigeze ahisha uyu muraperi ukuri, yamubwiye ko bahisemo kumukuramo kuko bari bamaze gukorana indirimbo nyinshi.
Ati “Safi Madiba yarambwiye ngo abantu bari batangiye gutekereza ko twakoze itsinda bituma bankuramo.”
"Caguwa" ni indirimbo ya Urban Boys na Jay Polly, yafashije iri tsinda ryari mu bahanzi bari bagezweho mu myaka ya 2014 gukomeza kwigarurira igikundiro cy’abakunzi b’umuziki.
Nyuma yo gukora iyi ndirimbo yamenyekanye bikomeye, yaba Urban Boys na Jay Polly batumiwe mu gitaramo gikomeye bakoreye mu Bubiligi.
Ama G The Black yakomoje kuri iyi ndirimbo nyuma yo gusohora inshya yitwa "Inkebebe" yanditse abitewe n’agahinda k’ubuhemu yagiye akorerwa.
Angelina Jolie na The Weeknd bafotowe basohokanye byibazwaho.
Aba bombi bafashwe amafoto yasakajwe kuri uyu wa Gatanu bivugwa ko bari basohokanye ku wa Gatatu w’iki cyumweru muri resitora yitwa Giorgio Baldi iherereye mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles muri Amerika.
Nyuma y’igihe bamaranye basangira baje kuva muri iyi resitora buri wese ari wenyine mu rwego rwo kwirinda itangazamakuru ariko n’ubundi byaje kurangira bafotowe.
PageSix yatangaje ko uyu mugore w’imyaka 46 yari yambaye ikanzu y’umukara yarengejeho ikote rirerire rya kaki. Mu gihe The Weeknd yari yambaye ipantaro n’umupira n’inkweto by’umukara yarengejeho ikote ryo mu bwoko bwa Denim naryo rikozwe muri iri bara.
Iki kinyamakuru cyatangaje ko uyu musore w’imyaka 31 na Angelina Jolie bari bahuye bahujwe n’akazi cyane ko The Weeknd ashaka kwinjira mu ruganda rwa sinema ya Hollywood.
Umwe mu batanze amakuru yagize ati “Ntabwo bigeze babihisha kuko nta kintu kidasanzwe kirimo. The Weeknd ari kwita cyane ku kwinjira muri filime mu buryo bw’umwuga. Afite iy’uruhererekane izaca kuri HBO [televiziyo].”
The Weeknd si ubwa mbere avuzwe muri sinema cyane ko yagaragaye muri filime yitwa “Uncut Gems” yagiye hanze mu 2019 ndetse aza kugira kugira uruhare mu banditse “American Dad” yasohotse umwaka ushize.
Bivugwa ko ari mu banditse indi filime yitwa “The Idol” izaca kuri HBO ari nayo mpamvu yatumye ahura na Angelina Jolie ngo bayunguraneho ibitekerezo.
Iyi filime yayanditse afatanyije na Reza Fahim na Sam Levinson. Ivuga ku mukobwa w’umuririmbyi wa Pop wakundanye n’umunyemari ufite akabyiniro muri Los Angeles.
The Weeknd wari waketsweho kuba yaba yatangiye gukururana ndetse bakaba bashobora kuba bakundana bucece na Angelina Jolie umurusha imyaka 15, yakundanye n’abandi bakobwa b’ibyamamare barimo Bella Hadid mu 2015 bagatandukana mu 2016 mu 2017 arongera bariyunga. Yanakundanye na Selena Gomez baza gutandukana.
Naho Angelina Jolie we azwi cyane mu nkuru z’urukundo na Brad Pitt bakoze ubukwe mu 2014, nyuma y’imyaka 10 bari bamaze bakundana. Nyuma y’imyaka ibiri basezeranye, ni bwo batandukanye, aba bombi bafitanye abana batandatu.
Angelina Jolie yari yarabanje gushyingiranwa na John Lee Miller mu 1996 batandukana mu 1999, kuva mu 2000 kugera mu 2003 yari umugore wa Billy Bob Thornton, waje gusimburwa na Brad Pitt.
Masamba na Mariya Yohana bagiye guhurira mu gitaramo cyo Kwibohora.
Ni igitaramo cyo kwiyibutsa ibihe by’ingenzi byaranze urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwabaye mu myaka 27 ishize.
Iki gitaramo kizaba kiri mu mujyo w’ibitaramo bya Iwacu Muzika Festival ariko cyo kikaba gifite umwihariko w’uko kizaba cyahariwe umunsi wo Kwibohora uzaba ku wa 4 Nyakanga 2021 ari nabwo nacyo kizaba.
Cyateguwe na East African Promoters kikazanyuzwa kuri Televiziyo y’u Rwanda guhera saa yine n’igice z’ijoro.
Mu minsi ishize nibwo Platini P yabimburiye abandi bahanzi mu bitaramo bya Iwacu Muzika Festival mu cyabaye tariki 26 Kamena 2021.
Bitewe n’uko icyorezo cya Covid-19 kitaratanga agahenge, ubuyobozi bwa East African Promoters (EAP) isanzwe itegura Iwacu Muzika Festival bwafashe icyemezo cyo kongera kuyitegura hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga, nyuma y’iyabaye mu 2020 nabwo arizo zifashishijwe.
Abahanzi bose bazatarama muri Iwacu Muzika Festival uyu mwaka bamaze kumvikana na EAP ndetse batangiye n’imyotozo bakorana n’abazabacurangira. Umwaka ushize Iwacu Muzika Festival yaririmbyemo abahanzi 15, mu bitaramo byatangiye mu ntangiriro za Nzeri 2020.
Isomwa ry’urubanza rwa Fireman ryasubitswe, agiye kongera kuburana.
Me Bayisabe Irénée wunganira Fireman muri uru rubanza yabwiye IGIHE ko Urukiko rwabamenyesheje ko isomwa ryarwo ryasubitswe ahubwo hazasubukurwa iburanisha rizagibwamo impaka ku byavuye mu iperereza ry’Urukiko.
Uyu munyamategeko wunganira Uwimana Francis uzwi nka Fireman, yavuze ko kuba Urukiko rwakora iperereza ryarwo ari ibintu bisanzwe, ati “Mu gihe urukiko rwaba rutaranyuzwe n’iperereza ryakozwe n’inzego z’Ubugenzacyaha ndetse n’Ubushinjacyaha, Umucamanza yemerewe gukora iperereza rye.”
Urukiko rwakoze iperereza kuko rutanyuzwe n’iryabaye mbere yo kuregerwa abaregwa, Me Bayisabe yagize ati “Nko muri uru rubanza wumvise inshuro nyinshi ko ababuranyi bagiye bagaragaza ko hari uburyo iperereza ritakozwe neza, ibyo wasanga ari byo umucamanza yanagendeyeho akora iperereza rye.”
Isubukurwa ry’uru rubanza ryashyizwe ku wa 16 Nyakanga 2021.
Fireman yaherukaga kwitaba Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare tariki 7 Kamena 2021, ari kuregwa mu itsinda ry’abantu 11 bakurikiranyweho icyaha cyo gukubita no gukomeretsa abanyeshuri bagororerwaga Iwawa.
Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwari rwamukatiye igifungo cy’imyaka itatu n’ihazabu y’ibihumbi magana atanu y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda (500 000 Frw).
Muri 11 bakurikiranywe n’Urukiko rwa Gisirikare, batatu ni bo bagizwe abere hanyuma umunani barimo na Fireman bahabwa igihano cyo gufungwa imyaka itatu n’ihazabu y’amafaranga ibihumbi 500.
Bitewe n’uko ibihano bahawe kimwe n’abagizwe abere bitanyuze Ubushinjacyaha bwa gisirikare, bwahise bujurira Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare.
Ubushinjacyaha buvuga ko butumva impamvu Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwirengagije ibimenyetso byatanzwe, hakagira abagirwa abere naho abandi bagahabwa ibihano birimo inyoroshyacyaha kandi batarigeze bacyemera cyangwa ngo hagaragazwe ibyashingiweho bahabwa ibihano bito.
Ubu bujurire bw’Ubushinjacyaha bwahuriranye n’ubw’abaregwa barimo na Fireman bagaragarije Urukiko ko batanyuzwe n’imikirize y’urubanza kuko bahanwe kandi ku bwabo bumva ari abere.
Fireman ari kuregwa muri dosiye imwe n’abayobozi batatu bahoze bayobora Ikigo ngororamuco cya Iwawa, abasirikare batanu n’abandi bahoze ari abayobozi b’abanyeshuri babiri.
Kenny Sol uherutse gutandukana na Bruce Melodie yasohoye indirimbo ya nyuma bakoranye.
Kenny Sol yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise ‘Haso’, ahita yemerera IGIHE ko ari iya nyuma mu ndirimbo yakoze ari kumwe na Bruce Melodie.
Ati “Iyi ni imwe mu ndirimbo nakoze ndi kumwe na Bruce Melodie, urebye ni wo mushinga wa nyuma w’indirimbo twakoranye.”
Yavuze ko ashimira Bruce Melodie kuba yaremeye kumufasha, ati “Mu Rwanda hari abanyempano benshi, ku ishuri barabizi njye banyitaga Melodie kuko narinzi kwigana indirimbo ze, ntababeshye nari umufana we. Kwemera kumfasha mu muziki rero nabifashe nk’ikintu gikomeye kandi ndabimushimira.”
Nyuma yo gutandukana na Bruce Melodie, Kenny Sol yemeje ko agiye gukomeza gukora umuziki afatanya n’inshuti ze mu gihe atarabona abamufasha bahoraho.
Kugeza ubu Kenny Sol ari gufatanya n’umusore witwa Billy Mugambage uzwi nka Billy Kapo wari usanzwe areberera inyungu ze mu muziki.
Kenny Sol we mu gihe yamaze mu maboko ya Bruce Melodie yakoze indirimbo zirimo You &I, Aga Fire, Umurego na Ikinyafu.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya ya Kenny Sol mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Element mu gihe amashusho yayo yo yafashwe anatunganywa na Fayzo.
Gaël Faye yatumiwe mu bitaramo azahuriramo na Youssou n’Dour, Angélique Kidjo na Fally Ipupa
Kuri gahunda y’ibi bitaramo, byitezwe ko Gaël Faye azataramira abazabyitabira ku wa 5 Nyakanga 2021.
Ibitaramo ‘Nuits du Peyrou’ byatumiwemo Gaël Faye ni byo bya mbere bikomeye bigiye kubera ku butaka bw’Ubufaransa kuva icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyakugariza Isi.
Mu majoro atandatu ibi bitaramo bizamara, byitezwe ko abahanzi barenga 30 b’ibyamamare ari bo bazataramira abakunzi b’umuziki.
Kugeza ubu abantu ibihumbi bitandatu ni bo bamaze kwemererwa kuzitabira ibi bitaramo bizabera i Montpellier.
Nibura abantu igihumbi ni bo bazajya bitabira igitaramo buri munsi, aho kugeza ubu nta cyangombwa icyo ari cyo cyose kijyanye no kwipimisha cyangwa kuba warikingije kizasabwa uzitabira.
Tariki 9 Nyakanga 2021 ubwo iri serukiramuco rizaba risozwa byitezwe ko hazatarama abahanzi nka Youssou N’Dour, Amadou & Mariam, Angélique Kidjo, Magic System, Lubiana, Khaled, Manu Katché, Enrico Macias, Faudel, Tayc, James BKS, DJ Youcef, Fally Ipupa n’abandi benshi.
Sex/Life’, filime nshya iri guca ibintu kuri Netflix yavugishije benshi.
‘Sex/Life’ yashyizwe kuri Netflix ku wa 25 Kamena 2021 ishingiye ku nkuru y’agatabo kitwa ‘44 Chapters About 4 Men’ ka BB Easton.
Ivuga ku nkuru y’umugore w’abana babiri witwa Billie Connelly washakanye n’umugabo witwa Cooper Connelly. Billie Connelly nyuma yo kurushinga n’uyu mugabo ntabwo anyurwa n’uburyo bakoramo imibonano mpuzabitsina ku buryo atangira kujya yibuka uko yayikoranaga na Brad Simon bakundanye atarashaka.
Nyuma uyu mugore aza gutangira kwandika inkuru y’ubuzima bwe bw’urukundo rwe n’uwo musore buba bwiganjemo ibihe byiza bagiranye mu gutera akabariro aba akumbuye. Cooper Connelly aza kugwa ku nyandiko y’uyu mugore we muri mudasobwa akamenya uburyo akundamo gutera akabariro akaba ari nabwo atangira kujya akoresha kugira ngo yigurire umutima we.
Season ya mbere ya ‘Sex/Life’ ifite ibice umunani. Iri mu bwoko bwa pornographie zoroheje buzwi nka erotic movie cyangwa soft porn. Igaragaramo Sarah Shahi ukina ari Billie Connelly, Mike Vogel ukina ari Cooper Connelly , Adam Demos ukina ari Brad Simon na Margaret Odette ukina nka Sasha Snow.
‘Sex/Life’ mu mashakiro y’imbuga nkoranyambaga iri kugarukwaho cyane bamwe bakavuga ko irimo ibyo abantu banyuramo mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Nk’uwitwa @Wizarab10 yanditse kuri Twitter ati “Iyi filime y’uruhererekane ya Sex/Life ivuga ku kibazo rusange mu buzima bwa muntu. Ukorana imibonano mpuzabitsina n’abantu benshi bagushimisha mutashyingiranwa ariko ugahura n’umusore ufite ejo hazaza kandi uguha amahoro ariko nyuma ugatangira kumunenga kutagushimisha mu gutera akabariro.”
Covid-19 yateje icyuho cy’abasura Ingoro y’Amateka y’Abami i Nyanza.
Mu Karere ka Nyanza ahitwa mu Rukari, ni ho hari Ingoro y’Abami b’u Rwanda igaragaramo amateka yihariye kandi ateye amatsiko, ku buryo buri wese uhasuye amara umwanya areba ibimenyetso bihari bigaragaza uko Abami b’u Rwanda babagaho ndese n’umuco wihariye w’abenegihugu.
Nyanza yafatwaga nk’Umurwa w’Ubwami kuva mu mpera z’ikinyejana cya 19 kugeza mu mwaka wa 1961.
Aha mu Kagari ka Rwesero mu Murenge wa Busasamana niho hari Ingoro z’Abami, hahoze urugo rw’Umwami Mutara wa III Rudahigwa wabatijwe Charles Leon Pierre, watwaye u Rwanda kuva mu mwaka w’1931 kugeza mu mwaka w’1959.
Gahongayire Yvonne uyobora Ingoro y’Amateka y’Abami mu Karere ka Nyanza avuga ko kuva icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyatumye abayisura bagabanuka cyane.
Ati “Mu mwaka wa 2018-2019 twakiriye abashyitsi 65,017; mu 2019-2020 twakira abantu 35,965 kuko batangiye kugabanuka kubera Covid-19 naho mu 2020-2021 hasuwe n’abantu 7,910.
Avuga ko mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 ari bwo ababasura batangiye kugabanuka kuko icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyageze mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020 hashize amezi arindwi umwaka w’ingengo y’imari utangiye.
Ati “Abantu bahise bagabanuka cyane bigaragara kandi nibwo igihe cyo kuza kw’abashyitsi benshi kiba kigeze kugera mu kwezi kwa gatanu n’ukwa gatandatu.”
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyanza, Ntazinda Erasme, avuga ko igitaramo ngarukamwaka ‘Nyanza Twataramye’ cyinjiririzaga Abanyenyanza benshi amafaranga mu gihe gito ariko na cyo Covid-19 yatumye gisubikwa.
Icyo gitaramo cyahuzaga abarenga ibihumbi bitatu mu ijoro rimwe bakarara inkera i Nyanza ntabwo kikihabera kuko umwaka ushize cyabereye kuri televiziyo abantu ntibahura ngo bidagadure ndetse n’uyu mwaka bigaragara ko ari ko bizagenda.
Ntazinda avuga ko kuba kitakibera i Nyanza ngo abantu bahure basabane byateje icyuho mu basura akarere n’igihombo ku bakora ubucuruzi.
Ati “Icyuho kirahari kinini kuko iyo uganiriye n’abacuruzi bo mu Mujyi wa Nyanza bavuga ko uwo munsi wri igitangaza kuri bo kuko kuva k’ufite hoteli kugera no ku munyonzi w’igare, kugera no k’ucuruza avoka mu gatebo, abo bose baracuruzaga bakanezererwa.”.
Nyanza Twataramye ni igitaramo kibanziriza umuganura uba mu kwezi kwa Kanama buri mwaka. Yatangiye kubera mu Karere ka Nyanza mu 2014.
Bamwe mu bakorera ubucuruzi mu Mujyi wa Nyanza na bo bavuga ko kuri ubu batakibona abakiriya nka mbere kubera Covid-19.
Musengimana Gérard ati “Abakiriya ni bake cyane ntabwo bakiza nka mbere kubera iki cyorezo. Umuntu ashobora kumara umunsi wose nta bakiriya batanu yakiriye kuko nta bashyitsi bakiza i Nyanza.”
Ingoro y’Amateka y’Abami igizwe n’ibice bine; icya mbere ni Ingoro Umwami Yuhi V Musinga yabayemo n’abandi bamubanjirije bose, igaragiwe n’izindi nzu ebyiri za kagondo (Iy’amata ndetse ndetse n’iy’inzoga). Igice cya kabiri kigizwe n’inyambo (inka z’amahembe ashyorongoshyoye).
Icya gatatu ni ingoro y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, naho icya kane kigizwe n’aho Abami batabarije i Mwima.
I Nyanza hatuwe n’Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse n’Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana.
Umugore wa Steve Harvey yasuye ingagi mu Birunga.
Uyu mugore ari mu Rwanda mu ruzinduko aho yasuye ingagi zo mu Birunga mu muryango wa Muhoza.
Yanditse ku rukuta rwe rwa Instagram, ati “Mwarakoze Pariki y’Ibirunga gufata neza izi ngagi nziza ndetse no kundeka nkagirana igibe nazo mu buturo bwazo.”
Marjorie Elaine Harvey yasezeranye kubana na Steve Harvey mu 2007. Uyu mugore w’imyaka 54 ri arushinze ku nshuro ya gatatu ndetse yari afite abana batatu mbere yo kubana na Steve Harvey. Aba bombi kandi bafitanye abana babiri b’abakobwa Lori Harvey na Morgan Harvey.
Marjorie Elaine Harvey ni umuhanzi w’imideli ndetse afite umuryango udaharanira inyungu ufasha urubyiruko witwa The Steve and Marjorie Harvey Foundation.
Umugabo we ni icyamamare muri Amerika no ku Isi yose kubera ibikorwa bitandukanye akora mu ruhando rw’imyidagaduro. Broderick Stephen Harvey [Steve Harvey] yavutse ku wa 17 Mutarama 1957.
Ni umunyamakuru kuri televiziyo, umunyarwenya, umukinnyi wa filime, umwanditsi, umushabitsi n’ibindi byinshi. Azwi mu biganiro nka The Steve Harvey Morning Show, Family Feud, Celebrity Family Feud ndetse ni na nawe uyobora irushanwa rya Miss Universe kuva mu 2015.
Uyu mugabo yatangiye ari umunyarwenya mu myaka yo mu 1980 nyuma aza kwinjira no mu itangazamakuru.
Hotel Akagera Game Lodge izacumbikira abazitabira CHOGM yashyizwe ku rwego rw’inyenyeri enye
Iyi hoteli yubatswe mu 1974, iza kugurwa na RSSB mu 2013 hagamijwe gushora amafaranga mu bikorwa bizagira uruhare mu iterambere ry’igihugu bikanahindura imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Nyuma yo kuyigura RSSB yashatse kuyivugurura ikajya ku rwego rwiza rukurura ba mukerarugendo. Mu 2018 yagiranye amasezerano na Sosiyete yo muri Afurika y’Epfo ikora ibijyanye n’amahoteli, Mantis kugira ngo ivugururwe.
Ubuyobozi bwa Mantis bwavuze ko mu mirimo yo kuyivugurura hibanzwe cyane mu kwagura ibyumba no kubishyira ku rwego rwiza kuruta uko byari bimeze mbere. Hongewemo ibyumba bibiri bifite ubushobozi bwo kwakira abakuru b’ibihugu.
Uwari Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe Ishoramari n’Ubukungu muri RSSB, Gacandaga Jean Marie, yavuze ko uru rwego rumaze gushora amafaranga agera kuri miliyari 8 Frw kugira ngo iyi hoteli ivugururwe kuko yari ishaje.
Yagize ati “Twayiguze ishaje, ni yo mpamvu twashoyemo amafaranga kugira ngo igere ku rwego rwiza. Ubwo twayijyagamo yego abantu benshi barayisuraga amafaranga akaboneka ariko ntabwo yari ku rwego twifuza.”
“Urwego ubu iriho ni inyenyeri enye kandi ni rwiza twizeye ko ari umushinga mwiza, rero iyo urebye n’imibare usanga amafaranga yashowemo azagaruzwa.”
Gacandaga yavuze ko kugura iyi hoteli biri mu murongo bihaye wo gukora ishoramari mu mishinga igamije guteza imbere igihugu ndetse n’imibereho myiza y’abaturage.
Akagera Game Lodge iri mu mahoteli azakira abazitabira Inama ya 26 y’Abakuru b’Ibihugu bikoresha ururimi rw’Icyongereza, Commonwealth, izwi nka CHOGM, ibintu Gacandaga avuga ko ari amahirwe akomeye kuba bibaye n’imirimo yo kuyivugurura yarangiye.
CHOGM iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 21 Kamena uyu mwaka. Iyi nama iba nyuma ya buri myaka ibiri, yagombaga kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 22–27 Kamena 2020 ariko iza gusubikwa ku mpamvu z’icyorezo cya COVID-19, cyahagaritse inama n’ibindi bikorwa bikomeye.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Uburasirazuba, Gasana Emmanuel, yavuze ko iyi hoteli igiye gukomeza kurushaho kubera abaturage ivomo ry’imibereho myiza n’iterambere ry’intara cyane ko ubukerarugendo buri mu nkingi za mwamba bifuza kubakiraho ubukungu.
Yakomeje ati “Turifuza ko ubukerarugendo buba mu bintu bitatu tuzashingiraho iterambere ryacu, birimo guteza imbere ubuhinzi, ubukerarugendo ndetse n’ubucuruzi. Ikindi ariko abaturiye aha ngaha imibereho izagenda ihinduka kuko babona akazi.”
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu Rwego rw’Igihugu rw’Iterambere (RDB), Belise Kariza, yashimye intambwe imaze guterwa mu bukerarugendo, avuga ko n’ubwo Covid-19 yakomye mu nkokora uru rwego, u Rwanda rudateze gucika intege mu kubushyigikira no kubuteza imbere.
Yashimiye Ubuyobozi bukuru bwa RSSB ku gikorwa cyo gushora imari mu bukerarugendo, avuga ko adashidikanya ko kizatanga umusaruro ushimije mu gihe Covid-19 izaba yacogoye ndetse n’ingendo zigakomeza nk’uko byari bisanzwe.
Hotel Akagera Game Lodge ifite ibyumba 59 harimo igishobora kwakira Umukuru w’Igihugu (Presidential Suite) n’igishobora kwakira abandi bayobozi mu nzego nkuru (Executive Suite).
Sosiyete ya Mantis ifite inshingano zo gukurikirana iyi hoteli umunsi ku wundi isanzwe icunga izindi ebyiri arizo Kivu Marina Bay iri mu karere ka Rusizi na Epic Hotel iherereye mu Karere ka Nyagatare.
Umukarani yatawe muri yombi akekwaho kwiba shebuja ibihumbi 10$ (Video).
Ku wa Mbere tariki ya 12 Mata 2021 ni bwo uyu mugabo ukekwaho kwiba shebuja amafaranga yafatiwe i Nyamirambo asigaranye ibihumbi 9.6 $.
Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 38, afite umuryango n’abana batanu, ubusanzwe atuye mu Karere ka Nyarugenge, mu Murenge wa Kimisagara.
Yavuze ko amafaranga yayatwaye ubwo umukoresha we yari amutumye kuyabitsa kuri banki, akagenda ntagaruke.
Yagize ati “Yari antumye kuri banki ngo njye kuyabitsaho, hanyuma sinabikora ndayajyana. Muri ako kanya ntacyo nari ndi gutekereza icyakoze naje gukuraho telefoni ngo hatagira unshaka akambona maze nyuma y’igihe gito nongera nyisubizaho ariko numvaga umutima uri kundya ko bashobora kumfata.”
Akomeza agira ati “Bamfashe nagiye mu rundi rugo, nari nahunze ntinya ko bashobora kumbona. Icyo gihe nari mfite ubwoba, nari nakuyeho 200 $ [agera ku 200.000 Frw] ndayakoresha mu rugo.”
Nyuma yo gufatwa uyu mugabo yemeye ko yakoze icyaha abisabira n’imbabazi ndetse aburira bagenzi be bashobora gukora ibisa n’ibyo ko baba bikururira akaga.
Uwibwe amafaranga ni umucuruzi ukorera mu Isoko rya Nyarugenge witwa Gihana Zabulon.
Ubwo yari amaze gushyikirizwa amafaranga ye yagarujwe ku bufatanye n’inzego z’umutekano, uyu mucuruzi yishimiye kongera kuyabona avuga ko atari ikintu cyoroshye.
Yagize ati “Numvaga uko byagenda kose dufite ubuyobozi bwiza ndetse na RIB ishobora kumfasha uwo muntu yaba atarambuka umupaka agafatwa. Uwo mukozi yari umuntu mwiza, twari dusanzwe dukorana neza ariko sinzi ukuntu uwo munsi byagenze kuko namuhaga n’arenze ayo ngayo. Ni umuntu ufite umugore n’abana sinatekerezaga ko yagira umutima wo kunyiba.”
Uyu mucuruzi yavuze ko yatangiye gutekereza ko yibwe hashize amasaha ane, kuko yabajije aho yamukekaga hose ntamubone kandi n’amafaranga atashyizwe kuri konti. Icyo gihe yatekereje ko yibwe, ashyikiriza ikirego Ubugenzacyaha.
Yashimiye uruhare RIB yagize mu gikorwa cyo gukurikirana uwamwibye agafatwa.
Gihana yavuze ko mu byamubayeho yakuyemo isomo rikomeye ririmo no kugira amakenga mu bikorwa by’ubucuruzi.
Umuvugizi w’Umusigire wa RIB, Dr Murangira B. Thierry, yabwiye IGIHE ko hakoreshejwe imbaraga mu gukurikirana uwibye amafaranga kugira ngo atabwe muri yombi.
Ati “Icyo tubwira abantu bose n’abo bakoranaga bose ni uko uwaba afite umutima wo kugerageza gutwara ibitari ibye, cyangwa kwiba ko ntaho yacikira ubutabera. Icyiza n’uko bareka uwo mutima wo gukora ibyaha.’’
Yibukije abaturage kurushaho gukorana n’inzego mu guhanahana amakuru kugira ngo bakomeze umurongo wo guhashya ibyaha.
Uyu mugabo watawe muri yombi aramutse ahamwe n’icyaha cy’ubujura yahanishwa ingingo ya 166, iteganya igihano cy’igifungo kitari munsi y’umwaka ariko kitarengeje imyaka ibiri.
Imyiteguro irarimbanyije ku bazakira n’ahazakirirwa abazitabira Inama ya CHOGM.
CHOGM iba nyuma ya buri myaka ibiri, yagombaga kubera mu Rwanda ku wa 22–27 Kamena 2020 ariko iza gusubikwa ku mpamvu z’icyorezo cya COVID-19, cyahagaritse inama n’ibindi bikorwa bikomeye.
Nyuma yo gusuzuma imiterere ya COVID-19, Ubunyamabanga Bukuru bwa Commonwealth, bwanzuye ko iyi nama izaba mu Cyumweru cya tariki 21 Kamena 2021.
Kuri ubu ibijyanye n’imyiteguro irimo za site inama izaberaho mu Mujyi wa Kigali, amahoteli azakira abazayitabira, imihanda ndetse n’ibindi bikorwa remezo irarimbanyije kugira ngo izasange biri ku murongo.
Iyi nama itegerezanyijwe amatsiko menshi i Kigali ndetse imyiteguro ku mahoteli no ku bantu bayobora abakerarugendo irarimbanyije. Itanga ishusho y’igihugu cyayakiriye muri rusange, kuva ku mihanda inyuramo imodoka z’abashyitsi, kugera ku byumba bya hoteli bararamo, inyubako ziberamo inama, ndetse n’aho batemberezwa mu bice binyuranye by’igihugu, cyane ko yitabirwa n’abantu baturutse hirya no hino ku Isi mu bihugu 54 bibarizwa muri The Commonwealth.
Bitandukanye n’izindi nama zabayeho, iy’uyu mwaka isaba indi myiteguro irenze iyo kubaka imihanda cyangwa iyo kurimbisha ibyumba n’ahazakorerwa inama kubera icyorezo cya Covid-19 kimaze umwaka urenga kibasiye Isi.
Igitezwe amaso kuruta ibindi, ni umutekano w’abazitayitabira, cyane ku byerekeye ubuzima, kureba niba hari uburyo buhagije bwo kwirinda Covid-19, kugira ngo hatazagira umushyitsi uyandurira mu Rwanda cyangwa se hakagira uyinjiza mu gihugu akanduza abo asanze.
Mu kiganiro IGIHE yagiranye n’abanyamahoteli batandukanye na bamwe mu bayobora ba mukerarugendo bazwi nka ‘Tour guides’, basobanuye uko biteguye iyi nama ndetse n’ingamba zafashwe mu kwirinda Covid-19.
Muri za hotel byifashe bite?
Amahoteli ni yo zingiro ry’ishusho umushyitsi ashobora kuvana mu gihugu, kuko ariho amara igihe kinini kuruta ahandi. Uburyo yakirwa aho afatira ifunguro, aho arara, hose hamusigira ishusho ituma azagaruka cyangwa akahazinukwa.
Ni iby’ingenzi rero ko yitegura neza bishoboka, hashyirwa ingufu mu bintu byose cyane mu kwirinda Covid-19, nk’icyorezo gihangayikishije Isi.
Mugesera Eric ushinzwe Abakozi muri Serena Hotel yasobanuye ko biteguye neza, baguze ibyuma bipima umuriro n’ibyibutsa abantu kwambara agapfukamunwa.
Ati “Hari amatsinda yashyizweho ashinzwe gutegura iyi nama kugira imyiteguro yose ikorwe neza […] Abakozi bacu twarabahuguye, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima, RBC, baradufashije mu guhugura abakozi, nabo baraza bahugura bagenzi babo kugira ngo bamenye uko bazirinda barinde n’abo bazakira. Ndetse ubu abakozi bacu bose barakingiwe.”
Ku bijyanye n’ibirori bisanzwe bibera muri hotel bizwi nka ‘Gala dinner’, ‘cocktails’ n’ibindi, Mugesera yavuze ko bizakomeza kuba nkuko byahoze ariko hakurikizwa amabwiriza yose MINISANTE itanga ajyanye no kwirinda Covid-19 cyane ko n’abakozi bahuguwe uburyo bazabyitwaramo.
Moges Hanna ushinzwe Itumanaho n’Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Kigali Convention Centre and Radisson Blu Hotel, yavuze ko iyi hotel yatangiye imyiteguro ya CHOGM mu ntangiriro za Werurwe, ndetse ko aho abashyitsi bazarara hateguwe.
Ati “Twongereye imiti yica udukoko mu byumba by’abashyitsi, dukuramo ibikoresho byakoreshejwe birimo ibitabo byo gusoma, imisego myinshi n’ibyo kwiyorosa biri mu tubati tubikuramo dutera imiti ahantu hose mu byumba yaba ku ntebe, kuri telefoni, telekomande za televiziyo, ku nzugi, ku madirishya ku tubati n’ahandi.”
Yavuze ko ibikorwa byose bizabera muri hotel birimo inama, gufata amafunguro, aho abashyitsi barara bizakorwa hirindwa Covid-19, basiga intera haba mu bashyitsi no mu bakozi, ndetse imiti yica udukoko igashyirwa ahantu hose, ku buryo yaba umukozi cyangwa umushyitsi yayibona.Abajijwe ku cyo Hotel zunguka iyo habaye inama nk’izi zikomeye, Hanna yavuze ko icya mbere ari isura nziza abashyitsi bahavana, bigatuma Isi ibona ko u Rwanda rushoboye kwakira inama mpuzamahanga zikomeye, abasura igihugu bakiyongera n’abategura inama bakakigirira icyizere.
Abayobora abakerarugendo biteguye kubereka ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda
Mu gihe cy’inama zikomeye, benshi mu bazitabira banasura ibice bitandukanye bakareba ibyiza biri mu rw’Imisozi igihumbi kuva ku moko y’inyoni zirenga 300 zo muri Pariki ya Nyungwe kugera ku ngagi zo mu Birunga zikurura abanyamahanga benshi.
Abayobora ba mukerarugendo bazwi nk’aba-guides bavuga ko biteguye neza kwakira abashyitsi bazitabira CHOGM ndetse hari abatangiye kubasaba ko bazabatembereza.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Home Rwanda Safaris, Tuyigire Aimable, yavuze ko nk’abatembereza ba mukerarugendo biteguye guhesha ishema n’isura nziza u Rwanda, cyane ko nyuma y’igihe kinini cyari gishize nta nama zikomeye ziba mu gihugu biteze kuzabona ababagana.
Ati “Ubu twamaze guhugura abakozi batwara ba mukerarugendo bijyanye n’ibihe turimo byo kwirinda Covid-19 ku buryo ntawe uzagira ikibazo mu rugendo. Turi gukorana n’ibice bisurwa birimo pariki z’igihugu ndetse imodoka zabugenewe zarateguwe ku buryo twiteguye kuzereka Isi ko u Rwanda ari igihugu kibereye ubukerarugendo.”
Umuyobozi wa Sosiyete itwara ba mukerarugendo ya Show me Around Rwanda Safaris, Bukuru Augustin, we yagize ati “Twiteguranye kwakira abashyitsi n’ubwuzu bwinshi. Twatangiye gutegura aho abantu bazasura by’iminsi mike hafi ya Kigali bijyanye n’umwanya muto baza bafite kugira ngo bizaborohere cyane.”
Muri rusange imyiteguro mu bantu bose bafite aho bazahurira bya hafi n’abashyitsi bazitabira CHOGM imeze neza ndetse n’ubwo bataramenya umubare w’abantu bazitabira, mu mezi abiri gusa asigaye byitezwe ko imirimo yo kwitegura inama no gukingira abantu bizaba byarangiye. Biteganyijwe ko iyi nama ishobora kuzitabirwa n’abagera ku bihumbi 10.
Usibye ibijyanye n’imyiteguro y’amahoteli n’abayobora ba mukerarugendo, Umujyi wa Kigali nawo ukomeje ibikorwa byawo byo kurimbisha imihanda izakoreshwa ahanini n’abazitabira CHOGM hagamijwe kubafasha kuryoherwa n’igihe bazamara ku butaka bw’u Rwanda.
Inama ya CHOGM iheruka kubera mu Bwongereza mu 2018, byari biteganyijwe ko izabera mu Rwanda mu 2020 irimurwa kubera Covid-19.
Ubushakashatsi bwagaragaje imibereho itangaje y’ingagi z’imfubyi
Byagaragajwe mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe ku ngagi 59 zifite hagati y’imyaka ibiri n’umunani zo muri Pariki y’Ibirunga iri mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda, kuva mu 1967 kugeza mu 2019.
Hifashishijwe amakuru n’izindi nyigo zakozwe mu myaka yabanje, ibyabuvuyemo byerekanye ko kuba abana b’ingagi baba imfubyi bitababuza gukomeza kubaho, kororoka no kwisanga mu zindi. Ni mu gihe abashakashatsi basobanura ko inguge ibuze nyina ikiri nto, bisa n’igikuba gicitse mu mibereho yayo, kuko nyina ari yo iyirinda ikanayitoza inzira nyinshi z’ubuzima bwayo.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RFI, Umuyobozi w’itsinda ry’abashakashatsi bakoze iyo nyigo, Robin Morrison, yatangaje ko ibyo biterwa n’uko ingagi zikunze kubana mu matsinda kandi zigafashanya.
Ati “Icyo twabonye muri ubu bushakashatsi ni uko uretse ukwita ku mwana kw’ingagi z’imbyeyi kuba kutagihari, iyo zigejeje ku myaka ibiri zishobora gukomeza kubaho kandi ntizihungabane. Bisa n’aho biterwa n’uko zibana mu itsinda rigari, riba ryuzuyemo ngenzi zazo bifitanye isano zikuriwe n’ingabo ishobora kuba ari se cyangwa atari we.”
Morrison yavuze ko mu mibereho yazo “zose ziba zisa n’izishaka kuba hafi y’izo z’imfubyi” bigatuma zisanga mu zindi bityo ntizigerweho cyane n’ingaruka z’ubupfubyi.
Muri uko kwisungana kandi ngo ingabo ikuriye itsinda ifasha abana batagifite ba nyina, ikabaryamisha buri joro kabone n’iyo yaba atari yo se.
Ku rundi ruhande, umuhanga mu by’imyitwarire y’ibinyabuzima, Matthew Zipple, yavuze ko kuba ingagi zibuze nyina zikiri nto zishobora gukomeza kubaho kandi neza ”bitangaje kandi byongeye urujijo.”
Ati “Ubundi mu bwoko bwa ziriya nyamaswa icyo tuba twiteze ni uko kubura nyina bishobora kuyigiraho ingaruka mbi zikomeye ku kuba yakomeza kubaho.”
Icyakora n’inyigo Zipple aheruka gukorera mu mwaka ushize ku nkende, ingagi, inkima n’inguge yerekanye ko nta ngaruka mbi zigaragara ku ngagi iba yarabuze nyina ikiri nto.
Muri rusange, ingagi ziba imfubyi biturutse ku mpfu, ubushimusi cyangwa se kuba zakwimuka zikava mu gace kamwe zisize abana.
Iyo nyigo nshya yamuritswe muri eLife ku wa 23 Werurwe 2021, yakozwe n’abashakashatsi bo muri Dian Fossey Gorilla Fund Rwanda, University of Exeter na University of Southern Denmark.
Radisson Blu Hotel & Kigali Convention Centre yabonye umuyobozi mushya.
Rob Kucera afite ubunararibonye burenga imyaka 20 mu bijyanye n’urwego rw’amahoteli. Yakoze mu micungire y’amahoteli muri Afurika y’Epfo, Turikiya, Uganda na Kenya.
Yakoze mu mahoteli akomeye nka The Westin Cape Town and Arabella Hotel, Golf & Spa Resort, Movenpick Wilderness Hotel na Protea Hotels.
Si ubwa mbere Rob Kucera agiye kuyobora Radisson Blu Hotel kuko yayoboye iyo muri Turikiya izwi nka Radisson Blu Bosphorus Hotel, Istanbul ndetse n’iyo muri Kenya izwi nka Radisson Blu Hotel, Nairobi Upper Hill. Rob Kucera asanzwe kandi ari we muyobozi wa hoteli za Radisson Blu mu Karere ka Afurika y’iburasirazuba.
Mu itangazo ubuyobozi bwa Radisson Blu Hotel na Kigali Convention Centre bwashyize hanze kuri uyu wa 30 Werurwe 2021 bwavuze ko ubunararibonye bwa Kucera mu bijyanye no kubera icyitegererezo abakozi, ndetse no kubashishikariza gufata inshingano mu bijyanye n’imicungire myiza ya hoteli biri mu byo bamwitezeho.
Izi ndangagaciro z’uyu mugabo mu bijyanye n’imiyoborere y’amahoteli byatumye we n’amatsinda y’abakozi bakorana babona ibihembo bitandukanye. Mu 2015 ubwo yakoraga muri Starwood Hotels &amp, Resorts Group bahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga kijyanye n’imikoranire myiza nk’itsinda ry’abakozi. Mu 2004 yahawe kandi igihembo nk’umuyobozi mwiza w’umwaka mu itsinda ry’amahoteli ya Protea (Protea Hotels).
Rob Kucera yabaye kandi Umuyobozi w’Inama y’Ubutegetsi mu kigo kigenzura ibikorwa by’ibigo 700 biri mu bikorwa by’amahoteli n’ubukerarugendo mu Ntara ya Western Cape muri Afurika y’Epfo kizwi nka ‘FEDHASA’.
Radisson Blu Hotel Kigali ni hoteli y’inyenyeri eshanu fite ibyumba 292, icyumba cy’inama cyakira abantu basaga 2500, ibiro byo gukoreramo n’ibindi. Yatashywe ku mugaragaro mu 2016, ndetse ifatwa nk’inkingi ya mwamba muri gahunda Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yihaye yo kwagura ubukerarugendo hibandwa ku kwakira ibiganiro, inama mpuzamahanga n’ibikorwa bitandukanye byiswe MICE mu magambo ahinnye y’Icyongereza bizwi nka Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Events.
Huye: Amayobera ku nkende yapfuye imanitse mu mugozi.
Umunyeshuri wo muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda, Rwamucyo Nsengimana Jean de Dieu, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi nkende bayibonye mu masaha ya mu gitondo imanitse, bihutira kubimenyesha ubuyobozi.
Ati “Byatubereye urujijo kuko twabibonye mu gitondo nka saa mbili, bivugwa ko yari imaze iminsi ifite umugozi mu ijosi, birashoboka ko yagiye hejuru kwa kundi ziba zikina akagozi kagafatwa mu ibati kagahita kayizirika.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ubuyobozi bwahise buhagera ariko nta cyo bwayikoraho kuko hari izindi nkende zarakaye, urumva ni hejuru cyane kandi bisaba n’abantu kuba bakurira kandi n’izindi nkende zihari byari bigoye kuba wazihakura.”
Hari amakuru ko urupfu rwayo rwatewe n’abantu bayiteze umugozi ku bushake, bakayambika agasinga mu ijosi bitewe n’uko hari abakunze kuvuga ko zibonera imyaka zikanabasagarira.
Umukozi wa RDB ushinzwe kubungabunga urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, Ngoga Télesphore, yabwiye IGIHE ko bagiye gushaka amakuru y’icyaba cyayishe.
Ati “Turi kubikurikirana kugira ngo turebe uko bimeze maze hashakishwe ikintu cyakorwa byihutirwa. Ubu turi kuvugana n’abayobozi ba Kaminuza ngo tumenye uko bimeze.”
Amakuru agera kuri IGIHE ni uko nyuma iyi nkende yamanuwe aho yari imanitse ikajyanwa ahakusanyirizwa inyamaswa muri Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda mu Ishami rya Huye, kugira ngo iterwe imiti itazangirika maze ijye yifashishwa mu bushakashatsi n’abanyeshuri biga ibijyanye n’imibereho y’inyamaswa.
Gusa kugeza ubu hategerejwe ko ibanza gukorerwa ibizamini hakarebwe niba nta ndwara ifite, mu gihe yasanganwa uburwayi igahita ishyingurwa.
Bimwe mu birwa bitatse ibyiza nyaburanga mu kiyaga cya Kivu.
Ikiyaga cya Kivu ni cyo kiyaga kinini mu Rwanda cyikaba gikurura imbaga y’abantu haba Abanyarwanda ndetse n’abandi baturutse mu bihugu bitandukanye. Igice cyacyo kimwe kiri ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda mu gihe ikindi kiri muri Repuburika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda gikora ku turere tune aritwo Rusizi, Nyamasheke, Karongi na Rubavu, aha hakaba harangwa n’ibyiza nyaburanga bitandukanye birimo nk’amahoteri akikije ikiyaga ndetse n’umucanga abantu bidagaduriramo.
Ibi ni ibigaragara inyuma ariko imbere muri iki kiyaga harimo ibirwa bitandukanye byuje ubwiza butandukanye bituma uwabigezeho atifuza gutaha.
Mu gushaka kumenya amakuru kuri ibyo birwa, IGIHE yaganiriye n’umwe mu bakozi ba sosiyete “Golden Rwanda Safaris Ltd”, izobereye mu gutembereza ba mukerarugendo.
Umwe mu bayikorera yavuze ko igikurura abantu kujya kuri ibi birwa ari ukurira imisozi bizwi nka ‘Hiking’ ndetse no kureba inyoni.
Ati “Abantu bajya ku turwa ni abantu baba bagira amatsiko cyane, wa wundi uba ushaka kumenya ikiri imbere mu kiyaga. Abajyayo rero ibyo bakorayo ni ukurira imisozi ndetse no kureba inyoni kuko zibamo cyane haba ari heza iyo ukunda ibyo bintu.”
Ibirwa biri mu kiyaga cya Kivu
Ikirwa cya Nkombo
Nkombo ni cyo kirwa kinini mu kiyaga cya Kivu kuko gifite ubuso bungana na kilometero kare 29,7 harimo 22,7 km2 z’ubutaka na 7 km2 z’amazi, uyu akaba ari umurenge wose uri mu Karere ka Rusizi.
Iki kirwa gituwe n’abaturage bakabakaba ibihumbi 18, gikurura abatari bake bashaka kujya kureba ukuntu abantu batuye hagati mu mazi ndetse bakururwa n’imico yaho itandukanye n’isanzwe irimo nk’ururimi rw’Amashi rwumvwa n’abaho gusa ndetse n’imbyino zabo zizwi nko gusama.
Abaturage baho benshi batunzwe no kuroba n’ubundi bucuruzi butandukanye bakorera muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo. Ba mukerarugendo barahakunda kuko ubuzima bwaho butandukanye n’ubw’ahandi mu gihugu.
Iki kirwa nta terambere ryaharangwaga mu myaka yashize ariko muri iyi myaka ryarahageze kuko haboneka ibikorwa remezo bitandukanye nk’umuriro, amazi meza, amashuri, ivuriro ndetse na hoteli.
Ikirwa cya Gihaya
Gihaya na ho ni mu Karere ka Rusizi ndetse ni hafi na Nkombo ariko ho ni hato. Ni ikirwa ba mukerarugendo bakunda kujya gusura bashaka kurira imisozi ndetse no gutembera mu bwato. Ubuzima bwaho ni nk’ubwo ku Nkombo.
Akarwa k’Abakobwa
Aka ni akarwa kari mu Karere ka Nyamasheke gafite amateka akomeye mu Rwanda, kera bajyaga ku kajugunyaho abakobwa babaga baratwaye inda z’indaro ngo badateza ishyano ku musozi.
Abantu baturutse imihanda yose biganjemo igitsina gore bajya kuhasura bagira ngo barusheho kumenya amakuru y’uko byagendaga ku bakobwa bahajugunywaga.
Ikirwa cya Nyamunini
Nyamunini izwi cyane nka Napoleon Island, ni ikirwa kiri mu kiyaga cya Kivu ku ruhande rwa Karongi. Iki ni kimwe mu birwa bikurura ba mukarerugendo bitewe n’ubwoko bw’inyoni butandukanye buhari ndetse n’imbuto zihari.
Ikirwa cy’Amahoro
Amahoro na cyo kiri ku ruhande rwa Karongi, nk’uko cyitwa amahoro koko ngo gitemberwa n’abantu babuze amahoro muri bo kandi ngo bahageze bakabona amazi agikikije n’amajwi y’inyoni ziririmba bakumva buzuye amahoro muri bo.
Ikirwa cya Nyakarwa
Nyakarwa ni ikirwa giherereye mu Karere ka Karongi cyizwiho kugira inyoni zitandukanye. Uwahegeze nta yandi majwi aba yumva usibye urusobe rw’amajwi atandukanye y’inyoni.
Ikirwa cya Mpembe
Mpembe na yo iherereye muri Karongi akaba ari icyirwa kigengwa n’umuntu ku giti cye, aho yashyizeho ahantu hangana n’ibilometero bine abantu bagenda n’amaguru. Gikurura benshi kuko kibafasha kuruhuka mu buryo bwihariye.
Si ibi birwa gusa biri muri iki kiyaga kuko muri 2012, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cyo Kubungabunga Ibidukikije (REMA),cyatangaje ko mu kiyaga cya Kivu habarizwamo ibirwa 250. Muri byo, 56 biri ku rahande rw’u Rwanda. Ibi twavuzeho ni ibyo ba mukerarugendo bakunze muri gusura muri iki gihe.
Amaso ahanzwe u Rwanda mu kiganiro Echappées Belles cya France 5.
Ibihugu bya Afurika buri gihe usanga bigarukwaho mu itangazamakuru ry’abo “bavuga ko bageze kuri demokarasi” bigaragazwa nk’ahari kubera ihonyorwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu, intambara, indiri y’imitwe y’iterabwoba, ibyorezo n’inzara; ukagira ngo ni nk’imbabare itabarizwa.
Nko mu Bufaransa by’umwihariko, isura y’u Rwanda mu mboni zabwo ntiyakunze kuba nziza bitewe ahanini n’uruhare abari abayobozi babwo bashinjwa kugira muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, nyuma bakajya no mu murongo wo kuyihakana no kutavuga ukuri kuri yo.
Ibyo byatumye n’abanyamakuru baho bagendera muri uwo mujyo, kuvuga ibyiza by’u Rwanda bigasa n’ibitabaho. Buri wese wumvise ko itangazamakuru ry’Abafaransa ryavuze ibyiza by’u Rwanda ntiyabura kugwa mu kantu.
Ibyo ariko birashoboka kuko mu nshuro nke bibaho n’iy’uyu munsi irazamo. Ikiganiro Echappées Belles gica kuri Televiziyo ya France 5 buri wa Gatandatu kuva ku wa 30 Ukuboza mu 2006, kiraza kwerekana ibyiza u Rwanda rumaze kugeraho mu rugendo rw’imyaka 27 rwiyubaka. Kiraba Saa 20:50 z’i Paris, saa 21:50 z’i Kigali.
Ni ikiganiro gisanzwe kigaragaza agace, igihugu cyangwa akarere runaka n’icyerekezo cyaho. Gikorwa n’abanyamakuru b’Abafaransa barimo Sophie Jovillard wanagitangije, akagikorana na Tiga ukomoka muri Bénin, Ismaël Khelifa na Jérôme Pitorin.
Mu itegurwa ryacyo, abo banyamakuru bakora urugendo bakajya gusura agace kadakunze kuvugwaho ibyiza (akenshi basura agace kari kure y’u Bufaransa), bakareba icyerekezo cyako n’ibihari byihariye bidakunze kuboneka ahandi, maze bakabyereka abagikurikira.
Mu minota 60 yacyo yo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 6 Werurwe 2021, Jovillard arerekana u Rwanda n’iterambere rumaze kugeraho n’ubwiza rufite mu myaka 27 rumaze rushegeshwe na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, aho yibanda ku guteza imbere abagore banagaragara cyane mu nzego nkuru z’igihugu.
Arabyerekanira mu mashusho arimo ayafatiwe mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda muri Pariki y’Ibirunga, Jovillard atemberana na Nyirakaragire Natalie wabaye umuganga wa mbere w’inyamaswa zo muri iyo pariki.
Haragaragaramo uko Abanyarwandakazi bari mu rwego rw’abikorera bageze kuri 40%, intambwe ikomeye itaraterwa n’ibindi bihugu byitwa ko bikomeye nk’u Bufaransa kuko bwo bufite 27%.
Muri Echappées Belles y’uyu munsi kandi haragaragarizwamo uko u Rwanda ruri kubaka ubukungu bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga hahangwa imishinga myinshi izana udushya muri urwo rwego, ari nako rwongera ingamba zo kurengera ibidukikije.
Intambwe yo kuba rwaraciye umuco wo gupfunyika mu mashashi hakifashishwa ibindi bikoresho ni hake yatewe, naho ikoranabuhanga ryo gutwara amaraso ku bitaro bitandukanye hifashishijwe Drones ni ibigwi.
Mu mashusho y’umunota umwe yashyizwe kuri YouTube na Facebook bya Echappées Belles, Sophie Jovillard yakumbuje abantu icyo kiganiro abararikira kudacikanwa kuko cyerekana ibyiza nyaburanga by’u Rwanda birimo ikiyaga cya Kivu n’inyamaswa zo muri Pariki ya Akagera.
Ati ”Mwaramutse nshuti! Mwitegure tujyane mu rugendo rudasanzwe, mwese muhawe ikaze mu Rwanda, ahari ubwiza bushya butuma bamwe barubonamo Singapore ya Afurika, naho abandi bakarwita u Busuwisi bwo muri Afurika.”
Yavuze ko u Rwanda ari ruto mu ngano ariko rukaba “rugari bitewe n’ubwiza” bwarwo, ashimangira ko nyuma y’ihungabana rwasigiwe n’amateka mabi “ubu abarutuye babanye mu mahoro.”
Yakomeje ati “Ruriya ni urugero rw’abantu bakize ibikomere, mu by’ukuri ndumva nshaka kuhatemberana namwe. Nsubiyemo nti ‘ikaze kuri mwese’. Murakaza neza mu Rwanda”.
Abashaka gutembera no kumenya Umujyi wa Kigali bashyizwe igorora.
Uwageze muri uyu mujyi ntiyifuza gutaha kubera ibyiza byinshi birimo imiturirwa myiza, amahoteli yo ku rwego rwo hejuru, ubusitani burimo ibiti bitanga umwuka mwiza n’ibindi byinshi binogera ijisho ry’abawugezemo.
Abawugenda bakoresha uburyo butandukanye butuma babasha kwirebera ibyiza biwugize, hari abagenda n’amaguru cyangwa abakoresha imodoka zabo biterwa n’icyo bashimye.
Mu gukomeza korohereza abatembera uyu Mujyi, Kigali City Tour yazanye imodoka nini zifasha abantu kureba no kumenya neza Umujyi wa Kigali batavunitse.
Iyi modoka nini ikoze mu buryo bugeretse ku buryo ushaka kurebera Kigali ahirengeye ayibona ndetse no hasi akayibona, ikaba ikora ingendo zitandukanye buri munsi mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Iyi modoka ihagurukira kuri Kigali Arena ikazenguruka hirya no hino mu duce two muri Kigali nka Kimironko, Kibagabaga, Rebero, mu mujyi rwa gati no mu tundi duce tw’umujyi.
Abashaka gutembera bashobora kugenda mu modoka ya mu gitondo cyangwa ihaguruka nyuma ya saa Sita, bakagenda basobanurirwa byinshi kuri Kigali buri wese yishyuye ibihumbi 10frw gusa akaza no guhabwa ibyo kurya.
Akarusho kandi n’uko abashaka gutegura ibirori kandi banagenda bashobora kwishyira hamwe iyi modoka ikabatembereza bari no kwishimisha mu birori byabo.
Ushinzwe guteza imbere ubucuruzi muri Kigali City Tour, Hassan Yakubu Mapesa, yavuze ko izi modoka zazanywe mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu gufasha abashaka kuwumenya ndetse no guteza imbere ubukerarugendo butandukanye ku buryo abantu bishimisha mu buryo butandukanye.
Ati “Izi modoka zifasha abantu kumenya Kigali ndetse no gusobanukirwa amateka yayo, ku buryo umuntu wakoze urugendo ataha yamenye byinshi kandi yanishimye yafashe amafoto meza n’ibindi byinshi byiza yabibonye.”
Si abo mu Mujyi wa Kigali gusa kuko ushaka kwishimana n’abawe mushobora kwishyira hamwe ku buryo babatembereza aho mushaka hose mu gihugu.
Mantis uBuranga, ubwato bw’akataraboneka buzakora nka hotel mu Kivu bugiye gutahwa.
Ubu bwato bwiswe Mantis Kivu Queen uBuranga byari biteganyijwe ko buzatangira gukora mu kwezi kwa Kane uyu mwaka, ariko kubera imbogamizi zitandukanye zatewe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, imirimo yo kubaka yagiye idindira.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye ibikorwa bya Mantis mu Rwanda, Dino Urbani, yabwiye IGIHE ko bataramenya neza igihe buzarangirira ariko bateganya ko buzatangira gukoreshwa mu kwezi kwa Karindwi.
Ati “Ntituramenya neza igihe ubwato buzaba bwarangiye, bityo sinakubwira ngo ni iyi tariki, cyangwa ni uku kwezi […] gusa turifuza ko mu kwezi kwa Karindwi bwaba bwarangiye.”
Yakomeje avuga ko nyuma y’ukwezi n’igice ni ukuvuga mu mpera za Werurwe, hazaba hamenyekanye igihe nyacyo buzaba bwarangiye.
Ibikoresho byo kubaka ubu bwato bituruka muri Afurika y’Epfo bigateranyirizwa mu Rwanda.
Dino yakomeje agira ati “Twahuye n’imbogamizi nyinshi, kubera Covid-19 ibintu byose byarafunze, nta kintu cyavaga mu gihugu kimwe kijya mu kindi [...] imvura nyinshi yaraguye muri Kibuye abantu ntibabona uko bakora bituma ibikorwa bitinda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko uretse izo mbogamizi bahuye nazo, ibikorwa byo kubaka byasubukuwe ndetse ko hari gutegurwa aho ubwato buzakorera, kandi ko hari gushyirwamo imbaraga nyinshi kugira ngo burangire.
Mantis Kivu Queen uBuranga ni ubwato buzaba bufite ibyumba bigezweho (cabin) icumi, kimwe gishobora kwakira abantu bo ku rwego rwo rw’abakuru b’ibihugu n’ikindi cy’abanyacyubahiro basanzwe.
Buri cyumba kizaba kirimo ikintu cyose umuntu yakenera, nk’uko nyine yaba ari muri Hotel, ni ukuvuga ubwiherero n’ubwogero, ibyuma bitanga ubushyuhe n’ubukonje, televiziyo, restaurant, bar, n’ibindi bitandukanye.
Ubu bwato buri kubakwa na sosiyete yo muri Afurika y’Epfo yitwa AfriNest, imikorere yabwo ikazagenzurwa na Mantis izobereye mu gucunga amahoteli.
Mantis isanzwe ifite hotel mu Rwanda mu Karere ka Rusizi nayo yo ku rwego rwo hejuru. Yitwa Mantis Kivu Marina Bay, ifite ibyumba 79 birimo kimwe gishobora kwakira nk’Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Ubushobozi bwo kwitunga bwa Pariki y’Akagera bwaragabanyutse cyane kubera Covid-19.
Imibare yatangajwe n’iyi Pariki igaragaza ko mu 2019 yasuwe n’abakerarugendo barenga 50 000, mu gihe mu 2020 yasuwe n’abagera ku 15 844 gusa, ni ukuvuga ko bagabanutseho 68%.
Ushinzwe Ubukerarugendo n’Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, Karinganire Jean Paul yabwiye IGIHE ko kimwe n’izindi nzego zose, urwego rw’ubukerarugendo narwo rwagizweho ingaruka cyane n’icyorezo cya COVID-19, bikaba byaratumye amafaranga ava mu bukerarugendo yinjizwaga na pariki y’Akagera agabanuka cyane.
Yagize ati “Ugereranyije ukwezi na Mutarama 2020 n’ukwezi kwa Mutarama 2021, harimo ikinyuranyo kinini cyane cy’igabanuka, bitewe na none n’uko abakerarugendo batakigenda nk’uko bagendaga COVID itaraza n’ubundi haracyariho COVID-19, ibihugu byinshi byo mu Burayi byashyizeho Guma mu rugo, abaturage babyo ntabwo babasha gutembera nk’uko batemberaga.”
Kuva muri Werurwe 2020 COVID-19 igeze mu Rwanda, ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byahise bihagarikwa, byongera gusubukurwa muri Kamena ubwo abantu bari bavuye muri Guma mu rugo.
Karinganire yavuze ko n’ubwo ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo byongeye gufungura, hakiri ikibazo cy’uko ibintu bitarasubira mu buryo, kuko ahenshi hakiri ingamba zo kwirinda zituma bidashoboka ko baza mu gihugu ku mpamvu z’ubukerarugendo.
Yagize ati “Ingaruka za COVID-19 n’ubundi ziracyariho uko ibihugu biracyafunze, n’ubwo ubukerarugendo bufunguye. Abanyarwanda baraza, abanyamahanga batuye mu Rwanda baraza, ariko abanyamahanga bava mu mahanga bazanywe n’ubukerarugendo baragabanutse n’ubundi kubera Coronavirus.”
Yakomeje avuga ko mu mibare y’abantu nta gihinduka cyane, ariko amafaranga ya pariki ava mu bukerarugendo ngo yo ariyongera, kuko nk’ayinjiye muri Mutarama uyu mwaka aruta ayinjiye muri Kamena na Nyakanga ndetse na Kamena 2020, mu gihe mu Ukuboza ari bwo hinjiye menshi kuko mu Rwanda hari hafunguye n’abantu bashobora gutembera bisanzwe.
Pariki y’Akagera mu Ukuboza yinjije arenga miliyoni 120 Frw, mu gihe muri Mutarama yinjije arenga miliyoni 100 Frw.
Karinganire yavuze ko ingaruka za COVID-19 kuri Pariki y’Akagera ari nyinshi cyane, kuko nk’umwaka wa 2019 yabashaga kwibonamo ubushobozi bungana na 90% ikaba yari ifite intego yo kugera ku kigero cya 100% ariko bigakomwa mu nkokora n’icyorezo, kuko kuri ubu ngo byasubiye inyuma bari ku kigero cya 34% gusa.
Yavuze ko mu rwego rwo kurushaho guhangana n’izi ngaruka zatewe n’icyorezo bashyizeho poromosiyo ku Banyarwanda n’abandi banyamahanga baba mu Rwanda bifuza gusura pariki y’Akagera, aho bagabanyirijwe ibiciro byo kurara mu macumbi (lodge) agenzurwa n’iyi pariki ari yo ya Ruzizi na Karenge.
Kuri ubu ngo kurara muri rimwe muri ayo macumbi kuva ku ijoro rimwe kugera kuri atatu, ni 100 $, mu gihe ngo mu bindi bihe byari 199 $.
N’ubwo iyi pariki yahuye n’ibizazane mu mwaka ushize, yabashije kugira umwanya wo kunoza uburyo bwo kurushaho kwita ku nyamaswa ziri muri iyo pariki.
Mu mwaka ushize inzovu eshanu n’intare zambitswe utwuma dupima amerekezo (GPS), ndetse n’inkura icyenda zashyizwemo “transmitters”, ibyo byose ni mu rwego rwo kumenya aho izo nyamaswa ziherereye ndetse n’uko zimeze mu rwego rwo kurushaho kuzitaho.
Mu mwaka ushize kandi muri iyi pariki hagaragaye ubwoko bushya bw’inyoni bwa “Flamingo”, Karinganire yavuze ko ari amahirwe bagize kuko ari zimwe mu nyoni ubundi zidakunda kuboneka.
Ati “Ni ubwoko bw’inyoni buba budakunze kuhaza, izi rero flamingo ni imwe mu nyoni zidakunze kuba mu Akagera, iyo yaje iba yavuye nko muri Tanzania, iyo zibonetse biba ari amahirwe cyane, hari n’izo tuba dufata ko zanarangiye, kuzibona rero ni amahirwe.”
Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ni imwe mu zujuje inyamaswa zisurwa cyane kuri uyu mugabane, nyuma yo gusubizwamo Inkura n’Intare zari zarahacitse kubera ibikorwa bya muntu. Ubu iyi pariki ibarizwamo inyamaswa zikomeye muri Afurika arizo Intare, Inzovu, Imbogo, Inkura n’Ingwe.
Mu mwaka wa 2020 abasura Pariki y’Akagera bagabanutseho 68 %
Pariki y’Akagera ivuga ko iyi mibare itari yitezwe ariko kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyahungabanyije bikomeye uru rwego, bituma n’abayisura bagabanuka.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 iyo pariki yari yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 49 000, yinjiza miliyoni 1.5 z’amadolari.
Ubuyobozi bw’iyi pariki bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize nta bantu basuye pariki ngo bahamare igihe kinini nkuko byakorwaga mbere ndetse n’abagiye bahaza, ntabwo bagiye bakoresha amafaranga menshi nkuko byahoze.
Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera ni imwe mu zujuje inyamaswa zisurwa cyane kuri uyu mugabane, nyuma yo gusubizwamo Inkura n’Intare zari zarahacitse kubera ibikorwa bya muntu.
Ubu iyi pariki ibarizwamo inyamaswa zikomeye muri Afurika arizo Intare, Inzovu, Imbogo, Inkura n’Ingwe.
Bisate Eco Lodge yashyizwe mu mahoteli 10 ya mbere ku Isi atangiza ibidukikije.
Uru rutonde rwakozwe n’Urubuga Elite Traveler, rwandika amakuru arebana n’ibintu bihenze kandi bigezweho, ubukerarugendo n’ibindi, rugaragaraho hoteli nziza kandi zigezweho hagendewe kuri buri mugabane.
Umugabane wa Afurika ufitemo hoteli ebyiri zirimo Bisate Eco Lodge yo mu Majyaruguru y’u Rwanda ndetse na Grootbos Private Nature Reserve yo muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Urubuga Elite Traveler ruvuga ko rwakoze uru rutonde mu rwego rwo gufasha ba mukerarugendo guhitamo aho bashobora kuruhukira hajyanye n’igihe kandi hatangiza ibidukikije.
Imiterere ya Bisate Lodge ituma ba mukerarugendo bizihirwa no kuharara. Ni hoteli iri mu rwego rwa hoteli z’inyenyeri eshanu yatashywe ku mugaragaro na Perezida Paul Kagame ku wa 1 Nzeri 2017.
Kuva iki gihe Bisate Eco Lodge yatangiye kwirahirwa n’abatari bacye barimo icyamamare mu mukino wa Tennis, Maria Sharapova wayirayemo igihe yasuraga u Rwanda mu 2019.
Iyi hoteli yubatswe hagendewe ku muco Nyarwanda kuko uwayikoreye inyigo yagendeye ku buhanga bw’imyubakire gakondo ndetse n’ibirunga by’u Rwanda.
Igizwe n’inzu z’ibyatsi esheshatu, buri yose ifite ishusho ya kimwe mu birunga byo mu Rwanda ikaba ahitegeye ku gasozi keza kari mu ishyamba, ku buryo uburanga bw’imisozi iyikikije n’ikirere bituma uhari yumva umwihariko waho.
Uretse kuba ifite ishusho y’ibirunga nka Bisoke, Mikeno na Kalisimbi, urebye Bisate Lodge uhita kandi uyibonamo ishusho y’ingoro y’Umwami yo mu Rukari i Nyanza.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Iterambere (RDB) ruvuga ko kuba mu Rwanda harafunguwe Bisate Eco Lodge ari ikimenyetso ko umuhate w’igihugu mu kubungabunga ibikorwa bikurura ba mukerarugendo, amabwiriza yorohereza ishoramari ndetse na politiki iharanira impinduka nziza byatangiye gutanga umusaruro.
Kuba kandi iyi hoteli igenewe kwakira ba mukerarugendo bo ku rwego rwo hejuru bifuza kugirira ibihe byiza muri Pariki y’Ibirunga, ihorana abashyitsi bishyura amafaranga abarirwa muri miliyoni imwe y’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, bishimangira ko hari byinshi byisumbuye igihugu cyasangiza abaturutse mu mahanga.
Uretse Bisate Eco Lodge, u Rwanda rufite n’izindi hoteli zubatswe mu buryo bugabanya ingaruka mbi ku bidukikije zigera ku 10 zirimo nka Inzu Logde iri mu Karere ka Rubavu, intego akaba ari ukubaka izindi nyinshi.
Urutonde rwa Elite Traveler rugaragaraho izindi hoteli zifite umwihariko wo kutangiza ibidukikije nka Pikaia Lodge yo mu Birwa bya Galápagos, Habitas Tulum yo muri Mexique, Whitepod yo mu Busuwisi, Borgo Pignano yo mu Butaliyani, Song Saa Private Island Resort yo muri Cambodia, Soneva Fushi yo muri Maldives na Kokomo Private Island yo muri Fiji.
Amabwiriza mashya ku basura pariki z’u Rwanda n’ahantu nyaburanga.
Kuva kuwa Kabiri tariki ya 19 Mutarama 2021, Umujyi wa Kigali washyizwe muri gahunda ya Guma mu Rugo y’iminsi 15 nyuma y’uko ubwandu bwa Coronavirus bukajije intera mu gihugu no muri uyu mujyi by’umwihariko.
Icyo gihe Inama y’Abaminisitiri yatangaje ko usibye serivisi z’ingenzi zizakomeza gukora, izindi zizafunga aho bishoboka abantu bagakorera mu ngo. Iki cyemezo cyaje gisanga ikindi cyari cyafatiwe mu yabanje cyahagarikaga ingendo zihuza Umujyi wa Kigali n’Intara.
Mu rwego rwo kubahiriza imyanzuro y’iyi nama, kuri uyu wa Gatatu RDB yashyize ahagaragara amabwiriza arebana n’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo azakomeza kubahirizwa mu gihe hategerejwe izindi ngamba zizagenda zifatwa n’inzego zishinzwe ubuzima mu Rwanda.
Mu bikubiye muri ayo mabwiriza harimo ko ingendo zijyanye n’ubukerarugendo zemewe mu Mujyi wa Kigali no hagati ya Kigali n’izindi Ntara n’Uturere, hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Harimo kandi ko abagenzi bose, baba abinjira cyangwa abasohoka mu gihugu bagomba kugaragaza icyemezo cy’uko bapimwe COVID-19 hifashishijwe uburyo bwihuse bwa RT-PCR mu masaha atarenze 120, mbere yo kuza cyangwa kugenda kandi abaganga bakaba barasanze batayirwaye.
Andi mabwiriza
Hoteli zakira abaturutse mu mahanga by’igihe gito zizakomeza gukora hubahirizwa amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19.
Ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo, harimo no gusura Pariki z’Igihugu, ingoro ndangamurage, ahantu nyaburanga ho gutembera ndetse no gusura imijyi bizakomeza mu gihugu hose, haba ku banyamahanga cyangwa abatuye mu gihugu, mu buryo bwubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19. Abatanga serivisi zifasha ba mukerarugendo basabwa kumenyesha RDB gahunda zabo ndetse n’inzira bateganya kunyura.
Abagenzi ubariyemo n’abashoferi, basabwa kuzuza inyandiko isaba urushushya rw’inzira bagashyiraho kopi z’ibyemezo by’uko bipimishije COVID-19 kandi batayirwaye, bakabyohereza hasigaye nibura amasaha 24 ngo batangire urugendo.
Ibigo by’ubukerarugendo bisabwa gusabira abakozi babyo uruhushya rw’inzira byuzuza buri cyumweru. Hoteli zemerewe kwakira gusa inama za ngombwa, zibanje kubihererwa uruhushya rwanditse na RDB.
RDB, yongeye kwibutsa abantu bose ko bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza y’isuku no kwirinda yatanzwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima hagamijwe kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Kuva ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020 ubwo umurwayi wa mbere yabonekaga mu Rwanda hamaze gufatwa ibipimo bya Coronavirus 804 337, byasanzwemo 11 548 banduye. Muri bo 7580 barasezerewe nyuma bikemezwa ko nta bwandu bagifite mu mibiri yabo mu gihe 3820 bakiri kwitabwaho, abapfuye ni 148.
Umunara nk’uwa Eiffel i Kigali: Umushinga mushya u Rwanda rweretswe wakongera ubukerarugendo.
Ni umunara wa metero 200 yagaragaje ko waba wihariye umwimerere Nyarwanda kuko ugaragaramo imirya y’inanga, ukaba wajyamo utubari, restaurants, inzu ndangamateka, indebakure (Jumelles) n’ibindi.
Umunara wa Eiffel umwe mu miremire ku Isi, ufite metero 300 z’uburebure. Uwo mu Rwanda uramutse wubatswe waba uwugwa mu ntege.
Icyo gitekerezo kiramutse cyemewe, nyir’umushinga agaragaza ko byakongerera u Rwanda kuba igicumbi cy’ubukerarugendo muri Afurika, amafaranga rwinjiza akiyongera.
Didier Gakuba ni inshuti y’uwo munyamahanga utifuje ko amazina ye atangazwa umushinga we utaremerwa dore ko we icyo atanga ari icyo gitekerezo n’igishushanyo, hagashakwa abashoramari.
Gakuba ni na we watangaje bwa mbere kuri Twitter amafoto agaragaza igishushanyo mbonera cy’uwo munara, asaba abayobozi mu Rwanda gusesengura niba uwo mushinga ushoboka.
Mu butumwa buherekejwe n’amafoto, Gakuba yagize ati “Muraho bayobozi bacu. Inshuti yanjye yakoze iki gishushanyo kiri mu bwoko bw’Umunara wa Eiffel. Yifuzaga ko gishyirwa kuri Mont Kigali kuko gifite metero 200, kikaba kijyamo restaurants, utubari n’indebakure. Iki gitekerezo murakibona gute? Ese abashoramari babyinjiramo nk’umushinga w’ubukerarugendo?”
Meya w’Umujyi wa Kigali ni umwe mu bayobozi bahise basubiza kuri Twitter, bavuga ko igitekerezo ari cyiza, anatanga igihe cyo guhura na nyir’umushinga ngo baganire.
Yagize ati “Umwaka mushya Didier Gakuba. Bwira iyo nshuti yawe ko byaba byiza tuganiriye birambuye kuri uyu mushinga. Ese yaba ari hafi ngo dupange uko twahura mu cyumweru gitaha?”.
Meya w’Umujyi wa Kigali ni umwe mu bayobozi bahise basubiza kuri Twitter, bavuga ko igitekerezo ari cyiza, anatanga igihe cyo guhura na nyir’umushinga ngo baganire.
Yagize ati “Umwaka mushya Didier Gakuba. Bwira iyo nshuti yawe ko byaba byiza tuganiriye birambuye kuri uyu mushinga. Ese yaba ari hafi ngo dupange uko twahura mu cyumweru gitaha?”
Ubukerarugendo butavugwa bushingiye ku buhinzi i Nyamasheke.
Abakorana na bamukerarugendo mu karere ka Nyamasheke barashishikariza abantu gusura ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bishingiye ku ubuhinzi.
Ibi babigarutseho mu rugendo rw’iminsi ibiri bakoze basura ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku mateka n’ibihingwa birimo ubuhinzi bw’icyayi mu karere ka Nyamasheke.
Ni urugendo rwari rugamije kumenyekanisha ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bishingiye ku muco n’amateka y’abantu birimo n’ubushingiye ku buhunzi.
Nyuma yo gusura bimwe mu bikorwa birimo ubuhinzi bw’icyayi cya Gisakura n’uruganda rugitunganya biherereye mu murenge wa Bushekeri, babwiye IGIHE ko usanga abantu bakunze gusura za pariki z’inyamanswa, ibiyaga, imigezi ariko ugasanga badasura ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku buhinzi.
Rugero Jeannette uherekeza ba mukerarugendo yagize ati “Ntabwo baragira amakuru yimbitse ku gusura ubuhinzi, nashishikariza buri wese gusura ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku bihingwa. Urugero abantu benshi banywa icyayi batazi uko gitunganywa, gihingwa gute. Abenshi babisura ni abanyamahanga.”
Kamugisha Kirenga yunzemo ati “Ntabwo abantu bafite amakuru ahagije, bayafite bajya babishyira muri gahunda zabo bakamenya ko nibagera hano bazajya gusura inganda z’icyayi, imirima y’icyayi, uko basoroma ndetse akaba yanasoma kuri icyo cyayi. Ni ukutabimenyekanisha, hari ibindi byinshi bitamenyekana harimo icyayi kuko abenshi bazi icyayi ku meza. Bipfira mu kumenyekanisha.”
Karangwa Anaclet uhagarariye Ivomo, umuryango uteza imbere ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku umuco n’abaturage yavuze ko abantu benshi bazi ko ubukerarugendo ari parike na hoteli kandi hari n’ubundi bwafasha abantu.
Ati “Hari ikintu cyagiye kijya mu bantu kumva ko ubukerarugendo ari amaparike na za hoteli ariko hari ibintu byinshi byakorwamo ubukerarugendo. Bakeneye kuza kureba umuturage ahinga gute, nk’ibi twajemo by’icyayi biri mu buzima bwo guhinga. Hari abantu rero bishimira kugenda muri kiriya cyayi gisa neza, akareba uburyo bagisoroma.”
Mu karere ka Nyamasheke, ni hamwe mu hantu hari ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo birimo ishyamba rya Nyungwe, ikiyaga cya Kivu ndetse n’ubuhinzi bw’icyayi n’amateka. Aba bakora mu bikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bakaba biyemeje kuzamura imyumvire ku bukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco, ubuhinzi n’abantu.
Abashoramari b’i Rusizi beretswe amahirwe bakwiye kubyaza umusaruro.
Mu nama yahuje abayobozi muri RDB n’abashoramari bo muri Rusizi, bagaragaje ko hari amahirwe yo kwihutisha ishoramari batari bazi ko ari muri aka karere.
Umuyobozi ukuriye Ishami ry’Ishoramari muri RBD, Lucky Philip, yagaragaje ko abashoramari bafite amahirwe yo kubakiraho babyaza umusaruro.
Mbere y’uko Isi yibasirwa na Coronavirus yatumye hafatwa ingamba zitandukanye zirimo no guhagarika ingendo zihuza ibihugu, imipaka ya Rusizi ya I n’iya II, n’uwa Bugarama yanyurwagaho n’Abanyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo mu ngendo z’ubucuruzi.
Rusizi ifite abashoramari banini 65 bahafite amahoteli n’ibindi bikorwa binini ariko hari ibicuruzwa byinshi bigitumizwa mu Mujyi wa Kigali, bigatuma bihagera bihenze cyane.
Abitegereza Akarere ka Rusizi bakabona nka zahabu ikiri mu gitaka kuko katarabyazwa umusaruro mu buryo bugaragara ukurikije ko gafite n’isoko utasanga ahandi ry’abaturanyi b’i Bukavu muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo batuma kagira isoko ryagutse ry’ibicuruzwa bitandukanye.
Abashoramari bo muri Rusizi beretswe ko hari amahirwe batarabyaza umusaruro kuko nko mu cyanya cyahariwe inganda kugeza ubu hamaze kugeramo rumwe gusa.
Ikiyaga cya Kivu uretse kugishakiramo isambaza na zo ubu zisigaye zarabuze, nta kindi kintu kigaragara abagituriye bagikesha nyamara, abazi iby’ubukerarugendo bakibonamo imari ikomeye.
Izi ngingo kimwe n’izindi ziri mu zo abashoramari bo mu Karere ka Rusizi beretswe nk’izo bakeneye kubyaza umusaruro.
Umujyi wa Rusizi ni umwe muri itandatu yunganira uwa Kigali muri gahunda ya Leta y’u Rwanda y’uko 35% by’Abanyarwanda bazaba batuye mu mijyi bitarenze 2020.
Teddy Riley yasazwe n’ibyishimo ubwo yasuraga ingagi mu Birunga.
Uyu mugabo w’umunyabigwi muri muzika, agiye kumara icyumweru mu Rwanda mu rugendo rwe bwite ariko byitezwe ko rushobora gushibukamo imikoranire yo mu yindi sura.
Amashusho yashyizwe ku rukuta rwa Twitter rwa Visit Rwanda, amugaragaza ari mu Birunga yagiye gusura ingagi, ndetse asangiza abantu ibyishimo afite. Yasuye umuryango wa Kwitonda, abona uburyo izi nyamaswa zifite imiterere igiye kumera nk’iy’umuntu n’ibindi.
Ku rukura rwe rwa Instagram naho yasangije abamukurikira amashusho y’umwana usa n’uri ahantu mu cyumba uri kubyina, avuga ko yishimiye kuba ari mu Amakaro (hotel y’akataraboneka iri hafi ya Pariki y’Ibirunga), avuga ko ari ahantu bakirana ababagana urugwiro ha mbere yabonye mu buzima bwe.
Teddy Riley wageze mu Rwanda ku wa Gatandatu tariki 5 Ukuboza akabanza gushyirwa mu kato kugira ngo apimwe Covid-19, ku wa Mbere tariki 7 Ukuboza yasuye Urwibutso rwa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi rwa Kigali ku Gisozi, anunamira inzirakarengane ziharuhukiye.
Nyuma yasuye ishuri rya muzika rya Nyundo aganira n’abanyeshuri baho ndetse abemerera kuzagaruka azanye n’inshuti ze bakareba impano ziri mu Rwanda. Yagiranye ibiganiro kandi n’abakora mu ruganda rw’imyidagaduro mu Rwanda anasura inzu ihanga imideli ya House of Tayo.
Abandi ba mukerarugendo bo muri Israel basuye u Rwanda.
Ahagana saa sita kuri uyu wa Kane nibwo iyi ndege yageze i Kigali. Ambasaderi wa Israel mu Rwanda, Ron Adam, niwe watangaje ko aba ba mukerarugendo bageze mu Rwanda, baje “kureba ibyiza” birutatse.
Baje nyuma y’aho mu mpera za Ugushyingo Sosiyete ya Israel itwara abantu n’ibintu mu kirere, Israir, yatangizaga ingendo zayo mu Rwanda za buri cyumweru itwaye ba mukerarugendo 80.
Mu Ugushyingo Israir yari yatangaje ko izatangira gukora ingendo rimwe mu cyumweru uhereye kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 26 Ugushyingo, aho ikiguzi cyo kugera i Kigali uvuye muri Israel ari amadolari 399, ni ukuvuga hafi ibihumbi 400 Frw.
U Rwanda na Israël byatangiye imibanire mu 1962 ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge. Uyu mubano waje gusa n’uhagarara kubera Jenoside u Rwanda rwaciyemo n’ibibazo byayikurikiye, ariko urasubukurwa ku buryo rufite ambasade ifite icyicaro i Tel Aviv guhera mu 2015.
Tariki ya 1 Gicurasi 2019 nibwo Israel yafunguye Ambasade yayo mu Rwanda; nibwo bwa mbere iki gihugu cyagize Ambasaderi [Ron Adam], ugihagarariye i Kigali kuva mu myaka 50 ishize.
Yafunguwe nyuma y’uko muri Nzeri 2018, Perezida Kagame na Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Israël, Benjamin Netanyahu, bemeranyije kubaka umusingi uhamye w’umubano mu bya dipolomasi n’ubukungu ushingiye ku kugira za ambasade mu bihugu byombi.
Ku wa 25 Kamena 2019 nibwo indege ya Sosiyete Nyarwanda ikora ingendo zo mu kirere, RwandAir, yageze i Tel Aviv muri Israel. Ni igikorwa cyazamuye amahirwe y’ubukerarugendo, ubucuruzi n’ishoramari ku bihugu byombi ndetse abakora ingendo za gihanuzi boroherwa no kugana i Yerusalemu.
Forest of Hope Guest House and Camp Site yafunguye imiryango muri Pariki ya Gishwati-Mukura.
