Uko Kigeli IV Rwabugili yanze kugurisha Abanyarwanda mu bucakara avuga ko ari ab’Imana.
Abanyamateka bagaragaza ko nibura ku nkengero z’Inyajya y’u Buhinde hagurishirijwe miliyoni 17 z’Abirabura. Icyo gihe ibice bimwe bya Afurika abaturage baragabanyutse, bicwa n’inzara, umuruho kubera ingendo ndende no gufatwa nabi.
Umwanditsi w’Umunyamerika, Sir Henri Morton Stanley nawe uri mu bageze muri Afurika mu bukoloni, yanditse ko nyuma yaje gusubira mu gace ka Maniema ko muri Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo asanga abaturage baragabanyutse cyane.
Iri curuzwa ry’abantu n’ubucakara byaherekejwe no gutesha agaciro, iyicarubozo, n’ihohoterwa ry’abirabura bo muri Afurika. Byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku birabura bose aho bava bakagera kugeza n’uyu munsi baracyahangana n’ibisigisigi by’izi ngaruka.
Ku ngoma y’Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugili nibwo abaturage bo mu bihugu byo muri Afurika yo munsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara no mu Karere k’Ibihugu byo mu Biyaga Bigari muri rusange, bari imari ishyushye ku isoko ry’ibihugu bya Amerika n’iby’Abarabu.
Rwabugili ni we mwami wenyine wanze gufata abaturage be ngo abagurishe. Ahandi mu bindi bice bya Afurika bararaga bafata abagabo n’abagore bafite imbaraga bakabagurisha abazungu n’Abarabu. Abami bagurishaga abacakara, bahabwa impano zitandukanye zirimo indorerwamo, amasaro, imyenda n’ibindi.
Umwanditsi akaba n’Impuguke mu mateka, Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu agaragaza ko Umwami Rwabugili yari yaramenye amahano Abarabu bari gukora mu Banyamwezi, mu Bagande, mu Banyoro n’i Karagwe n’ahandi hirya no hino mu karere. Abarabu bafatanyije n’Abami baho bari bamaze igihe bafata abaturage babo bakabagurisha.
Umwami Rwabugili amaze kumenyeshwa ko Abarabu bageze ku nkengero z’Ikiyaga cya Tanganyika, yahaye itegeko ingabo ze ko umuntu wese w’uruhu rwera bazabona akandagira ku butaka bw’u Rwanda bagomba kumwica.
Hari amateka agaragaza ko mu 1871, Abarabu ba mbere binjiye mu Rwanda baje gufata abantu, nta n’umwe warusohotsemo. Ayo makuru barayabwiranye, baratinya cyane.
Nyuma bagerageje kureshya umwami Rwabugili, bamuzanira impano nyinshi zirimo amatungo, imyenda n’ibindi kugira ngo yemere kugurisha Abanyarwanda ariko arabyanga ni yo mpamvu abarabu benshi bakambitse bakagarukira hakurya y’Akagera, ntibatinyuke kwinjira mu Rwanda.
Rwabugili yababwiye ko Abaturage ari ab’Imana
Abakoraga ubucuruzi busanzwe buzwi bo barambukaga neza bakinjira bagacuruza bakongera bagasubira iwabo. Abarabu bakoze ibishoboka byose ngo binjire mu Rwanda bafate abagabo n’abagore ariko umwami Rwabugili ababera ibamba.
Umushakashatsi akaba n’Impuguke mu mateka, Innocent Nizeyimana [yanditse igitabo yise ‘Ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda mu mateka yabo’] avuga ko abanyarwanda n’Ubwami bwabo bari bazi agaciro k’ikiremwamuntu ndetse n’uburenganzira bwe, ari nayo mpamvu bamaganye icuruzwa ry’abantu.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA, Nizeyimana yavuze ko Rwabugili yakundaga abaturage be ku buryo n’ubwo byari bisanzwe bizwi ko abaturage ari rubanda rw’Umwami, kuri we atari ko byari bimeze.
Yagize ati “Iki gihe cyo gucuruza abirabura, Rwabugili yarabahakaniye aravuga ati njyewe ntabwo nagurisha abanyarwanda kuko si abanjye, ahubwo ninjye wabo. Abanyarwanda ni ab’Imana.”
Nizeyimana avuga ko muri icyo gihe Abanyarwanda bitaga Umwami wabo, Nyagasani. Ni ukuvuga ko yari ahagarariye Imana, iyi akaba ari nayo mpamvu bikekwako yatumye yanga ko abanyarwanda bagurwa mu bucakara.
Ati “Abanyarwanda bumvaga ko Umwami ahagarariye Imana, none se Nyagasani yari kubagurisha ku banyamahanga? N’ubwo Umwami baje bakamwinginga yakomeje kwimana abaturage be.”
Amateka agaragaza ko hari abantu bagurwaga mu Burundi no muri Congo, mu Burengerazuba bwa Afurika no Mu burasirazuba icyo gihe banyuzwaga mu Rwanda bagiye gupakirwa mu bwato bwo ku cyambu cya Dar es Salaalam bakanyuzwa mu Nyanja y’Abahinde.
Mu banyuzwaga mu Rwanda habaga harimo abana, abagore n’abandi bantu barwaye, u Rwanda rwababona kubera ubumuntu bwahoze buranga abanyarwanda, rugasaba ko abo bantu bagumishwa mu gihugu noneho u Rwanda rugatanga ingurane.
Nizeyimana ati “Abanyarwanda barazaga bakabategera mu nzira, u Rwanda rukemera rugatanga amaturo rukabagura, rugatanga ihene nyinshi rukemera rukarenza kubyo bari batanze aho babaguze rwarangiza rubabwira ruti aba bantu ntabwo mwabagezayo dore bararembye bameze nabi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Babaguraga n’Abarabu babaga babajyanye muri Tanzania ku cyambu, ibyo rero byose birakwereka ko u Rwanda cyari igihugu kihagazeho. Ntirwigeze rugurisha abantu barwo ahubwo n’abanyamahanga rwarabaguraga rukemera rukabishyurira.”
Lt Col Gérard Nyirimanzi, umwe mu bagize Urwego rw’Intwari, impeta n’Imidari y’Ishimwe akaba no mu Ishyirahamwe ry’Abacukumbuzi b’Ireme ry’Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda, yavuze ko kimwe mu bigaragaza uko Rwabugiri yanze gucuruza abantu ari uko bamwise ‘Bwana Mkali’ cyangwa se umugabo ukaze.
Ati “Abacuruza abacakara bo byari byarabananiye kwinjira mu Rwanda ku buryo hari umucuruzi umwe wavuze ati ‘Pale musiende wana, kuna Bwana Mkali’, banavuga ko kariya gace kitwa Bwana Mukari banakitiriye uwo Rwabugiri wari waranze gucuruza abantu.”
Nyirimanzi avuga ko no mu Rwanda hari hari amasoko yacururizwagaho abantu ariko babaga ari abavanywe mu bihugu byo hanze nka Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo.
Ati “No mu Rwanda hari isoko ry’icuruzwa ry’abacakara ariko igihamya gihari ni uko Rwabugili yanze gucuruza abantu. Babimusabye arabaseka cyane.”
Umusizi Nsanzabera yavuze ko Rwabugili yanashyizeho ingabo zo kurwanya abacuruza abacakara, zishyirwa mu Bugesera ngo zihangena n’Abarabu. Icyo gihe ngo hapfuye abarabu icumi.
Kigeli IV Rwabugili yari mwene Mutara II Rwogera na Nyirakigeli Murorunkwere. Yimye mu mwaka w’ 1853 kugera muri Nzeri 1895.
Hagiye gusohoka igitabo kivuga ibigwi bya Nyirarumaga mu mateka y’u Rwanda.
Nyirarumaga yabaye umugabekazi w’ingoboka w’umwami Ruganzu II Ndoli.
Nsanzabera yabwiye IGIHE ko yatekereje kwandika iki gitabo afite intego yo gukeza intwari zigaragaje mu mateka y’u Rwanda, umuco avuga ko ukwiye gucengera mu Banyarwanda, maze abanyabigwi barwubatse rugahamya igitinyiro bagahabwa urubuga rubasingiza.
Yagize ati “ Bafite amavugwa n’amarorwa mu Rwanda. Igiti ntikimenyekana kubw’izina cyitwa, kimenyekana ku bw’imbuto cyera, ibikorwa byabo by’ubutaneshwa bikwiriye gushyirwa ahabona, buri wese akabigira ibye, bikamubera igikabuzo cyo kubaka ahazaza hazira icyasha.”
Yavuze ko ibyo abanyarwanda bagezeho byose bagiye babiharanira bityo ko bakwiriye gushimira no kumenyekanisha intwari zose zagize uruhare ngo ibyiza igihugu cyagezeho kibigereho.
Ati “Ibikorwa byubaka igihugu cy’u Rwanda, ubuhangange n’ubudasa, byagiye bigira intwari zabimburiye izindi mu kubyitangira haba mu kubihanga, mu kubyubaka no mu kubirinda. Ntacyo Abanyarwanda twagezeho kubera amahirwe, ahubwo byose twarabiharaniye, tubigeraho twiyushye akuya. Ni byiza ko twimakaza umuco wo gukeza no gusingiza intwari zagize icyo zikora ngo u Rwanda rube urwo ruri rwo uyu munsi.”
Amateka agaragaza ko Nyirarumaga ari umwe mu bagore babaye ibihangange mu Rwanda, aho yarunambiye kugeza ku munota wa nyuma, akabundisha (guhungisha) Ruganzu mwene Cyamatare ubwo Abanyabyinshi bamuhigiraga kubura hasi no kubura hejuru ngo bamwivugane, ingoma y’u Rwanda bayegukane.
Nyirarumaga yemeye gucibwa intoki ebyiri ku gaherere ubwo yangaga gutangaza aho Ndoli yabundiye (yahungiye) ubwo bashakaga kumwica.
Ruganzu Ndoli yaje kwitura Nyirarumaga amugira umugabekazi w’ingoboka ku ngoma ye, kuko nyina Nyabacuzi ba Kibogora yari yaraguye mu miko y’abakobwa i Rubi rw’i Nyundo. Nyirarumaga na Ndoli batwaye u Rwanda ahasaga mu wa 1510-1543.
Ni umwe mu bagabekazi 27 u Rwanda rwagize akaba umwe mu bakoze ibikorwa by’ikirenga byubatse u Rwanda mu rwego ruhanitse mu bihe by’ingoma ye, cyane cyane ku kubaka umuco mbonera w’ubumuntu n’ubumana. Kubaka imibereho n’imibanire y’Abanyarwanda, imyidagaduro n’ubuvanganzo no kurushaho gukuza agaciro k’umugore w’i Rwanda.
Abasizi bo bamwibukira ku kuba ariwe nyirakuruza wabo kuko ibisigo bya mbere ari ibye.
Nsanzabera yavuze ko abanyabigwi nka Nyirarumaga, bakwiye kubahwa no kwibuka ibihe byose, abakiri bato bagatozwa umuco w’ubutwari bushingiye ku bwitange no guhanga ibishya.
Iki gitabo ‘Nyiraruganzu II Nyirarumaga, Inkingi mwikorezi y’umuco n’amateka y’u Rwanda’ kizajya hanze mu minsi mike iri imbere.
Kwagura Urukari no kubaka Umudugudu Ndangamuco: Umushinga wihariye mu Karere ka Nyanza.
Ni umushinga watangiye ku bufatanye bw’Akarere ka Nyanza n’Inteko y’Umuco, ukaba uzakorerwa ahitwa mu Rukari ahari Ingoro y’Abami b’u Rwanda no mu nkengero zaho ndetse no hafi y’Icyuzi cya Nyamagana.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Nyanza, Ntazinda Erasme, yabwiye IGIHE ko batangiye uwo mushinga ari umwihariko bafite nk’icyerekezo cy’Akarere.
Ati “Icyerekezo cy’akarere ni ukuba izingiro ry’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku muco n’amateka. Icyakozwe ni uko twagerageje gushaka uburyo bwo kwagura Urukari dufatanyije n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda.”
Yavuze ko abaturage batuye mu nkengero z’Urukari aho ruzagurirwa bamaze guhabwa ingurane hakaba hasigaye igikorwa cyo gushaka amafaranga kugira ngo kubaka bitangire.
Yakomeje avuga ko umushinga wo kwagura urukari uzajyana no kubaka Umudugudu Ndangamuco hafi y’icyuzi cya Nyamagana. Uwo mudugudu ubwawo uzakorerwa ku buso bwa hegitari icyenda, kandi ibikorwa byo kwimura abaturage byari byaratangiye ariko bidindizwa n’icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Mu bazimurwa ahazajya uwo mudugudu hose hamaze kwishyurwa ahangana na hegitari ebyiri, bikaba biteganyijwe ko abatarishyurwa bo bazongera kubarirwa kuko ibiciro byahindutse.
Ntanzida ati “Hari habazwe amafaranga agera muri Miliyoni 200 ariko tuzongera tubare kuko hashize hafi imyaka ibiri, ubwo tuzongera tubare tubihe agaciro bundi bushya.”
Akarere ka Nyanza kabumbatiye amateka menshi yiganjemo ayo hambere kuko Nyanza yabaye Umurwa Mukuru w’Ubwami kuva mu 1899 kugeza mu mu 1962.
I Nyanza hatuwe n’Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse n’Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana.
Hari ingoro y’Abami yo mu Rukari, Ingoro y’Umurage wo Kwigira, Umusezero w’Abami, Ibigabiro, Inzira Gakondo z’Ubukerarugendo; haboneka Amariba ya Mutende yafukuwe ku ngoma y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, aho Inyambo ze ndetse n’inka z’abaturage ziturutse imihanda yose zashokaga.
Hari kandi icyuzi cya Nyamagana cyafukujwe n’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa afatanyije na agoronome w’Umubiligi witwaga Dubois. I Nyanza kandi hafatwa nk’igicumbi cy’ubutabera kuko hahoze urukiko umwami yaciragamo imanza.
Inyubako ziri mu Mujyi wa Nyanza zose zatakishijwe imitako gakondo ifite ibisobanuro bijyanye n’umuco nyarwanda hagamijwe kuwurimbisha ugasa neza; kubungabunga amateka ndetse no kongera umubare w’abawusura kandi bakahatinda.
Hashyizweho kandi Inzira eshatu z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo za kinyarwanda zizwi na The Nyanza Cultural Trials, zitezweho kongera umubare w’abahasura.
Icyorezo cya Covid-19 kitaraza Akarere ka Nyanza kasurwaga na ba mukerarugendo basaga ibihumbi 70 ku mwaka.
Umurage urubyiruko rukwiye kuvoma kuri Gihanga Ngomijana wahanze u Rwanda.
Ni ubutumwa yageneye abitabiriye Uruhererekane rw’Ibiganiro by’Umuco n’Amateka byiswe "Amateka Series" bitegurwa n’Urubyiruko ruba mu bihugu bya Australie na Nouvelle-Zélande. Iyi gahunda igamije gufasha urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga kumenya Umuco n’Amateka by’u Rwanda.
Abitabiriye iki kiganiro cyabaye mu buryo bw’ikoranabuhanga, baganirijwe ku nkomoko y’u Rwanda rwahanzwe na Gihanga, ubutwari bwaranze Abanyarwanda ba mbere y’Ubukoloni ndetse n’uruhare rw’abagore n’urubyiruko mu gukomeza gusigasira uwo murage.
Abatanze ibiganiro barimo Minisitiri Bamporiki Edouard, Umuhanzi Mukankuranga Marie Jeanne [Mariya Yohana] n’Umunyarwanda uba mu Mujyi wa Perth muri Australie, Niyonzima Jean Paul. Umuhanzi Icyoyitungiye Jules Bonheur [Jules Sentore] niwe wasusurukije abari bakurikiye ikiganiro.
Minisitiri Bamporiki yabwiye uru rubyiruko ko Gihanga atekereza umushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda, yasize intekerezo zihamye zishobora kuyobora abazabaho nyuma kandi zanafasha abariho uyu munsi.
Ati “Gihanga yatumye tugira igihugu ariko aravuga ngo kugira igihugu ni ukumva ko ukirwanirira, ukavuga ngo nzagikorera iki, nzakimarira iki, nzagisigamo iki, ko ngisanzemo umurage njyewe nzasiga ndaze abandi iki? Ugasigara wumva ko ikitwa inyungu z’igihugu, ziruta kure inyungu z’undi muntu.”
Minisitiri Bamporiki yavuze ko umuntu urutisha inyungu ze iz’igihugu aba ari kure cyane y’umurage wa Gihanga, aba ahemukira abakurambere n’Intwari z’u Rwanda kuko zo zari zizi ko nta cyaruta u Rwanda.
Ati “Iyo ni impamba yaguherekeza aho uri dukura kuri Gihanga. Ariko yavuze n’ibintu bikomeye, yaravuze ngo ‘Uwubaka u Rwanda ntagegena yigeraho, arwubakana n’abato’. Ni nayo mpamvu igihugu cyacu cyahisemo guha inshingano abakiri bato kugira ngo abahari batagegena bigeraho bubaka u Rwanda.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni ikintu cyavuzwe na Gihanga, ni umurage tumwubahira uyu munsi. Kwigira no kwishakamo ibisubizo, kwihangira imirimo n’ubunyamwuga tubyikoreye, tubyishatsemo. Gihanga birimo no guhanga, uyu munsi ubwo twubaha Gihanga bidusigire n’intekerezo yo kuvuga ngo ndahanga iki?”
Mbere y’umwaduko w’Abakoloni babibye amacakubiri n’ ivangura mu Banyarwanda babacamo ibice kugira ngo babategeke, Abaturarwanda bari bunze ubumwe nk’umurage basigiwe na Gihanga.
Umurage wa Gihanga wakomeje gukura mu Banyarwanda ndetse nk’uko amateka abigaragaza mu 1500, Abaryankuna banze guhemukira u Rwanda biyita abadahemuka banga kuruhemukira kugeza ku munota wa nyuma.
Minisitiri Bamporiki ati “Banze guhemukira u Rwanda, badusigira umurage w’ubudahemuka, umwana w’umunyarwanda, urubyiruko n’ubwo yaba ari mundiba y’Isi, iyo bigeze ku Rwanda agomba kurubera umudahemuka. Singahemuke, ntimugahemuke, mu ruhererekane dukomora kuri Gihanga byaduhaye Abadahemuka.”
Mu 1700, ku ngoma ya Cyilima II Rujugira, u Rwanda rwaratewe nabwo abantu bahagurukira rimwe biyita abataneshwa bararurwanira kandi batsinda ibihugu bine birimo u Burundi, Igisaka, Ndorwa n’u Bugesera. Icyo gihe nibwo Umwami Cyilima yahise avuga ngo ‘u Rwanda ruratera ntiruterwa’.
Minisitiri Bamporiki avuga ko nyuma y’abataneshwa haje Abakoloni banesha abanyarwanda, babahimbira amoko y’Abatwa, Abatutsi n’Abahutu ari nabyo byagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Ati “Abakoloni bo mu 1890 bishyira mu 1900, batangira kutureba bati ariko wowe waturutse aha, undi bati wowe waturutse aha. Barabivangavanga bica umurage, bica indangagaciro, bica igihugu bitugeza kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.”
Akomeza avuga ko Inkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda zabahaye umurage w’abadaheranwa zakomoye kuri Gihanga, ari nawo ukomeye urubyiruko rw’ubu rukwiye gusigasira.
Yakomeje agira ati “Umuntu yagutsinda ariko ntiyaguherana. Rero rubyiruko aho muri hose, ntihagire uheranwa n’ubusinzi, ubwomanzi ubwo aribwo bwose, mwishakemo imibereho, umunyarwanda arababara, aratsindwa arakubitika ariko ntaheranwa. Niko Inkotanyi zatwigishije.”
Umuhanzikazi Mariya Yohana yabwiye urubyiruko by’umwihariko abakobwa ko bakwiye gukurikiza umurage barazwe n’abakurambere babo barimo ba Ndabaga n’abandi bagiye bagaragaza ubutwari bwo gukorera u Rwanda.
Yagarutse ku ruhare abakobwa n’abagore bagize mu rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no guhagarika Jenoside.
Ati “Abagore ntabwo bigeze bicara ku gushyira u Rwanda imbere, ari ibya cyera hari abagore bagize ishyaka, bagize agaciro kanini n’ubu twibuka, birashoboka ko ari nabo tureberaho. Bana bacu rubyiruko namwe turashaka kuzabavuga nk’uko tuvuga abo bagore ariko kandi mugomba kumenya ko u Rwanda mugomba kururirimba kandi niko gaciro kanyu.”
Gahunda ya ‘Amateka Series’, ni umushinga watangijwe mu Ukuboza 2020, ukubiyemo ubukangurambaga bwatangijwe n’urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga hagamijwe kwigisha bagenzi babo, yaba ababa hirya no hino mu mahanga ndetse n’abari mu Rwanda, ibijyanye n’amateka y’u Rwanda hamwe n’ubugeni mu ngeri zitandukanye.
Beata Umubyeyi Mairesse yahawe igihembo ‘‘Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie’’ (Video).
‘‘Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie’’ ni igihembo gihabwa intyoza mu buvanganzo, cyatangiye gutangwa mu 2001 bigizwemo uruhare n’Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa (OIF). Gihabwa igitabo cy’umwanditsi wagaragaje umwihariko mu guteza imbere Ururimi rw’Igifaransa.
Umubyeyi wegukanye iki gihembo yavuze ko yishimiye kukibona ndetse ari icy’ingenzi mu rugendo rwe nk’umwanditsi.
Yatangiye kwandika afite imyaka 30 ndetse icyo gihe ntiyizeraga ko azaba umwanditsi w’ibitabo.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Nakunze gusoma kuva kera nkiri muto cyane, ngira amahirwe yo kuvukira mu Mujyi wa Butare, wari ufite inzu z’amasomero, izigurishirizwamo ibitabo n’ububiko bwabyo. Tukiri abana byaradufashaga cyane kubona ibitabo ukabivanamo ubumenyi bwinshi, harimo kugukundisha na we kuzaba wavamo umwanditsi, ukiga neza ururimi usomamo n’ibindi. Ni ho hampaye imbaraga zo kwandika no kubikunda.’’
Mu kiganiro cyihariye IGIHE, uyu mwanditsi yavuze ku gitabo cye ‘‘Tous tes enfants dispersés’’, bishatse kuvuga ‘‘Abana bawe bose batatanye’’ cyamuhesheje igihembo.
IGIHE: Wakiriye ute iki gihembo?
Umubyeyi: ‘Prix des Cinq Continents de la Francophonie’ ni igihembo gikomeye nishimiye cyane, barampamagaye mu minsi ishize barabimbwira. Ni igihembo gitangwa biciye mu kanama nkemurampaka (Jury) gashinzwe ijonjora, riba rigizwe n’abanditsi bakomeye bo mu bihugu byinshi bitandukanye bivuga Igifaransa.
Kari kayobowe na Paula Jacques, Jean-Marie Gustave Le Clézio, Lise Bissonnette, Ananda Devi, Hubert Haddad, Monique Ilboudo, Vénus Khoury-Ghata, Liliana Lazar, Wilfried N’Sondé, René de Obaldia, Lyonel Trouillot, Abdourahman Waberi, Jun Xu et Gilles Jobidon. Aba barimo n’abigeze guhabwa iki gihembo.
Babanje guhitamo ibitabo by’abanditsi 10, muri ibyo bakuramo ibindi bibiri bihembwa, ari na ho icyanjye cyaje ku isonga gikurikirwa n’icya Paul Kawaczak, umwanditsi w’imyaka 34 wo muri Québec.
Iki gitabo rero kikaba ari nacyo cya mbere nanditse mu buryo bwa Roman, bikaba byaranshimishije ko bwa mbere cyabonye igihembo.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe mpamvu wagize amahitamo yo kwandika roman aho kwibanda ku buhamya bw’amateka ya Jenoside warokotse?
Umubyeyi: Ni byo koko kwandika ubuhamya kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ni ibintu nubaha bikomeye. Nshima kandi ngasanga ababikoze kugeza ubu ari ubutwari, kuva nagera hano mu Bufaransa nyuma yo kurokoka, uko hasohokaga igitabo kirimo ubuhamya naragisomaga, abenshi turi no mu kigero kimwe ndabazi.
Ibitabo byabo birakomeye cyane ku mateka yacu, kuko bituma abantu bamenya ibyakorewe Abatutsi muri kiriya gihe ku buryo nyabwo bivugwa n’ababibayemo babikorewe, bigatuma nta warengera avuga ibindi bitari byo.
Njye rero kwandika mu buryo bwa Roman hari impamvu nyinshi zabinteye, imwe muri izo ni uko wenda nari ntaragira ubwo butwari bwo kuvuga amateka yanjye.
Njya mbabazwa cyane n’Abafaransa bamwe usanga bavuga ngo ni amateka yabereye kure muri Afurika, mbese ugasanga bisa nkaho bitabareba, ariko Jenoside iyo ariyo yose ni icyaha cy’iyicarubozo kireba ikiremwamuntu cyose ku Isi.
Mu kwandika rero inkuru karemano (Roman) n’inkuru yihariye mba nshaka kwerekana ariko bitavuze ko ari amateka muri rusange aho uhuza abantu batandukanye mu nkuru ishobora kubaho ariko mpimbano. Hari aho usanga ya mateka yo muri Jenoside ajemo, noneho wa muntu usoma igitabo uwo ariwe wese n’umugabane yaba aherereyemo wose, na we ashobora kumva bimureba cyangwa bisa n’ibyo yaciyemo, atavuze ko byabereye kure bitamureba.
Ubwo rero ni bwo buryo bwanjye bwo kuvuga ibintu bikomeye ariko bikakirwa mu buryo bworohera uwo ari we wese kandi akibonamo.
Hari umwanditsi wo mu Bwongereza witwa Zedie Smith wanditse mu gitabo cye inyandiko ya nyayo ya David Foster Wallace ngo “La bonne littérature est faite pour réconforter les gens dérangés et déranger les gens confortables’’, bivuze ngo ‘Inyandiko nziza ifasha abatameze neza kubera ibibazo bahuye nabyo mu buzima wenda, ikanababaza abari bamerewe neza bashaka ko ikibi kitavugwa muri rusange.’’
Hari uba afite intimba ku mutima yasoma inkuru akumva hari abandi bahuje akababaro akumva biramufashije nkuko mu Rwanda bakunda kuvuga bati ‘Si urw’umwe’ kuko abona muri iyo nkuru harimo abakomeza umutsi, bagakora ku buryo bagira ejo heza habo, na we bikamugiraho ingaruka nziza.
Aho abandi twavuze baba badashaka gusoma ibintu bikomeye babona gusa umutwe w’inkuru ko uvuga kuri Jenoside agahita avuga ati ‘Sinshaka gusoma ibintu bintera umutwe aribo nise (les gens confortables). Muri make ni uko nabonye ibyiza byo gukoresha inkuru karemano.
IGIHE: Mu gitabo wibanze ku byo wise Métissage na Transmission, gifite uburemere bw’uruhererekane rw’umuco, uburere, ingiro ku cyo umuntu ari cyo ukanagaruka kuri Jenoside. Iki gitekerezo cyo guhuza ibintu biremereye by’ingeri nyinshi cyakujemo gite?
Umubyeyi: Byaturutse ahantu henshi, mu bitabo nasomye by’abanditsi batandukanye harimo n’abaturuka mu Birwa bya Antilles. Abirabura bo muri Amerika n’abandi benshi bavuze amateka y’abirabura muri Diaspora ku Isi yose niho navuga navanye inganzo (inspiration). Ikindi ni uko umuntu ashobora no kwandika agendeye ku mateka azi nk’aya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi cyangwa kuba imvange y’umwirabura n’umuzungu (Métisse) nkuko Gaël Faye avuga ati ‘ni hagati y’imigezi ibiri hagati y’intebe ebyiri.’
Njyewe mu Rwanda batubwiraga ko turi abazungu, njyeze mu Bufaransa batwita abirabura. Ibyo rero ni ibintu abantu benshi usanga baranyuzemo.
Icyo nagerageje gukora muri iki gitabo ‘Tous tes enfants dispersés’ mu bihe bishize, ni ukuvuga nk’umukecuru wavukiye mu Rwanda, avukirayo, abyirukirayo, ahura n’Umufaransa barashakana babyarana umwana wa mbere bise Blanche, nyuma aza kubyara n’undi mwana yise Bosco, ariko we amubyarana n’Umunyarwanda bakundanye bakiri mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Ubwo rero ukabona hari umwana umwe w’Umu-métisse, undi w’Umunyarwanda, kuri uwo mubyeyi ubarera wenyine, hakaba n’ibyo atababwira kubera umuco w’Abanyarwanda akenshi ababyeyi batavuga bumva ko ari ukurengera umwana ariko abana bakazakura bibaza ku mateka yaho bakomoka mu miryango yacu n’ibindi.
Icyo gihe rero mu Rwanda intambara yatangiye wa mwana Bosco ajya mu Inkotanyi, wa mubyeyi agumana n’umukobwa we. Jenoside itangiye abwira uwo mukobwa ati ‘Wowe uri Métisse jyana na bariya bazungu bava i Butare utoroke ugende uzagere i Burayi mu gihugu cya so uzarokokereyo. Uwo mubyeyi na we yagize amahirwe aza kurokoka.
Igitabo gitangira Blanche umukobwa we yarize i Burayi mu Bufaransa ararangiza, ashaka umugabo w’umu-métisse na we aza gushaka uko yataha mu Rwanda gusura nyina na musaza we Bosco.
Nyuma rero igitabo kivuga ukuntu muri uwo muryango habaye agahinda kenshi n’ibintu byinshi bitabashije kuganirwaho kuko byagumye mu mitima yabo bikabatera intimba nyinshi.
Umubyeyi yagaragaje ko iki ari ikibazo kibaho ku miryango myinshi ivukamo aba-métisse ndetse yashakaga ko ibyo yashyize mu gitabo byaba imbarutso y’ibiganiro kugira ngo abana babakomokaho bazabashe kubaho neza no kumenya inkomoko yabo.
Uyu mwanditsi avuga ko mu myandikire ye akunda kwerekana imitekerereze itandukanye ku kintu runaka, cyangwa gufungura ibiganiro, kuko abantu bose batabona ibintu kimwe.
Umubyeyi ufite ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa, yarokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; yavukiye i Butare-Ngoma, ubu ni mu Karere ka Huye, mu 1979. Afite abana babiri akaba atuye mu Mujyi wa Bordeaux mu Bufaransa.
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame na Mgr Bigirumwami: Intwari zibagiranye?
Babayeho mu bihe bimwe, byari bikomeye u Rwanda ruri mu maboko y’Ababiligi ariko baharanira ko amateka n’umuco nyarwanda bitibagirana, nk’imwe mu nkingi ikomeye yatumye igihugu kimara imyaka ibihumbi gishikamye.
Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yavutse tariki 15 Gicurasi 1912 i Kiyanza mu Buliza (ubu ni mu Karere ka Rulindo, Umurenge wa Ntarabana), hari ku ngoma y’Umwami Yuhi V Musinga. Yahawe ubupadiri mu 1941.
Kagame ni umwe mu banyarwanda ba mbere bize kaminuza, ayiga mu mahanga mu bijyanye na filozofiya. Mu mateka y’u Rwanda azwi nk’umwe mu ba mbere bakozeho ubushakashatsi butandukanye, yandika ibitabo byatumye abiga amateka bamenya aho bahera birimo nk’Inganji Kalinga, un abrégé de l’ethno-histoire du Rwanda.
Yanditse ibindi bitabo byinshi n’inyandiko yamenyekanye nk’Indyoheshabirayi, Umuririmbyi wa Nyiribiremwa, Isoko y’Amajyambere, La Philosophie Bantu-Rwandaise de l’être” n’ibindi.
Musenyeri Aloys Bigirumwami we yavutse kuwa 22 Ukuboza 1904 avukira i Gisaka i Zaza. Mu 1952 yagizwe Musenyeri wa Nyundo, abimburira abandi birabura kwambikwa iryo kamba muri Afurika Mbiligi yari igizwe n’u Rwanda, u Burundi na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Mu 1954, Musenyeri Bigirumwami yashinze akanyamakuru k’abana kitwa Hobe kamamaye cyane, kugira ngo bamenyere gusoma babone n’inkuru basoma mu Kinyarwanda.
Yanditse inyandiko zibanda ku muco n’imyemerere ya Kinyarwanda zirimo; Imigani miremire (1972), Imana y’abantu, abantu b’Imana, Imana mu bantu, abantu mu Mana (1979) ndetse n’Imihango, Imiziro n’imiziririzo mu Rwanda (1984) byose bigaruka ku muco nyarwanda.
Nubwo ibikorwa by’aba bagabo bitavugwa cyane, ni bimwe mu byabimburiye ubundi bushakashatsi bacukumbuye amateka n’umuco nyarwanda. Ikirenzeho bagiye babikora nta zindi nyungu barambirijeho.
Buruga Aloys Gonzague, murumuna wa Musenyeri Alexis Kagame mu muryango, aherutse kubwira IGIHE ko mukuru we akwiriye guhabwa agaciro kuko ibyo yakoze ari iby’ubutwari.
Yagize ati “Hari ubwo intwari ziba izo ku rugamba, izaguye igihugu zikagitsindira abanzi ariko hakwiriye kubaho n’abo twakwita abakurambere bafite ibindi bakoze bifitiye igihugu akamaro.”
“Tumwise intwari, si ikigwari kuko yarwanye urugamba rw’uko umuco w’u Rwanda utazima, aharanira ko amateka y’u Rwanda atazimira ayashyira mu nyandiko. Navuga ngo yakwibukwa nk’intwari.”
Muri abo bombi, Musenyeri Kagame niwe wahawe impeta y’ishimwe, kuwa 5 Nyakanga mu 1979 ubwo yagirwaga “Officier de l’ordre national des Grands lacs”. Kuwa 3 Nzeri 2014, yahawe igihembo n’Inteko Nyarwanda y’Ururimi n’Umuco cyiswe “Igihembo cya Akademi”, cyashyizweho hagamijwe gushima abantu bakora ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa mu kubungabunga ubusugire n’iterambere by’ururimi n’umuco by’u Rwanda.
Icyakora hari ababona abo bagabo nk’abitanze batizigama ngo umuco nyarwanda n’amateka yarwo adasibangana, ku buryo bakwiriye ubutwari cyangwa impeta z’ishimwe bihanitse kandi ibikorwa byabo bikagaragara henshi.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’urwego rushinzwe Intwari z’Igihugu, Impeta n’Imidari by’ishimwe, Nkusi Déo, yabwiye IGIHE ko Musenyeri Bigirumwami na Musenyeri Kagame batibagiranye nkuko bamwe babikeka, kuko gushyirwa mu ntwari cyangwa guhabwa umudari runaka, hakorwa ubushakashatsi bwimbitse.
Ubusanzwe kugira ngo umuntu akorweho ubushakashatsi bushobora kumushyira mu ntwari, hagomba kuba hari ababimusabiye cyangwa se urwego rubishinzwe rukibwiriza.
Nkusi yagize ati “Abo bantu babiri rero ni abantu bazwi cyane mu mateka kandi birumvikana banakoze n’ibintu byinshi ku byerekeye amateka n’umuco, bafite inyandiko zinadusfsha nk’abanyarwanda ku bintu byinshi cyane, byumvikane rero ko abo bantu batibagiranye.”
Nkusi yavuze ko kuba ibitabo n’inyandiko za Musenyeri Kagame na Bigirumwami bikoreshwa mu mashuri atandukanye no mu zindi nzego, nabwo ari ubundi buryo bwo kubaha agaciro.
Ntabwo yeruye ngo avuge niba haba hari ubushakashatsi buri kubakorwaho, kuko bitemewe kubitangaza ubushakashatsi butararangira, icyakora yumvikanishije ko hari ikiri gukorwa.
Ati “Twakiriye amazina menshi cyane y’abantu batandukanye , birumvikana ko abantu bazwi cyane ntibabura n’ababavuga ariko inshingano zo kuvuga uwakozweho ubushakashatsi ntabwo ari izacu, hari inzego zibishinzwe igihe nikigera zizababwira ubushakashatsi icyo bwatanze.”
Nkusi yavuze ko gukora ubushakashatsi ku muntu kugira ngo abe yagirwa intwari cyangwa yahabwa umudari bifata igihe kandi bigasaba ubushishozi buhambaye.
Ati “Si nko kwatsa itara ngo pa!riratse cyangwa rirazimye, ni ibintu bifata igihe, byitonderwa bigaca mu nzgeo zitandukanye akaba yashyirwa mu rwego runaka rw’intwari cyangwa yahabwa impeta y’ishimwe bitewe n’ibikorwa bye.”
Kugeza ubu hari amazina asaga 200 y’abanyarwanda basabiwe gukorwaho ubushakashatsi kugira ngo bashyirwe mu ntwari, abandi babe bambikwa impeta z’ishimwe.
Kuwa 2 Ukuboza 1981 nibwo Musenyeri Alexis Kagame yitabye Imana aguye mu bitaro by’i Nairobi muri Kenya aho yari yagiye kwivuza. Aloys Bigirumwami we yatabarutse afite imyaka 81 ku wa 03 Kamena 1986 mu bitaro bya Ruhengeri azize indwara y’umutima.
Ikiganiro n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa CHENO, Nkusi Déo.
Menya byinshi ku bakurambere biziritse ku Rwanda bakanga kururekura.
Birashoboka ko u Rwanda rwari kuba rungana nka Seychelles, agahugu gato kaba muri Afurika, ariko kubera abami barurwaniriye bakagenda barwagura, bakarwizirakaho bamwe bagahara n’ubuzima bwabo, rwabaye u Rwanda rugari, nubwo abakoloni batarurebeye izuba bakarugabagabanya mu nama yabereye i Berilini.
Mu kiganiro RBA yagiranye n’abanyamateka batandukanye barimo Kalisa Rugano impuguke mu muco n’amateka; Umuraza Landrada, komiseri mu itorero ry’igihugu ndetse n’umwanditsi w’amateka, Nizeyimana Innocent, bagarutse cyane ku butwari bukomeye bwaranze abanyarwanda kuva kera, harimo n’abami b’u Rwanda Ruganzu Bwimba ndetse na Ruganzu II Ndoli.
Ruganzu Bwimba niwe mwami wenyine w’u Rwanda wameneye igihugu amaraso
Mu bami barurwaniriye bakarwizirakaho, harimo Ruganzu Bwimba wategetse u Rwanda mu wa 1312-1345, akarumenera amaraso, akemera kuba umutabazi w’umucengeri ari umwami, kugira ngo u Rwanda rwigarurire i Gisaka.
Umutabazi w’umucengeri ni umuntu wiyemezaga kuba igitambo akemera kumena amaraso mu gihugu cy’amahanga agamije kurinda u Rwanda no kurwagura.
Kalisa Rugano yavuze ko ibi byabaye ubwo i Gisaka cyashakaga kwigarurira u Rwanda bikabananira, niko kwiga umutwe wo gushaka mushiki wa Bwimba, Robwa Nyiramateke, kugira ngo azahabyarire umwana w’umuhungu maze agire u Rwanda ingaruzwamuheto, kuko yari kuba ari umunyarwanda akaba n’umunyagisaka.
Kugira ngo baramire u Rwanda byasabye ko Robwa apfa umwana ntavuke, ariko mu muco wa kera byari ngombwa ko hagira n’undi bapfana maze bikitwa ko batabaye u Rwanda.
Bararaguje ngo barebe uwo indagu zifata, maze zemeza ko ari Nkurukumbe nyirarume wa Ruganzu Bwimba ugomba kuba umutabazi w’umucengeri. Abyumvise ahimba amayeri atuma atajya gupfira u Rwanda, nuko birakaza umwami Ruganzu maze ubwe yiyemeza kwitabarira bucengeli.
Aba abaye umwami wa mbere n’uwa nyuma mu mateka y’u Rwanda umeneye igihugu amaraso.
Ruganzu II Ndoli yategetse u Rwanda nyuma y’imyaka 11 rwarigaruriwe n’abanyamahanga
Undi mwami wamenyekanye cyane, wagaragaje ubutwari bukomeye ni Ruganzu Ndoli, wategetse u Rwanda akiri muto ku myaka 33, akarukura mu maboko y’abanyabungo nyuma y’imyaka 11 bararwigaruriye.
Nizeyimana Innocent agaruka ku butwari bwe, yavuze ko hambere havutse amakimbirane hagati ya se Ndahiro II Cyamatare n’abavandimwe be aribo Byinshi na Bamara maze bagambanira u Rwanda, bituma rwigarurirwa n’abanyabungo.
Akomeza avuga ukuntu barugabagabanye, bakarutobanga aho bamaze imyaka 11 bari mu Rwanda.
Abahanuzi b’umwami babonye ko ibintu biri gufata indi ntera ni ko guterana babwira umwami ko yashaka ukuntu yohereza Ruganzu Ndoli kwa nyirasenge Nyabunyana wari warashatswe n’umwami w’i Karagwe (Tanzania y’ubu).
Yagiye kwa nyirasenge mu buryo bwo kumuhungisha kugira ngo atazapfa, arindwe neza, yigishwe ategurwe kuzaba umwami, azaze aje gutabara u Rwanda.
Ni ko byagenze koko, arategurwa agaruka mu Rwanda. Yagiye mu Rwanda se na nyina na nyirakuru barishwe, aza afite agahinda ariko ntiyihorera, aza aje gutabara abanyarwanda.
Ntabwo yagiye arwituramo kuko nta bantu bari bamuzi uretse abiru n’abatware b’i Bwami, yagiye arurwanirira yica mwene se Byinshi wari waragambaniye u Rwanda, aramunyaga igihugu agisigaramo wenyine ari umwami w’u Rwanda.
Ruganzu Ndoli yamenyekanye ku bintu byinshi, birimo ko yari azi ubwenge bwinshi cyane, yiswe Cyambarantama ndetse n’ingabo ze zitwaga ibisumizi.
Hari n’abandi bami benshi bagaragaje ubutwari barimo na Mutara III Rudahigwa, bimanye u Rwanda bakanarurwanira ishyaka.
Nsanzabera yashyize hanze igitabo gikubiyemo ikinamico yise“Ingizi yabwo ntiyabugaruriwe”.
Kamere y’iki gitabo cy’amapaji 56, ni iy’Ikinamico zishobora gukinwa mu ruhame cyangwa se kuri Radiyo. Ikaba ari Ikinamico yimakaza umuco wo kubabarira no gusaba imbabazi, ubumwe n’ubwiyunge, no kurwanya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’ingengabitekerezo yayo.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Nsanzabera yagize ati “N’ubwo umutima muhanano utuzura igituza, ariko ntujya uganza umutima w’imbabazi n’ubugiraneza burenga akahise bukubakira ku ntego yo kwimakaza amahoro n’imico mbonera y’ubumuntu”
Si kenshi uwabereye undi imfura, akabugirira n’abandi, abwiturwa n’abo yabugiriye. Nibyo byabaye ku musaza Rusaneza n’umugore we Nyirayuhi, batengushywe n’abaturanyi babo Rukarabankaba n’umugore we Nyirabyavu, babakoreye ibya mfura mbi kandi baranabagabiye Inka, bakababera abaturanyi beza.
Umukecuru Nyirayuhi, ni urugero rwiza rwo kurenga imitekerereze yo kubakira ku nzika, yimakaje kubabarira abamwiciye abana n’umugabo, arahindukira abahindura abana be, ndetse yiyemeza no kubaha umurage mu kigwi cy’abe batakiriho.
Nsanzabera yavuze ko urwo ari urugero rwiza buri wese akwiye kugira urwe, agaharanira kwimakaza umuco wo kubabarira.
Yavuze ko yifuza ko uzasoma iyi Kinamico cyangwa se uzayibona bayikina, izamubera urugero rwiza rw’ubutwari bwo kubabarira ku biciwe no gusaba imbabazi ku bishe imbaga y’Abatutsi muri Jenoside. Ndetse
Ibitabo byanditswemo iyi Kinamico” Ingizi yabwo ntiyabugaruriwe”, byamaze kugera ku isoko, aho biboneka mu maguriro y’ibitabo nka Caritas no mu Ikirezi i Kigali.
Urwibutso ku miterere y’ibirango by’u Rwanda mu mateka y’impitagihe.
Kuva mu bihe by’Abami kugeza mu bya Repubulika, u Rwanda rwanyuze mu bihe bitandukanye bijyanye n’inkingi zikomeye igihugu cyubakiraho, bigatuma gihamya igitinyiro mu ruhando rw’ibindi.
Mu ihanga ry’ibihugu kuva u Rwanda rwaturwa ahasaga mu mwaka wa 300, haremwe ibihugu bigera kuri 29 bya mbere y’uko urwa Gasabo rubaho. Buri gihugu cyagize ikirango cyariho muri ibyo bihe cyitwaga “Ingoma Ngabe” wagereranya n’ibendera ry’igihugu.
Ikirangantego ni cyo cyari izina ryayo, ryabaga rikagiriyemo ibigwi bya ba nyiracyo n’intego bafite mu iyubaka bihugu byabo.
Muri ibyo bihe ni bwo ibihugu byose byahuriye ku kuramvura ingoma mu biti, bakayiha ishusho bashaka, bakayita izina rikagiriyemo intego zabo n’icyerekezo baganamo.
Aha ni ho dusanga nk’Ingoma Ngabe y’u Bugesera yitwaga Rukombamazi, iy’ u Bushiru ikitwa Nkundubushiru, iy’u Bungwe ikitwa Nyamibande, iy’u Rweya ikitwa Sera, iy’u Budaha n’u Bwishaza ikitwa Mpatsibihugu, iy’i Gisaka ikitwa Rukurura, iy’u Buliza ikitwa Bushizimbeho, iy’u Bwanacyambwe ikitwa Kamuhagama, iya Nduga ikitwa Nyabihinda, iy’u Bunyabungo ikitwa Karyamahugu, iy’u Bunyambilili ikitwa Nkunzurwanda, iy’u Bukunzi ikitwa Nyamuganza, iy’u Bugoyi ikitwa Nyamwishyura, iy’u Burera ikitwa Bazarubaze, iya Rwankeri y’Abalindi ikitwa Kabuce, iya Rwankeri y’Abaguyane ikitwa Ndahaze, iy’u Bukonya ikitwa Ruvugamahame, iy’u Buhoma ikitwa Nkandagiyabagome, iy’u Bwanamwali ikitwa Rugoruhindingoma, iya Bugamba-Kigamba ikitwa Kayenzi-Iravumera, iya Cyingogo ikitwa Simugomwa, iy’i Ndorwa ikitwa Murorwa, iy’u Bugara ikitwa Rugara.
Ibi bihugu byose byabaga bifite ibyangombwa byuzuye ngo bibe biganje, bifite ubusugire bwabyo n’ubutavogerwa ku Isi, harimo n’ingoma ngabe nk’ibendera ry’igihugu n’ikirangantego cya ba nyiracyo. Ni cyo cyatumye byitwa ibihugu n’ubwo wasangaga bifite ubutaka buto bungana n’akarere k’iki gihe cyangwa se ugasanga hari n’aho kamwe karimo ibihugu bibiri.
Muri iyi nkuru tugiye guterura amateka y’ibirango by’u Rwanda mu mateka yanzikira ku ihangwa ry’igihugu kugeza mu bihe bya Repubulika.
Ibirango bya Gihanga ahanga u Rwanda
Amateka yerekana ko u Rwanda rwahanzwe na Gihanga cya Kazi ahasaga mu wa 1091. Ahanga u Rwanda, yasanze rugandagajemo ibihugu 24, icye cya Gasabo cyaje kubyara u Rwanda kiba icya 25, hiyongeraho n’ibindi bine byahanzwe n’abana be mu bisigara by’ubutaka bwasigaye bahanga ibindi bihugu.
Mu ihangwa ry’u Rwanda, Gihanga na we yaje muri uwo mujyo wo kugira ibirango by’igihugu ariko bitandukanye n’iby’abami b’ibindi bihugu byamutanze kurema kuri ubu butaka.
Ibirango Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda birimo urusengo, inyundo n’umuriro kandi byose byari bifite igisobanuro muri icyo gihe.
Urusengo: Ni igikoresho cy’umuziki cyashushanyaga ubwisanzure, ubusugire n’ibitaramo by’abaturage bafite amahoro, cyiswe “Nyamilinga”. Iri zina rikomoka ku nshinga yitwa “Kulinga’’ isobanura ‘Icyizere ntagamburuzwa cy’ahazaza h’igihugu kiramye’.
Inyundo: Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda inyundo isanzwe bifashisha mu bucuzi. Yayihaye izina rya “Nyarushara”, bivuga ‘Inyundo yacuze Abami, igahanga igihugu.’
Umuriro: Umuriro uvugwa hano wagombaga guhora waka ubutazima. Washushanyaga “Uburame bw’ubwami, ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda n’ubusugire bw’igihugu.”
Ibirango by’ibihugu byiyunze bikaba kimwe
Ahasaga mu 1100, ni bwo Gihanga yahaye igitekerezo Abami b’Abasangwabutaka cyo guhuza ibihugu bito bafite kandi bitubakitse, bakarema igihugu kimwe kigwije igitinyiro. Aya masezerano yasinyiwe i Nkotsi na Bikara mu Buhanga [Ubu ni mu Murenge wa Nkotsi mu Karere ka Musanze].
Nyuma yo kwemeranya ayo masezerano y’ihuzabihugu, bahise barema ikirango cy’igihugu gishya cy’ibihugu byiyunze. Icyo kirango cyabaye Ingoma Ngabe Rwoga yaramvuwe na Nyamuhindura wa Rubunga w’Umusinga w’Umurenge, bakura igisekuruza cyabo ku Basinga b’Abasangwabutaka.
Ingoma-Ngabe “RWOGA” isobanura ‘Kogera cyangwa Kwamamara’. Kuva Rwoga yaremwa, u Rwanda rwahise ruyigira iyarwo, kubera ko arirwo rwahawe ubunyamabanga nshingwabikorwa bushyira mu bikorwa umushinga w’ukwiyunga kw’ibihugu, n’ubwo bwose byari bitariyunga ngo bibe kimwe.
Kuva ubwo ibirango Gihanga yahanganye u Rwanda, byasimbuwe na Rwoga ariko bikomeza kuba mu mihango y’iyimikabami b’u Rwanda no mu yindi y’ubucamanza, iyo gutangiza intambara, kohera ibiza n’ibyorezo byabaga byibasiye igihugu.
Ibirango by’u Rwanda byaremwe na Ruganzu Ndoli
Nyuma y’aho bicikiye i Rubi rw’i Nyundo, bene Gahima barwaniye ingoma Ndahiro Cyamatare akahagwa, ingoma ngabe Rwoga ikanyagwa n’Abanyabungo u Rwanda rukamara imyaka 11 ruraranze, Ruganzu Ndoli amaze kubundura u Rwanda, yahise arema indi ngoma ngabe isimbura Rwoga yari yaranyazwe n’Abanyabungo.
Ingoma ngabe Ruganzu Ndoli yaremye, ni yo yiswe Kalinga mu mateka y’ibirango by’u Rwanda.
Kalinga yaramvuwe mu Ishyamba rya Cyungo ho muri Cyungo (ubu ni mu Murenge wa Cyungo mu Karere ka Rulindo), iramvurwa na Minyaruko ya Nyamikenke ahasaga mu wa 1510.
Imihango y’iramvura rya Kalinga yateguriwe kwa Minyaruko ya Nyamikenke mu Busigi (ubu ni mu Mirenge ya Bushoki, Tumba na Mbogo yo mu Karere ka Rulindo), ha handi yarasukiye bwa mbere, mu ijoro yabundukiyemo ubwo yageraga i Rwanda.
Igisobanuro cy’Ingoma Ngabe Kalinga, ari na cyo kirangantego za ba nyiri u Rwanda, usanga n’ubundi gisa n’icya Nyamilinga yahangiweho u Rwanda. Igisobanuro cya Kalinga n’ubundi gikomoka ku nshinga Kulinga, Kalinga yo bikavuga ‘Inkingi y’icyizere cy’ahazaza’.
Ibirango by’ingoma ya cyami by’agateganyo ku bwa Rudahigwa
Mu bihe abakoloni b’Ababiligi bari mu Rwanda, batangiye kugerageza ikirangantego cy’ingoma ya cyami mu buryo bwa kizungu butandukanye n’ingoma ngabe Kalinga yariho muri ibyo bihe.
Icyo gitekerezo bakizanye ku ngoma y’Umwami Mutara Rudahigwa mu 1935, nyuma y’uko bamaze kureba Ibuku ari yo ndangamuntu ya mbere y’Abanyarwanda irimo ubwoko bw’Abahutu, Abatwa n’Abatutsi.
Muri icyo kirangantego kirimo interuro igira iti “Imbaga y’inyabutatu ijya mbere”. Gusa ntaho amateka adutekerereza ko kigeze cyemerwa ngo gikoreshwe mu miyoborere y’Abanyarwanda.
Ibirango by’u Rwanda mu bihe bya Repubulika ya Mbere n’iya Kabiri
Aho ingoma ya cyami ibererekeye Repubulika, ibirango by’igihugu na byo byarahinduwe, babyambura umuco byahanzwemo.
Repubulika yakuyeho ingoma ngabe irema ibendera ry’igitambaro cyakorewe mu ruganda gifite amabara afite ibisobanuro by’intego zashyizweho, hakiyongeraho n’igishushanyo cy’ubugeni kirimo ibimenyetso biranga icyo bimirije imbere.
Imiterere n’imihangire y’ibirango by’igihugu mu bihe bya Repubulika, bayifatiye ku birango by’Abanyaburayi bakolonizaga Afurika muri ibyo bihe, bakuraho umuco wa Kinyafurika w’ibirango bifatiye ku ngoma ngabe. Muri ibyo birango hiyongereyeho n’Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu.
Ibendera ry’u Rwanda rya mbere ryamuritswe ku wa 1 Nyakanga 1962, ubwo u Rwanda rwabonaga ubwigenge, Kayibanda Grégoire, akarubera Perezida wa Kabiri warutegetse mu 1962-1973. Amabara yari agize ibendera rya Repubulika ya Mbere, yari ‘Umutuku, umuhondo n’icyatsi’.
Indirimbo yubahiriza Igihugu yari “Rwanda rwacu”. Ikirangantego cyari kigizwe n’ibimenyetso bitandukanye ariko kivuga ‘Ubumwe, Amahoro n’Amajyambere’.
Ibyo birango by’u Rwanda rwa Repubulika, ni byo rwagendeyeho mu bihe bya Repubulika ya Mbere n’iya Kabiri kugeza ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2001. Iki cyemezo cyafatiwe mu nama zidasanzwe zo kwigira hamwe uko igihugu kizabaho mu myaka iri imbere zabaye mu 1998-1999.
Ibirango by’u Rwanda mu bihe kuzuka k’u Rwanda
Nyuma y’uko habayeho amahano rurangiza ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi igahitana abasaga miliyoni, ikaza guhagarikwa n’Ingabo za FPR-Inkotanyi zari zirangajwe imbere na Kagame Paul, Leta y’ubumwe bw’Abanyarwanda, yashinzwe ku wa 19 Nyakanga 1994, yatangiye kwiga uburyo ibirango by’igihugu byahindurwa. Byakozwe hagamijwe gushyiraho ibijyanye n’ibyo igihugu cyifuza kugeza ku benegihugu mu Rwanda rushya.
Ibirango bya Repubulika ya Mbere n’iya Kabiri, byari byiganjemo amacakubiri, irondakoko n’irondakarere. Aha ntiwakwirengagiza n’ubwishongoro bwinshi Abaparimehutu babigaragajemo ubwo birukanaga benshi mu baturarwanda bakajya kuba impunzi mu mahanga, n’abasigaye mu gihugu bakaba impetamugongo n’impunzi mu gihugu cyabo.
Nuko ku wa, 31 Ukuboza 2001, ni bwo hasohotse ibirango bishya by’u Rwanda, birimo ibendera ry’igihugu rigizwe n’amabara atatu, ari yo ‘Ubururu-juru, umuhondo w’izahabu n’icyatsi kibisi’. Ni na bwo kandi habonetse n’indirimbo nshya yubahiriza igihugu yiswe ‘Rwanda Nziza’.
Ikirangantego cyo kiganjemo ibimenyetso bitandukanye, bifite igisobanuro cy’‘Ubumwe, Umurimo no gukunda igihugu’, nk’intego y’Abanyarwanda bagiye kurandura icyo bapfa, bakabagarira icyo bapfana.
Ikirangantego gishya n’ibendera ry’igihugu, biranga u Rwanda muri ibi bihe byahanzwe n’umunyabugeni Alphonse Kirimobenecyo, aho yatsinze bagenzi be basaga 400 bari bahanganye.
Indirimbo yubahiriza igihugu yo yahanzwe n’abagororwa batatu bari bafungiye muri Gereza ya Karubanda barangajwe imbere na Munyaneza Vedaste, barimo Kalisa Evariste, Shenge Laurent na Mbonyizina Jean Marie Vianney.
Umurage w’u Rwanda mu birango b’igihugu
Ukurikiye amateka y’iremwa ry’u Rwanda n’iyubakwa rya rwo, usanga ari igihugu cyubakiye ku murage utajya uhinduka kugeza magingo aya ubwo aya mateka yandikwaga.
Uwo murage tunawusanga no mu birango by’igihugu uko byagiye bihererekanwa kuva kuri Gihanga, ugakomereza kuri Ruganzu Ndoli no kuri Perezida Kagame Paul, ariko twirengagije intego mbi zikubiye mu mitekerereze mibi yadukanywe mu birango bishya bya Repubulika ya Mbere n’iya Kabiri.
Mu busesenguzi bw’Amateka buri mu gitabo “Nkurangire u Rwanda, igihugu cya Benimana”, umwanditsi agaragaza ko ibirango by’u Rwanda byagiye bikagirirwamo umurage udasaza ugikoreshwa mu mushinga wo kubaka u Rwanda, no mu kinyejana cya 21.
U Rwanda rwagize ibirango bitandukanye, byinshi muri byo bikaba bikagiriyemo umurage ndagwabuvivi uzafasha bene rwo kurwubaka rugwije igitinyiro n’icyubahiro mu mahanga aruzengurutse. Igihamya gikomeye, ni iryo huzabitekerezo ryaremye ibirango by’u Rwanda byaba iby’abami na Perezida Kagame.
Ng’ayo ng’uko! Ng’ayo mateka y’impitabihe ku birango by’u Rwanda bimaze imyaka isaga 930 (1091-2021). Nihaganze umurage ukagiriye mu birango by’u Rwanda twarazwe n’abakurambere batuboneye iryo mu museso. Ibyadukanye umurage –mutindi, w’abadakunda u Rwanda na bene rwo, byo bigende nk’ifuni iheze.
No muri Paradizo hashobora kumeramo imifatangwe-Ev Uwagaba avuga ku rushako rwe rutarambye.
Nubwo aba bombi bari bamaze amezi atandatu bahamije isezerano ryo kubana nk’umugabo n’umugore [basezeranye ku wa 3 Werurwe 2018], iminsi mike ni yo bamaranye kuko igihe kirekire Mucyo yakimaze mu bitaro.
Mucyo Sabine yitabye Imana ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2018 azize indwara yitwa Systemic Lupus Erythematosusituma; inkuru yabaye incamugongo kuri Uwagaba, inshuti n’umuryango we.
Uwagaba uvuka i Rwamagana yateye intambwe ya mbere yandika igitabo cy’amapaji 170 yise ‘A Hundred days in marriage’ kivuga ku bigwi n’amateka y’umugore we.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 31 y’amavuko kuri ubu abarizwa muri Pologne aho yagiye kwiga amasomo y’Icyiciro cya Gatatu muri Kaminuza ya Varsovie mu bijyanye n’Ubwikorezi n’Ubucuruzi Mpuzamahanga.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye na IGIHE, Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye ‘‘A hundred days in Marriage’’ bishatse kuvuga ‘‘Iminsi 100 ya mbere y’urushako’’, yacyanditse ashaka gusohoza ibyo yemeranyije n’umugore we.
Yagize ati ‘‘Nashakaga kubahiriza isezerano nagiranye n’umugore wanjye Mucyo Sabine mbere y’uko yitaba Imana. Mu gihe yari arwaye hari ibyo namusezeranyije nzakora, impamvu ya kabiri ni uko namufashe nk’umuntu w’icyitegererezo numva ko ubuzima bwe n’amateka bye bitapfa kurangira gutya gusa kubera ko yitabye Imana. Oya Sabine ntazibagirana kuko namushyize mu gitabo. Nifuza ko umuntu wese uzabishaka azamenye amateka ye.’’
Yakomeje avuga ko ikindi cyamuteye kwandika ari uko abahanga mu bijyanye n’isanamitima bavuga ko ari umuti wavura agahinda cyangwa ihungabana runaka kuko ‘bifasha kuvuga ibyo utabashaga kwatura ngo uvuge kubera amaranga mutima yawe’.
Ati ‘‘Nanditse rero ngo ibindimo mbikure ku mutima bisohoke bimvemo mbisangire n’abandi.’’
Yasobanuye ko ibikubiye mu gitabo bitanga n’igisubizo ku bibaza ku rupfu rw’umugore we.
Yakomeje ati ‘‘Dukora ubukwe byari nk’ibisanzwe nk’uko abandi bose bakundanye babigenza twari tumaze igihe kinini tumenyanye, aha nashakaga no kwerekana ukuntu abantu bajya bivuga ko urugo ahanini ari Paradizo nibyo koko ariko ntibihira bose kuko muri iyo Paradizo hari igihe hashobora kumeramo amahwa y’ibitovu cyangwa imifatangwe ku buryo utungurwa.’’
Uwagaba yavuze ko igitabo cye gifite amasomo by’umwihariko mu kubaka ingo.
Ati ‘‘Urugo si ugutura muri paradizo ni nayo mpamvu, nibanze ku minsi mike twabanyemo na Mucyo kuko benshi bakeka ko ari iminsi ya buki yo kwishimisha mu buzima ariko byabaye ibindi kandi tuguma ku isezerano twagiranye.’’
‘‘Nyuma y’ubukwe twagiye mu kwezi kwa buki nk’abandi bose, tujya mu gihugu duturanye, tujya ku Gisenyi turatembera, turataha tugeze mu rugo umugore atangira kugaragaza ibimenyetso by’uburwayi. Twagiye kwa muganga batubwira ko ari ibintu bitagoye baduha imiti isanzwe, bavuga ko ari umunaniro.’’
Nyuma y’icyumweru, Mucyo yasubiye mu kazi ariko hashize igihe gito atangira kubyimba ibirenge, ibyo bamwe bitiranyije no gusama, ariko ‘uko iminsi ishira akarushaho kuremba.’
Uwagaba yahungabanyijwe n’urupfu rw’umugore we
Ku wa 28 Nzeri 2018, Mucyo yajyanywe mu Bitaro bya CHUK ndetse abaganga baza kumenya indwara arwaye.
Uwagaba avuga ko icyo gihe yatangiye gushaka uko yajya kumuvuriza mu bihugu bifite ibikoresho bihambaye kuko mu Rwanda byari byananiranye ariko [Mucyo] ajya muri koma yamazemo ibyumweru bitatu, ahita yitaba Imana.
Ati ‘‘Uburwayi bwe bwari bugoye ku buryo byampungabanyije cyane. Sabine yari umukobwa ukora siporo, ubona ko afite ameze neza ariko nyine ubuzima burahinduka.’’
Mu gitabo cye, Uwagaba akomeza gushimangira isezerano yagiranye n’umugore we.
Ati ‘‘Urukundo nyarwo, kurinda isezerano, kwitanga, ni byo nahaye umutwe wa kabiri w’izina ry’igitabo. Kugira urugo rwiza cyangwa urushako rwiza bisaba kwitanga, kwitonda, kugira ibyo wigomwa kugira ngo uwo mugiye kubana abe we wuzuye.’’
Mu gihe umugore we yari arwaye, Uwagaba yagombaga kumwitaho ariko agakomeza gushaka imibereho ngo abone ikibatunga.
Ati ‘‘Umugore wanjye arwaye twarakubititse cyane kuko nagombaga no gukora ngo tubeho, na we nkamugeraho kenshi bishoboka. Haje kugera igihe yumva yorohewe yakize, twaraganiriye arambwira ati ‘ariko uzi ko ubuzima twaciyemo bugoye kandi bubabaje?’ Icyo gihe yacurangaga gitari, arambwira ngo ‘uwazahimba indirimbo cyangwa nkakora umuvugo ariko nkagira ikintu nkora nk’inkuru ivuga iminsi twabanyemo muri aya mezi.’’
Icyo kiganiro ni cyo cyanogerejwemo igitekerezo cyo kwandika igitabo ‘‘A hundred days in Marriage’’ kigaruka ku minsi ya mbere yabo mu rushako.
Uwagaba ati ‘‘Abari aho bamubwiye bati ‘byaba birebire kereka mubishyize mu gitabo. Sabine ati ‘nimumbwire rero tuzakita dute?’ Avuga ko ubwo tumaze amezi atatu mu bibazo reka tuzacyite ‘Mu minsi 100 twubatse urugo’. Ni we wihitiyemo, nibyo nise isezerano. Ubwo twaje gusezererwa turataha nyuma aza kwitaba Imana.’’
Urupfu rw’umugore we rwaramuhungabanyije kugeza aho yagiye gushaka umuganga w’indwara zo mu mutwe amugira inama yo kuruhuka bitewe n’ihungabana yari afite.
Ati ‘‘Uwo muganga yangiriye inama yo kwandika kuko njye rwose sinigeze ntekereza ko nzandika igitabo.’’
Akimara kumurika ‘A Hundred days in marriage’, Kaminuza yigamo i Varsovie muri Pologne yamugeneye igihembo cy’umunyeshuri wakoze ikintu gikomeye.
Igitabo cya Uwagaba kiri mu Cyongereza, anateganya kugishyira mu Gifaransa no mu Kinyarwanda. Kiboneka ku maguriro ya murandasi azwi ku Isi yose nka , , Barnes, Noble, Google, iBooks, Scribd, Booktopia n’ayandi.
Reba ikiganiro na Uwagaba Joseph asobanura Igitabo cye ‘A Hundred days in marriage’
Imigogo ibiri y’abami b’u Rwanda iri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi.
Ntabwo muri iyo ngoro ariho abo bami batabarijwe ahubwo imigogo yabo ihari ngo ikorweho ubushakashatsi buzafasha abahanga kumenya byimbitse amateka y’u Rwanda.
Uruhererekane nyemvugo rugaragaza ko Cyilima II Rujugira yatanze nyuma yo
gutegeka u Rwanda kuva mu 1675 kugeza mu 1708. Mu migenzo ya cyami, abami bitwa ba Cyilima bagombaga gutabarizwa (gushyingurwa) n’abami bitwa ba Mutara.
Cyilima amaze gutanga, umugogo we wasizwe imiti ituma udashanguka, ubikwa mu rugo rwe rwari ruherereye i Kayumbu muri Kamonyi. Umwami witwa Mutara wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima ni Rwogera wategetse u Rwanda hagati ya 1830 na 1853. Ntabwo byakozwe kuko Rwogera yatanze atunguranye. Byabaye ngombwa ko bategereza undi mwami uzima ingoma yitwa Mutara, umugogo wa Cyilima ukomeza kubikwa.
Umwami wagombaga gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira ni Mutara III Rudahigwa mu 1931, icyakora yimye mu bihe bibi u Rwanda rwari rwarinjiriwe n’abakoloni ndetse ni nabo bamwimitse bitandukanye n’imigenzo y’ubwiru.
Igitabo ’Ibitaramo ku mateka y’u Rwanda’ cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko abiru aribo bafashe umwanzuro wo gutabariza Cyilima Rujugira, bikorwa rwihishwa mu 1931 i Gaseke (Rutobwe: Ubu ni mu murenge wa Kayumbu mu karere ka Kamonyi).
Umwami Kigeli IV Rwabugiri we yiciwe mu Bunyabungo (muri Congo) mu gitero yari yahagabye, umugogo we uzanwa mu Rwanda atabarizwa i Rutare mu karere ka Gicumbi, ahari imisezero y’abami.
Imigogo yabo iri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi
Igitabo cya Kagiraneza kivuga ko umugogo wa Cyilima Rujugira wataburuwe mu mwaka wa 1969 kugira ngo ukorerweho ubushakashatsi. Muri icyo gihe ni nabwo hataburuwe uwa Nyirayuhi Kanjogera, nyina w’umwami Yuhi V Musinga. Kanjogera yapfuye mu 1933.
Mu musezero (imva) wa Cyilima, hakuwemo ibindi bikoresho byo mu gihe cye birimo nk’amacumu, amasaro, imitako, utubindi n’ibindi.
Ubushakashatsi bwakorewe kuri ibyo bikoresho byasanzwe mu mva ye, bwagaragaje ko mu gihe yari akiri umwami amasaro n’indi mitako byakorerwaga i Burayi cyangwa mu Buhinde, byageraga mu Rwanda binyuze mu nyanja y’Abahinde.
Umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu yavuze ko nta gitangaza kirimo kuba mu mva ya Cyilima Rujugira barasanzemo amasaro, kuko imyenda n’imitako nk’amasaro byaje mu Rwanda ku ngoma ya Yuhi III Mazimpaka (1642-1675), ari we se wa Rujugira.
Umushakashatsi mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Maurice Mugabowagahunde, yavuze ko n’umugogo wa Kigeli IV Rwabugiri uri mu ngoro y’umurage i Huye, aho uri gukorerwaho ubushakashatsi.
Kugeza ubu abemererwa kugera aho iyo migogo ibitse, ni abashakashatsi babiherewe uburenganzira gusa, abasura ingoro ndangamurage ntabwo babyemerewe.
Ati “Keretse uri umushakashatsi naho umushyitsi ntiwawubona. Icyo wabona ni ibindi bikoresho byari biri kumwe na we, ariko turacyari mu bushakashatsi ariko duteganya ko ubushakashatsi niburangira uzongera ugatabarizwa.”
Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko umugogo wa Cyilima ukimara gutabururwa, wajyanywe mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari zifite ubushobozi bwo gupima ibya kera, zigaragaza ko yabayeho imyaka igera ku ijana mbere y’iyo uruhererekane nyemvugo nyarwanda ruvuga ko yatangiyeho.
Yagize ati “Amagufa ye yagiye mu Bubiligi muri laboratwari bigaragaza ko n’igihe Mgr Alexis Kagame yagerageje gukora agaragaza igihe yapfiriye, laboratwari yo igaragaza ko ari vuba cyane. Yabayeho mu myaka ijana mbere y’iyo Kagame yandikaga. Ibyo bituma umenya neza igihe kurusha kugenekereza.”
Biramutse byemejwe neza, byaba bivuze ko umwami Cyilima Rujugira yabayeho mu myaka yo hagati ya 1500 na 1600.
Ibikoresho byasanzwe mu musezero (imva) wa Cyilima Rujugiro nabyo byakoreweho ubushakashatsi. Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko utubindi twasanzwemo, twapimwe bakagaragaza ko twari turimo inzoga zikoze mu buro.
Ibyo ashimangira ko bifite igisobanuro mu myemerere y’Abanyarwanda bo hambere.
Ati “Ibyo bigaragaraza imyemerere y’Abanyarwanda ko umwami adapfa, ko akomeza ubuzima akanywa.”
Mu mateka kandi bivugwa ko guhera ku bwa Yuhi III Mazimpaka, abami batari bemerewe kunywa urwagwa. Banywaga inzoga zikoze mu binyampeke.
Kuba barasanze mu tubindi twa Cyilima inzoga zikoze mu buro, Mugabowagahunde avuga ko bihuza n’ibyo amateka avuga.
Ubushakashatsi buracyakomeje, gusa Mugabowagahunde yavuze ko hakiri imbogamizi yo kubona abahanga bahagije bo gufasha muri ubwo bushakashatsi n’ibikoresho.
Ati “Ikibazo gihari turabura inzobere mu bushakashatsi ku bisigaramatongo (archeologists). Mu Rwanda dufite bake kandi nta laboratwari ikomeye ariko turi gusinyana n’Inzu ndangamurage yo mu Bubiligi Tervuren kugira ngo ubushakashatsi bwihute.”
Gahunda ihari ni uko imigogo y’abo bami nimara gukorerwaho ubushakashatsi, izongera gutabarizwa.
Inkomoko ya ‘Amateka Series’, gahunda igamije kwigisha umuco urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga.
Inkomoko ya ‘AMATEKA SERIES’, gahunda igamije kwigisha umuco urubyiruko ruba mu mahanga
Ubu bukangurambaga bukubiyemo ibiganiro bizajya bitumirwamo impuguke zitandukanye mu by’umuco, inararibonye zizafasha mu kwigisha urubyiruko ibijyanye n’amateka, abahanzi mu ngeri zitandukanye n’abandi.
Linda Iriza uri mu bategura ‘Amateka Series’ yabwiye IGIHE ko igitekerezo cyo gutangiza uyu mushinga bakigize muri Mutarama 2020.
Ati “Igitekerezo cyo gutangiza ‘Amateka Series’ twakigize muri Mutarama 2020, ubwo twateguraga ibikorwa by’urubyiruko ruba mu Mujyi wa Perth muri Australie. Gutekereza iki gikorwa byatewe n’uko benshi muri twe tutazi byinshi, ndetse hari n’abatazi na bike, ku mateka n’umuco by’u Rwanda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko hahise haduka icyorezo COVID-19 biba ngombwa ko abantu batongera guterana.
Icyo gihe ubwo bari muri ‘guma mu rugo’ ni bwo batangiye gutegura gahunda zose zijyanye n’iki gikorwa ndetse muri Gicurasi 2020 batangira kujya baganira bifashishije ikoranabuhanga.
Muri Kanama 2020, amabwiriza ajyanye no kuguma mu rugo yarorohejwe ndetse hategurwa Umuganura wahujwe na ‘Amateka Series’. Icyo gihe hatumiwemo abantu bakuru batanze ibiganiro ku bijyanye n’umuganura ndetse bababwira amateka yawo byimbitse.
Iriza avuga ko benshi mu rubyiruko baba muri Perth nibura bageze muri Australie bafite imyaka itatu ndetse abandi bakaba ari naho bavukiye bituma batagira amahirwe yo kumenya byinshi ku gihugu cyabo cy’inkomoko. Ku bw’iyo mpamvu bashaka kwiga byinshi ku muco Nyarwanda ndetse n’amateka y’igihugu.
Yavuze ko ari ikintu cyakiriwe neza cyane, ati “Twashimishijwe n’ibitekerezo byiza twakiriye ndetse n’ubufasha turimo kubona.”
Iriza yakomeje ashimira Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Singapore, Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane na Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco y’u Rwanda bababaye hafi kandi bakabashyigikira.
Avuga ko bafite intumbero y’uko iki gikorwa kizakomeza ndetse abagitegura bagashishikariza urubyiruko gukora ubushakashatsi, bakandika, bagasangiza abandi ibyo bagezeho kandi bakarushaho kwiga byinshi ku muco wabo.
Iriza yasoje asaba urubyiruko rw’abanyarwanda aho bari hose ku Isi kuzitabira igikorwa giteganyijwe ku italiki ya 06 Gashyantare aho bazaganirizwa ku nkomoko y’u Rwanda ndetse bakanataramirwa n’umuhanzi Jules Sentore. Ibi biganiro bizanyura ako kanya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zose za Amateka Series (Twitter, Facebook, Instagram na YouTube).
Umwaka ushize ibiganiro byakozwe byari byatumiwemo abantu batandukanye barimo Turahirwa Moses washinze inzu y’imideli Moshions; Hope Azeda watangije Mashirika Performing Arts and Media Company; Ambasaderi Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu uhagarariye u Rwanda muri Singapore n’abandi.
Ushaka gukomeza kumenya amakuru atandukanye ku bikorwa bitegurwa binyuze mu ‘Amateka Series’ wabasura kuri uru rubuga.
Guma mu rugo, umwanya mwiza ku banditsi b’ibitabo nyarwanda.
Ibitabo bifasha abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye kwiyungura ubumenyi bubafasha gutera imbere haba mu kwihangira imirimo, kwimakaza indangagaciro na kirazira mu iterambere, ubumenyi bw’Isi n’ibindi.
Mu gihe umujyi wa Kigali uri muri gahunda ya Guma mu rugo, ni umwanya mwiza ku banditsi b’u Rwanda, kujya mu nganzo bagahanga, bakandika ibifasha igihugu nabo ubwabo kwiteza imbere.
Nta mwanditsi ukwiriye kuvuga ko yabuze icyo akora muri Guma mu rugo. Umwanya munini w’abanditsi bawushyire mu gukora ubushakashatsi bandikire u Rwanda, bandikire Afurika bandikire Isi.
Muri Guma mu rugo yabaye umwaka ushize, hari abanditsi bayibyaje umusaruro, irangira ibitabo babigeze kure, ku buryo amezi yakurikiyeho yari ayo kubimurika, abo ni abo gushimirwa.
Ntabwo kwandika bikwiriye kuba ibya bamwe, kuko buri wese afite inkuru yo kwandika. Ni byiza ko Abanyarwanda bose barushaho kwimakaza umuco wo kwandika no gusoma ibitabo kuko ari umuco mwiza wongera ubumenyi n’ubuhanga.
U Rwanda rudutegerejeho ubuhanga n’ubumenyi bwo kurwubaka kandi nta handi bituruka uretse mu gusoma ibitabo. Ni umukoro kuri buri wese, mu rwego aherereyemo yakwandika kandi bikaba umusanzu ukomeye ku bariho bashaka kumenya ibyo mu rwego akoramo n’abazaza nyuma.
Wakubaka u Rwanda ute utandika cyangwa udasoma ibitabo?Wakubaka Afurika ute utandika cyangwa udasoma ibitabo? Wakwandika ute ibitabo utabisoma?
Gusoma ibitabo niwo musingi w’ibikorwa byubaka u Rwanda ndetse n’Afurika.
Mucyo duce imigozi twaziritswe na Bagashakabuhake, ngo ‘Umunyafurika umuhisha mu bitabo? Tubyamagane. Twimakaze umuco wo kwandika no gusoma ibitabo nkuko Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika adahwema kubidusaba kuko nibyo bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse n’Afurika twifuza.
Ubuzima butoroshye bwa Kurawige wiciwe se mu maso muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Kuva icyo gihe yatangiye ubuzima bwo gushaka aho yerekeza, ku bw’amahirwe ahungana n’umuryango wo kwa nyirakuru ariko ntiyawutekaniyemo kuko yahahuriye n’ibibazo birimo no gufatwa ku ngufu.
Mu kubika ayo mateka no kuba umuhamya wayo, Kurawige yanditse igitabo yise ‘From Bondage to Freedom’ bishatse kuvuga ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda ‘Gufatwa bunyago ukaza kwibohora’ cyashibutse ku nzira y’inzitane yanyuzemo muri Jenoside.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na IGIHE, Kurawige yavuze ko igitabo cye yacyanditse ashaka gutanga ubuhamya bw’ibyamubayeho muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ubwo yicirwaga se umubyara bikozwe n’Interahamwe.
Yagize ati “Ni igitabo nanditse kugira ngo abahakana Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, nkanjye wiciwe Data mu maso, mbibere umuhamya hatazagira ubeshya abatabizi kandi turiho. Ni igitabo nanditse mpawe imbaraga n’ubuhamya numvise muri filime mbarankuru ‘La Traverse du Génocide’ bituma nanjye numva nzasubira aho nababariye nkahakora filime mbarankuru.”
Yavuze ko iki gitabo nacyo mu minsi iri imbere ateganya gusinya amasezerano y’uko cyakorwamo filime mbarankuru muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Yakomeje agira ati “Mu byo niyemeje rero ni ukuvuga amateka nabayemo n’abo tuyahuje kugira ngo abagenda babeshya kubera inyungu ntazi bafatwe bahanwe.”
Umutoni avuga ko ku myaka itanu ubwo Interahamwe zicaga se Dr Kurawige Jean Baptiste, yabanje kumuhisha munsi y’intebe.
Uyu mukobwa wari ukiri umwana yarungurutse munsi abona uko bamutema, abona amaraso atemba, ariko mu bitekerezo yari afite ku myaka ye yumvaga ko umubyeyi we ari bugaruke akamukura aho yamubwiye kwihisha, ariko siko byagenze.
Umutoni avuga ko yaje kuhavanwa na nyirakuru ubyara nyina babasha guhunga bagera muri Uganda mu nkambi, bahava berekeza muri Burkina Faso, tariki ya 3 Ugushyingo 1994.
Avuga ko bavuye muri Burkina Faso agana muri Afurika yepfo, mu mwaka wa 2011, avuyeyo yasubiye mu Rwanda bwa mbere mu 2012, ariko izi nzira zose ntabwo byari byoroshye, kuko guhera igihe se yicwaga kugeza 2011 yari mu bibazo bikomeye.
Umutoni avuga ko byamubabaje cyane kuko abishe se ari abo mu muryango wo kwa nyina ndetse no mu guhunga ajyana na nyirakuru ubyara nyina yakomeje kubabamo batamukunda, uretse gusa nyirakuru wahoraga amubwira ati “Mwana wanjye ujye uhora wimenya ntibagukunda’’
Bageze muri Burkina Faso, nyina wabo wari warashatse muri icyo gihugu yamushumuriye umugabo we akajya amufata ku ngufu ku myaka 16.
Ati “Bari barabuze urubyaro bashaka ko umugabo we yambyaraho umwana, ku buryo yamfataga ku ngufu byibura gatanu mu cyumweru. Uyu mugabo yari akomeye cyane muri kiriya gihugu kuko yari inshuti ya Perezida waho icyo gihe, ku buryo na Perezida basuranaga mu ngo, ibi bikamuha imbaraga zo gukora icyo ashaka muri iki gihugu.”
Yakomeje avuga ko “Byaje no kumenyekana ko mfatwa ku ngufu mu Banyarwanda batuye muri icyo gihugu ariko bagira uwo babibwira mu butegetsi bwaho bigafata ubusa.”
Umutoni avuga kandi ko muri icyo gihugu yahagiriye amakuba y’uko umugabo witwa Athanase wishe se, yahageze babana atamuzi.
Yagize ati “Turabana ntamuzi, nzi ko ari umuntu nyine wo mu muryango nkumva mukunze, akamperekeza ku ishuri tukaganira nk’umwana nashakaga kumenya byinshi. Nyuma Interpol yaje kumushaka nibwo namenye ko ariwe wishe Papa, nakwibuka ukuntu nari naramugize umuntu numva nkunze ngashengukira mu mutima.”
Igihe cyarageze nyirakuru yitaba Imana, atangira gushakisha uko yahunga ariko biramugora kuko yari yakumiriwe.
Yakomeje ati “Nasigaye nsa nk’aho ntaho ndi, nshakisha uko nahunga birangora cyane. Bari barashyize amatangazo ku kibuga cy’indege ku mipaka y’ibihugu byose bikikije Burkina Faso ko ntashobora gusohoka mu gihugu. Nabiganirije umwe mu basirikare bakuru baho, ambwira ko bagiye kumfasha ariko azangira inama y’uko nzabigenza bigakunda.’’
Yamusabye guhindura amazina, ashaka ibindi byangombwa ndetse amufasha guhungira muri Afurika y’Epfo, aho yatangiriye ubuzima bushya.
Kurawige yize muri Kaminuza ya Pretoria mu bijyanye na Géologie, ahasoje amasomo mu 2016, yasabye kwimenyerereza umwuga mu Rwanda aho yagarutse afite imyaka 23.
Avuga ko yahuye n’umwe mu bafunzwe uri mu bohereje abishe umubyeyi we ariko ngo amugeze imbere aramusuzugura cyane yanga kwemera ibyo yakoze.
Akomeza ati “Na n’ubu ntiyemera ibyo yakoze, ariko njye mu masengesho yanjye nahisemo kubabarira kugira ngo nduhuke uwo mutwaro.’’
Kurawige kuri ubu utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu Mujyi wa Dallas, yavukiye i Ngoma mu Karere ka Huye mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo mu 1988. Ni umwe mu bayobozi b’ikigo gikomeye gikora ibijyanye n’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro.
Reba ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Umutoni
Menya Amanda Gorman, umusizi ukiri muto waciye agahigo mu irahira rya Perezida.
Uyu mukobwa yanditse amateka ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 20 Mutarama 2021, ubwo yavugaga umuvugo mu muhango wo kurahira kwa Perezida mushya wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika, Joe Biden na Visi Perezida Kamala Harris.
Uyu mukobwa yavuze umuvugo yise “The Hill We Climb” cyangwa “Umusozi tuzamuka’’ mu rurimi rw’Ikinyarwanda.
Ni umuvugo yari amaze ibyumweru bibiri ari gukoraho, ugaruka ku bumwe n’ubwiyunge ku banyamerika.
Avuga ko guhimba uyu muvugo ari kimwe mu bintu by’ingirakamaro yakoze mu buzima bwe, ati “Nari mfite ibintu byinshi, ariko mu by’ukuri ni kimwe mu bintu by’ingenzi nakoze mu buzima bwanjye bujyanye no kuvuga imivugo. Naravugaga nti ningerageza kuzamuka uyu musozi rimwe, nzagera kure.”
Imwe mu mirongo igize uyu muvugo yayanditse ku wa 6 Mutarama 2021, ubwo ibihumbi by’abaturage bashyigikiye Donald Trump binjiraga mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Amerika ubwo abayigize bari bateranye ngo bemeze intsinzi ya Joe Biden, bakarwana inkundura na Polisi bigateza impagarara muri Amerika.
Uyu mukobwa w’umwiraburakazi ufite inkomoko ku bacakara yarezwe na nyina gusa. Afite inzozi zo kuzaba Perezida umunsi umwe. Yatangiye kugaragaza impano yo kuvuga imivugo akiri muto ndetse atangira kuzamura impano ye vuba cyane. Yakuriye mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles aho nyina yari umwarimu.
Ku myaka 16 yahize abandi mu mivugo mu marushanwa y’abakiri bato muri Los Angeles. Imyaka mike yakurikiyeho ubwo yigaga ibijyanye na ‘Sociologie’ muri Harvard yahize abasizi ku rwego rw’igihugu bakiri bato.
Nyuma yo kwigaragaza mu irahira rya Joe Biden, yashimwe na benshi barimo Barack Obama ndetse n’umugore we, Michelle Obama yagaragaje uburyo yakozwe ku mutima n’umuvugo wa Amanda Gorman.
Ati “ Hamwe n’amagambo ye akomeye kandi akora ku mutima, Amanda Gorman atwibukije imbaraga dufite mu gusigasira demokarasi. Komeza urabagirane Amanda mfite amatsiko y’ibyo uzakora mu bihe biri imbere.”
Abandi bantu bakomeye barimo Oprah Winfrey bose bagaragaje ko batewe ishema n’uyu mukobwa w’umwiraburakazi wanditse amateka akomeye.
Abari bari mu itsinda ryateguraga irahira rya Joe Biden bahamagaye uyu mukobwa mu mpera z’ukwezi gushize. Yavuze ko atari yahawe amabwiriza y’ibijyanye n’umuvugo we. Yahamagawe biturutse ku mugore wa Joe Biden, Jill Biden wabonye inyandiko ze mu isomero.
Yagize ati “Nta mabwiriza bari bambwiye ajyanye n’ibyo ngomba kwandika. Insanganyamatsiko y’irahira yari ‘ubumwe bwa Amerika’ rero ubwo numvaga ko ariyo nsanganyamatsiko yabo byaranyoroheye kuko nanjye ni cyo kintu nashakaga kwandikaho mu muvugo wanjye, ku bumwe bwa Amerika.”
Uyu mukobwa yabonye izuba mu 1998 avukira mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles, yakuranye n’impanga ye yitwa Gabriella na nyina w’umwarimukazi.
Mu 2015 yashyize hanze igitabo cye cya mbere cy’imivugo “The One for Whom Food is Not enough” gikubiyemo insanganyamatsiko zitandukanye zirimo izivuga ku burenganzira bw’abagore, ubwoko n’inkomoko n’abanyafurika baba muri Amerika.
Mu bantu afatiraho icyitegererezo harimo Winston Churchill wigeze kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza, Martin Luther King Junior na Malala Yousafzai umukobwa w’umunya-Pakistan watsindiye igihembo cy’amahoro mu 2013.
Amanda afite inzozi zo kuziyamamariza kuzaba Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 2036 ubwo uzaba afite imyaka 38. Uretse kuvuga imivugo, ni n’impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Silas Majoro, Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza ‘Ababiligi bagahinda umushyitsi’
Yigishije Milton Obote wabaye Perezida wa Uganda
Yashyizwe n’Umwami Mutara mu nama nkuru y’igihugu
Yapfuye urupfu rw’amarabira
Nta gasozi kabura intwari! Muri ibyo bihe bikomeye aho kwiga amashuri abanza byasaga nk’inzozi ku Banyarwanda, mu 1917 i Gahini muri Kayonza havutse umuhungu akitwa Majoro Silas arenga izo nzitizi zose aba Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza yirwanyeho.
Mu myaka Majoro yavutsemo, mu Rwanda amashuri abanza yari mbarwa n’ahari amenshi yari mu maboko y’abihayimana ba Kiliziya Gatolika. Majoro yavukiye mu muryango w’Abangilikani, byumvikana ko kwiga mu mashuri ya Kiliziya byasaga nk’ibidashoboka.
Ababyeyi bamurwanyeho, ashakisha ishuri, birangira abonye iryo muri Uganda rizwi nka King’s College Budo. Yahize amashuri abanza n’ayisumbuye araharangiza.
Umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda Ishami ry’Uburezi, Dr Evariste Karangwa, ni umwe mu bize kuri King’s College Budo, ashishikazwa no kumenya amateka y’Umunyarwanda wa mbere wahize, ari we Majoro.
Dr Karangwa yabwiye IGIHE ko muri iryo shuri Majoro yari umuhanga cyane, by’umwihariko mu ishami ry’Imibare. Majoro yiganye muri iryo shuri na Kabaka II Edward Mutesa waje kuba Umwami wa Buganda.
Yagize ati “Icyo nabonye muri archives z’iryo shuri ryatangiye mu 1906, bafite archives za kera, icyo bamuziho yari umuhanga cyane cyane mu mibare.”
Mu myaka ya 1940 Majoro yari arangije amashuri yisumbuye abanza gukora muri Uganda. Icyo gihe mu Rwanda nta Kaminuza n’imwe yari ihari, yewe nta n’umunyarwanda wari wakayize abenshi barangizaga mu mashuri yisumbuye nabo ari mbarwa.
Majoro yabanje kwigisha muri Uganda mu ishuri ryitwa Mwili College. Muri iryo shuri yigishijemo abarimo Milton Obote waje kuba Perezida wa mbere wa Uganda.
Majoro amaze kwigisha muri iryo shuri, yaje gukomereza amasomo ye muri Kaminuza ya Makerere, yiga ibijyanye n’uburezi. Yarangije mu 1949.
Igitabo ’Ibitaramo ku mateka y’u Rwanda’ cya Zephrin Kagiraneza kivuga ko icyo gihe Majoro ari we wari Umunyarwanda wa mbere wize Kaminuza, akaba uwa kabiri mu Rwanda no mu Burundi.
Kigira kiti “Muri Ruanda- Urundi, uwabonye impamyabushobozi ya kaminuza bwa mbere ni umuganwa w’Umurundi witwa Birori Joseph mwene Baranyanka. Mu 1949 mu Rwanda habonetse Umunyarwanda Silas Majoro. Yatsindiye impamyabushobozi y’uburezi muri Kaminuza ya Makerere muri Uganda.”
Majoro arangije muri Kaminuza ya Makerere, yafashe icyemezo cyo gutaha mu Rwanda gufasha mu iterambere ry’uburezi.
Yanzwe n’Ababiligi, aba inshuti y’Umwami Rudahigwa
Dr Karangwa avuga ko yageze mu Rwanda abakoloni b’Ababiligi bakamwanga cyane kuko yagaragazaga amatwara y’impinduramatwara ngo uburezi bugere kuri bose.
Mu bindi bamwangiraga, ngo ni uko yari uwo muri Angilikani kandi amashuri menshi ari aya Kiliziya, hakiyongeraho ko yari yarize mu Cyongereza mu gihe amashuri yo mu Rwanda yakoreshaga Igifaransa.
Ati “Nyuma yo gusoza amashuri, yasuzuguwe cyane n’ubuyobozi bw’abakoloni kubera idini rye n’amashuri yizemo. Yagiye kwigisha mu ishuri ry’iwabo i Gahini. Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa yabibonye kare, amushyira mu nama nkuru y’Igihugu, Conseil Supérieur du Pays ariko akomeza kwangwa bikomeye n’abakoloni.”
Bivugwa ko Majoro yari agiye kugirwa Umuyobozi Mukuru w’amashuri yose yo mu Rwanda ariko ubuyobozi bw’abakoloni na Kiliziya Gatolika bakabyitambika kuko yari umuporotestanti.
Dr Karangwa ati “Bashakaga kumugira Umuyobozi Mukuru w’amashuri y’u Rwanda. Ntabwo bamushyizeho ahubwo bashyizeho Kayibanda Grégoire. Baramwangiye ngo nta Gifaransa azi ariko ubwo harimo n’ibindi by’uko ari umuporotesitanti n’ibindi.”
Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa amaze kumutera imboni, yabaye inshuti ye y’akadasohoka. Dr Karangwa avuga ko Majoro ari we watangiye guhuza umwami Mutara na Kabaka Mutesa II wa Uganda kuko Majoro na Mutesa bari inshuti cyane.
Ati“ Yabaye umuyobozi w’ishuri ribanza rya Gahini ariyobora neza, akora ibishya byinshi, abakobwa batangira kwiga, Ababiligi baramwikanga ariko Rudahigwa aramukunda kubera amatwara yo gushaka abantu bazana amajyambere mu gihugu, amushyira mu nama nkuru y’Igihugu.”
Inama Nkuru y’Igihugu muri ibyo bihe yakoraga nk’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko, cyangwa se abajyanama b’umwami.
Umusaruro ukomeye w’ubwo buhuza bwa Majoro hagati ya Rudahigwa na Mutesa, ni uruzinduko rw’amateka umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa yagiriye mu bwami bwa Buganda guhera tariki 14 Ukwakira kugeza kuwa 2 Ugushyingo 1956.
Muri urwo ruzinduko, umwanya munini Rudahigwa yawumaze asura amashuri yo muri Buganda harimo na King’s Budo College Majoro yizeho, rikaba ishuri ryamushimishije cyane.
Musenyeri Alexis Birindabagabo wahoze ayobora Diyozezi Angilikani ya Gahini, yabwiye IGIHE ko Majoro yashakaga ko u Rwanda rwihuta mu iterambere vuba.
Ati “Yaravugaga ati Ababiligi ibyo badukorera ntitujya mbere. Ubundi inshuti za mbere za Rudahigwa yari Majoro na Church w’Umwongereza. Ubwo Majoro yashakaga kumuhuza n’Abongereza nibwo bavuze bati umuntu araducitse, mumwohereze ahandi.”
Birindabagabo avuga ko Majoro yari umuntu ugendera ku mahame. Bigaragarira mu banyeshuri yigishije i Gahini, kuko ngo hari interuro yari yaranditse ku gikuta igira iti “Le Patriotisme c’est l’amour de la patrie” (Gukunda Igihugu ni ugukunda aho ukomoka).
Bivugwa ko iyo yabaga agiye mu nama nkuru y’Igihugu i Nyanza, yagendaga mu modoka ye bwite, yitwaye.
Mu myaka ya 1950, amajwi yatangiye kuba menshi mu Rwanda, basaba ko Abanyarwanda bahabwa amahirwe bakajya kwiga Kaminuza mu mahanga cyangwa se hakubakwa Kaminuza mu gihugu.
Ababiligi babanje kwica amatwi ariko bikomeza kuvugwa cyane ndetse binandikwa mu binyamakuru byari biriho icyo gihe. Igitabo ‘Ibitaramo by’amateka y’u Rwanda’ kivuga ko Leta Mbiligi yageze aho ikavuga ko ntawe izarihirira.
Kinyamateka yo muri Gicurasi 1956, ivuga ko u Bubiligi bwatangaje itegeko ribuza abategetsi bo muri Ruanda-Urundi gukora mu isanduku y’igihugu bashaka gufasha ushaka kujya kwiga mu mahanga.
Byaje kumenyekana mu nama nkuru y’Igihugu ari nabwo Rudahigwa yatangizaha ikigega cyamwitiriwe ‘Fond Mutara’, kugira ngo abana b’Abanyarwanda bajye kwiga mu mahanga.
Majoro yapfuye amarabira
Mu ba mbere barihiwe n’icyo Kigega harimo na Majoro washakaga kujya kwihugura i Burayi mu bijyanye n’Ubutegetsi n’Igifaransa dore ko mu byo Ababiligi bamwangiraga ari uko yize mu Cyongereza.
Ubwo yari amazeyo igihe gito, Majoro yafashwe n’uburwayi butunguranye aza kugwa mu maboko y’umuganga wamuvuraga i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi tariki 31 Werurwe 1958.
Dr Karangwa avuga ko urupfu rwe rwajemo amayobera nk’urw’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa kuko nta ndwara ikomeye izwi yari arwaye. Bikekwa ko na we yaba yarishwe ku kagambane k’Ababiligi batifuzaga umuntu ujijutse ugaragaza amafuti bakora cyangwa se uharanira ubwigenge n’iterambere nyabyo.
Musenyeri Birindabagabo na Dr Karangwa bahuriza ku kuba Majoro yari umuntu ukunda igihugu, wari unyotewe no guteza imbere uburezi.
Dr Karangwa ati “Yakundaga igihugu cy’u Rwanda mu gihe gito yabayeho.”
Ishuri ribanza rya Gahini Majoro yigishijemo riracyariho ariko inyubako zaryo zaravuguruwe. Ahari hubatse ishuri ry’umwimerere yigishirijemo, ubu hubatse Katederali ya Diyosezi ya Gahini mu Itorero Angilikani.
Nyuma ya Majoro, abandi Banyarwanda babashije kujya muri Kaminuza mu bihe bya mbere harimo Déogratias Mbandiwimfura wagiye kuminuza mu mategeko ya Kiliziya i Roma guhera mu 1947 kugeza mu 1951 na Musenyeri Alexis Kagame wagiye kwiga mu 1952 yiga Filozofiya.
“Nanditse ngo ntsinde abifuje ko dushira ntihazagire ubara inkuru ye” Ndizeye Omar.
Iki gitabo ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda cyitwa ‘Ubuzima n’urupfu i Nyamata’ cyashyizwe hanze umwaka ushize.
Ndizeye utuye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE, yagarutse ku mpamvu zatumye yandika ayo mateka nk’umwe mu bagize amahirwe bakarokoka Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi muri 1994.
Ati “Navuga ko igitabo kigaruka ku mateka ya Nyamata aho mvuka nakuriye, nkaharokokera. Kiravuga ku buzima no ku rupfu muri Jenoside. Nyamata kandi nyigarukaho nk’ahantu hari ibimenyetso by’amateka ya Jenoside ariko ahera mu 1959, nkanagaruka uko nibuka ibyabereye aho nise mu Rusengero rwuje umwijima mu Rwanda.”
Ndizeye avuka ahahoze ari Komine Kanzenze, ubu ni mu Murenge wa Ntarama mu Kagali ka Kanzenze. Muri uyu murenge niho hari urusengero rwiciwemo ibihumbi by’Abatutsi, bakicanwa ubugome bukabije.
Mu gitabo cye, agaruka ku buryo Abatutsi batujwe mu Bugesera mu 1959 bakahajyanwa batabihisemo ahubwo ari amayeri y’ubutegetsi bwari buriho mu mugambi wabwo wo gutegura Jenoside.
Ati “Mu 1959 nibwo ubutegetsi bw’Ababiligi bwahimuriye Abatutsi babakuye mu gice cy’Amajyaruguru za Gakenke na za Rulindo ndetse na za Burera by’umwihariko. Hari n’abandi Batutsi bakuwe mu gice cy’epfo muri za Butare na Gikongoro. Kujyanwa mu Bugesera rero ntabwo bari babisabye kuko bajyanwaga basize ibintu byabo, amatungo, inzu n’isambu, ni muri ibyo bihe rero n’abandi Batutsi benshi birukanywe mu gihugu bagana ibihugu bidukikije.”
Iki gitabo Ndizeye agaragazamo ibyo yibaza ku buzima ababyeyi be babayemo mu nkambi zo mu Bugesera hagati ya 1959 na 1962 n’uburyo bakomeje gutoterezwa muri izo nkambi, bamwe bakicwa.
Ati “Hari byinshi bitatumye ngoheka, aha navuga nk’amateka y’umubyeyi wa mwarimu wanjye Uwamaliya Enatha wanyigishije mu wa mbere w’amashuri abanza, waje kubura se wishwe mu 1963 mu Batutsi bishwe barasiwe aho bitaga kuri Nyabarongo ku kiraro cya Kanzenze, se wa Uwamaliya rero akaba yari Data wacu.”
“Bahuye kandi n’ibindi bibazo mu Nkambi ya Nyamata kuko barwariyemo indwara nka za Tifoyide kubera isuku nke, hapfamo benshi cyane ibyo nzabigarukaho mu kindi gitabo ndimo kwandika.”
Uretse ubwo buzima bwo mu Bugesera mu nkambi, Ndizeye agaruka ku byo yiboneye n’amaso ye birimo iyicwa ry’Abatutsi hagati ya 1990 na 1993, mitingi z’amashyaka by’umwihariko MRND na CDR yateguye akanashyira mu bikorwa Jenoside.
Mu kindi gice, avuga by’umwihariko kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, aho avuga uburyo umuryango we wishwe.
Ati “Igice cya Jenoside nyir’izina gitangira mu 1994, uko twahizwe, tukaza guhungira i Ntarama, nkabona uko bishe Data, muri ako kanya simbitekerezeho cyane kuko muri Jenoside, buri munota wabaga ari ubuzima, iyo wabonaga uwishwe wumvaga ko mu kanya ari wowe ukarwana no kureba ko wahanyanyaza ngo wihishe, akababaro kaza nyuma wongeye kubitekereza no kubiha umwanya.”
Ndizeye yavuze ko gutanga ubuhamya bw’ibyo abarokotse babayemo muri Jenoside, bifasha benshi kugabanya umutwaro w’ibyo baba bafite batavuze byibera mu mutima no mu bitekerezo byabo.
Ati “Twari nk’inyamanswa ziba mu ishyamba zitegereje guhigwa no kwicwa isaha iyo ariyo yose buri munsi ku manywa, kuko mu ijoro nibwo twagiraga icyo nakwita agahenge.”
Tariki 13 Gicurasi 1994 nibwo Inkotanyi zabarokoye. Ati “Byari ibyishimo bivanze n’umunaniro, agahinda n’inzara. Tujya i Nyamata Inkotanyi zitangira kutwondora, baduha icyo gufungura, amazi yo koga n’ibindi, turongera tuba abantu.”
Ndizeye yavuze ko icyakomeje gutuma abaho ari icyizere cy’ejo heza, kuko “bitagenze bityo byaba ari Jenoside igikomeza kuko umugambi w’abayitegura bakayikora ni ukurimbura.”
Yavuze ko kwandika ari uburyo bwo guhashya ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside no guha agaciro abe bishwe.
Ati “Kwandika rero kuri njye ni uburyo bw’isanamitima, kandi kugira ngo ntsinde ingengabitekerezo yo kumaraho abanjye, kuko bifuzaga ko amazina yabo asigara mu bitabo by’amateka kuko nta n’umwe wari kuzarokoka ngo avuge inkuru ye.”
Yashishikarije abandi barokotse Jenoside kwandika amateka babayemo kugira ngo atazasibangana.
CHENO yashyizeho amarushanwa y’indirimbo n’imivugo bisingiza Intwari z’Igihugu.
CHENO mu itangazo yashyize hanze ku wa 11 Mutarama, yakanguriye Abanyarwanda babizi kandi babifitiye ubushobozi gukora imivugo n’indirimbo bisingiza Intwari z’igihugu, bikanakangurira abiganjemo urubyiruko kwimakaza umuco w’ubutwari.
Imyaka icumi y’igihirahiro kuri Sudani y’Epfo, Perezida Kiir ’arananiwe’.
Icyizere cyari cyose kuri Aquil De Chut Deng n’abandi bagore bagenzi be babyinaga intsinzi mu mihanda ya Juba, bishimira ko noneho bagiye kubyara bagaheka, bagatunga bagatunganirwa.
Ntibyateye kabiri, icyizere cyaraje amasinde inzozi batifuzaga kurota ziba impamo. Intambara zatangiye mu 2013 kugeza n’ubu zanze kurangira kugeza ubwo na Perezida Salva Kiir avuga ko ananiwe.
Mu 2013, Perezida Salva Kiir wari umaze imyaka ibiri ayoboye icyo gihugu gishya ku ikarita y’Isi, yashwanye na Riek Machar wari Visi Perezida, Kiir ashinja mugenzi we gushaka kumuhirika ku butegetsi.
Salva Kiir aturuka mu bwoko bw’aba-Dinka naho Machar agaturuka mu bwoko bw’aba-Nuer. Imirwano yahereye mu barinda Perezida, abo mu moko yombi batangira gushwana kugeza ubwo bigeze no mu baturage, imirwano ifata indi ntera.
Kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 9 Nyakanga 2021, abanya-Sudani y’Epfo basaga ibihumbi 400 bamaze kugwa muri iyo ntambara mu gihe abasaga miliyoni 4.5 bavuye mu byabo.
