Ni igihugu gikennye ariko gikungahaye kuri peteroli ari na yo ivamo 90 % by’amafaranga igihugu cyinjiza, nubwo Perezida Kiir aherutse kubwira Citizen TV yo muri Kenya ko Peteroli bafite ‘yababereye umuvumo’ aho kuba isoko y’ubukire.
Kubera ko ariko gace kari gakungahaye kuri peteroli n’andi mabuye y’agaciro, Sudani y’Epfo yabonye ubwigenge ifite bimwe mu bikorwa remezo byiza, nyamara Croix Rouge ivuga ko nibura mu bitaro n’amavuriro Sudani y’Epfo yari ifite mbere y’ubwigenge, ibisigaye bikora ari 40 %.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w‘Abibumbye ryita ku bana (UNICEF) rivuga ko nibura miliyoni 4.5 z’abana muri Sudani y’Epfo bakeneye ubufasha ngo bave mu mirire mibi.
Umubare w’abaturage bakeneye inkunga muri Sudani y’Epfo ugeze kuri miliyoni 8.5 muri miliyoni zisaga 10 zituye icyo gihugu.
Kubera imvururu, imyaka icumi ishize igihugu nta bushobozi kiragira bwo gutegura amatora, ataha akaba ateganyijwe mu 2023 ariko icyizere cy’uko azaba ni gike hashingiwe ku bibazo by’intambara, inzara n’imvururu za politiki zicyugarije igihugu.
Igitutu cy’amahanga, cyatumye abayobozi bombi bemera gusangira ubutegetsi, mu 2018 Machar yongera kugaruka mu gihugu nka Visi Perezida wa mbere, mu ba Visi Perezida batanu igihugu gifite. Muri Gashyantare 2020 Kiir yashyizeho Guverinoma y’Ubumwe ariko ntabwo yabujije ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku moko hirya no hino mu gihugu bukomeza.
Isabukuru y’imyaka icumi yakabaye ibirori bidasazwe ku gihugu cyabonye ubwigenge kimaze imyaka 30 kibuharanira, nyamara Perezida Salva Kiir yategetse ko nta birori bidasanzwe biba kuko ntacyo kwishimira gihari.
Aherutse kugira ati “Ibihano Sudani y’Epfo yafatiwe byaradukenesheje nubwo mu bisanzwe dukize. Ibihano byose baduhaye, ntabwo byatumye tuzamuka mu buryo twifuzagamo. Niyo mpamvu tudashobora kwizihiza imyaka 10 ishize nk’uko abantu babyifuzaga. Abantu barashonje, ubushobozi dufite ntabwo twabushyira mu birori, byarakaza abaturage bacu.”
Ubwo Sudani yemezaga ko ibonye ubwigenge, Akanama k’umutekano ka Loni katoye kemeza ko ingabo za Loni zishinzwe kubungabunga amahoro zigomba kujya mu gihugu gishya gusubiza ibintu ku murongo.
Izo ngabo zigerageza gushyira ibintu mu buryo ariko ntabwo bibuza imvururu gukomeza.
Umuyobozi w’ingabo za Loni muri icyo gihugu , Nicholas Haysom kuri uyu munsi Sudani y’Epfo imaze imyaka icumi yigenga yagize ati “Turasaba abanyapolitiki kubyaza umusaruro aya mahirwe kugira ngo inzozi abaturage bari bafite mu myaka icumi ishize, zibe impamo. Baharanire amahoro arambye n’iterambere.”
Umuryango Mpuzamahanga na Kiir bararebana ay’ingwe
Nubwo amatora yitezwe mu 2023 ngo hatorwe undi uzasimbura Salva Kiir, benshi ntibizera ko ayo matora azaba. Hari ababona ko kugira ngo Sudani y’Epfo igire amahoro, bizasaba ko Kiir ava ku butegetsi akajyana na Riek Machar.
Ibyo byifuzo ababifite babisangiye na Loni dore ko Raporo yatanzwe muri Mata 2021 y’inzobere za Loni kuri Sudani y’Epfo, yavuze ko “Kiir na Machar bahindutse ikibazo kuri demokarasi, iterambere ry’ubukungu n’imibereho myiza muri Sudani y’Epfo.”
Iryo tsinda ry’impuguke ryakomeje rivuga ko abo bayobozi bombi bakwiriye kuvaho “kugira ngo igihugu kibone undi murongo mushya wa politiki hanakumirwe izindi mvururu.”
Nubwo Loni isanga Kiir ari we kibazo muri Sudani y’Epfo, nyir’ubwite we asanga Umuryango mpuzamahanga ari wo utuma igihugu kidatera imbere.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana n’umunyamakuru wa Citizen TV Kenya, Jeff Mwaura Koinange, Perezida Kiir yagize ati “Ndananiwe, ariko ntabwo nanijwe n’abaturage, nanijwe n’umuryango mpuzamahanga. Niyo mpamvu mfite ba Visi Perezida batanu. Njya kubona nkabona n’umuntu utarigeze arasa na rimwe, baramuzanye ngo ari mu masezerano y’amahoro.”
Umunyamakuru yahise abaza Kiir impamvu bakora ibyo badashaka akabyemera, ati “Nagira nte se? Ndabareka bagakora icyo bashaka.Ubu se iyo ufashe inka ukayijyana mu ibagiro, yatera amahane. Niko bakora, bo icyo bashaka ni ukumvana ku butegetsi.”
Kubera imvururu n’intambara, Loni yafatiye Sudani y’Epfo ibihano birimo iby’ubukungu, kutemererwa kugura intwaro, gufatira imitungo ya bamwe mu bashinjwa uruhare mu mvururu no kubabuza gukorera ingendo mu mahanga.
Ibyo byakomye mu nkokora iterambere ry’icyo gihugu. Bishobora kuba ari nabyo bituma icyo gihugu kitagira igisirikare gikomeye cyabasha guhangana n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro.
Abaturage ntibizeye umutekano utangwa na Leta, ari yo mpamvu imbunda n’izindi ntwaro zinyanyagiye mu baturage zikanifashishwa iyo habaye imvururu zishingiye ku moko cyangwa ibindi.
Perezida Salva Kiir yavuze ko izo ntwaro bigoye kuzimara mu baturage, ngo keretse bahawe ingengo y’imari bakazibagurira.
Ati “ Niba umuntu yaragiye akagurisha inka ze akigurira imbunda ngo yirinde, ntabwo yapfa kuyitanga. Twe twumva ko kugira ngo ibyemejwe mu masezerano bigerweho, bizasaba ko dutekereza uburyo abaturage bamburwa intwaro. Bizakunda ari uko tubahaye amafaranga, tukazigura.”
Hari ababona impamvu ibintu byazambye muri Sudani y’Epfo, ari uko Kiir asa n’uwaguweho n’ubutegetsi, akabufata atiteguye.
The Sudan People’s Liberation Army, umutwe w’ingabo warwaniye ubwigenge bwa Sudani y’Epfo washinzwe mu 1983 na John Garang.
Garang yari afite impamyabumenyi y’ikirenga (Phd) mu bukungu bushingiye ku buhinzi yakuye muri Iowa State University . Yari azi kureshya amahanga kugira ngo yemere impamvu yatumye bafata intwaro, ari nabyo byabagejeje ku bwigenge.
Mu 2005, Garang yasinye amasezerano y’amahoro na Guverinoma ya Sudani ari nayo yabanzirizaga ubwigenge. Yaje kugirwa Visi Perezida wa Guverinoma y’inzibacyuho ya Sudani, hashize iminsi agwa mu mpanuka ya kajugujugu.
Inyeshyamba za Garang zisanze mu ihurizo ryo gushaka umusimbura, bagena Salva Kiir wari umusirikare mukuru umenyereye ibyo kurwana, udafite amashuri menshi n’ubunararibonye muri politiki.
Mu gihe Garang yari azi kureshya amahanga no gutera ibipindi, Kiiir we yaje ari umuntu ucecetse.
Ikinyamakuru Foreign Policy giherutse gutangaza ko hari inama yigeze guhuza Kiir na George W Bush wayoboraga Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, gusobanura neza ibibazo byabo biramunanira biba ngombwa ko havuga abaminisitiri be.
Bush wakundaga cyane Garang, yabaye nk’utishimira politiki ya Kiir, gusa ibintu byarushijeho kuzamba ku ngoma ya Barrack Obama, ubwo Amerika yamenyaga ko Sudani y’Epfo yaba itera inkunga imitwe y’inyeshyamba irwanya Sudani.
Salva Kiir nubwo avuga ko ananizwa, ntatanga umuti uhamye w’icyakorwa ngo imvururu zihoshe mu gihugu cye. Gusa yizera ko mu myaka icumi iri imbere, Sudani y’Epfo izaba imeze neza.
Ati “Abaturage ba Sudani y’Epfo nibemera ko amahoro aganza, mu myaka icumi iri imbere kizaba ari igihugu kidasanzwe. Nibatongera kurwana, nyuma y’imyaka icumi kizaba ari igihugu.”
Icyakora, Kiir avuga ko hari “Hari abantu bakinyotewe n’amaraso, bashaka kubona abantu bapfa muri Sudani y’Epfo.”
Kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe, uko yahunze n’abamusabye kugambanira igihugu - Ikiganiro na Dr Rwigema Pierre-Célestin.
Ubu afite imyaka 68 y’amavuko. Yabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe muri Guverinoma yari iyobowe na Pasiteri Bizimungu hagati ya 1995 na 2000 mbere yaho yabaye Minisitiri w’Uburezi mu gihe cy’umwaka umwe [1994-1995].
Ni Umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba [EALA].Mbere ya Jenoside yari Umuyoboke wa MDR. Mu 2001, yaje gushinjwa kugira uruhare muri Jenoside, hashize iminsi mike yeguye ku mwanya wa Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Byatumye ahunga ava mu Rwanda ajya muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ashaka ubuhungiro nk’umunyapoltiki. Muri icyo gihe yarimo akomereza amasomo ya Masters muri Bowling Green State University muri Leta ya Ohio.
Ihunga rye ryavuzweho byinshi ndetse bivugwa ko yageze iyo imahanga akareshywa n’abantu b’ingeri zitandukanye kugira ngo yiyunge ku barwanya FPR Inkotanyi.
Ibi byose ni byo yagarutseho mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye na IGIHE.
IGIHE: Waba wibuka uko winjiye muri Politiki n’icyabiteye?
Dr Rwigema: Inkundura y’amashyaka ije, ntabwo nabigiyemo. No muri MRND baje kunsaba kujyamo ndanga, gusa naje kurushwa imbaraga n’uko icyo kintu cyari gikomeye i Gitarama aho nkomoka, barantumira kugira ngo njyemo ndanga, mbanza kubaha icyo nakwita ubufasha, bageze aho bati ’amafaranga ntabwo tuyashaka ni wowe dushaka’.
Mbura uko mbigenza, nemera kujya mu nzego zikomeye z’ishyaka rikomeye iwacu, dutangira tuvuga ko tugiye kurwanya Habyarimana, kandi akomeye ariko twe nta n’imbaraga dufite; nta mbunda twagiraga […]. Ni uko ngiye iwacu muri Kigoma bahita bantora mu nzego, bigeze kuri Perefegitura ngira ngo nabaye uwa gatatu. Ni uko ninjiye muri politiki.
Hari n’abavuga ko wigeze kwigumura kuri Habyarimana; ni ukuri?
Mu 1993, Habyarimana yabonye ko opozisiyo ikomeye, ahitamo kugira ngo abikatemo kabiri, ari na bwo bamwe yabahaga icyo nakwita nk’ubushobozi cyangwa amafaranga, barabagura abandi turanga.
Ndibuka ko muri kongere yabereye i Gitarama, nafashe ijambo mbabwira ko ntashobora kubyemera, ndasohoka, ikindi gipande kinini kirankurikira. Ni uko byacitsemo kabiri, noneho rero abantu batangira guhigana.
Ubwo icyo gihe hari abagiye ku ruhande rw’Inkotanyi...
Hari abashyigikiye Habyarimana abandi tuvuga rumwe n’Inkotanyi, abantu batangira guhigana hagati yabo kuko ibyo twari twaremeranyije nka Demokarasi bamwe basa nk’aho bagambaniye abandi kubera ko ubutegetsi bwabaciyemo kabiri.
Wabaye Minisitiri w’Uburezi wa mbere nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi; usobanura ute uko izo nshingano zari zimeze?
Kuba Minisitiri w’Uburezi nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994 ni nk’inzozi kuko nanjye iyo nsubije amaso inyuma hari igihe nibaza uko nabikoze ariko narabikoze.
Mu 1994 kukubaza umubare w’abanyeshuri, abarimu bari mu gihugu noneho hagakubiraho n’uko u Rwanda rwarimo rwakira ababyeyi bazanye n’abana babo bavuye muri Kenya bize mu cyongereza, bavuye muri Tanzania bize mu Kiswahili, bavuye muri Uganda bize mu Cyongereza, abavuye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo bize mu Gifaransa abavuye i Burundi bize mu Gifaransa n’abari basanzwe mu Rwanda bize mu Kinyarwanda ntabwo byari byoroshye. Ndakubwiye ni ikizamini kimwe n’ibindi.
Twatangije amashuri muri Nzeri mu 1994, nakoze gahunda nyijyanye no muri guverinoma kugira ngo ize kubyemera byafashe igihe, bumvaga bidashoboka.
Ndabasobanurira hanyuma barambwira bati wabaye woroheje? Ndababwira nti ariko ndakeka ko dukwiye kugerageza kuko ababyeyi n’abana n’iki gihugu gikwiye kongera kugira icyizere cyo kubaho.
Ni bande bari bagushyigikiye icyo gihe mu bari muri Guverinoma?
Perezida wa Repubulika [Perezida Kagame] ari mu banshyigikiye cyane, aravuga ati mumureke agerageze kuko nanjye nari maze kuvuga nti mureke ngerageze nibyanga njyane na byo mushyireho undi.
Ni iki wihutiye gukora?
Natangije amashuri, icyo gihe hari Perefegitura, natangiriye mu Ruhengeri, icyo gihe yayoborwaga n’uwitwaga Kagiraneza Deus, nkora ku buryo tumenya ibigo byashobokaga kugira ngo bitangire, noneho aho tudafite abarimu tugashyiramo n’abanyeshuri barangizaga bashoboraga kwigisha.
Za UNICEF zirahurura, za GIZ mbese imiryango itari iya leta yose n’abanyamakuru baza kureba uburyo ibyo bintu bizahaho. Ibigo bitandatu byose turatangira barigisha, bigenda neza.
Mwakurikijeho he?
Umunsi wa kabiri tubikora i Byumba, hayoborwaga na Colonel Lizinde Théoneste na Musenyeri we ukinariho baradufashije cyane, tubikora kimwe n’uko twabikoze mu Ruhengeri, umunsi wa Gatatu tujya i Kibungo hari umugabo w’umukozi witwa Musoni Protais na Musenyeri Rubwejanga.
Rubwejanga yari n’inshuti yanjye na bo turakorana turabipanga birakora, umunsi wa kane tujya i Gitarama, tubikora uko twabikoze mu ntangiriro.
Ubwo byakirwaga gute hanze aha?
Ku munsi wa Gatanu ari na ho Inama ya Guverinoma yabaga, inkuru yari yasakaye Isi yose, bati ya Guverinoma itaranamara n’amezi abiri yakoze igikorwa cy’indashyikirwa, yatangije amashuri. Noneho ndakomeza, ni uko byagenze.
Nyuma y’umwaka umwe wahise ugirwa Minisitiri w’Intebe...
Ukurikije amasezerano ya Arusha, bavugaga ko Minisitiri w’Intebe azaturuka muri MDR, Twagiramungu yari yanditse muri ayo masezerano, Twagiramungu rero amaze kunanirwa inshingano, arasezera, bagombaga gushaka umuntu umusimbura.
Bashatse umuntu umusimbura rero ntabwo bari gusaba iryo shyaka ngo ribahe umuntu kanaka, byari bikomeye. Ariko barababwiye bati nimuduhe abantu bane, turahitamo umwe. Urumva icyo gihe njye nari Minisitiri kandi mfite n’amanota y’ibikorwa nari maze gukora.
Bivuze rero ko watowe?
Nk’ishyaka twakoze inama ya Biro Politiki, baratora, batora abantu bane, mu bantu bane hatowe uwitwaga Mbonimpa Jean Marie Vianney wari Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Busuwisi; Mfizi Christophe wari Ambasaderi wacu i Paris, nkurikiraho mba uwa gatatu nari Minisitiri w’Uburezi, uwa kane yari Eugène Ndahayo, wari Umuyobozi ushinzwe ibikorwa bya Guverinoma muri Minisiteri y’Itumanaho.
Batanga bane, noneho FPR ihitamo Rwigema ari we njyewe. Ni uko nabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe, hari tariki 29 Kanama 1995.
Ni wowe wahabwaga amahirwe muri bose?
N’amaradiyo yari yamaze gutangaza ko ari njye n’ibyemezo bitarasohoka. Kuko ngira ngo nari Minisitiri w’Uburezi, maze kugira ibikorwa bigaragara, abantu bose ahari ni ko babyifuzaga.
Mu biganiro byo mu Rugwiro ubwo byumvikane ko na ho wari uhari
Mu nama zo mu Urugwiro nari mpari, nazigizemo uruhare rukomeye nari ndi Minisitiri w’Intebe.
Ni iki wazivugaho?
Inama zo mu Urugwiro, ni ikintu gikomeye kandi ni n’ikintu umuntu yashimira FPR kuko yahuje abantu batashoboraga guhura. Abantu bari aba UNAR muri za 1959, abari aba Sous-Chefs, abari muri za RADER mbese ihuza ibintu bitashoboraga guhura.
Ariko twaganiriye ku mateka y’u Rwanda, ibyatanyije abanyarwanda, ibishobora kongera kubahuza n’uburyo abantu bavugisha ukuri.
Ni gute usobanura umusingi wazo ku Rwanda rwa none?
Ni ukuri kw’Imana ni ikintu gikomeye mu bintu byubatse iki gihugu kuko zahujije abantu batashoboraga guhura, barongera baricarana barebana mu maso, bavuga amateka mbere y’umwaduko w’abazungu, igihe cy’Ubukoloni na nyuma ibintu bijya kuba nabi hakaza ubwicanyi cyane cyane Umwami Mutara Rudahigwa bamaze kumuhitanira i Bujumbura.
Ni ikintu gikomeye rero ngira ngo Inama zo mu Urugwiro abantu bari bakwiye kuzazandikaho ibitabo kuko hari abantu bari bahari bakuru, umuntu agize Imana bakinariho, umuntu agahera no ku byo abantu bibuka.
Mu 2001 wahunze igihugu, hari bahaye iki?
Njyewe icyo nari nkeneye ni ukugira ngo mbone ibyangombwa banyakire, kandi ibyo narabikoze. Maze kubigeraho ahasigaye njya mu mirimo yo gutunga umuryango wanjye nditonda, mba Umunyarwanda. Nk’Umunyarwanda ukunda igihugu cye.
Kandi abantu baranshatse kugira ngo banshyire muri ibyo bintu, mbese nanjye ngambanire igihugu, njye muri iyo mitwe ya politiki ndabihunga ndanabyanga.
Ubwo bagusabaga kubangamira igihugu mu buhe buryo?
Hari n’abanzaniye amafaranga ngo nandike ibitabo byo gusebya igihugu cyanjye, ndababwira nti ayo mafaranga ndayakeneye ariko ntabwo nabikora.
Nti nta kintu nasebya u Rwanda ntagizemo uruhare, urumva rero ni ukuvuga ngo ndasebya igihugu nayoboye, nabayemo Minisitiri w’Intebe, ni ukuvuga se ko ibyo ntakoze njyewe ari ibihe?
Waje kugaruka mu Rwanda ute? Bivugwa ko wabisabye Perezida Kagame… niko biri?
Nanjye ubwanjye n’umutimanama wanjye numvaga ko ngomba gutaha, aho mbisabiye na we rwose abyakirana umutima mwiza.
Ibyo nabyita ubutwari bukomeye kuko aho kugira ngo ube warabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe utahe urwana wataha wubaka. Uko gukunda igihugu ni byo byanyoboye.
Ariko ubu, umurongo u Rwanda rwahawe kubera ubuyobozi bwiza, imiyoborere myiza n’ibikorwa rumaze kugeraho, ni nde se utakwishimira kuza ahubwo kuba mu Rwanda?
Njye ndi Umudepite muri East African Community iyo tuvuganye na bagenzi bacu b’Abadepite baba abo muri Kenya, Tanzania n’Abagande, iyo bageze hano mu Rwanda barareba bakumirwa.
Baravuga bati ni agahugu k’i Burayi bateruye baraza bagashyira muri Afurika. Ubwo se iryo shema urumva utaryishimira? Kandi rero nta muntu n’umwe ukunda iki gihugu, ukunda u Rwanda wakumva ko aho rugeze yakumva ko rukwiye gusubira inyuma. Ntabwo bishoboka, nta wabyemera kuko twe twishimira kuba Abanyarwanda.
Kubera uko u Rwanda, ruteye, ruyobowe, ibyo rumaze kugeraho, ubuyobozi rufite, wumva utakwishimira ko […] utanatekereza ko rukwiye gusubira inyuma.
Uyu munsi u Rwanda wifuza ni urumeze rute?
U Rwanda nifuza ni uru Rwanda ndimo kandi nkumva ko rukwiye gukomeza rugatera imbere kandi urwo nifuza ntabwo ari urwo bazampa, oya, ni urwo nzafatanya n’abandi kubaka. Tukajya inama tukavuga ngo turashaka kugera aha, tukahagera.
Ntabwo ari u Rwanda rw’impanuka, ni u Rwanda tugomba kubaka tukagera aho dushaka. Mu 1994 ndi Minisitiri nta telefone yabagaho, twakoreshaga ibyombo, nta mishahara twahembwaga, twahaga abarimu ibishyimbo, akawunga, umuceri n’ibindi kugira ngo abantu bongere batangire ibikorwa bundi bushya.
Ariko uko turiho ubu n’uko turiho, wabigereranya se n’icyo gihe? Ntabwo rero hari n’uwakwifuza ko byongera gusubira inyuma.
Cyera wajyaga hanze Umunyarwanda bakagufata nk’umwicanyi ariko ubu ugera hanze wavuga ko uri Umunyarwanda bati ba bantu batekereza neza, ba bantu b’abakozi, igihugu kiri ku murongo, gifite isuku,...
Ibyo rero tubikesha ubuyobozi bwiza, tubikesha Intore izirusha intambwe, kuba turi mu Itorero, tugatozwa, tukareba, tukagira ibyo dukunda tukabihitamo kandi tukabigeraho.
Ni nko kugereranya umuriro n’ijuru-Rutaremara na Sheikh Harerimana ku Rwanda rwa 1994 n’urwa 2021
Tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 1994, ifite igisobanuro kinini ku kwibohora kw’Abanyarwanda. Abato kuri ubu babona ibishashagirana, bashobora kwibwira ko ariko byahoze.
Ni ah’inararibonye muri Politiki zabashije kubona u Rwanda rwa mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, urwo muri Jenoside n’urwa nyuma y’aho ari narwo gusa hafi 60 % by’Abanyarwanda bazi.
Impuguke muri Politiki akaba n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Urwego rw’Igihugu Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, Tito Rutaremara yavuze ko ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda rwarangiraga uretse kuba abantu bari barishwe, ibindi bintu birimo ibikorwa remezo byari byarasenywe.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE, Rutaremara yagize ati “ Ibintu byose byari byarasenyutse, amazu, imihanda barayishwanyuje. Sinzi icyo bayihoraga. Ikindi cyari gitangaje umuntu yajyaga kwibaza ni uko mu mashuri, ari muri za Minisiteri, ari amazu wasangaga inzugi zitariho, intebe zidahari, utubati ntatwo, ukabona amadirishya y’ibyuma ariko wabona ay’ibiti ugasanga nta yariho.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Twaje kugenda tubimenya. Muri icyo gihe cyose birirwaga bajya kwica, babonaga amatungo, inyamanswa, imiceri n’ibindi basahuye n’iki byose bakajya guteka kugira ngo ejo bazasubire ku kazi kabo. Nta kindi rero ibyo bikoresho nibyo batekeshaga.”
Rutaremara yavuze ko na nyuma y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ubwo hashyirwagaho ubuyobozi bushya, hari hasigaye ikibazo cyo kubona aho gukorera kuko Leta yakoze Jenoside yari yarasenye ibintu byose.
Ati “Ni na cyo cyatumye leta itangiye bwa mbere abantu bagiye bajya gushaka udutebe, intebe zose mu mashuri n’ahandi wasangaga barazitwaye barazitekeshaga kugira ngo babone uko bazasubira kwica.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni na cyo twibazaga tuti ’ese ko dufashe igihugu mwo kabyara mwe turabigenza gute?’ Dusanga ariko BNR ifunze […] wenda n’amafaranga arimo cyangwa ibindi, izo za banki wenda na BCR yari ifunze ariko izindi zose zari zifunguye byose byari byasamye. Nyuma twaje kumenya impamvu yabyo.”
Ni ukuva mu muriro tujya mu ijuru!
Ubwo urugamba rw’amasasu rwo kubohora igihugu rwari rurangiye, hakurikiyeho urugendo rwo Kwibohora bya nyabyo, rugana ku cyerekezo cyo kugira u Rwanda rutarangwamo ubukene, rurimo ubumwe, rufite ibikorwaremezo byorohereza abaturage kugera ku bukire.
Umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana, yabwiye IGIHE ko by’umwihariko Ukwibohora kw’Abanyarwanda gusobanuye byinshi ku gihugu muri rusange.
Sheikh Harerimana wanabaye Umujyanama wa Perezida Kagame, avuga ko by’umwihariko tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 1994, ari umunsi usobanuye byinshi ku Banyarwanda kuko ariwo munsi batangiye gukora bashaka iterambere rirambye kandi bizeye ko ntacyo bazaba.
Yavuze ko FPR Inkotanyi ijya gutegura urugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda, hari impamvu nyamukuru zari zigenderewe zirimo ubumwe bw’abanyarwanda, guca ubuhunzi n’izindi mpamvu zibutera, iterambere ry’abanyarwanda bose n’ibindi byinshi kandi kuri ubu byamaze kugerwaho.
Ati “Ni ibyo kwishimira rero uyu munsi ibyo byose byagezweho, urebye iterambere rirambye Abanyarwanda bamaze kugeraho ukareba ububanyi n’amahanga, imibereho myiza n’ibindi byagezweho kandi n’ibitaragerwaho hari icyizere. Numva rero ivuka rya FPR Inkotanyi ryaraziye igihe.”
Rutaremara we yavuze ko kugereranya u Rwanda rwa mbere ya tariki 4 Nyakanga 1994, n’urw’uyu munsi ari nko kuva mu muriro ujya mu Ijuru.
Ati “Reka nkoreshe imvugo abantu bose bazi, ni nko kuva mu muriro ujya mu Ijuru. Ubu turi mu ijuru, icyo gihe abantu bari mu muriro. Mu buryo ubwo aribwo bwose, urebye uko abantu b’abagome bari bakiri aho, icyo gihe abantu barebaga uko igihugu kimeze cyarashwanyaguritse.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Urumva ko harimo ibibi nk’ibyo mu muriro. Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari hari icyizere cy’uko wenda ubwo FPR Inkotanyi yari itsinze, ibintu bigiye kujya mu buryo ariko ubundi cyari nko kuva mu cyubo ujya ahantu heza. Ni nko gufata ikimoteri cya Nduba, ukagereranya na Kigali Convention Centre. Ni ibintu bidashobora guhura.”
Yavuze ko uyu munsi u Rwanda rumeze neza ariko urugamba rwo kwibohora rutarangiye kuko hagezeweho urw’iterambere kandi na rwo rukomeye cyane.
Ati “Icya mbere Kwibohora ni inzira ndende kuko iyo utangiye kwibohora uba ugomba kubohora igihugu cyawe muri byose, iyo nzira iba ifite igice cyayo nk’icyo gushaka ibitekerezo, icyo kurwana intambara, gukuraho igitugu. Rero iyo wakuyeho igitugu ari na cyo cyabohaga abantu, uba ufite ububasha bwo gutangira kubohora abantu za ngoyi babashyiragaho.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Hari ikindi gice rero cyo gusana no kongera kubaka igihugu bundi bushya, kubaka inzego ndetse noneho muri rusange hari ahantu tugeze aho umuntu aba afite ibimutunga, aba yumva umwana we yakwiga, umwana we yakwivuza, akaba yabika udufaranga n’ibindi. Ubu rero twinjiye mu cyerekezo cya 2050, cyo kubaka ubukungu bwacu ngo bugere ku kigero nk’ikibihugu byateye imbere.”
Kurangara k’urubyiruko byaba ari icyaha gikomeye cyane
Abateguye urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bari bato ndetse n’uwari uruyoboye Paul Kagame, ubwo rwarangiraga ku wa 4 Nyakanga 1994, yari afite imyaka 36 gusa. Ni ibintu inararibonye muri politiki zisanga bikwiye kuba umukoro ukomeye ku bakiri bato b’uyu munsi.
Sheikh Harerimana avuga ko urubyiruko rw’uyu munsi rukwiye kumenya ko arirwo rufite inshingano zo kubaka igihugu ku buryo kurangara byaba ari ukwikorera icyaha gikomeye.
Ati “Abakiri bato ni ukubakangurira ko ibyubatswe bitagomba gusenywa barebera kandi aho amatafari ageze ababyeyi babo bubaka na bo bafite inshingano zo kongeraho andi matafari, igihugu kirubakwa kandi kizubakwa na bose.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Icyo gihe rero urubyiruko nirurangara rukagira ngo u Rwanda ni uku rwari rumeze, byaba ari icyaha gikomeye barimo kwikorera kandi bakorera n’abazabakomokaho. Bakomeze rero bakore kandi babitoze n’abazabakomokaho.”
Rutaremara we yagize ati “Abenshi muri twe ntabwo tuzaba tukiriho muri icyo cyerekezo 2050, hari urubyiruko nirwo ruzaba ruhari. Turabasaba ko babimenya bakabiharanira kuko bafite igihugu cyiza, bariga neza, bigishwa kuyobora n’andi mahirwe ya ngombwa atuma babaho neza.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Uretse no kugira ibyo byose, banashyirwa mu buyobozi guhera hasi, ntabwo babigisha ubuyobozi ahubwo babushyirwamo guhera hasi ku Isibo kugera mu Nteko no muri Guverinoma. Urumva ko rurimo rwiga kuyobora kandi nirwo ruzaba ruyobora mu minsi iri imbere. Bafite imbaraga, bafite leta ibakunda, yabakinguriye amarembo, urumva ko izo mbaraga zabo nizo zizatugeza hariya.”
Kwizihiza Kwibohora ku nshuro ya 27 bisanze u Rwanda rwarateye imbere mu nzego zose nk’ubukungu, imibereho myiza, ibikorwa remezo n’ibindi.
Perezida Kagame yakiriye intumwa yihariye ya Perezida wa Mali.
Perezida Kagame yakiriye Minisitiri Amb Abdoulaye kuri iki Cyumweru Tarik 4 Nyakanga 2021, bagirana ibiganiro ndetse anamugezaho ubutumwa bwa mugenzi we wa Mali, Colonel Assimi Goïta.
Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu, Village Urugwiro byatangaje ko “Perezida Kagame yakiriye Amb Abdoulaye, uri mu Rwanda nk’Intumwa yihariye yazanye ubutumwa bwa Col Assimi, Perezida w’inzibacyuho muri Mali.”
Muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka nibwo Colonel Assimi Goita yagiye ku butegetsi ahiritse Perezida w’inzibacyuho Bah Ndaw
Mu kiganiro Perezida Kagame yagiranye na TV5 Monde muri uko kwezi, yabajijwe icyo avuga kuri iryo hirikwa ry’ubutegetsi. Yavuze ko icyangombwa abantu bagakwiriye kurebaho, ari umutekano w’abaturage n’ububabare bari kunyuramo kubera ibyabaye, mbere yo kwamagana cyangwa kutamagana ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi.
Ati “Ntabwo ntekereza ko umuyobozi uwo ari we wese wo muri Afurika cyangwa se undi muturage wo muri Afurika yakwishimira umutekano muke nk’uriya. Abantu bavuga ku ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi, bakavuga ku bayobozi n’ibindi ariko ikintu gikomeye gikwiriye kuduhangayikisha, ni ububabare abaturage bari kunyuramo kubera ibyo.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikibazo cyo kumenya byimbitse ngo ni ibiki byabaye, ni nde wabikoze? Ibyo abantu babivugaho ariko igikomeye ubu ni umutekano muke n’ububabare bw’abaturage, ni bariya bantu batabona neza ejo hazaza. Ni byiza ko twishyira mu mwanya w’abaturage ba Mali.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ashyigikiye inzira yatangijwe n’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yo kumvikanisha impande zitavuga rumwe muri Mali, umutekano n’ituze rusange bikagaruka.
U Rwanda na Mali bifitanye imikoranire mu ngeri zitandukanye aho hari amasezerano byasinyanye ajyanye n’ubwikorezi bukorerwa mu kirere yemerera indege zo muri ibi bihugu byombi gukoresha ibibuga mpuzamahanga byabyo.
Ubutumwa butandukanye amahanga yageneye u Rwanda ku munsi w’Ubwigenge
Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Qatar, Sheikh Tamim Bin Hamad Al Thani, unashinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane, bifurije u Rwanda umunsi mwiza w’Ubwigenge ndetse banashimira Perezida Paul Kagame na Minisitri w’Intebe w’u Rwanda, Ngirente Édouard.
Ni mu butumwa bugira buti “Nyakubahwa Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Qatar akaba na Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga n’Ubutwererane yashimiye Nyakubahwa Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Rwanda ku munsi igihugu cye cyaboneyeho ubwigenge”
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Maldives, Abdulla Shahid na we yifurije umunsi mwiza w’Ubwigenge mugenzi we w’u Rwanda, Minisitiri Vincent Biruta n’Abanyarwanda muri muri rusange, anashimangira ko bazakomeza kubaka umubano mwiza hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Ndashimira Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Vincent Biruta n’abaturage b’u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mwiza bizihiza Ubwigenge. Twizeye ko tuzakomeza gushimangira umubano mwiza hagati ya Maldives n’u Rwanda.”
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ya Ukraine na yo yanyujije ubutumwa bushimira u Rwanda ku munsi warwo w’Ubwigenge ku rubuga rwa Twitter.
Yagize iti “Turashimira cyane abaturage b’inshuti zacu b’u Rwanda na bagenzi bacu bo muri Minisiteri y’Ubabanyi n’Amahanga kuri uyu munsi bizihizaho Umunsi w’Ubwigenge. Turabifuriza amahoro, umutekano ndetse n’ubukire! Twizeye ko tuzakomeza kubaka umubano mwiza hagati y’ibihugu byacu ku nyungu z’abaturage bacu.”
Malaysia na yo yoherereje u Rwanda ubutumwa bwo kurwifuriza isabukuru nziza ku munsi w’Ubwigenge, ibinyujijie muri Minisiteri yayo y’Ububanyi n’amahanga yitwa Wisma Putra.
Bagize bati “Wisma Putra irashimira cyane Repubulika y’u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi mwiza yizihizaho imyaka 59 imaze ibonye Ubwigenge. Malaysia n’u Rwanda byubatse umubano wabyo mu 2005, Ambasade ya Malaysia muri Kenya ni yo ifite izo nshingano [zo gukurikirana umubano w’ibihugu byombi.]”
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’Ubwami bwa Bahrain yagize iti “Turashimira Repubulika y’u Rwanda kuri uyu munsi yizihizaho ubwigenge.”
Ni mu gihe Ambasade ya Finland muri Tanzania ariko inahagarariye iki gihugu mu Rwanda yaruhaye ubutumwa bugira buti “Embasade ya Finland muri Dar es Salaam irifuriza u Rwanda Isabukuru Nziza y’imyaka 59 rumaze rubonye ubwigenge.”
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye rikorera muri Lithuania na ryo ryifurije u Rwanda ibyiza. Riti “Turifuriza abaturage ba Repubulika y’u Rwanda umunsi mwiza, ubwo bishimira umunsi babonyeho ubwigenge. Turifuriza u Rwanda rwose umunsi mwiza w’Ubwigenge.”
Ku rundi ruhande Umuryango w’Ibihugu bya Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, EAC wagize uti “Turifuriza guverinoma n’abaturage b’u Rwanda umunsi mwiza bizihizaho imyaka 59 bamaze babonye ubwigenge. Umunsi Mwiza w’Ubwigenge Rwanda!”
U Rwanda rwizihije umunsi w’Ubwigenge hamwe n’igihugu cy’u Burundi ndetse na Somalia, aho ibi bihugu byose byavuye mu maboko y’Abakoloni ku itariki ya 01 Nyakanga 1962.
Iby’ingenzi byagize u Bushinwa igihangange burangajwe imbere n’Ishyaka CPC rimaze imyaka 100 (Amafoto).
Muri make, ubukungu bw’u Bushinwa icyo gihe bwanganaga n’ubwa Hong Kong kuri ubu, imwe mu duce tugengwa n’u Bushinwa. Ni agace gafite umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyari z’amadolari zisaga gato 360.
Nubwo Isi yugarijwe na Covid-19, ibirori mu Bushinwa birarimbanyije bishimira imyaka 100 ishize ishyaka rya rubanda, The Communist Party of China (CPC), rishinzwe ari na ryo ryagize uruhare mu kuzana izo mpinduka zose zituma u Bushinwa buri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu bihugu bikize cyane ku Isi, nta muturage wabwo n’umwe ukibarizwa munsi y’umurongo w’ubukene.
Ishyaka CPC ryashinzwe muri Nyakanga 1921, rishingwa n’abantu 13 bari baje bahagarariye abandi 50 mu gihugu hose, bafite intego yo gutangiza impinduramatwara n’urugamba byamaze imyaka 28 bigasiga bihiritse ubutegetsi bw’igitugu bw’Aba-Kuomintang (KMT).
Rya shyaka ryatangijwe n’abantu 50, ubu ni ryo rinini ku Isi rifite abayoboke benshi basaga miliyoni 95, rifite agahigo ko gutangiza ingamba zatumye mu myaka 30 ishize, abantu basaga miliyoni 700 baravuye mu bukene bukabije.
Ni ishyaka ryaje rishyize imbere abaturage nk’uko biri mu mazina yaryo, bikanagaragarira mu mazina igihugu cyahawe rimaze kujya ku butegetsi mu 1949, Repubulika ya Rubanda y’u Bushinwa (People’s Republic of China).
U Bushinwa bushya bwisanze mu gihe kibi, Isi iri mu bibazo byasizwe n’Intambara ya Kabiri y’Isi yose. Cyari igihugu kikishakisha, hafi kimwe cya kabiri cy’abagituye bari mu bukene bukabije, ibikorwa remezo ari iyanga n’ibindi.
Isi yakurikiwe n’ibihe bibi by’Intambara y’Ubutita, u Bushinwa bufatwa mu murongo w’Aba-Communistes bari bahanganye n’Aba-Capitalistes bo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi. Kubera ingufu Abanya-Burayi n’Abanyamerika bari bafite, u Bushinwa ntibwagize ababureba neza benshi, ibihugu byinshi byakoranaga na bwo byikandagira.
Nta mukene rwimbi usigaye mu Bushinwa
Mu gihe byinshi mu bihugu ku Isi bigowe no kugera kuri imwe mu nkingi z’umuryango w’abibumbye zigamije iterambere rirambye (SDGs), yo kuba ubukene bukabije bwaranduwe mu 2030, u Bushinwa bwo bwabigezeho mbere y’imyaka icumi.
Mu mpera za 2020, u Bushinwa bwakoze ibyo benshi basanga bidasanzwe ubwo bwaranduraga burundu ubukene bukabije mu baturage babwo. Miliyoni zisaga 98 z’abaturage bavuye mu bukene bukabije mu myaka icumi gusa, ubaze neza ni nk’abatuye Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo bose, cyangwa se inshuro icyenda abatuye u Rwanda.
Mu mwaka wa 1990, 61% by’abaturage b’u Bushinwa babaga munsi y’umurongo w’ubukene. Byageze mu 2002 ubukene mu Bushinwa bugeze kuri 33 %. Mu mwaka wa 2015, abaturage 4 % mu Bushinwa ni bo bari basigaye mu bukene.
Mu myaka itarenze 30 gusa, miliyoni 700 z’abatuye u Bushinwa zakuwe mu bukene. Ni ibintu bitigeze biba ahandi ku Isi kandi byose byakozwe ku ngamba zagiye zifatirwa mu buyobozi bw’Ishyaka CPC nka moteri ya Guverinoma y’u Bushinwa.
Uku gutera imbere gukomeye k’u Bushinwa kwatewe n’ingamba Leta yashyizeho zigamije kuzamura abatuye mu bice by’icyaro byari byiganjemo ubukene bukabije. Abaturage benshi bimuwe mu bice bari batuyemo bashyirwa mu midugudu igezweho ibonekamo amahirwe y’imirimo n’ubuzima bwiza.
Ubukungu bwazamukanye n’imibereho myiza
Umushinwa wo mu 1949, iyo yuzuzaga imyaka 35 byabaga bidasanzwe, muri make yabaga ari umurame. Byaterwaga n’impamvu zitandukanye zirimo ubukene, intambara za hato na hato zahoraga muri icyo gihugu n’ibindi. Kuri ubu icyizere cyo kubaho ku Mushinwa kiri ku myaka 77.
Ubwo bwiyongere bw’icyizere cyo kubaho bwaturutse ku ngamba zirimo kongera ishoramari, ibikorwa remezo n’ibindi.
Kuri ubu, abantu batuye mu mijyi yo mu Bushinwa bafite akazi bavuye kuri miliyoni 15 bari bariho mu 1949, ubu bageze kuri miliyoni zisaga 435. Iki gihugu mu 1949 cyari gifite imijyi myiza 132 ariko ubu igeze kuri 670. Uburezi ni imwe mu nkingi yatejwe imbere cyane muri icyo gihugu gituwe na miliyari 1.4. Imibare igaragaza ko 99.95 by’abana bageze igihe cyo kwiga amashuri abanza bayiga nta nkomyi, mu gihe 48 % by’abagomba kuba biga Kaminuza bayiga.
Umusaruro mbumbe w’u Bushinwa ubu ugeze kuri miliyari ibihumbi 14.3 z’amadolari, uvuye kuri miliyari $360 mu 1990. Ni ubwa kabiri kuri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifite umusaruro mbumbe wa miliyari ibihumbi 21 z’amadolari.
Ubukungu bw’iki gihugu bwarushijeho gutumbagira mu 2001 ubwo u Bushinwa bwinjiraga mu Muryango Mpuzamhanga w’Ubucuruzi (World Trade Oraganisation). Kwinjiramo byabuhaye amahirwe yo gukomorerwa kw’ibicuruzwa byabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga, gukwirakwira kw’ishoramari ryabwo mu mahanga n’ibindi.
Agaciro k’ibyo u Bushinwa bwoherezaga n’ibyo bwavanaga mu mahanga mu 1950 kabarirwaga miliyari 1.13 z’amadolari, nyamara mu 2018 byari bigeze kuri miliyari 4600 z’amadolari.
Igihugu cya mbere gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi igezweho
Mu gihe urujya n’uruza rw’abantu rudashoboka ngo ubucuruzi busagambe, nta gihugu cyarota iterambere. Imihanda myiza ni imwe muri moteri y’iterambere ryihuse, ni yo mpamvu ahanyujijwe kaburimbo mu bihugu byacu bya Afurika, agaciro k’ikibanza kiwegereye kazamuka bitajenjetse, ubucuruzi bunini n’ubuciriritse bikahaza.
Guhera mu kinyejana cya 21, u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga mu kuvana mu bwigunge ibice byabwo bitandukanye, bwubaka imihanda igezweho ya gari ya moshi zihuta (high-speed railway).
Mu mwaka wa 2000, nta muhanda wa gari ya moshi yihuta (high-speed railway) n’umwe u Bushinwa bwagiraga. Gari ya moshi zahakoraga inyinshi zari iza kera zishaje zimwe zicumba umwotsi, zangiza ibidukikje ku buryo washoboraga kuva mu ntara imwe ujya mu yindi, bikagutwara iminsi n’iminsi.
Inkuru yarahindutse, ubu u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku Isi gifite imihanda myinshi ya gari ya moshi zihuta. Iyo mihanda ibarirwa ibilometero nibura 37.900. Kimwe cya kabiri cy’iyi mihanda cyubatswe mu myaka itanu ishize.
Icyerekezo cy’u Bushinwa ni ukuba bwubatse nibura ibilometero 70.000 bitarenze umwaka wa 2035. Myinshi muri iyo mihanda gari ya moshi zikoresha umuvudulo wa kilometero 350 ku isaha. Mu mwaka wa 2020, ibice 75 % by’imijyi yo mu Bushinwa byari byaragejejwemo imihanda ya gari ya moshi yihuta.
U Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cyonyine ku Isi cyabashije kugera ku iterambere rihambaye mu bijyanye na gari yamoshi zihuta kuko nk’u Bwongereza bufite kilometero 107 gusa mu gihe nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifatwa nk’igihugu cya mbere gikize ku Isi, gifite umuhanda umwe wa gari ya moshi yihuta kandi nawo izinyuramo zigendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 240 ku isaha, bivuze ko gariyamoshi zo mu Bushinwa ziri imbere ho ibilometero 100 kandi ari na nyinshi birenze.
Muri uku kwezi, u Bushinwa bwashyize hanze ubwoko bushya bwa gari ya moshi yihuta (bullet train) ikoresha amashanyarazi gusa. Ni ukuvuga ko ntaho ihuriye na zimwe za kera zakoreshaga amakara, izikoresha ibikomoka kuri peteroli n’ibindi byangiza ibidukukije. Ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku isi cyabashije kubigeraho.
Iyo gari ya moshi nshya y’amashanyarazi ishobora kugendera ku muvuduko wa kilometero 160 ku isaha. Ni ukuvuga ko ihagurutse i Kigali saa Mbili za mu gitondo, saa Mbili n’iminota 50 yaba yageze i Rubavu mu ntera y’ibilometero 148.
Igisirikare kiyingayinga icya Amerika
Iterambere ryose rituruka ku mutekano, ni yo mpamvu u Bushinwa bwashyize imbaraga nyinshi mu kubaka inzego zabwo z’umutekano by’umwihariko igisirikare cyizwi nk’icya rubanda, People’s Liberation Army (PLA). Ibyo bigaragarira mu ngengo y’imari igisirikare gikoresha yiyongereye mu myaka ishize.
Igisirikare cy’u Bushinwa kandi cyiza mu bya mbere bikoresha ikoranabuhanga cyane cyane imashini zikoresha ubwenge bw’ubukorano (AI), misile zishobora gushwanyaguza ubwato bw’intambara mu gihe gito (anti-ship ballistic missiles) n’ibindi.
Nko kugeza mu 2018, igisirikare cy’u Bushinwa cyazaga ku mwanya wa kabiri mu gukoresha amafaranga menshi ku mwaka kuko cyakoreshaga nibura miliyari 239 z’amadolari, gikurikiye icya Amerika gikoresha miliyari 634 ku mwaka nkuko byatangajwe na Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI). Ni inyongera ikomeye kuko mu 1998, Igisirikare cy’u Bushinwa cyakoreshaga ku mwaka ingengo y’imari ya miliyari 38 z’amadolari.
Iki gisirikare kandi cyongereye ubushobozi bwacyo mu bijyanye n’ubwirinzi mu kirere, indege z’intambara kandi zikomeye ndetse na drones z’ikoreshwa mu butasi.
Mu 2015, Ikigo cy’Abanyamerika RAND Corporation cyatangaje ko nibura kimwe cya kabiri cy’indege z’intambara u Bushinwa butunze ari izigezweho.
ki gisirikare bivugwa ko gifite ibisasu bishobora kuraswa bikagera ku bwato bw’intambara bwa Amerika buherereye mu Burengerazuba bw’Inyanja ya Pacifique.
U Bushinwa buri gukora misile zihuta cyane ku kigero gisumba cyane umuvuduko w’ijwi ku buryo byagora umwanzi kubona umwanya wo kwitegura guhangana nabyo mu gihe byaba birashwe. U Burusiya ni bwo bwonyine bwari butunze ubwo bwoko bw’ibisasu buzwi nka Hypersonic Missiles.
Mu myaka yatambutse, igisirikare cy’u Bushinwa cyakoreshaga nyinshi mu ntwaro zakorewe mu Burusiya ariko ubu byarahindutse, inyinshi zikorerwa mu nganda z’imbere mu gihugu. Igisirikare cyateje imbere umubano na Kaminuza zikomeye ku buryo ikorwa ry’intwaro mu Bushinwa rihorana udushya mu ikoranabuhanga.
Raporo ya SIPRI yo mu 2020, ivuga ko u Bushinwa bushobora kuba buri ku mwanya wa kabiri mu gukora intwaro nyinshi ku isi, nyinshi muri izo zikagurishwa mu bihugu biri mu nzira y’Amajyambere.
Mu mwaka wa 2017, Perezida w’u Bushinwa Xi Jinping yatangaje ko igisirikare cy’igihugu cye gifite intego yo kuba ari intangarugero mu mwaka wa 2049.
Ibihugu bikize byarakangaranye
Amagambo make, ibikorwa byinshi ni wo murongo u Bushinwa bufite. Kubera guceceka cyane, akenshi ibihugu bikomeye byisanga icyo gihugu cyageze ku bintu bidasanzwe ku buryo hari impungenge ko bishobora kwisanga byanyuzweho mu nzego zose.
U Bushinwa burajwe ishinga no kurushaho gufungura imiryango binyuze mu bufatanye mpuzamahanga, ahanini mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere, bigakorwa muri politiki itari iya gikoloni ahubwo ishingiye ku bwubahane
Iki gihugu mu 2013 cyatangije umushinga wo kubaka ibikorwa remezo bihuza imigabane yose y’Isi, umushinga wiswe Belt and Road Initiative.
Muri uyu mushinga, u Bushinwa bwiyemeje gutanga inkunga mu kubaka ibikorwa
remezo birimo imihanda ya gariyamoshi, ibyambu, imirongo migari ya internet, itumanaho, imihanda n’ibindi bituma imigenderanire n’urujya n’uruza byoroha mu batuye isi. Uyu mushinga ureba cyane ibihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere.
Numara kujya mu bikorwa, uzasiga iki gihugu kiri ku mwanya wa mbere ku Isi mu bukungu byongere n’ijambo ryabwo mu ruhando mpuzamahanga. Biteganyijwe ko uyu mushinga uzahuza kimwe cya kabiri cy’abatuye Isi, byongere amahirwe y’ishoramari n’ubucuruzi. Ibihugu bisaga ijana byamaze gusinyana amasezerano n’u Bushinwa muri uwo mushinga.
Ibihugu birimo iby’i Burayi na Amerika byatangiye kureba ikijisho u Bushinwa kubera uwo mushinga ushobora gusiga nta jambo bigifite mu bukungu no mu buryo bwa politiki. Mu nama iherutse yahuje ibihugu bikize ku Isi (G7), byarwanyije cyane u Bushinwa ndetse bitangiza undi mushinga wo kubaka ibikorwa remezo bihuza isi mu guca intege uw’u Bushinwa.
Mu gihe umuvuduko u Bushinwa buriho mu iterambere waba ukomeje, iki gihugu biteganyijwe ko mu 2030 kizaba ari icya mbere gikize ku Isi n’umutungo wa miliyari ibihumbi 38 z’amadolari. Buzaba bukurikirwa na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na miliyari ibihumbi 23 z’amadolari, u Buhinde buri ku mwanya wa gatatu.
Amb. Karega yahawe igihembo cy’ibikorwa by’indashyikirwa.
Iki gihembo yagishyikirijwe kuri uyu wa 1 Nyakanga 2021. Mu mpamvu zatumye iki kigo kimugenera igihembo harimo kuba by’umwihariko yaragaragaje ubushobozi n’ibikorwa by’ingirakamaro haba mu rwego rwa politiki, dipolomasi, ubuyobozi n’ibindi bya kimuntu.
Nk’uko bigaragara kuri iki gihembo mu magambo yanditseho, ikigo Panorama cyasobanuye ko Karega yagize uruhare mu gushimangira umubano muri dipolomasi y’ibihugu byombi, amateka n’ubufatanye bw’abaturage b’ibihugu byombi.
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Twitter, Ambasaderi Karega yavuze ko yatunguwe kandi ko yishimiye iki gihembo n’uburyo yazirikanwe n’iki kigo.
Ahawe iki gihembo mu gihe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka bamwe mu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga n’ibinyamakuru muri RDC bamwibasiye bamushinja ubugizi bwa nabi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’Ikinyamakuru cyitwa Business et Finances cyo muri RDC, Karega yavuze ko byari ibihuha bidafite ishingiro byakwirakwijwe n’abafite inyungu atazi izo ari zo.
Ambasaderi Vincent Karega amaze umwaka urengaho amezi make ahagarariye u Rwanda muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, inshingano nk’izi akaba yarazibayemo no muri Afurika y’Epfo.
RDC ni cyo gihugu yavukiyemo anagikuriramo kuko ababyeyi be bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda ari ho bari batuye akaba yarahavuye afite imyaka 27 agaruka mu Rwanda mu 1995 avuye muri Afurika y’Epfo aho yari atuye nk’umwenegihugu wa Zaïre y’icyo gihe.
Avuga adategwa indimi eshatu zikoreshwa muri Congo zirimo Igifaransa, Igiswahili n’Ilingala naho igi-Tshiluba n’Ikikongo akazivuga mu buryo bworoheje.
Impaka muri Loni ubwo u Rwanda n’u Burundi byangaga kumvira amahanga ngo bibe igihugu kimwe.
Imyaka 59 irashize ibihugu byombi bibonye ubwigenge, bwabanjirijwe n’imyaka ibiri y’inkundura bisaba kuva mu maboko y’u Bubiligi, Umuryango w’Abibumbye ukabanza kubisaba kwihuza kugira ngo bitazawurushya.
Mu 1960 Congo ikimara kubona ubwigenge, nibwo u Burundi n’u Rwanda byari bimaze imyaka ari indagizo Loni yahaye u Bubiligi, byihutishije umushinga wo kwigenga kwabyo. Ni inkundura yari irimbanyije no mu bindi bihugu byinshi bya Afurika nyuma y’imyaka y’ubukoloni.
By’umwihariko mu Rwanda, hari hari ibibazo bikomeye n’imvururu zaterwaga n’amashyaka y’Abahutu yari ashyigikiwe n’u Bubiligi yari amaze iminsi ahiritse ubwami akanirukana umwami mu gihugu, ikibazo Loni yizeho bikarangira ikiburiye umwanzuro.
Kwihutisha uwo mushinga w’ubwigenge ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, raporo za Loni muri iyo myaka zigaragaza ko byari uburyo bwo gushyira igitutu kuri Loni ngo yemere ubutegetsi bushya bwari buherutse gushyirwaho na Parmehutu ya Grégoire Kayibanda, bityo mu maso y’amahanga u Rwanda rugaragare nka Repubulika, ikibazo cy’ubwami n’Umwami kiburizwemo.
Umwaka wa 1962, ibiganiro bigamije guha ubwigenge u Rwanda n’u Burundi byafashe indi ntera. Inteko rusange ya Loni yateranye tariki 23 Gashyantare 1962 yafashe imyanzuro itandukanye ku kibazo cy’u Rwanda n’u Burundi kugira ngo bibashe kubona ubwigenge.
Loni yatoye ko kugira ngo “ejo hazaza h’u Rwanda harambirije mu kwihuza nk’igihugu kimwe gihuje ubukungu, igisirikare n’ububanyi n’amahanga ariko ntibivaneho ubuzima gatozi bwa buri kimwe nk’u Rwanda n’u Burundi.”
Icyo gihe Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni yasabwe gushyiraho Komisiyo igamije gufasha mu guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe haba mu Rwanda n’u Burundi, gukurikirana iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu n’ubwo gutanga ibitekerezo, iyubahirizwa ry’umutekano n’amategeko, gutegura uko ibihugu byagira igisirikare n’inzego zabyo zishinzwe umutekano, gukurikirana itahuka ry’impunzi n’ibindi.
Hasabwe ko iyo Komisiyo itegura mu maguru mashya inama ikabera Addis Abeba u Rwanda n’u Burundi bigahararirwa n’abantu batanu kuri buri ruhande, bakigira hamwe uburyo ibihugu byombi byakwihuza bikavamo kimwe kizahabwa ubwigenge.
Byari bigiye kwihuza na Congo cyangwa Tanganyika
Ibihugu bihuriye mu muryango Commonwealth, ibya Aziya na Afurika byari bishyigikiye ko u Rwanda n’u Burundi biba igihugu kimwe.
Ikibazo gikomeye ibyo bihugu byagaragazaga ku gutandukana k’u Rwanda n’u Burundi, ni uburyo ari ibihugu bikennye, bitagira abakozi b’inzobere, abasirikare n’abapolisi babyo bwite ku buryo gutatanya imbaraga byari kuba ikibazo gikomeye. Amahanga na Loni ngo byari kuyagora kujya abona amafaranga yo guha buri gihugu nk’inkunga.
Ibaruwa Canada yandikiye umunyamabanga wungirije wa Loni ushinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga ku wa 24 Mutarama 1962, ivuga ko kuba nta bukungu buri gihugu cyari gifite buhagije, na byo babibonaga nk’ikibazo ngo buri kimwe kizabashe kwibeshaho. Canada yumvaga ko kuba u Rwanda n’u Burundi byaba igihugu kimwe bizoroshya imikoreshereze y’ingengo y’imari.
Canada yavuze ko iyo muri Congo haba hatarabayeyo imvururu, ngo baba barashyize igitutu ku Rwanda n’u Burundi bikemera kwihuza na yo bikaba igihugu kimwe gifatika. Icyo ntabwo cyari kigishobotse kuko Congo itari ikigaragara nk’iyo kwizerwa kubera imvururu zabaye hicwa Abasirikare b’Ababiligi byanihutishije gahunda yayo yo kubona ubwigenge. IKindi ni uko na Congo ubwayo yari yatangiye gucikamo ibice.
Muri raporo za Loni, ntabwo hagaragazwa neza icyo u Rwanda n’u Burundi byashingiragaho byanga kwihuza, icyakora mu ibaruwa ya Canada, bigaragara ko hari ibindi bihugu byari byatangiye kwegera u Rwanda n’u Burundi ngo bibe igihugu kimwe.
Hari amakuru y’uko Moïse Tshombe warwaniraga ukwigenga kwa Katanga yiyomoye kuri Congo, yaba yaregereye u Rwanda n’u Burundi abyumvisha ko bazihuza bagakora igihugu kimwe gihuje u Rwanda na Katanga n’u Burundi. Ni ubusabe bwashobokaga kuko Katanga yabisabaga ari intara ikungahaye ku mutungo kamere.
Andi makuru yari ay’uko Julius Nyerere yari yatangiye kwegera u Rwanda n’u Burundi abisaba kwihuza na Tanganyika bikaba igihugu kimwe. Tanganyika yari itarihuza na Zanzibar ngo bibyare Tanzania. Canada yavuze ko yabiganiriyeho n’u Bubiligi, bukagaragaza ko icyo cyifuzo cyaba ari cyiza kandi bazagishyigikira.
Byanavugwaga ko ibihugu byombi bishobora kwihuza na Uganda, Tanganyika na Kenya bigakora Leta ihuriweho ya East Africa.
Impamvu ibihugu byinshi bya Afurika byari bishyigikiye ko u Rwanda n’u Burundi biba igihugu kimwe, ni uko mu buso byari ibihugu bito kandi bikennye ku buryo hashobora kujya hahoramo amakimbirane ashingiye ku bukene. Ikindi ntabwo ibihugu bya Afurika byashakaga ko ikomeza gucikagurikamo uduce twinshi.
Bakekaga ko uko gucikamo ibice k’u Rwanda n’u Burundi kwihishwe inyuma n’u Bubuligi bwari bufitanye umubano mwiza na Guverinoma ya Parmehutu yariho mu Rwanda mu gihe ku ruhande rw’u Burundi Guverinoma y’Umwami Mwambutsa IV batacanaga uwaka.
Mu nteko rusange yo ku wa 9 Gashyantare 1962, Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bubiligi yavuze ko bashyigikiye ugutandukana kw’ibihugu byombi. Impamvu yatanze, ni uko ngo imyumvire y’abanyapolitiki mu bihugu byombi yari itandukanye bityo ko kubahatira kumvikana byaba ‘ntaho bitaniye n’ubundi bukoloni bari kwirukana’.
Mu nama ya Commonwealth yabaye tariki 18 Mutarama, abari bahagarariye Australia barwanyije igitekerezo cyo gutandukana k’u Rwanda n’u Burundi, basaba ko habaho uburyo bwo guhuza abayobozi ku mpande zombi bakabyumvikanaho uko byagenda kose.
Uwo munsi u Buhinde bwavuze ko byaba ari ‘ishyano’ kwemera ko habaho uduhugu duto gutyo kandi mbere twari igihugu kimwe.
Nubwo amahanga yakomeje gushyira igitutu ku Rwanda n’u Burundi ngo byemere kuba igihugu kimwe, abari bahagarariye ibihugu byombi ntibigeze babyemera. Mu biganiro byahurije hamwe intumwa z’ibihugu byombi n’iza Komisiyo yari yashyizweho na Loni bikabera Addis Abeba muri Ethiopia, ibihugu byombi byakomeje gutsimbarara gusa bigaragara ko bizemera guhuza za gasutamo n’ibijyanye n’ubukungu.
Ntabwo mu myanzuro y’izo nama za Addis Abeba hagaragara neza icyashingirwagaho u Rwanda n’u Burundi byanga kwihuza, icyakora imiyoborere ya buri kimwe ishobora kuba yarabigizemo uruhare.
U Burundi bwari mu maboko y’abatutsi mu gihe u Rwanda rwari mu maboko y’Abahutu. Byari bigoye ku Bahutu mu Rwanda bari bari ku butegetsi nyuma y’iminsi mike bahiritse ubwami bashinjaga kubaheza ngo bemere kuyoborwa n’Abatutsi bavuye mu Burundi. Ikindi ku Burundi byari bigoye ko Umwami Mwambutsa na Leta ye bemera guhara ubutegetsi ngo babusigire Abahutu bo mu Rwanda.
Kugenda kw’ingabo z’u Bubiligi byabaye ihurizo
Ikindi kibazo cyabaye insobe mu biganiro byaganishije ku bwigenge bw’u Rwanda n’u Burundi, ni ukugenda kw’ingabo z’u Bubiligi zari zishinzwe umutekano mu bihugu byombi.
Umwami w’u Burundi Mwambutsa yashakaga ko ingabo za Loni ziguma mu gihugu cye ariko abo bategekana batabishaka. Byatumye mu biganiro bya Addis Abeba aho u Burundi bwari buhagarariwe na Minisitiri w’Intebe, bwamaganye icyemezo cyo kugumisha ingabo za Loni mu gihugu. U Rwanda rwo rwarifashe cyane, ruvuga ko ruzabyigaho rukareba niba bitaba ngombwa ko zihaguma cyangwa se zikahava.
Impungenge zari zihari, kwari uko ibihugu byombi nta ngabo byari bifite ku buryo ikibazo cy’umutekano cyavuka nyuma yo kugenda kw’Ababiligi, nta bushobozi byari kubona bwo guhangana na cyo.
Ikinyamakuru Le Monde muri Gashyantare 1962 cyatangaje ko ibihugu by’aba-Communistes byashakaga ko ingabo z’u Bubiligi zihita zivanwa mu Rwanda n’u Burundi, ahubwo Loni igashyiraho uburyo bufasha gutoza abasirikare b’ibyo bihugu bazahita bafata inshingano Ababiligi bakihava mbere y’ubwigenge.
Loni yo yatangarije ibyo bihugu ko u Rwanda n’u Burundi nibitemera ko ingabo z’u Bubiligi zihaguma, nta mafaranga izabiha yo kubifasha gutoza no kwita ku mutekano wabyo kuko nta bushobozi ibifitiye.
Byakomeje kuzurungutana kugeza ubwo tariki 27 Kamena 1962, Inteko rusange ya Loni yatoye umwanzuro uvuga ko u Bubiligi bwambuwe inshingano zo kurebera u Rwanda n’u Burundi nk’indagizo bwahawe na Loni, bityo ko ibihugu bihawe ubwigenge buzatangira kubahirizwa tariki 1 Nyakanga uwo mwaka.
Ingabo z’u Bubiligi zahawe kuba zahavuye bitarenze Kanama 1962 kandi Loni igahita yohereza intumwa ziyihagararira mu Rwanda gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’iyo myanzuro no gufasha ibyo bihugu bishya kwisuganya mu nzego zitandukanye z’iterambere.
Ibihugu byombi hemejwe ko bizakomeza gukorera hamwe ku bijyanye n’ubukungu nka gasutamo n’imicungire y’amafaranga, Banki nkuru ikomeza kuba Banque d’Emission du Rwanda et du Burundi (BERB) yari iherereye i Bujumbura. Tariki ya 1 Mutarama 1964 nibwo ibihugu byombi byatandukanye mu by’ubukungu, buri cyose kigira Banki yacyo na gasutamo.
Umurwa Mukuru w’u Burundi byemejwe ko ukomeza kuba Bujumbura mu gihe u Rwanda rwahisemo Kigali kuko ariho hagaragaraga nko hagati mu gihugu. Kubera ko mu Rwanda nta kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga cyahabaga, u Burundi bwemeye ko Abanyarwanda bazakomeza gukoresha ikibuga cy’indege cya Bujumbura kugeza babonye icyabo kiri ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Ngirente yitabiriye ibirori by’Isabukuru y’Ubwigenge bw’u Burundi.
Abarundi n’inshuti zabo kuri uyu wa 1 Nyakanga 2021, bitabiriye Ibirori ngarukamwaka byo kwizihiza Umunsi Mukuru w’Ubwigenge mu Burundi, bibera ku Gicumbi cy’Intwari Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore ufatwa nk’intwari yaharaniye Ubwigenge bw’Abarundi.
Tariki ya 1 Nyakanga ni nayo u Rwanda rwaboneyeho ubwigenge, nyuma y’igihe ibihugu byombi bikolonijwe n’u Bubiligi.
Ibiro bya Minisitiri w’Intebe byagize biti “Minisitiri w’Intebe, Dr Ngirente Edouard yageze i Bujumbura guhagararira Perezida Kagame mu birori byo kwizihiza isabukuru y’imyaka 59 y’Ubwigenge bwa Repubulika y’u Burundi.”
Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Ngirente ubwo yageraga ku Kibuga cy’Indege cyitiriwe Melchior Ndadaye yakiriwe na Visi Perezida w’u Burundi, Prosper Bazombanza.
Bahaye icyubahiro Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore
Ibirori byo kwizihiza Ubwigenge mu Burundi, byabimburiwe no guha icyubahiro Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore, aho abanyacyubahiro bayobowe n’Umukuru w’Igihugu, Gen. Évariste Ndayishimiye bashyize indabo ahari imva ye.
Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore yagizwe Minisitiri w’Intebe mbere gato y’Ubwigenge ariko araswa nyuma y’amezi atandatu n’umucuruzi w’umugereki wari kumwe n’abarundi batatu, kuri hoteli i Bujumbura, ku wa 13 Ukwakira 1961. Ni mbere y’amezi make ngo hatangazwe ubwigenge ku wa 1 Nyakanga 1962.
Rwagasore ni umwe mu ntwari z’Abarundi ndetse yanitiriwe Stade Nkuru y’Igihugu. Afite amashuri n’imihanda yagiye imwitirirwa. Rwagasore yari umuhungu mukuru w’Umwami Mwambutsa IV.
Sarkozy utaranyuzwe no kwirengagizwa na Macron i Kigali babiganiriyeho.
Agahinda ka Nicolas Sarkozy katumye nyuma y’iminsi ine Macron avuye mu Rwanda, amutumira mu biro bya Perezida (Elysée), babiganiraho.
Ikinyamakuru Opinion cyatangaje ko Sarkozy yababajwe n’uburyo atatumiwe ngo aherekeze mugenzi we mu ruzinduko rw’amateka yagiriye i Kigali, akaba ataranakomojweho mu ijambo yahavugiye uwo munsi, ryagaragaje ukwicuza no kwemera uruhare igihugu cye cyagize muri politiki yagejeje kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu baherekeje Macron i Kigali harimo abayobozi batandukanye mu nzego nkuru z’u Bufaransa nka Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Jean-Yves Le Drian n’abandi barimo n’abashoramari bashaka gutangira gukorera mu Rwanda.
Harimo kandi abantu bazi amateka y’u Rwanda nka Gen Jean Varret wahoze ari Umuyobozi ukuriye Ibikorwa bya Gisirikare by’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda hagati ya 1990 na 1993.
Kwinuba kwa Sarkozy gufite imizi mu kuba ari we Perezida wa mbere w’u Bufaransa wasuye u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside mu 2010, akemera ko igihugu cye cyakoze amakosa.
Nubwo igihu hagati y’u Bufaransa n’u Rwanda cyakomeje nyuma ya Sarkozy kubera politiki, uyu mugabo yakomeje kugaragaza ko yumva u Rwanda n’ingaruka z’ubufasha igihugu cye cyahaye abakoze Jenoside.
Na nyuma yo kuva ku buyobozi yakomeje gusura u Rwanda ndetse tariki 5 Gicurasi 2021 abinyujije muri Le Point, Sarkozy yasabye Macron gusura u Rwanda kandi akahava asabye imbabazi kuko gukomeza gutegereza birambiranye.
Umwe mu ba hafi ba Sarkozy yabwiye Opinion ko ‘yatunguwe cyane n’iyi myitwarire’ ya Macron yo kutamutumira ngo bajyane i Kigali, yanahagera ntagaragaze ko hari mugenzi we wagerageje kubyutsa umubano mbere ye nubwo bitakunze neza.
Macron agihaguruka mu Rwanda, Sarkozy yanze kuripfana atangira kugaragaza akababaro ke. Byatumye tariki 31 Gicurasi Macron amutumira basasa inzobe baraganira. Muri icyo kiganiro, Macron yamubwiye ko imbwirwaruhame yavugiye mu Rwanda yifuzaga ko iba rusange aho kwibanda ku bantu ku giti cyabo, ari nayo mpamvu atamukomojeho.
Bamwe mu ba hafi ba Macron batangaje ko ibiganiro by’abo bombi byagenze neza kandi babyishimiye.
Uruzinduko rwa Emmanuel Macron mu Rwanda rwafunguye amarembo y’imibanire myiza hagati y’ibihugu byombi, nyuma y’imyaka 27 yo kurebana ay’ingwe kuko icyo gihugu kitemeraga uruhare rwacyo muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Kuva yava ku buyobozi, Sarkozy yakomeje gushimangira umubano mwiza n’u Rwanda; by’umwihariko akunda kurangira abashoramari b’Abafaransa ingeri bashoramo imari yabo mu Rwanda.
Ku wa 15 Mutarama 2018, yagiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda anabonana na Perezida Kagame. Ni urugendo yazanyemo n’Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo gikora Ubwikorezi bw’ibicuruzwa byambuka imipaka mu ndege, ku butaka no mu mazi, Cyrille Bolloré.
Umusaruro wavuye muri uru ruzinduko, ni uko Vivendi Group, ikigo gishamikiye kuri Bolloré Holdings ya Cyrille Bolloré cyemeye gushora imari ya miliyoni 40 z’amadolari ya Amerika mu bikorwa bitandukanye bizakorerwa muri Kigali Cultural Village i Rebero mu Karere ka Kicukiro.
Hari n’amakuru avuga ko Sarkozy yaba yaragize uruhare mu koroshya ibikorwa byo gusinya amasezerano y’imikoranire hagati y’u Rwanda na PSG.
Bivugwa ko byaba byarashingiye ku mubano afitanye na QSi iyoborwa na Al-Khelaifi ari na we Perezida wa PSG cyane ko uyu wahoze ari Perezida w’u Bufaransa ariwe watumye igurwa ry’iyi kipe ryoroha.
Ibidasanzwe mu byaranze uruzinduko rwa Tshisekedi i Rubavu na Kagame i Goma.
Ku munsi wa nyuma w’iyo nama yabereye muri Kigali Convention Centre ikitabirwa n’abasaga 1800 mu 2019, Tshisekedi yavuze ko ibyo abanyapolitiki bakwigira byose “ibihugu byacu [u Rwanda na Congo] bizahora bituranye”.
Uwabonye cyangwa wumvise u Rwanda na Congo ku bwa Joseph Kabila, biragoye kumwemeza ukuri kw’amashusho amaze iminsi acicikana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga y’abasirikare babiri, uw’u Rwanda na Congo basuhuzanya, bacunze umutekano mu bwubahane nta n’umwe usagariye undi.
Biragoye kumvisha uwo muntu ko Perezida Tshisekedi yasuye u Rwanda kuwa Gatanu, bugacya kuwa Gatandatu Perezida Kagame na we amusura, bakajyana kureba ingaruka zatewe n’iruka rya Nyiragongo ryanashegeshe u Rwanda mu kwezi gushize.
IGIHE yakusanyije bimwe mu bintu bidasanzwe byaranze uruzinduko rw’abakuru b’ibihugu byombi mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, bishimangira ko Abanyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo ari abavandimwe kurusha uko bamwe babitekereza.
Ubusabane mu bashinzwe kurinda umutekano
Ingabo z’u Rwanda na Congo mu myaka yashize, zahoraga zirebana ay’ingwe cyangwa se bagahura bakozanyaho bya hato na hato ku mupaka, umwe yakwibeshya akarenga ku rubibi rw’igihugu cye, imirwano ikarota.
Itsinda rishinzwe kugenzura imipaka y’u Rwanda na Congo, Expanded Joint Verification Mechanism (EJVM) ryari ryarahagorewe.
Ryahoraga mu mpaka zo guhosha umwuka mubi, ufite inkomoko mu myaka isaga 20 ishize ubwo Ingabo z’u Rwanda zambukaga muri icyo gihugu cya kabiri mu bunini muri Afurika, zigiye gusenya inkambi z’impunzi zari ziri kwisuganya ngo zigaruke guteza umutekano muke, nyuma y’aho benshi basize bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Kuri ubu uwo mwuka w’intambara ku mpande zombi warashize, ibyo bikagaragazwa n’amashusho ndetse n’amafoto yakwirakwijwe mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize, agaragaza umusirikare w’u Rwanda n’uwa Congo bahagararanye ku burinzi ntawe usagariye mugenzi we.
Hari andi mashusho yakoze benshi ku mutima, y’umusirikare w’u Rwanda n’uwa Congo ku nkengero z’ikiyaga cya Kivu, aho umusirikare w’u Rwanda asanga uwa Congo akamusuhuza (bimwe urubyiruko rwita gutanga chance), bakaganira gato imbere yabo mu mazi hari ubwato bugenda.
Ni ikimenyetso cy’uko umugani wa Tshisekedi, abanyapolitiki b’ibihugu byombi babishatse batahiriza umugozi umwe mu gushaka amahoro, akaba umusingi w’iterambere ry’abaturage b’ibihugu byombi, aho gushora imari mu ntambara ‘isenya itubaka’.
Ntabwo ari kenshi Umukuru w’Igihugu kimwe ashobora gusura ikindi, ngo bucye uwo yasuye amwishyura. Akenshi biterwa n’uko imyiteguro ikomeye ibanziriza uruzinduko rwa Perezida, ifata igihe.
Mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize si ko byagenze, kuko ubwo Perezida Tshisekedi yasozaga uruzinduko rw’umunsi umwe yagiriye mu karere ka Rubavu ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, Perezida Kagame yazindutse kuwa Gatandatu amusura mu Mujyi wa Goma, banajyana kureba ingaruka zatewe n’Iruka ry’Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo.
Ibi ubwabyo bitanga ubutumwa bukomeye. Icya mbere ni uko kwa kwishishanya hagati y’ibihugu byombi kwashize, aho igihe cyose umuyobozi ashakiye gusura mugenzi we, ashobora kubikora kandi bigakunda.
Ikindi ni icyizere Perezida Kagame afitiye ubuyobozi bwa Congo, ku buryo yemera gusura agace nka Goma kari muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru, yakunze kuvugwamo umutekano muke uterwa n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro irimo n’igamije guhungabanya u Rwanda.
Ni icyizere kandi n’umusanzu ku ngamba Tshisekedi aherutse gufata zo guhashya iyo mitwe, byanatumye ubuyobozi bwa Kivu y’Amajyepfo n’Amajyaruguru bushyirwa mu maboko y’igisirikare.
Perezida Kagame yavuze Igifaransa
Ntabwo ari kenshi Perezida Kagame yagiye yumvikana mu ruhame avuga Igifaransa, inshuro zose yabikoze byabaga bifite igisobanuro gikomeye, yishimye cyangwa ashaka gutanga ubutumwa bukomeye.
Inshuro yibukwa ni tariki 7 Mata 2014 muri Stade Amahoro, ubwo yagarukaga ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu muhango wo Kwibuka Jenoside ku nshuro ya 20.
Perezida Kagame wavuze ijambo mu gihe umubano w’ibihugu byombi wari ukirimo agatotsi, yavuze ijambo ry’Igifaransa ryabaye ikimenyabose aho yagize ati “les faits sont têtus” [Ibimenyetso birivugira].
Indi nshuro ni mu Ugushyingo 2018 ubwo yari Erevan muri Armenia mu nama ya Francophonie.
Mu muhango wo kwishimira intsinzi ya Mushikiwabo mbere y’uko atangira inshingano ze nk’Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa OIF, Perezida Kagame yahishuye uko ari i Erevan yavuze Igifaransa mu kuranga uyu wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga.
Ati “None se n’icya ‘on est ensemble’ cyananira? Louise ‘a dit qu’on est ensemble’.”
Kuba kuri uyu wa Gatandatu yarongeye avugira Igifaransa i Goma, ururimi ubundi adakunze gukoresha dore ko yigeze kuvuga ko rumugora.
Na Tshisekedi ubwe yaratangaye ubwo Perezida Kagame yavugaga ati “Monsieur le president, vraiment je vous remercie” [Nyakubahwa Perezida, ni ukuri ndabashimira].”
Umwambaro mushya ku basirikare barinda Perezida Kagame
Ingabo zishinzwe kurinda Umukuru w’Igihugu [Republican Guards) nazo zaserukanye umucyo mu ruzundiko Tshisekedi yagiriye mu Rwanda n’urwo Perezida Kagame yagiriye muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Ahanini izo ngabo zari zimenyerwe mu ipantalo z’umukara n’ishati zijya gusa n’ubururu bw’ikirere, bakarenzaho gillets z’umukara. Hari ubwo kandi bajyaga bagaragara bambaye amakositimu asanzwe.
Mu cyumweru gishize byari byahindutse. Haba i Rubavu n’i Goma, izi ngabo zagaragaye mu mwambaro mushya. Ni ukuvuga amapantalo y’imikara, imipira y’imikara inyuma barengejeho gillets za kaki.
Ni ubwa mbere bari bagaragaye muri iyo myenda, ijya kumera nk’iy’abarinda Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Israel.
Perezida Kagame yatwaye Tshisekedi mu modoka
Tapi itukura, icyubahiro cya gisirikare n’ibindi ni bimwe bisanzwe bimenyerewe ku mukuru w’igihugu wasuye mugenzi we, icyakora si kenshi Perezida akunze kugaragara ari mu modoka kuri ‘volant’ atwaye mugenzi we.
Mu ruzinduko Tshisekedi yagiriye mu Rwanda kuwa Gatanu, Perezida Kagame yamutwaye mu modoka bagenda baganira ubwo bajyaga gusura ibikorwa remezo byangijwe n’imitingito yakurikiye iruka ry’Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo ryabaye ku wa 22 Gicurasi 2021.
Si kenshi Perezida Kagame akunze kugaragara yitwaye mu modoka cyangwa atwaye mugenzi we wamusuye, icyakora nanone si ubwa mbere. Gusa inshuro nke byabaye hari mu Ukuboza 2016 ubwo umwami wa Maroc, Mohammed VI yasuraga u Rwanda.
Muri Gashyantare 2018 ubwo Perezida Ali Bongo wa Gabon yasuraga u Rwanda, nabwo Perezida Kagame yagaragaye amutwaye mu modoka. Muri Werurwe 2019, Kagame yongeye gutwara mu modoka Uhuru Kenyatta wa Kenya mu ruzinduko rw’umunsi umwe yagiriye mu Rwanda.
Muri Mata uwo mwaka, nabwo Perezida Kagame yatwaye mu modoka Umuyobozi w’Ikirenga wa Qatar, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al-Thani wari wasuye u Rwanda.
Ubufatanye mu gucukura no gutunganya zahabu
Wumvise ibivugwa n’abanyapolitiki batavuga rumwe na Leta ya Congo cyangwa se abandi batifuza ko umubano w’ibihugu byombi wasagamba, watekereza ko gufatanya by’umwihariko mu bijyanye n’iby’amabuye y’agaciro ari sakirirego hagati y’u Rwanda na Congo.
Umuhanda mwiza cyangwa inzu nziza yuzuye i Kigali, uzasanga bavuga ngo ni ‘amabuye ya Congo’. Ni ibintu u Rwanda rwakunze guhakana kenshi nyamara bidasiba kugaragara muri raporo za Loni ku mutekano wo mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo. Icyiza ni uko Leta ya Congo nta na rimwe yo ubwayo irabishinja u Rwanda.
Kubera ayo makuru ahora mu kirere, nta wakekaga ko kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ibihugu byombi bishobora gusinya amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu kwimakaza umucyo mu bucukuzi n’ubucuruzi bwa Zahabu hagamijwe guhashya ubucuruzi bwayo bukorwa n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikorera muri RDC.
Ibigo bibiri, Sakima yo muri RDC na Dither SA yo mu Rwanda nibyo bizagenzura urugendo rwose kuva mu gucukura zahabu bizakorwa na Sakima kugeza mu kuyitunganya bizakorwa na Dither SA, hirindwa ko yakomeza kujya mu maboko y’imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikoresha amafaranga yavuye muri ayo mabuye y’agaciro, mu gukomeza guteza umutekano muke.
Uku kurenga ku bivugwa no ku byakabaye bitanya ibihugu byombi ahubwo bigashyira imbere ibibihuza, ni ikimenyetso cy’uko u Rwanda na Congo ari ibihugu ‘bivandimwe’, abaturanyi bahoraho byabishaka bitabishaka.
Dr Vincent Biruta yasabye urubyiruko rwa PSD gutinyuka kwiyamamaza mu matora y’inzego z’ibanze.
Ibi Dr Vincent Biruta yabisabye kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ya 19 Kamena 2021, mu mahugurwa y’iminsi ibiri y’urubyiruko n’abagore bo muri PSD agamije gushishikariza abagore n’urubyiruko kugira uruhare mu bikorwa bya politiki bikorerwa mu mutwe wa politiki n’ibiteza imbere Igihugu muri rusange.
Yagize ati “ Mu gihugu cyacu ubu harategurwa amatora y’inzego z’ibanze, iz’urubyiruko n’izabagore mukaba musabwa kubigiramo uruhare muharanira imigendekere myiza yayo ariko kandi munatinyuka kwiyamamaza ndetse mukanabishishikariza abandi.”
Yavuze ko kwiyamamaza biba bivuga ko umuntu aba yiteguye gutanga umusanzu we mu miyoborere y’Igihugu kandi yiyumvamo ubushobozi n’ubushake bwo gutanga umusanzu we mu kucyubaka.
Dr Biruta yashishikarije kandi abitabiriye inama, kwirinda no kudaha umwanya abakwirakwiza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga amakuru asebya leta y’u Rwanda, apfobya Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu 1994 n’andi yose adafite akamaro, ko ahubwo bakwiye guharanira ibiteza imbere igihugu.
Uhagarariye PSD mu Murenge wa Bwisige mu Karere ka Gicumbi, Munyaneza Vianney yabwiye IGIHE ko aya mahugurwa yatumye yiyumvamo ubushobozi n’ubushake bwo kwiyamamaza mu nzego zifata ibyemezo.
Ati “ Mbere urubyiruko twitinyaga kuko tutari twagasobanukiwe uburenganzira bwo kuba urubyiruko twajya mu nzego bwite za Leta zifata ibyemezo ariko aya mahugurwa twahawe agiye gutuma dushishikariza bagenzi bacu batari bagatinyutse gutera iyo ntambwe ijya imbere mu kwiyamamaza muri izo nzego zifata ibyemezo.”
Nibagwire Leonia na we uri mu bahuguwe yavuze ko bagomba kwiyamamaza kugira ngo bagire umusanzu batanga mu kubaka Igihugu.
Ati “ Kudushishikariza kwiyamamaza tujya mu myanya y’ubuyobozi ni kimwe mu bintu nk’abagore n’urubyiruko tugomba kwitabira kuko natwe tugomba gutanga umusanzu mu gihugu cyacu .”
Yongeyeho ko mbere inshuro nyinshi bitinyaga ariko aya mahugurwa yabatinyuye ku buryo babonye ko bashobora kwiyamamaza bagatanga umusanzu wubaka igihugu muri rusange.
Aya mahugurwa yitezweho kongerera abagore n’urubyiruko ubumenyi ku buhanga bwo kwiyamamariza kujya mu myanya y’ubuyobozi bw’umutwe wa politiki n’indi myanya y’ubuyobozi ifatirwamo ibyemezo hagamijwe kugira uruhare rugaragara mu nzego zinyuranye z’ubuyobozi, Gushishikariza abayoboke ba PSD gukomeza gushimangira ihame ry’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye, kwishyirahamwe hagamije kwiteza imbere, kwishakamo ibisubizo no kwigira ndetse no kuganira ku mategeko azagenga urugaga rw’urubyiruko n’urw’abagore rushamikiye kuri PSD.
U Rwanda rwamaganye ibyo kuba icyambu cy’amabuye ya magendu acukurwa muri RDC.
Raporo yakozwe kuri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo mu 2020, igashyikirizwa Perezida w’Akanama k’Umuryango w’Abibumbye gashinzwe Umutekano, yagaragaje ko kimwe mu bibazo bituma umutekano muri icyo gihugu utaboneka, ari imitwe y’iterabwoba n’inyeshyamba zikorera mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo, kandi zose zigatungwa n’amabuye y’agaciro zicuruza mu bihugu by’amahanga.
Bibarwa ko Uburasirazuba bwa Congo bukoreramo imitwe y’inyeshyamba irenga 130, yose ivuga ko ifite impamvu z’intambara imbere muri Congo ndetse no mu bihugu icyenda bihana imbibi na Congo.
Iyi mitwe imaze gutuma nibura abaturage bari hagati ya miliyoni enye n’eshanu bahungira imbere muri Congo, mu gihe abandi benshi bahungiye mu bihugu by’ibituranyi, byose biturutse ku bitero bisaga 100 byagabwe n’imitwe y’iterabwoba mu mwaka ushize.
Raporo yashyikirijwe Akanama k’Umuryango w’Abibumbye gashinzwe Umutekano, igaragaza ko imyinshi muri iyo mitwe ikura amikoro mu bikorwa by’ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ndetse ikavuga ko amwe muri ayo mabuye anyuzwa mu Rwanda mbere yo kujyanwa ku isoko mpuzamahanga, mu bihugu birimo u Bushinwa, Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu na Hong Kong.
Abakoze raporo ahanini bashingira ku byavuzwe n’ababahaye ubuhamya badatangaza amazina, bavuga ko ngo amabuye anyuzwa mu Rwanda kuko ari byo bihendutse, akinjira anyuze mu Kiyaga cya Kivu ndetse no ku mipaka ya Rubavu na Rusizi, avuye muri Kivu ya Ruguru n’iy’Epfo.
Batanze urugero rw’abantu batatu babwiye iri tsinda ryari mu bushakashatsi ko amabuye y’agaciro yabo bayacuruza ku bacuruzi banini bari i Goma, nabo baba bazayambutsa bakayageza mu Rwanda akajyanwa mu ndege.
Iyi raporo kandi ivuga ko mu Ukuboza 2020, sosiyete ya Avanish Sarl ikorera i Bukavu yohereje Sosiyete ya Al-Hallaq Jewellery LLC y’i Dubai ibiro 5 103 bya zahabu binyujijwe mu Rwanda, ndetse na sosiyete yitwa KMC Sarl, nayo ikorera i Bukavu, ngo ikaba yarohereje ibiro 4 795 bya zahabu kuri sosiyete ya Gold Fun Corporation Ltd y’i Hong Kong, kandi nabyo bikanyuzwa mu Rwanda.
U Rwanda rwabihakanye rwivuye inyuma
Nyuma yo kumva ibirego ku Rwanda, iri tsinda ryagerageje kuvugana n’uruhande rwarwo kugira ngo ryumve icyo u Rwanda rubivugaho, rubitera utwatsi.
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bike byemeye gusubiza kuri iyo raporo kuko ibindi byinshi byahisemo kwinumira burundu.
Muri iyi raporo harimo ko umwe mu bayobozi b’u Rwanda utarashatse ko amazina ye atangazwa, yagize ati “Nta na rimwe u Rwanda rwabonye amabuye ya magendu afite aho ahuriye na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo kuva mu Ugushyingo 2020 kugera muri Mata uyu mwaka.”
Ubusanzwe u Rwanda rufite inzego z’umutekano ku mupaka uruhuza na Congo zishinzwe gukurikirana no kurinda ko hari amabuye yaturuka muri icyo gihugu yinjira mu Rwanda.
Mu 2020, u Rwanda rwari rweretse iryo tsinda ry’abashakashatsi ko hari ibiro 155 bya Coltan rwafashe kuwa 23 Mutarama 2020, biturutse muri RDC mu buryo bwa magendu. Izi coltan zari zibitse mu Karere ka Rubavu.
Iri tsinda kandi ryaneretswe andi mabuye menshi yafatiwe hirya no hino mu gihugu kuva muri Kamena 2019. Yarimo ibiro 360 by’ayakekwaga ko ari beryllium, ibiro 293 bya cassiterite, ibiro 250 bya wolfram n’ibindi biro 54 bya coltan.
Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Muryango w’Abibumbye nayo yahakanye aya makuru y’icuruzwa ry’amabuye mu buryo bwa magendu, ndetse ibwira aba bashakashakatsi ko “RwandAir idafite ibyemezo by’uko ariyo yatwaye ayo mabuye ya magendu”.
Si ubwa mbere u Rwanda rugaragaza ko amakuru atangwa muri bene izi raporo ku bijyanye na magendu y’amabuye y’agaciro anyuzwa mu Rwanda atari ukuri kuko n’umwaka ushize, rwashimangiye ko bitemewe n’amategeko kurunyuzamo amabuye hatabanje kwerekanwa inkomoko yayo.
U Rwanda rwemeje Antoine Anfré nka Ambasaderi w’u Bufaransa
Mu ruzinduko Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron yagiriye mu Rwanda mu kwezi gushize nibwo yagennye ugomba guhagararira igihugu cye nka Amabasaderi.
Ambasaderi Anfré umaze kwemezwa n’u Rwanda azaba afite icyicaro i Kigali. Ni mu gihe ibikorwa bya Ambasade y’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda byayoborwaga na Chargé d’affaires witwa Jérémie Blin wasimbuye Etienne de Souza, kuva aho Michel Flesch, wasoje imirimo ye muri Nzeri 2015 nka Ambasaderi agendeye.
Anfré w’imyaka 58 asanzwe ari amenyereye dipolomasi; yari Umugenzuzi w’Ibijyanye n’Ububanyi n’Amahanga muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga mu Bufaransa.
Izina rye rigaragara muri Raporo ivuga ku ruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yitiriwe Vincent Duclert.
Mu myaka ya 1990, Anfré yari Umuyobozi w’Ishami rishinzwe Ibikorwa bya Afurika na Malgaches [ikirwa cya Madagascar] ryitwaga DAM rikaba ryarakoreraga i Quai d’Orsay muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga.
Muri raporo Duclert agaragazwa nk’uwari ushyigikiye ko Politiki y’u Bufaransa ku Rwanda ihinduka, umurongo wari uhabanye cyane na Politiki y’u Bufaransa ku Rwanda.
Antoine Anfré yakoze mu nzego zitandukanye mu bijyanye n’ububanyi n’amahanga kugeza ubwo mu 2014 yagizwe Ambasaderi wihariye w’u Bufaransa muri Niger kugeza muri Nyakanga 2015 ubwo yahamagazwaga n’igihugu cye.
Yahawe izindi nshingano nyuma y’aho, agirwa Ambasaderi ushinzwe Siporo muri Minisiteri y’u Bufaransa, inshingano yamazeho umwaka hagati ya 2015 na 2016. Hari mbere yo gusubira kuba Umugenzuzi muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Bufaransa.
Guhera mu 1962, u Bufaransa bumaze kohereza mu Rwanda ba ambasaderi 16, kuva kuri Jean-Marc Barbey wabimburiye abandi kugeza kuri Michel Flesh wagiye mu 2015.
Amb Rugwabiza yagaye ibihugu bikomeje kugenda biguru ntege mu gufata abakekwaho Jenoside.
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Kabiri ubwo afatanyije n’Ubuyobozi bw’Urwego Mpuzamahanga Rwashyiriweho Gukora Imirimo y’Insigarira y’Inkiko Mpanabyaha (IRMICT), bagezaga ku Kanama k’Umutekano ka Loni raporo y’ibikorwa ya 18.
Rugwabiza yasabye akanama gashinzwe umutekano kugira icyo gakora ku kibazo cy’ubufatanye buke mu korohereza akazi IRMICT, ni ukuvuga kuyifasha gufata abakekwaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bakidegembya hirya no hino.
Yagize ati “Twibukiranye ko u Rwanda rwohereje impapuro zisaga igihumbi zo guta muri yombi abakekwaho Jenoside bari hirya no hino ku Isi, rusaba ko bafatwa bagacirwa imanza cyangwa bakoherezwa mu Rwanda. Ibihugu bike nibyo byagize icyo bikorwa.”
Kugeza ubu impapuro 1145 nizo zimaze gutangwa zisaba ko abagize uruhare muri Jenoside bihishe mu bihugu 33 bafatwa, abafashwe ni mbarwa.
Rugwabiza yashimiye ibihugu bike byagaragaje ubushake mu gufata cyangwa kuburanisha ababyihishemo bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ibyo bihugu birimo u Bufaransa biturutse ku mbwirwaruhame Perezida Emmanuel Macron aherutse kuvugira i Kigali, yizeza ko u Bufaransa butzaha umwanya abakekwaho Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yashimiye iki gihugu kandi ku bufatanbye bwagaragaje umwaka ushize mu itabwa muri yombi rya Felicien Kabuga wari umaze imyaka isaga 20 ashakishwa n’ubutabera nk’umwe mu baterankunga b’imena ba Jenoside.
Iki gihugu kandi giherutse gutangaza ko muri Gicurasi 2022 aribwo urubanza rwa Laurent Bucyibaruta wahoze ari Perefe wa Gikongoro ruzatangira. Ni igikorwa Rugwabiza yagaragaje ko gitanga icyizere.
Yashimiye kandi Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ku bufatanye ziherutse kugaragaza bwohereza mu Rwanda Béatrice Munyenyezi ukekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside.
Ati “Ibi bigaragaza ko nta kabuza ubutabera bushobora gutangwa iyo hari ubushake bwa politiki n’ubufatanye mu kugeza mu butabera abakekwaho uruhare mu byaha byibasiye inyokomuntu.”
Icyakora, Rugwabiza yagaye bimwe mu bihugu bya Afurika ari nabyo bibarizwamo umubare munini w’abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ariko abafatwa bakaba ari mbarwa.
Yibukije umwanzuro w’akanama k’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe gashinzwe Umutekano wo ku itariki 12 Mata 2021 usaba ibihugu byose bigize uwo muryango gukora iperereza, guta muri yombi, gucira imanza cyangw akohereza abakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside babibarizwamo.
Yavuze ko kudashyira mu bikorwa ibikubiye muri uwo mwanzuro ari amakosa.
Insiriri n’uruhumbikiro rw’ibibazo bya Uganda n’u Rwanda: Depite Mukasa Mbidde yabivuye imuzi.
Mbidde ni Umunyapolitiki wo muri Uganda uhagarariye iki gihugu mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, EALA.
Hari umuntu ushobora kuba azi Icyongereza, yaracyize yewe yaranakiminujemo ariko ugasanga hari amagambo runaka atajya avuga n’umunsi n’umwe. Bene uwo ashobora guhura na Mbidde agataha ubwumvane bwanze kuko akoresha amagambo akakaye, amwe asaba kuyumva usubije inyuma cyangwa inkoranyamagambo za Longman cyangwa Oxford ziri hafi aho.
Mu mwaka ushize ubwo hizihizwaga Noheli, abinyujije kuri Twitter yandikiye abamukurikira ubutumwa bugira buti “​Hon Fred Mbidde Musaka wishes you a splendiferous, supercalifragilisticexpialidociou​s,​ droll, chuppy​ and frolicsome Christmas"​. Aya magambo yose yakoresheje nubwo adakoreshwa na benshi, ari mu y’Icyongereza cyemewe.
Wifashishije inkoranyamagambo, Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious bisobanura ikintu cyiza by’agatangaza, nubwo kurisoma byumvikana nk’ikigeragezo. Kuri we ni nko kunywa amazi. Ni cyo kimwe na splendiferous ugenekereje mu Kinyarwanda risobanura agahebuzo.
Mu yandi magambo adakoreshwa na benshi mu Cyongereza ariko usanga akoresha kenshi harimo nka “poohoo” risobanurwa kurira bimwe bita kuboroga ariko iyo umuntu afite ububabare, “Kowtow” rishatse kuvuga guca bugufi, cyangwa “Jabberwocky” akunda gukoresha risobanura ibintu bidafite ishingiro.
Yigeze kuvuga ati “Abantu bavuga ko nkoresha Icyongereza gikomeye ndetse bakanenga bavuga ko ntari umuntu uzi gusobanura ibintu, ariko ndashaka kubabwira ko narangije Kaminuza mu itangazamakuru muri Makerere University, kandi twari 60 gusa bigaga iryo somo.”
Ni umunyamategeko w’umwuga, winjiye mu ruhando rwa Politiki guhera mu myaka ya 1999 ariko ntiyahirwa n’imyanya y’imbere mu gihugu kugeza ubwo mu 2011 yatsindwaga amatora y’Abadepite ariko akabona inenge mu mategeko yahaga uburenganzira ishyaka rya NRM bwo kugira umuntu urihagararira mu Nteko ya EALA.
Yuririye kuri iyo nenge, atanga ikirego anatsinda urubanza yinjira muri EALA atyo.
Muri iyi nteko yabaye muri Komisiyo zitandukanye ndetse aranaziyobora zirimo ishinzwe Itumanaho, Ubucuruzi n’Ishoramari; ubu anayobora agashami kayo gashinzwe amategeko.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE, yasesenguye byimbitse imvano y’ikibazo cy’umubano mubi umaze igihe hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda, umuti wacyo n’igihombo bikomeje gutera.
Gufunga umupaka byari igisubizo, si ikibazo
Mbidde yasobanuye ko hari bamwe bakeka ko ikibazo cy’u Rwanda na Uganda cyatangiye mu 2019 ubwo Umupaka wa Gatuna wafungwaga, nyamara yemeza ko bifite imvano ya kure cyane.
Ati “Gufunga umupaka, byari bigamije gukemura ikibazo. Ntabwo byo ubwabyo ari ikibazo. Icyo rero umuntu yakwibaza, ikibazo cyari ikihe?”
Uyu mugabo yavuze ko kuba abantu baravaga mu Rwanda, bakambuka umupaka bajya muri Uganda, bagahura n’ibibazo birimo gutabwa muri yombi n’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda, bakamara umwaka bari muri gereza nta muntu ubizi batotezwa, ari impamvu ikomeye yagombaga gutuma umupaka ufungwa.
Ati “Ibyo ubwabyo byatumye biba ikintu cy’ingenzi cyane kuri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ifunga umupaka wayo ku buryo abaturage baguma ari bazima. Icya kabiri, Uganda yatangiye guhishira abantu bikekwa ko bashaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.”
Yatanze urugero kuri Mukankusi Charlotte uri mu buyobozi bwa RNC wahawe Pasiporo na Uganda. Uyu na bagenzi be banahuye na Perezida Museveni ndetse aza kubyiyemerera, avuga ko ngo guhura na bo "byari impanuka".
Ibi bikubitana n’uko imbere muri Uganda, abantu bose baruciye bakarumira ntihagira n’umwe uhaguruka ngo asabe ko iki kibazo gikemurwa.
Mbidde yagize ati “Ni njye muntu wa mbere wavuze mu ruhame kuri ibi bibazo muri Uganda kuko abandi bose bari barabitinye. Kandi icyo nakubwira ni uko Guverinoma yafashe umurongo wo kuruca ikarumira.”
Usibye Abanyarwanda bagirirwa nabi muri Uganda, Mbidde yavuze ko n’Abanya-Uganda bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bakunze kwibasirwa, ati “N’ubu baracyahungabanywa”.
Yagize ati “Nibuka umunsi umwe Abanya-Uganda 40 bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda bafatiwe mu rusengero bashinjwa kuba intasi. Niba atari Politiki yo guhutaza Abanyarwanda, ni ukubera iki intasi 40 zahurira mu rusengero? Bari gushinga ishyaka se? Cyangwa se gutata ni umurimo ukorwa abantu bahuriye hamwe?”
Mbidde yavuze ko abantu bose bakekwaho kugira uruhare mu bikorwa byo guhungabanya umutekano, barimo Tribert Rujugiro bose ubushabitsi bwabo bwahawe rugari muri Uganda nta nkomyi.
Igiteye inkeke kurushaho ni uko abo mu bwoko bw’Abanyarwanda bwemewe muri Uganda bakomeje guhohoterwa.
Ati “Mfite ikirego ndi gukurikirana cy’Abanyarwanda, Abanya-Uganda bafite inkomoko mu Rwanda no muri iki gihe bivugwa ko ibihugu byombi biri mu nzira y’amahoro, bo barirukanwe bajyanwa mu Rwanda. Bamaze hafi umwaka baba muri hotel mu Rwanda, kuko birukanwe mu gihugu cyabo, basiga ibikorwa byabo, ni njye uri gukurikirana imitungo yabo iri muri banki.”
Mbidde yavumbuye ikintu kidasanzwe amaze guhura na Museveni
Hari benshi bahuza ikibazo cy’uyu munsi cy’u Rwanda na Uganda n’amateka ari hagati y’ibihugu byombi ahera mu rugamba rwo kubohora Uganda cyangwa se urwo guhagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi n’intambara yo muri Congo.
Mbidde yavuze ko yagize amahirwe yo guhura n’abakuru b’ibihugu byombi, aza gutahura ko bishoboka cyane ko Museveni yaba afitiye Abanyarwanda urwango rwa karande.
