Nyuma y’amasaha make ateye ivi, Jacques Tuyisenge yasezeranye mu mategeko
Rutahizamu wa APR FC akaba na Kapiteni w’Ikipe y’Igihugu Amavubi, Jacques Tuyisenge, yasezeranye imbere y’amategeko n’umukunzi we Musiime Recheal Jordin nyuma y’amasaha make ateye ivi amusaba ko bazabana akaramata.
Jacques Tuyisenge n’umukunzi we basezeranye imbere y’amategeko mu Murenge wa Kimihurura ku wa Kane, tariki ya 18 Gashyantare 2021.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 19 Gashyantare ni bwo ku mbuga nkoranyambaga hasakaye amafoto ya Tuyisenge na Jordin barahirira ku ibendera ry’igihugu, bemera kubana nk’umugabo n’umugore.
IGIHE yamenye ko umukunzi wa Tuyisenge ari Umunyarwanda uba muri Uganda, ahari umuryango we mugari. Hari n’andi makuru avuga ko Tuyisenge n’umugore we bari bamaze iminsi babana mu nzu.
Tuyisenge Jacques ufite imyaka 29, yanyuze mu makipe atandukanye mu Rwanda no muri Afurika, arimo Kiyovu Sports yavuye mo yerekeza muri Police FC. Yagiriyemo amahirwe yo kwerekeza muri Gormarhia yo muri Kenya ayigiriramo ibihe byiza.
Yavuye muri Kenya yerekeza muri Angola mu ikipe ya Petro-Atletic de Luanda yavuyemo asubira mu Rwanda asinyira ikipe y’Ingabo z’Igihugu APR FC muri Mata 2020 amasezerano azageza mu mwaka 2022.
Zimwe mu ngeso zishobora kwangiza umubano w’abakundana.
IGIHE yifashishije imbuga zitandukanye yateguye zimwe mu ngeso zishobora gutuma umubano w’abakundana wangirika niyo haba hari byinshi ukora byiza, ariko waba ufite zimwe mu ngeso zibangamira mugenzi wawe bikaba byatuma umubano ujyamo agatotsi.
Kunywa itabi ni imwe mu ngeso itihanganirwa na benshi kuko usanga rifite umuhumuro batishimira. Hari ubwo umukunzi wawe aguhisha ko anywa itabi nyamara iyo mumaze kubana biragorana kubihisha ku buryo bishobora gutuma uwo muri kumwe atabyihanganira akaba yakureka.
Hari abantu bagira ingeso yo kuterekana amarangamutima yabo, ku buryo utamenya niba yishimye cyangwa ababaye. Kuri we aba yumva ari byiza ariko ku wo babana ntibimushimisha kuko hari igihe agukorera ibintu byiza ntugaragaze ko ubyishimiye akaba yagufata nk’umuntu utanyurwa bikabatandukanya.
Hari abantu batiyitaho haba ku bigaragara inyuma cyangwa imbere aho usanga umuntu afata amafunguro uko abonye ndetse akambara n’ibyo abonye, ukaba agaragara nk’umuntu utari kuri gahunda.
Kuba utiyitaho bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko niba utiyitaho ubwawe biragora kuba wakwita kuri mugenzi wawe. Iyo ubigize umuco bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu.
Ubunebwe bushobora kuba ari nayo ntandaro yo kutiyitaho kuko usanga umuntu utiyitaho aba yabitewe no kugira ubute bwo kugira icyo yikorera, ibi bigatuma utagira byinshi ugeraho.
Biragoye kubona umuntu w’umunebwe atera imbere kuko ibyo yakabaye akora bimuteza imbere ahora abyimura bigatuma ahora genda biguru ntege. Ibi bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko nta wishimira kubana n’umuntu udatera imbere.
Inzoga nyinshi ntabwo ari nziza kuko zishobora gutera ibibazo by’ubuzima nk’uburwayi budakira ndetse n’ubukene kuko ziba zigutwara ubushobozi bwinshi. Iyo uwo mubana atabasha kubyihanganira na byo biri mu bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu.
Guhora uri mu kazi igihe cyose ugakora amasaha menshi ha handi ni yo uvuye mu kazi ugera mu rugo ukongera ugakora bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe. Icyo gihe iyo uhora mu kazi ntubona umwanya wo kugira ibindi utunganya mu rugo n’uwo kwita ku mukunzi wawe bikaba byagutandukanya na we.
Kubeshya ni ingeso mbi cyane idashobora kwihanganirwa mu rukundo kuko iyo ubeshya umukunzi wawe agutakariza icyizere kandi urukundo rutarimo icyizere ruba rwamaze gusenyuka.
Niba ugira imwe muri izi ngeso ukwiye kuyireka kuko ibangamiye umukunzi wawe n’ukomeza kuyikuza bishobora kuzababera intandaro yo gutandukana.
Zimwe mu ngeso zishobora kwangiza umubano w’abakundana.
IGIHE yifashishije imbuga zitandukanye yateguye zimwe mu ngeso zishobora gutuma umubano w’abakundana wangirika niyo haba hari byinshi ukora byiza, ariko waba ufite zimwe mu ngeso zibangamira mugenzi wawe bikaba byatuma umubano ujyamo agatotsi.
Kunywa itabi ni imwe mu ngeso itihanganirwa na benshi kuko usanga rifite umuhumuro batishimira. Hari ubwo umukunzi wawe aguhisha ko anywa itabi nyamara iyo mumaze kubana biragorana kubihisha ku buryo bishobora gutuma uwo muri kumwe atabyihanganira akaba yakureka.
Hari abantu bagira ingeso yo kuterekana amarangamutima yabo, ku buryo utamenya niba yishimye cyangwa ababaye. Kuri we aba yumva ari byiza ariko ku wo babana ntibimushimisha kuko hari igihe agukorera ibintu byiza ntugaragaze ko ubyishimiye akaba yagufata nk’umuntu utanyurwa bikabatandukanya.
Hari abantu batiyitaho haba ku bigaragara inyuma cyangwa imbere aho usanga umuntu afata amafunguro uko abonye ndetse akambara n’ibyo abonye, ukaba agaragara nk’umuntu utari kuri gahunda.
Kuba utiyitaho bishobora kwangiza umubano wawe kuko niba utiyitaho ubwawe biragora kuba wakwita kuri mugenzi wawe. Iyo ubigize umuco bishobora kwangiza umubano wanyu.
Kubeshya ni ingeso mbi cyane idashobora kwihanganirwa mu rukundo kuko iyo ubeshya umukunzi wawe agutakariza icyizere kandi urukundo rutarimo icyizere ruba rwamaze gusenyuka.
Niba ugira imwe muri izi ngeso ukwiye kuyireka kuko ibangamiye umukunzi wawe n’ukomeza kuyikuza bishobora kuzababera intandaro yo gutandukana.
Impamvu zituma umuntu yumva ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongereye kurushaho.
Umuntu ni inyamaswa yihariye ifite ububasha bwo gutegeka Isi, ibimuha amahirwe yo kugenzura no kunonosora ikimubaho cyose ndetse akaba yamenya impamvu kiba, uburyo kibamo n’ingaruka cyamugiraho. Birumvikana ko nk’igikorwa kimugeza ku kuryoherwa n’ubuzima, ntasiba gusesengura ibijyanye n’imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Muri rusange kugira ubushake bwo gutera akabariro ni ikintu cyishimirwa ku rwego rwo hejuru, bikanaba ikimenyetso gikomeye ko uri muzima bihagije.
Icyakora iyo ubushake bwabyo bubaye bwinshi cyane birabangama, ndetse bigahindurirwa inyito ntibyitwe ubushake ahubwo bikitwa irari. Ubusanzwe irari si ryiza kuko ritera nyiraryo kwifuza ibyo atagenewe no kutanyurwa n’ibyo yemerewe ndetse bikaba byamugaragaza nabi mu bandi bikamwambuza icyubahiro.
Kurarikira imibonano mpuzabitsina, kuri bamwe bishobora kubashimisha ariko hariho n’abo bibangamira kuko byagutesha n’amahirwe amwe n’amwe arimo no kukwirukanisha ku kazi, bishobora gutuma uhatiriza undi muntu kujya muri icyo gikorwa atabishaka, cyangwa bikagukoresha ibyaha birimo no gusambanya abana.
Abashakashatsi batandukanye berekana ko kwiyongera k’ubushake bwo gutera akabariro [bitari irari] kurusha uko umuntu yari asanzwe yiyumva, “si uburwayi kandi si n’igikuba.”
Umuhanga mu by’Imibonano Mpuzabitsina ukora mu iduka ry’ibicuruzwa bigenewe abifuza kongera ibirungo mu bijyanye n’icyo gikorwa riri i Calfornia, Dr Jill McDevitt, kuri iyo ngingo yagize ati “Ni ibisanzwe rwose kuba ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwakwiyongera kurusha uko bisanzwe, ndetse bikaba byanamara iminsi, ibyumweru, amezi cyangwa imyaka.”
Dr Jess O’Reilly ufite Impamyabumenyi y’Ikirenga (PhD) mu by’Imibonano mpuzabitsina unamenyerewe mu biganiro bitandukanye bigaruka ku ngingo nk’izo, we yavuze ko “Kwifuza gutera akabariro kurusha uko usanzwe wiyumva ntibyahita bihabwa inyito y’uko ufite ikibazo.” Bikugira umuntu.
Kuvuga ko ubushake bwo kujya muri icyo gikorwa bwiyongereye, ntibisobanuye ko hari igipimo runaka cy’ubushake busanzwe abantu bagakwiye kuba bafite. Ahubwo umuntu ku giti cye ni we wiyumva uko mu bihe runaka ameze agereranyije n’uko yajyaga yiyumva mu bihe bitandukanye.
Hagaragazwa ko imyaka umuntu agezemo, uko yitwara ku bandi n’abo bakunze kuba bari kumwe, igihe afata cyo gusinzira, imirire ye n’uko akora imyitozo ngororamubiri bigira uruhare mu kuba yarushaho gushaka gutera akabariro.
Byumvikane neza ko umuntu ukora imyitozo ngororamubiri kenshi cyangwa ufite umubyibuho udakabije azagira ubushake bwo kujya mu gikorwa kurusha wa wundi utayikora.
Abari mu kigero cy’ubwangavu n’ubugimbi na bo bagira ubushake kurusha abarenze icyo kigero, naho abageze mu myaka ya 60 bakagenda barushaho kumva batabishaka.
Hari kandi uburyo umuntu apangamo gahunda ze, ibihe arimo n’ubuzima bwo mu mutwe, uko imisemburo y’umubiri iri gukora, ubuvuzi cyangwa imiti yafataga akaba yayiretse, ndetse n’uko ateye bigaragarira inyuma.
Nta bimenyetso bigaragarira amaso byerekana ko ubushake bwiyongereye, ahubwo kugira ngo ubimenye ushobora kugereranya ubushake ufite n’ubwo wari ufite igihe nk’icyo mu mwaka ushize, uko uri kubirarikira n’uko wari usanzwe ubitekereza, ndetse ukagenzura hagati yawe n’uwo mujyana mu gikorwa ubishaka cyane.
Ibyo nubigenzura ni byo byonyine bizagufasha kumenya niba urugero rw’ubushake bwawe bwo gutera akabariro rwazamutse.
Ibishobora kukongerera ubushake bwo gutera akabariro
Nubwo atari ihame ko ari byo byatuma abantu bose bagira ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina kurusha uko basanzwe biyumva, hari ibyo abashakashatsi bahurizaho bikunze kuba impamvu kuri benshi.
McDevitt avuga ko icya mbere ari ukuba nta ntekerezo nyinshi umuntu afite mu mutwe we, mbese nta bimuhangayikishije.
Ati “Iyo uri mu bihe bitagusaba gutekereza bihambaye, ubushake bwo gutera akabariro buziyongera."
Iyo ngo ni yo mpamvu abantu bagira akazi kenshi baryoherwa cyane n’icyo gikorwa ari uko bari mu karuhuko (Vacation sex).
Umujyanama mu bijyanye n’uburyo buboneye bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa, Eric M. Garrison, avuga ko ubuzima bwo mu mutwe na bwo bugira uruhare mu kuba ubushake bwakwiyongera cyangwa bukagabanuka.
Yagize ati “Kuba uwo mubana ataguha ubwisanzure byatuma utagira ubushake cyane bwo gukorana nawe icyo gikorwa.”
Bisobanuye ko mu gihe uwo mubana cyangwa mugiye kwinjirana mu gikorwa akugusha neza bizatuma wumva ubishaka cyane.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko umuntu ashobora no kuba afite ibindi bibazo birimo agahinda gakabije n’ihungabana, bikagira ingaruka ku buzima bwe bwo mu mutwe bityo ntabe yagira ubushake.
Hatangwa inama ko mu gihe uwo mubana atagira ubushake bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa, mwakwegera muganga wabihuguriwe mukabimuganiriza akabibafashamo.
Dr McDevitt agaragaza kandi ko imikorere y’imisemburo y’umubiri w’umuntu mu bihe bitandukanye yatuma ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongera; kuko ituma imyanya y’ibanga ikura neza bityo umubiri ukarushaho gukenera imibonano mpuzabitsina.
Imyitozo ngororamubiri ikorwa kenshi nayo Dr O’Reilly asobanura ko kuri bamwe iba impamvu yo kongera ubushake, biturutse ku kuba yongerera umuntu icyizere, ikagabanya umunaniro mu ntekerezo ndetse igatuma uwayikoze asinzira neza.
Ubushakashatsi bunerekana ko guhagarika ifatwa ry’imiti imwe n’imwe bigira uruhare mu kongera ubushake bwo gutera akabariro.
Nk’urugero mu 2015, Pubmed yagaragaje ko imiti ivura agahinda gakabije n’ihungabana igabanyiriza uyifata ubushake bwo kwinjira muri icyo gikorwa.
Imwe mu miti ivura indwara z’umutima n’ikoreshwa mu kuboneza urubyaro, na yo ubushakashatsi bugaragaza ko ishobora gutuma ubushake bugabanuka.
Mu gihe uwafataga imwe muri iyo miti yaba ayihagaritse rero, Garrison yemeza ko byatuma yiyumvamo icyo gikorwa kurushaho.
Hagaragazwa kandi ko ibihe umuntu arimo bishobora gutuma ubushake bwiyongera cyane cyane ku bagore. Ibyo bigaragarira ku kuba hari igihe bagaragaza umushiha batanakeneye ku bijyamo mu gihe runaka, ubundi ukabona babikeneye cyane.
Abashakashatsi basobanura ko biterwa n’imisemburo yabo, kandi ko ubushake bwabo bushobora kwiyongera mbere, nyuma cyangwa mu gihe cy’imihango.
Ikigero cy’imyaka umuntu agezemo na cyo gishobora gutuma ubushake bwiyongera cyangwa bukagabanuka. Uvuye mu bwana ageze mu bugimbi cyangwa ubwangavu agira impinduka zidasanzwe zirimo no kongera ubushake cyane, iyo amaze kurenga imyaka 20, uko agenda akura ni ko ubushake bugabanuka.
Ni ryari ukwiyongera k’ubushake bwo gutera akabariro biba ikibazo?
Nk’uko byagaragajwe haruguru, muri rusange kugira ubushake bwo gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina birishimirwa ndetse ni ikimenyetso cy’uko umuntu ari muzima.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko Garrison avuga ko “Kwiyongera k’ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bizaba ikibazo igihe wowe ubwawe uziyumvamo ko ari ikibazo, cyangwa igihe bigutera kugira imyitwarire ibangamira izindi ngeri z’ubuzima bwawe.”
Urugero nk’iyo bikubangamira mu kazi ukora, bituma uca inyuma uwo mwashakanye cyangwa uwo muri mu rukundo, bituma utakariza amafaranga mu kugura ibikoresho bigufasha kwikinisha, cyangwa bikagutera indi myitwarire iteye inkeke.
Igihe ingaruka nk’izo zikugezeho, ni byiza ko wegera muganga wabihuguriwe akaba yagufasha gusubira ku murongo.
Ushobora kandi guhindura umuvuno cyane cyane ku bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina mu buryo bwo kugabanya intekerezo nyinshi bafite, ukaba washaka ubundi buryo ukoresha bubigufashamo.
Ikindi gishobora kugufasha gusubira ku murongo mu gihe ubushake bwo gutera akabariro bwiyongereye cyane, ni ukudahatira uwo mugiye gukorana igikorwa, ahubwo ukabanza kubimuganiriza ndetse igihe akubwiye ko atabishaka ukitoza kwakira igisubizo uhawe.
Ubuhamya bwa Uguyeneza warwaye agahinda gakabije akajya ahabwa inkwenene na bamwe mu nshuti ze.
Bamwe barwara agahinda gakabije “Depression” ntibabimenye cyangwa se bakabimenya batinze kuko atari ibintu wahita wiyumvamo cyangwa se ubimenye ako kanya kuko uba wumva ari ubuzima wabayemo cyangwa ubayemo bwatumye umera gutyo!
Ariko, siko biri ahubwo ni indwara nk’izindi kandi iravurwa igakira. Ibiranga ufite ubu burwayi ndetse n’ubundi bujya gusa nkabwo harimo ukugaragaza impinduka mu myitwarire, imyifatire, imitekerereze bikaba byanagira ingaruka mu bikorwa umuntu yakoraga mu buzima busanzwe cyangwa mu busabane yagiranaga n’abandi.
Umuganga w’Inzobere mu kuvura indwara zo mu Mutwe, Kanyandekwe Dr Simon, yigeze kubwira IGIHE ko izi ndwara ziterwa n’uruhererekane rw’impamvu nyinshi.
Ati “Ziterwa n’uburyo ubwonko bw’umuntu bwaremwe [nta budahangarwa], akenshi usanga bavuga ko umuntu ashobora kurwara kurusha abandi. Uko umuntu yabayeho mu muryango akomokamo cyangwa aho yakuriye, ibibazo yahuye nabyo akiri umwana [nk’ihungabanga] n’imibereho y’umuntu aho asanzwe aba byaba mu muryango cyangwa n’ahandi.”
Uguyeneza Alliah ni umwe mu bagize uburwayi bwa ‘Depression’ ndetse abubana igihe kinini biturutse ku kuba yarakuze adafite se ndetse nta rukundo rw’ababyeyi babiri yigeze yerekwa.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na 1K Studio, uyu mukobwa wiga Amategeko muri kaminuza yagaragaje uko yagize ubu burwayi n’uko yabukize.
Uguyeneza yavukiye mu muryango w’abana batatu ni imfura ariko ntabwo yigeze agira amahirwe yo kubana na se.
Ati “Nabuze papa nkiri muto, ntabwo nigeze ngira ayo mahirwe y’uko hari umuntu wabiganiriza, ni ibintu byasabye uko ngenda nkura mbona ko hari ikibura ko nabuze umubyeyi.”
Akomeza avuga ko bitajyaga bimutera ikibazo akiri umwana, ariko uko yagiye akura bikaba byaragiye nabyo bikura kugera aho bimubanye byinshi cyane akajya yigunga.
Ati “Ntabwo byajyaga bintera ikibazo cyangwa se ngo mbyiteho mbere ariko iyo uri umwana urakura ugatangira kubona ibintu runaka. Gusa uko nagiye nkura najyaga ku ishuri abandi bana bakambaza ngo twirirwa tukubona mama wawe akuzana, Papa wawe arihe? Ntabwo nigeze ngira imbaraga zo kubwira bagenzi banjye ko data yapfuye. Narababwiraga nti muzamubona.”
Yemeza ko ibi bintu iyo aba yarabivuzeho bitari kumugendekera uko byagenze ahubwo byari kuba byiza mu buzima bwe akanabyakira ariko akavuga ko byamwangije cyane akiri muto.
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko yarwaye ihungabana ari mu mashuri yisumbuye yaba ari kumwe na bagenzi be we akaba ari kwitekerereza ibindi ku ruhando bitandukanye ni byo barimo.
Ati “Narwaye ihungabana ndi mu mashuri yisumbuye naba ndi kumwe na bagenzi banjye nkitekerereza ibindi bitandukanye n’ibyo bari kuvuga, nkisanga ndi njyenyine. Agahinda gakabije kwirirwa urira. Ukumva ko agahinda kawe karuta ak’abandi. Kandi iyo urwaye agahinda uba wumva abandi bari mu Isi bari mu munezero.”
Akomeza avuga ko abantu batangiye kujya bavuga ko adakunda kuvuga kandi ari ukubera agahinda ariko batazi ko ari ko. Yarabyukaga buri munsi akumva adashaka guhura n’abantu ahubwo ashaka kubaho wenyine kandi nabwo akirirwa.
Ati “Naje kubimenya bitewe n’uko nabonaga abandi. Hari ukuntu abandi bagira agahinda cyangwa amarangamutima ariko bikarangira. Ariko njye amarangamutima yarivangaga cyane ukabona umunota umwe urishimye ariko utishimye mu by’ukuri ahubwo ari ukugira ngo wiyibagize ibyo uri gucamo.”
Avuga ko agahinda ke katangiye gukura ubwo yari ageze mu mashuri yisumbuye kuko akiri umwana nabwo yari agafite ariko katarakura cyane nk’uko byaje kugenda nyuma.
Ati “Agahinda kanjye katangiye gukura cyane ngeze mu mwaka wa mbere w’amashuri yisumbuye. Ahantu nigaga kwiyandikisha wasangaga ababyeyi bose bazanye umwana nkihagera muri uko kwiyandikisha ninjye njyenyine wari uri kumwe n’umubyeyi umwe. Abantu bakajya bambaza ngo twabonye mama wawe turashaka kubona na papa wawe ariko batazi ko ari ibintu binkora ku mutima.”
Avuga ko akiri umwana yarakazwaga n’ibintu bito, ibi nabyo bikaba ari ibintu yaje kumenya ko byari kimwe mu bimenyetso by’ubu burwayi. Ngo yagiye kwiga mu mashuri yisumbuye biba ibindi bibazo kubera ko yaganirizwaga n’abandi bamubaza ikibazo yaza kugitekerezaho nyuma akarira.
Yatangiye kwiyumvamo ubu burwayi inshuti ye ya mbere abibwiye imugira umusazi biramubabaza cyane, ariko ntiyacika intege abibwira undi mugenzi we.
Ati “Hari inshuti yanjye natangiye mbibwira aba arasetse. Arambwira ngo niba urwaye agahinda urumva twebwe turwaye iki? Icyo gihe byarambabaje cyane. Nyuma nabwiye indi nshuti yanjye ko nshobora kuba ndwaye agahinda. Yampuje n’umuvandimwe we wari inzobere mu kugira inama abantu barwaye agahinda aramfasha, nyuma nza gukira. Numvaga atari ibintu nkeneye nanjye nabyiganiriza ariko iyo ufite umuntu ubwira biba byiza.”
Arakomeza ati “Maze kugirwa inama ni bwo narebye ku bintu nanyuzemo nkumirwa. Nkirangiza icyo gihe cy’agahinda kababaje naratekerezaga nti iyo ngira umuntu wanganirije nkiri muto ntabwo byari kugenda gutya.”
Agira inama abantu barwaye agahinda kujya batobora bakabivuga kuko biba byiza kandi bikabafasha guhita bakira mu buryo bworoshye.
Uguyeneza Alliah afite imyaka 19. Yari mu bakobwa 11 bahataniye ikamba rya Miss Supranational uyu mwaka ariko yatangajwe muri batatu batabashije gukomeza mu kindi cyiciro.
Gukura ibyinyo, kururu kururu n’aba-diaspora: Amafaranga ari kumunga inkundo z’ubu.
Kuva mu myaka ya kera uyu mubano wahozeho kuko niwo uganisha ku kubaka urugo, ugakomeza kugenda neza cyangwa nabi bitewe n’amahitamo yaba nyiri urugo.
Muri iki gihe cy’urukundo rw’umusore n’inkumi, usanga buri wese akora iyo bwabaga ngo hatagira agatotsi kaza mu mubano wabo. Aha niho usanga basurana, basohokana ndetse inshuro nyinshi bagahana impano zitandukanye.
Nubwo buri wese akora iyo bwabaga ngo barusheho kunezerwa mu mubano wabo, hari bamwe mu basore bashinja inkumi gukunda ibyo batunze kurusha kubakunda bo ubwabo ndetse inkumi nazo rimwe na rimwe zikagaragaza ko hari abasore badukanye iyi ngeso itari ibamenyereweho.
Bamwe mu basore baganiriye na IGIHE, bavuze ko ahanini usanga mu mubano w’uyu munsi usanga abakobwa baba badakunze abahungu, ahubwo baba bakunze ibyo batunze.
Ibi ngo bigaragazwa n’uko rimwe na rimwe iyo inkumi ibonye umusore urusha amafaranga uwo bari bari kumwe, ishobora gufata umwanzuro wo kumwanga nta kindi bapfuye.
Uwiragiye Jean Claude, yavuze ko muri iyi minsi bigoye ngo kubona umukobwa ugukunda iyo ufite ubushobozi buke, ngo nyamara wakira ntumenye aho bavuye.
Ati "Uri umuhungu ukennye birakugora kuba wabona umukunzi ariko se amafaranga naboneke, gato barizana. Biragoye kuba wagumana n’umukobwa udafite icyo kumuha.”
Yakomeje avuga ko ikindi cyemeza ko abakobwa bakundira abahungu amafaranga ari uko ubona aribo bahora bakira ariko badatanga.
Ati “Uzarebe mu rukundo usanga abahungu aribo bahora batanga impano zihenze ndetse n’iyo mwasohotse akaba ari umuhungu wishyura, kandi wenda umukobwa na we afite amafaranga ariko ntiyayatanga. Ubuse nihe badakunda amafaranga?.”
Ibi byashimangiwe na Rukundo Benjamin, wavuze ko muri iyi minsi bigoye kubona umukobwa wagukunda udafite ibyo umuha.
Ati “Uba ufite umukobwa mukundana wakena gato ntumenya aho aciye cyangwa haza umusore ufite ubushobozi kukurenza ahita akureka nta kindi mupfuye. Umukobwa ntimwabana utagira ibyo kumuha bikundira amafaranga.”
Ku ruhande rw’abakobwa bo bavuga ko aba umwe agatukisha bose, bakemeza koko ko hari bagenzi babo bakunda umusore bamukurikiyeho amafaranga ngo kimwe n’uko hari abahungu nabo babikora.
Munyemanzi Gisèle, yavuze ko kuba hari umukobwa ukunda amafaranga bidakwiye kwitirirwa abakobwa bose, kuko no mu bahungu hari abagize umwuga kurya amafaranga y’abakobwa.
Ati “Abantu hari ikintu bibeshyaho, burya mu bantu bose habamo abantu bose. Hari umukobwa yego ukunda ibintu utagukunda udafite amafaranga ariko siko twese tumeze. Ubuse ko tutavuga ko abahungu bakunda amafaranga, ni uko nta ngero z’abahungu bariye amafaranga abakobwa tuzi? Hari abayakunda ariko si bose.”
Mukarukundo Justine we yavuze ko abavuga ko abakobwa bakunda amafaranga bigiza nkana.
Ati “Abavuga ko abakobwa bakunda amafaranga baheruka inzira mu cyi. Umuhungu wagukunda udafite akazi ni nde? ubuse nitwe dukunda aba-diaspora cyangwa n’abahungu baba bashaka kubarya amafaranga, si abakobwa bose bayakunda."
Nubwo iyo bije kuri iyi ngingo abahungu n’abakobwa usanga bitana ba mwana, ikibazo cyo kubaka umubano ushingiye ku mafaranga cyo kiriho kuko umunsi ku munsi mu itangazamakuru ntihasiba kugaragara inkuru zivuga ko inkumi cyangwa umusore runaka yariwe amafaranga n’uwo bakundanaga.
Jenoside: Ibaruwa ku mugabo wagerageje kuvuga ukuri.
Umunyamakuru ukomoka muri Ireland wakoreraga ikinyamakuru cyo mu Bwongereza, The Independent ndetse akaba yaragendereye u Rwanda mu bihe bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, ari gushaka kugera kuri Raymond Mbaraga, warokotse Jenoside ndetse mu gihe yabaga akemera kumuvugisha yirengagije ibyago yari ari kwishyiramo. David Orr yicuza kuba inyota yagize yo kubona inkuru yarasumbye kuba yarimo amushyira mu byago.
Iyi baruwa iri munsi ni iyo David Orr yandikiye Raymond Mbaraga ishyirwa mu Kinyarwanda na IGIHE.
Nshuti, Raymond
Kuva ubwo duherukana hashize igihe kinini. Ndizera ko umeze neza. Mfite kuvuga ko kuva mu minsi ishize nagutekerejeho cyane, ku bw’ibyo ntekereza ko nakwandikira. Iki gitekerezo nakigize ubwo nari nicuye mu ijoro hagati. Nari ndimo gukora isuku ngwa ku gikarito kirimo amakayi yanjye ya kera n’inkuru nanditse ubwo nari umunyamakuru ushinzwe gutara amakuru kuri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda. Ubwo nabinyuragamo nageze ku izina ryawe n’inyandiko nakoze ubwo twahuraga mu 1994.
Mvugishije ukuri, ubu sibwo bwa mbere nari ngutekerejeho muri iyi myaka. Buri gihe mu buryo buhoraho, iyo numvaga ikintu kuri radiyo cyerekeranye na Jenoside cyangwa nkareba filimi mbarankuru ibitekerezo byanjye byasubiraga inyuma muri ya minsi iteye ubwoba y’ubwicanyi n’akarengane. Nibukaga amahirwe twagize yo guhurira mu nkambi aho wari warafatiwe ubwo ubwicanyi bwari bukabije ndetse n’inshuro ya kabiri ubwo twahuraga mu buryo tutateganyije nyuma y’ibyumweru bike.
Kuva aho hari igihe ubuzima bwantwaraga, ukaba wava no mu bitekerezo byanjye, urabizi uko ubuzima bugenda.
Kuri iyi nshuro, nari mfite intego y’uko ntagomba kureka ngo aya mahirwe ance mu myanya y’intoki. Ubwo nari nicuye natekereje ko ngomba kuzavugisha ikinyamakuru cyo mu Rwanda, nkandikira Raymond urwandiko rufunguye. Wenda azarubona, noherereje email umuntu nari nzi muri Kigali ubundi ampa izina ry’umunyamakuru, niyo mpamvu turi aha.
Birumvikana ko nagushakishije kuri Facebook ariko sinabashije kubona umuntu nu’mwe witwa Raymond Mbaraga. Nshobora kuba naranditse izina ryawe nabi ubwo twagiranagana ikiganiro muri ya nkambi y’urupfu. Wenda bitewe n’ibihe twarimo byashoboka ko wari kuba warampaye n’izina ritari ryo.
Ariko ntiwari kuba ufite impamvu ya kongera kubikora ku nshuro ya kabiri twahuye, kubera ko icyo gihe ibibi, cyangwa reka mvuge ibibi bikabije byari bimaze kurangira.
Ibyo tubaye tubishyize ku ruhande ndizera ko Raymond, umwarimu twahuye muri iyo myaka yose ishize akiriho kandi ameze neza, kandi akaba azasoma aya magambo.
Ikintu cya mbere nshaka kuvuga ni uko nsaba imbabazi. Imbabazi z’uko ntaguhaye agaciro kandi wowe warashyize ubuzima bwawe mu kaga umbwira ibyabaga muri biriya bihe by’umwijima. Yego nagerageje kukurinda ntavuga umwirondoro wawe muri raporo yanjye ya mbere. Nakujyanye kure gato ahitaruye amaso y’abari bashinzwe kurinda inkambi kandi hasaga n’ahatekanye turaganira.
Ariko kongera gusoma inkuru z’ikinyamakuru cy’i Londres, The Independent, bihita bigaragarira amaso yanjye ko kubona inkuru bishobora kuba aribyo byazaga imbere muri gahunda yanjye y’icyo gihe. Iyo nza kubitekerezaho byimbitse, nashoboraga kubona ingano y’ibyago wirengeraga wemera kumvugisha. Kandi neza nk’uko wabimbwiye nyuma ubwo twongeraga guhura, wagambaniwe n’imfungwa ngenzi zawe zashakaga kugirirwa impuhwe n’abaguhigaga.
Byari amahirwe n’ubwenge bwawe bwagusimbukije urupfu ubwo abarinzi b’Interahamwe bazaga bagushakisha.
Nshobora kuba wenda ndi kurya amagambo. Ku bw’inyungu z’abasomyi, nshobora wenda gusobanura ibyabaga icyo gihe n’ukuntu naje guhura na we. Byari muri Gicurasi hagati mu 1994 hamwe n’irindi tsinda ry’abanyamakuru, nageze i Kabgayi mu nkengero z’Umujyi wa Gitarama (ubu ni mu Karere ka Muhanga) aho Guverinoma yakoze Jenoside yari ikambitse.
Bariyeri, Interahamwe zifite imihoro n’umuhiri n’abasirikare bafite imbunda bari batonze umurongo mu mihanda. Urusaku rw’imbunda rwumvikaniraga mu ntera cyane ko Ingabo zahoze ari iza RPA zasatiraga. Ubwicanyi bwari bumaze ukwezi bukorwa. Imirambo yuzuye mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu ndetse itemba no mu migezi.
Kugira ngo mbashe kumvikanisha ibi ndakoresha amagambo nakoresheje mu nkuru. Aka kanya mfite agace k’agapapuro kayo. Ushobora kubona umutwe wayo ugira uti ‘‘Inside Rwanda’s Death Camp Hell’- byumvikana nk’inkuru iteye ubwoba ariko ntiyari kure y’ukuri.
“Hanze y’Umujyi wa Gitarama ahantu hazengurutswe na senyenge Abatutsi barenga 1000 bafunzwe mu buryo bubi ntigeze mbona. Buri munsi, nabwirwaga inshuro nyinshi, ko amatsinda y’abagabo akurwa muri iyo nkambi bagakubitwa n’abasirikare ba Guverinoma kugeza bapfuye.” (Mbonye ko nanditse “ Umututsi 1000”, aho kuba Abatutsi, ni yo mvugo yari ikwiye yo gukoresha ariko muri iyo minsi ya mbere, abenshi muri twe banyamakuru b’abanyamahanga twari tukiga byinshi ku Rwanda.
Ndibuka ko hari ikinyamakuru kimwe kizwi cyanditse Tutus na Hutsis. Ariko nari narigeze gusuraho u Rwanda mbere ya Jenoside, byatuma mvuga ko wenda ibyo nari nzi byarutaga ibya bamwe muri bagenzi banjye b’abanyamakuru.
Reka nkomeze mbabarira inkuru nk’uko yari yanditse. “Mbere na mbere, batangiye gusohora abagabo bakuze ariko kuri ubu bari gufata n’abato,” aya ni amagambo nabwiwe n’umusore wari wambaye ingofero. “Dufite ubwoba bwinshi ariko turabizi ko tugerageje gusohoka iyi nkambi Interahamwe zadufata.”
Ku bw’inyungu z’abasomyi reka nsobanure, Interahamwe ni “itsinda ry’abasore bitwazaga imihoro bari mu rubyiruko rwo ku ruhande ya guverinoma.”
Nakomeje nsobanura uko byari byifashe muri iriya nkambi wowe Raymond wari ufungiyemo. “Amagana y’abantu yuzuye mu mbuga y’icyahoze ari iseminari, amagana y’abandi yikusanyirije mu byumba byuzuyemo umunuko ndetse n’izindi nzu zo anze. Imirambo irambaraye mu bazima no mu bari guhumeka uwa nyuma. Hari ibyo kurya bike cyane kandi nta mazi. Umugore ukuze amfashe akaboko ubundi antungira agatoki ku nda ye mu buryo busa n’aho afite icyo ashaka cyane. Mu mbuga rwagati abana bari gukinira iruhande rw’imirambo ibiri iri mu ngobyi z’abarwayi.”
Sinigeze mbona, ko mu kugukoresha ikiganiro, nabaye nk’ugusiga umeze nk’umuhigo. Muri kiriya gihe ubwo njye n’abandi banyamakuru twageraga muri Gitarama, abasirikare barinze inkambi baragushakishaga. Impamvu baturutse ngo twinjire mu nkambi mbere na mbere sinyizi. Birumvikana ko baduhakaniye ko hari ikibi kiri kuba.
Batubwiye ko wari warafashwe kubera ko bashakaga kukurinda. Ariko washiritse ubwoba, umbwira ukuri. Wenda watekereje ko inkuru mu kinyamakuru kizwi cyane izagabanya umuvumba w’ibyabaga.
Gusa watubuye ubushobozi bw’itangazamakuru mpuzamahanga. Ubwicanyi bwarakomeje. Nubwo ibyaberaga muri icyo gihugu cyawe gito kidakora ku Nyanja byigaragazaga. Abo mu burengerazuba bw’Isi ntacyo bakoze ngo babihagarike.
Raymond, ndacyafite urwibutso ku gihugu cyanyu cyiza, urwibutso rw’igihugu cyanyu giteye ubwoba nk’uko cyari cyahindutse mu 1994. Gutwara imodoka mu bibaya n’imisozo y’icyatsi, gusura ingagi zo mu misozi nk’umwaka wari wabanje mbere y’uko Jenoside itangira.
Kugirana ikiganiro na Perezida Habyarimana mbere ho amezi y’uko indege ye iraswa Jenoside igatangira. Guhagarara hejuru y’Umugezi w’Akagera muri Gicurasi 1994, imirambo itemba mu mazi.
Gucumbika muri Hoteli Méridien muri Kigali- nta mazi ariko televiziyo ya CNN igaragara, n’urusaku rw’imbunda ziremereye rukikije udusozi tutuzengurutse.
Gutemberera mu nkambi y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye irimo abashinzwe kubungabunga amahoro bananiwe kuyabungabunga. Guhura na Perezida Kagame mu mashyamba ubwo we n’ingabo ze basatiraga umurwa mukuru.
Mu kongera gusoma inkuru zanjye kuri Jenoside, ndi guheranwa n’ibiteye ubwoba bitarangira. Nakoze inkuru eshatu muri Gicurasi na Kamena 1994, ebyiri mu ruhande rwa Guverinoma ubwo ubwicanyi bwari bugeze ku kigero cyo hejuru n’indi imwe mu runda rwa RPF. Muri kiriya gihe ngomba kuba naraganiriye n’amagana y’abantu, biganjemo abarokotse ubwicanyi. Abenshi muri iyi nyandiko bagaragara badafite amazina.
Muri bariya bose nahuye nabo, kubera iki ari wowe wagaragaye nk’uri kuvuga ibifite umujyo n’imbaraga? Byarashobokaga ko nawe umwirondoro wawe wari kuguma ari ibanga, iyo bitaza kuba ko nyuma yo guhura kwacu kwa mbere, nongeye guhurira nawe mu rugo rw’umuntu wari wameneshejwe hanze y’Umujyi wa Ruhango, iki gihe RPF niyo yari ifite ubutegetsi.
“Ubwicanyi no gufata ku ngufu byarakomeje nyuma y’uko ugiye,” Niko wambwiye. “Interahamwe zimaze kumva ko navuze ibyabaga zaje zincaka. Ni Imana gusa yandinze. Nacukuye umwobo muri nyakatsi umuvandimwe wanjye antwikiriza ibibabi. Nagumye muri uwo mwobo mu minsi itanu, nsenga ngo ntafatwa. Kiriya gihe RPF yaraje iratubohoza.”
Wavuze ko abavandimwe bawe babiri batemaguwe n’abicanyi. Wamaze ibyumweru bitandatu muri iriya nkambi. Nta numwe uzi umubare w’abahiciwe. Nyuma y’uko RPF ije, abari bameze nkawe bafite imbaraga zihagije bagiye mu mijyi yari yamaze kubohorwa.
Ubwo njye na bagenzi banjye b’abanyamakuru twasubiraga muri iriya nkambi, twasanze hari abarokotse bagihari, nta mbaraga kandi baraguhabanye ku buryo batashoboraga kuhava. Mu mirambo, nahabonye abana babiri bari bakiriho, umwe muri bo yurira umurambo wa nyina.
“Ese bake barokotse iri curaburindi bazigera bakira ibikomere?” Niko nibajije.
Icyo navuga ni uko ubwo nongeraga guhura na Raymond Mbaraga, yari afite ibishashi by’ubuzima mu maso ye. Kiriya gihe n’ubu iyo yavugaga, wabonaga inseko ku minwa ye. Ndetse yakomoje zimwe muri gahunda ze z’ahazaza.
Zari gahunda nziza. Uracyari umwarimu, ndibaza…. niba ugifite akanyamuneza ku maso yawe? Raymond, nifuza kumenya icyo wabaye cyo mu myaka yakurikiyeho. Duhura wari ukiri umusore muto.
Ndatekereza ko wubatse, ukagira umuryango. Wenda inkuru y’ibitangaza y’uko warokotse abicanyi yabaye inkuru y’umuryango. Cyangwa wenda wahungabanyijwe n’ibyo wanyuzemo ku buryo utifuza kuvuga kuri iriya minsi y’umwijima. Urwibutso rwanjye kuri Jenoside rwambujije gutuza bihagije- mu byumweru byakurikiyeho nagize inzozi mbi ndetse ngorwa no kugoheka. Ariko uburemere bw’urwibutso rwanjye ruremereye bingana iki ngereranyije n’urwawe n’urwa biriya bihumbi by’abagore n’abagabo musangiye igihugu barokotse? Ni iki nshobora kumenya cyangwa ngo numve ku kababaro n’ibibazo byawe?
Ndacyeka ko iyi myaka yakubereye myiza ndetse igatuma ugera kuri zimwe muri za gahunda wari warambwiye. Ntibishoboka ko waba waribagiwe ibyo wanyuzemo ariko wenda wize kubana n’ahahise no kwishakamo no gushakira abawe urumuri, ubuzima bushya muri icyo gihugu cyawe cyiza naje kumenya neza nyuma. Mu myaka yakurikiyeho narahagarutse ndetse buri gihe uko nazaga, nibukaga uguhura kwacu.
Yabanje kumwima urukundo, nyuma yumva yarumwisabira!Inkuru y’urukundo rwa Diane na Kwizera.
Bikunda kubaho kenshi ku bakobwa, aho usanga yarimye umusore urukundo ariko nyuma akazisanga yaramukunze kuburyo yumva yabimwibwirira, gusa kubera wa muco w’abanyarwanda utemerera abakobwa kubwira abahungu ko babakunda, akabura uko abigenza.
Ibi n’ibyo byabaye kuri Diane Uwiduhaye, wasabwe urukundo na Kwizera Emmanuel bari baziranye kuva kera bakiri abana, ariko akamutsembera kubera ko yabonaga bitashokoka, cyane ko ngo Kwizera yitondaga cyane, acecetse, asa nk’umuntu uzi icyo ashaka.
Mu Kiganiro aba bombi bagiranye na 1K Studio, bavuze inkuru y’urukundo rwabo, kuva kera ari bana bato basengana kugeza babanye bakanabyarana.
Diane avuga ko ubwo hari hashize umwaka yimye urukundo Kwizera, yagiye gukora ahantu yimenyerezaga umwuga, asanga niwe ugiye kujya amuyobora, bimutera ubwoba, biramurenga. Yibazaga ukuntu azitwara, uko azakorana n’umuntu yimye urukundo bikamuyobera.
Akomeza agira ati "Yabyitwayemo neza cyane, cyane ko yankundaga. Yakoze ibishoboka byose akagerageza kunyereka ibimenyetso by’uko ankunda, ariko ntavuge ikintu na kimwe. Yageze ku nshuro yo kumbwira ko ankunda ahubwo ndi hafi kuzabyivugira.”
Kwizera avuga ko ajya kumusaba urukundo, yagiye nta mutima afite, ubwoba ari bwose, ndetse ko Diane akimubona yaturitse akarira, biramurenga aribwira ati ‘noneho bindangiriyeho, agiye kongera anyange’.
Abajijwe icyatumye arira, Diane yavuze ko kubera urukundo yamukundaga byamunaniye kubyakira, kwiyumvisha ko umusore yihebeye ari we ari kumusaba urukundo.
Yabyemeye bwangu atazuyaje, cyane ko ngo kuri we byari akarusho kuko aribwo bwa mbere yari yemereye umuhungu bari kumwe amaso ku maso, atari bya bindi byo kuri telefone.
Kwizera avuga ko noneho amaze kubyemera, byamubereye umutwaro, nk’umuntu utari warigeze akundana na rimwe. Yibajije ukuntu agiye kujya abigenza, biramuyobera.
Ati “Yarambwiye ati ‘Ndabyemeye!’ bimbana umutwaro noneho utarabaho[…] byabaye nk’aho ngiye kwiga. Umunsi wa mbere abinyemerera haciyemo nk’iminsi nk’ine ntaramuhamagara. Numva nyine icya mbere ari uko mfite umuntu wanyemereye ko dukundana.”
Bakomeza bavuga ukuntu urukundo rwabo rwagiye ruzamo imbogamizi nyinshi, kubera ko Kwizera yari acecetse, atamenyereye gukundana mu gihe Diane we yisanzura amenyereye kwitabwaho.
Kubera ubwitonzi n’urukundo Kwizera yamukundaga, yagiye yiga uko bakundana, yemera gukosora amakosa yose yajyaga akora, babana neza mu myaka ibiri bamaze bakundana batarabana.
Bavuga ko ku munsi w’ubukwe bwabo, nijoro batateye akabariro nk’uko bimenyerewe, ahubwo ko bamaze ijoro ryose baganira, bamenyana, bavuga ku by’urugo rwabo rushya, ibintu bavuga ko byabafashije kwisanga, kwiyumvanamo neza nk’umugabo n’umugore, ndetse no kubana neza, aho ubu bafite abana babiri mu myaka hafi itatu bamaranye.
Airtel Rwanda yatangije irushanwa rizahemba abanditsi beza b’inkuru z’urukundo.
Sosiyete y’Itumanaho ya Airtel Rwanda kuri uyu wa 14 Gashyantare 2021 yatangije irushanwa ryiswe “NkundaUrwanda” rizahemba inkuru nziza zijyanye n’urukundo zizahiga izindi.
Abazaba aba mbere muri ‘NKundaUrwanda’ bazahabwa ibihembo birimo PocketWifi ndetse na 30GB zo gukoresha kuri internet.
Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze na Airtel rigaragara ko iri rushanwa riri mu rwego rwo gukomeza gufasha abantu, binyuze mu kugaragaza urukundo rukomeye bakunda u Rwanda.
Riti “Twashatse ko uku kwezi kuba umwihariko duha ikaze buri wese tunamushishikariza gutanga inkuru ye mu rurimi yahisemo, kugira ngo bagaragaze urukundo rwabo ku Rwanda. Inkuru zishobora kuba ku kintu icyo ari cyo cyose abakiliya bacu, abaturage ndetse n’abatuye u Rwanda bumva bishimira.”
Airtel Rwanda yatangaje ko buri munsi hazajya hahembwa abantu 50.
Airtel yongeyeho ko inkuru zatanzwe n’abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga za Twitter, Facebook na Instagram zishobora kuba zivuga ku rukundo rw’umuntu cyangwa zishimira abantu.
Zishobora kuba zishimira abaganga bari ruhembe rwo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19, abaforomo na Polisi, abakozi ba supermarket, abakora muri farumasi, abahinzi n’abantu bose bagize uruhare rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Izi nkuru zishobora kuba zivuga ku bantu bakunda imyitozo ngororamubiri, serivisi nka Irembo cyangwa umuyoboro mwiza w’umuhanda.
Ushaka kwitabira yandika inkuru agakurikizaho hashtag ya #NkundaUrwanda, akazishyira ku rubuga rwe bwite cyangwa kuri Twitter ya Airtel @airtelrw, Facebook @airtelrwanda cyangwa urubuga rwa airtelrw rwa Instagram.

Chloé, izina ry’umukobwa w’umunyabwenge.
Chloé ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umukobwa, rikaba ryaragiye rikoreshwa kuva kera mu Bagiriki bashaka gukeza imana yo gusarura.
Chloé ni umukobwa ukunze kurangwa n’impano y’ubwenge buhambaye uhorana inyota yo kwiga no kumenya ibintu bishya. Afite kamere yo kwigenga ndetse yishimira kugira ibihe bituje byo gutekereza.
Uyu mukobwa arangwa n’ubushishozi akanga kugira amakimbirane ndetse agakunda kunga abantu. Chloé yigirira icyizere gike ariko imico ye ikurura abagabo cyane.
Biragoye kumwegera kuko aba atuje cyane ariko iyo mumenyeranye uhinduka ingenzi kuri we.
Hari bimwe mu byamamare byabayeho byagiye byitwa iri zina hari umukinyi wa filimi w’Umunyamerika Chloë Sevigny wakinnye muri filimi Dogville na Zodiac. Undi wamamaye cyane ni Chloë Moretz, watangiye gukina filimi ku myaka irindwi. Hari kandi umunyamideli w’Umufaransa, Chloé Mortaud wabaye Nyampinga wa Albigensian Midi-Pyrénées mu 2009 akaba yarabaye n’igisonga cya gatatu cya Nyampinga w’Isi.
Impano zigezweho Abanya-Kigali bari gutegurira abakunzi babo kuri St Valentin (Amafoto).
Imyiteguro yo kwizihiza Umunsi w’Abakunda witiriwe ‘Saint Valentin’, irarimbanyije hirya no hino ku Isi by’umwihariko abo mu Mujyi wa Kigali ntibatanzwe, bari gucicikana bategurira abo bihebeye impano zo kubashimisha no kubashimira ko bababereye inkoramutima.
Uyu munsi wizihizwa ku wa 14 Gashyantare buri mwaka, urangwa n’uko abakundana bibuka urukundo rwabo bagasangira.
Hambere aha COVID-19 itaraza, abakundana barasohokanaga ariko by’umwihariko bagahana impano zitandukanye ziganjemo indabo.
Hirya no hino benshi mu bafite abakunzi bahangayikishijwe no kubashakira impano zabashimisha zigatuma babona ko bazirikanwe kuri uyu munsi ndetse bikagaragara nk’ikimenyetso cy’urukundo bafitanye.
Mu Mujyi wa Kigali n’ahandi hari urujya n’uruza rw’abagana mu masoko bajya gushaka impano nziza zizanyura abakunzi babo kuri St Valentin.
Impano zitangwa hagendewe ku byo ugiye kuyakira akunda ariko zigaherekezwa n’indabo z’amaroza atukura kuko afatwa na benshi nk’agaragaza urukundo. Kuva mu bihe byakera izi mpano zagiye zitangwa.
N’ubwo mu bihe byo hambere impano zatangwaga akenshi zabaga ari indabo, kuri ubu ibintu byahinduye isura haje uburyo bwo kubihuriza hamwe mu kintu kimwe indabo n’izindi mpano bikaba birimbishirijwe hamwe.
Bamwe mu bafite amaduka acuruza impano babwiye IGIHE ko kuri ubu hasigaye hagezweho uburyo bwo guhuza impano zigategurirwa hamwe n’indabo.
Mutezimana Sandra ucuruza mu iduka rya Bloom Rw, ricuruza indabo, amasaha agezweho, impeta n’ibindi bikoresho bitandukanye bahuriza hamwe ugasanga bikoze akantu keza umuntu ashobora guha uwo bakundana bikamugwa ku mutima.
Yavuze ko ubu bisigaye byoroshye ku bakiliya gutanga impano nziza kandi bataruhijwe no kuzigeraho.
Ati “Ubundi twe tuba dufite ibintu bitandukanye, umukiliya atubwira ibyo yifuza gushyira mu mpano tukabimuvangira mu ikarito yabugenewe n’indabo, ukabona ari byiza akabisanga bimeze neza atiriwe ashakisha kimwe kimwe.”
Kuba izi mpano zifasha abakiliya kubona ibintu byiza kandi vuba byemejwe na Nyishimire Gisèle, ufite iduka rya Aveda Blossom ricuruza impano zitandukanye wavuze ko ubu buryo bujyanye n’iterambere kandi bworohereza abaguzi.
Ati “Izi mpano zakoreshwaga mu bihugu byateye imbere ariko no mu Rwanda zarahageze kuko natwe tugendana n’iterambere n’ibigezweho, kandi ubu buryo ni bwiza kuko bworohereza umuguzi kuko aza asanga ibintu biteguye hamwe kandi ari byiza.”
Ku ruhande rw’abaguzi na bo bavuga ko ubu buryo ari bwiza buborohereza kubona ibyo bashaka byose batiriwe bazenguruka ahantu henshi.
Mubera Angelique waguriye umukunzi we imwe muri izi mpano yavuze ko ubu buryo bumushimishije kuko yabonye ibyo yashakaga byinshi ahantu hamwe kandi ari byiza.
Ati “Naje kugura izi mpano hano kuko ibyo nari nkeneye byose nabibonye ntiriwe niruka mu maduka atandukanye kandi bizananyorohereza kuzitanga ziri hamwe kandi biba zinasa neza.”
Saint Valentin y’uyu mwaka igiye kwizihizwa mu bihe abantu basabwa kubahiriza ingamba zashyizweho mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19.
Muri iki gihe, Leta yafashe ingamba zitandukanye zo gukumira abantu benshi guhurira ahantu hafunze, kwiyakirira muri restaurant n’ahandi bikaba byatuma habaho kwanduzanya.
Guhana impano ni bwo buryo buzoroha muri iki gihe mu rwego rwo kubahiriza ingamba zo kwirinda COVID-19, cyane ko zishobora kugera ku muntu mu buryo bworoshye kuko zicururizwa no kuri internet.
Kagame Charles yahishuye uko Imana yamurokoye urupfu, anakomoza ku ruhisho afitiye abakunzi be
Umuhanzi w’umunyempano Kagame Charles ukora umuziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana muri Australia yashimye Imana nyuma yo kurokoka impanuka ikomeye aherutse gukora.
Kagame Charles asengera mu Itorero rya Lifehouse Church mu Mujyi wa Coffsharbour muri Australia ndetse ni naho akorera ivugabutumwa rinyuze mu ndirimbo.
Uyu muhanzi mu minsi ishize, humvikanye inkuru zivuga ko yakoze impanuka bituma abakunzi b’umuziki we bibaza uko amerewe.
Mu kiganiro cyihariye yagiranye na IGIHE, Kagame Charles, yavuze uko yasimbutse urupfu mu mpanuka yakoe, anakomoza ku bikorwa ateganya mu minsi iri imbere bijyanye n’umuziki we.
Yagize ati “Impanuka nakoze ni iy’imodoka, nagize ikibazo cy’igufwa ry’akaboko k’iburyo, gusa ku bw’urukundo rw’Imana ndi amahoro ndetse ndi gukira.”
Yakomeje avuga ko ibikorwa byinshi yateganyaga gukora mu muziki byakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 cyugarije Isi. Muri byo harimo gutunganya indirimbo y’amashusho n’izindi zikiri muri studio ndetse n’indi yifuza gukorana n’abandi bahanzi banyuranye.
Indirimbo y’amashusho Kagame Charles azashyira hanze ku ikubitiro yitwa “Amakuru”, iri kuri album ya mbere ari gukora igizwe n’indirimbo 10, amajwi yayo akaba yarakozwe na Boris.
Yakomeje ati “Ku ruhande rwa muzika na ho nkomeje gukora cyane n’ubwo ibikorwa twari dufite byagiye bikomwa mu nkokora na Coronavirus bigatuma bitazira igihe bisanzwe bizira, muri ibyo bikorwa harimo nk’indirimbo y’amashusho yagombaga gusohoka vuba mbere y’uko ‘Guma mu rugo’ ya Kigali igaruka kuko hari ibice byakorerwaga mu Rwanda. Ikindi hari indirimbo ziri muri studio ndetse harimo n’iyo twifuza gukora mu gihe cyose COVID-19 yaba irangiye.”
Yashimiye abantu bose bamugaragarije ko bakunda ibihangano bye, anasobanura ko impamvu indirimbo ye nshya yatinze gusohoka bifitanye isano na Guma mu rugo, Umujyi wa Kigali warimo yatumye hari ibikorwa bimwe bitagenda neza.
Kagame Charles yasoje atanga ubutumwa ku bantu bose, abasaba kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Ati “Ubu dukomeje kwirinda Coronavirus ndetse dushishikariza abakunzi bacu kuyirinda. Turifuza ko bakomeza kudushyigikira ndetse bagashyigikira ibihangano byacu.”
Uyu muhanzi mu rugendo rwe rw’umuziki amaze gushyira hanze indirimbo enye zirimo “Ahindura ibihe”, “Tubagarure”, “Ntuzibagirwe” n’iyitwa “Naragukunze”.
Kagame Charles ni umwe mu babarizwa muri Moriah Entertainment Group ibarizwamo abandi bahanzi b’amazina akomeye mu muziki uhimbaza Imana barimo Gahongayire Aline, Patient Bizimana, Gaby Kamanzi, Richard Ngendahayo, Kanuma Damascène, Umurundi Fortran Bigirimana n’abandi.
Souleyman, izina ry’umuhungu ukunda gusoma.
Souleymane ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umuhungu rikaba rikomoka mu Cyarabu aho risobanura umuntu ufite umutima wera.
Souleymane aba ari umuntu utangaje cyane, ni wa muntu ushobora kumara amasaha menshi yiherereye ari gusoma ibintu bimufitiye akamaro ku buryo abo bari kumwe bashobora kuyoberwa aho yagiye ari gusoma.
Arangwa n’ubushishozi ndetse iyo muhuye bwa mbere ubona ari umuntu utavuga ariko sibyo kuko azi kuvuga no kuganiriza abantu cyane abakuze. Yisanga cyane mu bugeni ndetse akunda kwigisha ibintu bitandukanye abantu bari kumwe. Akunda siporo, umuziki ndetse no kwishimira ubuzima.
Hari bimwe mu byamamare byagiye byitwa iri zina birimo nk’umukinyi wa ruhago wo muri Senegal, Souleymane Diawara n’umukinyi w’iteramakofi Souleymane Cissokho ndetse hari n’umukinyi wa filimi wamenyekanye cyane Souleymane Cissé.
Yann Gwet yakomoje ku kiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame cyamubereye imbarutso yo kuba Umunyarwanda.
Inama y’Abaminisitiri yateranye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 2 Gashyantare 2021 iyobowe na Perezida Kagame, yahaye ubwenegihugu abantu batanu, nyuma yo kubisuzumana ubushishozi.
Yann Gwet, umwanditsi wo muri Cameroun akaba n’umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu ishami ry’itangazamakuru ndetse n’umufasha we, Sidonie Kouam Gwet ni bamwe mu bahawe ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda.
Gwet yagaragaje ibyishimo byo guhabwa ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda n’uburyo ikiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame aricyo cyahinduye cyane uko yatekerezaga u Rwanda, akiyemeza kuba umwe mu baharanira iterambere ryarwo.
Mu nyandiko yanyujije muri Jeune Afrique, Gwet yavuze ko Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yabaye akiri muto. Mu rwego rwo kugerageza kumva neza ibyabaye, yasomye ibitabo bitandukanye birimo L’inavouable cya Patrick Saint-Exupéry. Gwet avuga ko aho gusobanukirwa yakomezaga kugwa mu rujijo, gusa muri byose akumva ko ibyabaye mu Rwanda ari ibyago bidasanzwe.
Icyamutunguye cyane cyanatumaga yibaza byinshi, ni uburyo igihugu cyari cyarasenyutse mu myaka 27 ishize, cyiyubatse mu kanya gato ubu kikaba ari intangarugero muri Afurika.
Mu 2016, uyu mugabo avuga ko yageze mu Rwanda. Bwari ubwa kabiri ahageze. Yari yitabiriye Inama Mpuzamahanga yiga ku Bukungu (World Economic Forum). Icyo gihe yagize amahirwe yo kuba umwe bitabiriye ikiganiro Perezida Paul Kagame yagiranye n’abanyamakuru baba ab’imbere mu gihugu na mpuzamahanga.
Gwet yavuze ko akimara guhabwa umwanya ngo abaze Perezida, yari afite ibibazo bitatu, ariko kimwe muri ibyo nicyo cyahinduye imyumvire ye kiba n’inkomoko y’umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo kwaka ubwenegihugu bw’u Rwanda.
Ibibazo bibiri bya mbere byabazaga Perezida Kagame kuvuga uko atekereza imiyoborere mu myumvire nyafurika. Ikibazo cya gatatu ari nacyo cyahinduriye Gwet ubuzima cyagiraga kiti “Bivuze iki kuba Umunyarwanda? Iki kibazo numvaga gifite akamaro gakomeye kuri njye kuko nabonaga ko nubwo ubukungu ari ingenzi cyane, ariko ubwabwo budahagije ngo igihugu kibeho igihe kinini.”
Gwet yavuze ko gushyira hamwe nk’igihugu bidahari, ubukungu nta gaciro bwaba bufite uko bwaba ari bwiza kose.
Ati “Gushyira hamwe niko kwari ku isonga mu byago u Rwanda rwanyuzemo ariko [gushyira hamwe] ni nako kwari mu mushinga wa FPR Inkotanyi ya Kagame. Natekereje ko ari indangagaciro ishinze imizi mu muco nyarwanda.”
Perezida Kagame yasobanuriye Gwet ko kuba Umunyarwanda no kuba umunyafurika mwiza ntaho bitandukaniye.
Ati “Yansobanuriye ko u Rwanda ari igice kimwe kigize Afurika bityo ibyaruyabeho bitatandukanywa cyane n’ibyagwiririye umugabane wose. Kuba Umunyarwanda ni inzira yo kuba umunyafurika. Indangagaciro nyarwanda zigomba kuba iziha ikaze Afurika n’isi.”
Perezida Kagame yamusobanuriye ko politiki nziza ibereye Afurika ikwiriye kuba irenga ibijyanye n’amoko byahawe intebe kuri uwo mugabane, ikareba iterambere rya bose.
Ati “Natekereje ko icyo gisubizo gitandukanye n’icyo nari niteze. Kuba twiyumvamo kuba abanyafurika ntabwo bigabanyiriza agaciro kuba turi Abanyarwanda. Ushobora kunyurwa n’injyana ifutse y’indirimbo za Cécile Kayirebwa [...] ukumva umeze nk’uri mu rugo aho waba uherereye hose muri Afurika. Ushobora kuva ikantarange ukisanga mu cyerecyezo cy’u Rwanda. Turi Abanyarwanda kubw’amaraso ariko birashoboka ko mbere na mbere turi bo kubw’umutima.”
Gwet yaje gusesengura ibyo yabwiwe na Perezida Kagame, asanga mu bibazo byose u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo, hari abanyafurika bake barunambyeho nta kindi baruca, ahubwo kuko bumvaga ko ari inshingano zabo kwifatanya na bagenzi babo bari mu kaga.
Byagaragaye ubwo impunzi ibihumbi z’abanyarwanda zirukanwaga mu gihugu mu 1959, zikakiranwa yombi n’Abanyafurika bo mu bindi bihugu.
Yavuze kandi kuri Ibrahim Gambari ushinzwe ibikorwa by’inama y’abaminisitiri mu biro bya Perezida wa Nigeria Muhammadu Buhari, mu gihe cya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi wari ambasaderi w’igihugu cye muri Loni. Gambari yarwanyije bikomeye umwanzuro w’ibihugu bikomeye byari byanze gutabara u Rwanda.
Gwet yavuze ko “muri icyo gihe, Ibrahim Gambari yiyumvaga nk’umunya-Nigeria, Umunyafurika n’Umunyarwanda icyarimwe.”
Yongeye gutanga urugero rwa nyakwigendera Jerry Rawlings wayoboraga Ghana mu 1994, mu gisa nk’ubwiyahuzi wemeje umwanzuro wari wafashwe na Brig Gen Henry Kwami Anyidoho, wari umugaba w’ingabo za Ghana zari mu butumwa bwa Loni mu Rwanda. Anyidoho yafashe umwanzuro wo kurekera ingabo z’igihugu cye mu Rwanda binyuranyije n’icyemezo Loni yari yafashe cyo kugabanya ingabo ntizirenge 270.
Gwet avuga no ku bandi basirikare b’Abanyafurika bari bari mu butumwa bwo kugarura amahoro mu Rwanda, bitanze barimo n’umunya- Sénégal capitaine Mbaye Diagne wiciwe mu Rwanda agerageza gutabara abicwaga.
Ati “Izi ntwari zose zatabaye ikuzo rya Afurika mu gihe abayobozi bayo bo batari bashishikajwe na dosiye irebana n’u Rwanda mu 1994. Ibikorwa byabo by’ubutwari byabaye umurama washibutsemo u Rwanda rushya. Bagaragaje icyo kuba umunyarwanda bivuze mu buryo bumwe n’ubwa Paul Kagame, baharanira amahoro, ubumwe n’iterambere ry’abanyarwanda bose n’abanyafurika muri rusange.”
Gwet yavuze ko icyo kiganiro yagiranye na Perezida Kagame, cyatumye akunda u Rwanda anarwimukiramo, akemeza ko hari indi Afurika nziza ishoboka, Afurika yose iramutse ifite imyumvire nk’iya Perezida Kagame.
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu byaguye amarembo kandi bitanga ubwenegihugu ku babwifuza, mu gihe bujuje ibisabwa birimo no kureba inyungu iguhugu kimufiteho.
Louis, izina ry’umuhungu ukunda umuryango we.
Louis ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umuhungu rikomoka ku ijambo Hlodowig risobanura amahirwe n’intambara.

Inkuru y’urukundo rutangaje rwa Jules na Alice bahuriye kuri internet.
 Ni gake cyane abantu badasanzwe baziranye bahurira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bakahakundanira kugeza biyemeje gufata umwanzuro wo kubana nk’umugore n’umugabo.
Abantu benshi batekereza ko umuntu muhuriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mudashobora kugira urukundo ruhamye, bitewe nuko hari abahaza bashaka gukinisha abandi nyamara hari n’abishimira abandi kuri izi mbuga.
Uku niko byagendeye Jules wishimiye Alice akamwandikira ku rubuga rwa Instaragaram,ariko uyu mukobwa agatekereza ko ari bamwe batesha abantu umutwe ntiyahita amusubiza.
Uwawe ntaho wamucikira! Nyuma y’umwaka Jules amwandikiye, Alice yaje kumusubiza, inkuru y’urukundo rwabo itangirira aho, batangira guhamagara no kuganira byimbitse.
Mu kiganiro aba bombi bagiranye na 1K Studio, bavuze ko umunsi wa mbere bavuganye bahise bahuza ndetse buri wese yishimira gukomeza kuvugana na mugenzi we.
Uyu mukobwa Alice, usanzwe ari umunyamideli yavuze ko yamusubije akuruwe n’ifoto agira ngo ni umufotozi ushaka kumufotora, nyuma yo kuvugana aramwishimira cyane yifuza gukomezanya na we.
Ati “Yari yaranyandikiye sinahita musubiza mbonye ifoto nkeka ko afotora ashaka kumfotora ndamusubiza, dutangira kuvugana umunsi wa Mbere twavuganye amasaha atanu na nyuma numva nshaka ko twakomeza kuvugana.”
Yakomeje avuga ko bitewe n’uburyo bahuje mu minsi itatu yahise yumva amakunze cyane yifuza ko yamubera umukunzi ndetse afata iyambere mu kubimubwira.
Ati “Twaravuganaga cyane ha handi nabaga ndi kumwe n’abandi sinibuke ko turi kumwe. Hari umunsi twavuganye cyane mpita mfata umwanzuro wo kumubwira ko mukunda ndamwandikira ndabimubwira na we abyakira neza cyane.”
Ku ruhande rwa Jules avuga ko babyakiriye neza kuko na we yari yaramukunze bahita batangira inzira y’urukundo rwabo.
Ati “Yanyoherereje ijwi ry’iminota irindwi yose ambwira ko ankunda ryumva nk’inshuro eshatu, nanjye nari naramukunze duhita tujya mu rukundo ko twese twabyiyumvagamo.”
Urukundo rwabo rwakomeje kugenda nkuko babyifuza gusa bagiye bahura n’imbogamizi zitandukanye bitewe n’uko Jules aba mu mahanga bigatuma hatabaho kwizerana cyane.
Jules yavuze ko hari igihe yajyaga atekereza ko uyu mukobwa yaba afite abandi bahungu bavugana kuko atari amuri hafi, ariko bitewe n’icyizere yamweretse biza gushira.
Ati “Iyo utari hafi y’umuntu ngo mubonane bituma wumva ufite irungu ndetse ntimuhuze n’umwanya wo kuvugana cyane. Bituma wumva utizeye ko ari wowe wenyine. Numvaga ko hari abandi bavugana ariko uko twavuganaga byatumye mwizera cyane.”
Bitewe no kunga ubumwe ndetse no kwizerana byatumye urukundo rwabo rukomera, birangira bafashe umwanzuro wo kubana. Jules yamaze kwambika Alice impeta amusaba kumubera umugore ndetse baritegura gukora ubukwe.

Nina ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umukobwa rikaba rifite ibisobanuro bitandukanye bitewe n’aho rituruka. Muri Espagne risobanura ikintu gito, naho mu giheburaho riva ku ijambo Hannah risobanura ubuntu.
Nina aba ari umukobwa urangwa no gutungurana, arangwa no gukunda kuyobora abandi kuko ahorana ibitekerezo byiza. Ni umuntu kandi ukunda ibintu bikozwe neza icyo yifuza ashirwa akigezeho.
Azi gusobanuro ibitekerezo bye kandi ahorana inyota yo kwiga no kugera ku bintu byiza, ibi bituma akomeza gutera imbere ndetse agateza imbere n’abamwegereye.

Byinshi ku ndabo z’amaroza, n’ayo waha umukunzi wawe kuri Saint Valentin.
Guhana indabo ni kimwe mu byerekana urukundo ruri hagati y’abantu, iyo umuntu aruguhaye aba akwereka ko agufitiye urukundo rukomeye kandi ko ashimishishijwe n’umubano wanyu.
Abantu bahana indabo mu buryo butandukanye bitewe n’umubano bafitanye cyangwa n’icyabaye hagati yabo, ariko akenshi abakunda guhana indabo ni abari mu rukundo, umusore n’inkumi cyangwa umugabo n’umugore.
Abakundana bahana indabo mu kugaragarizanya urukundo rukomeye ruri hagati yabo cyangwa bakazihana bitewe n’ibirori bitandukanye bizihiza ariko akenshi biganisha ku rukundo rwabo.
Nubwo guhana indabo bigaragara nk’ikimenyetso cy’urukundo kiri hagati y’abakundana ariko siko indabo zose zisobanura urukundo kuko usanga hari n’izisobanura agahinda cyangwa undi mubano utari urukundo.
Hari ubwo habaho ukwibeshya k’ugiye gutanga ururabo akumva gutanga amaroza ayo ariyo yose bisobanuye urukundo ariko ni ukwibeshya kuko buri maroza agira icyo asobanuye nubwo yose aba aganisha ku mubano mwiza.
Nk’amaroza y’umuhondo asobanura ubucuti buri hagati y’abantu, ubu bwoko ushobora kubuha umuntu w’inshuti yawe umwereka ko unyuzwe n’ubucuti mufitanye.
Naho amaroza afite ibara ry’iroza yo asobanura gushima, ubuntu n’umunezero. Aya uyaha umuntu ushaka kumushimira bitewe n’igikorwa runaka yagukoreye.
Byaba bitangaje ko ku munsi wahariwe abakundana ushobora guha uwo mwashakanye amaroza y’umuhondo kandi washakaga kumugaragariza urukundo ruri hagati yanyu.
Iki gihe ukoze ibi, ntiwaba umweretse rwa rukundo washakaga ko abona abaye ari umuntu usobanukiwe n’iby’indabo, ntabwo byamushimisha kuko yakwibaza uburyo urukundo rw’abashakanye uruhinduyemo ubucuti busanzwe, icyiza rero ni uko wamuha amaroza atukura asobanura urukundo.
Aya maroza atukura yamenyekanye ubwo yakoreshwaga n’Abaromani n’Abagiriki aho yagaragaza Aphrodite cyangwa Venus ikaba yari Imana y’urukundo. Yaje gukoreshwa nk’ikimenyetso cy’abakundana bitewe na William Shakespeare wayakoreshaga mu bihangano bye bituma yamamara nk’akoreshwa hagati y’abakunda.
Abahana aya maroza ni abakundana urukundo rwo kubana nk’umugore n’umugabo cyangwa abamaze kubana, kuko asobanura urukundo. Biba byiza cyane kuyatanga ku munsi w’abakundana uzwi nka St Valentin.
Kuba amaroza atukura agaragaza urukundo byemezwa n’umucuruzi w’indabo, Bateta Grace wabwiye IGIHE ko iyo ushaka guha umukunzi wawe ururabo umuha amaroza atukura.
Ati “ Ubundi iyo ushaka guha umukunzi wawe ururabo umuha amaroza atukura kuko niyo asobanura urukundo, ntabwo ari byiza guha umukunzi wawe irindi bara kereka ushaka ku mushimira ukamuha iroza naho iyo ari urukundo ushaka kumwereka umuha amaroza atukura.”
Hirya no hino ku Isi hari ubwoko bw’amaroza busaga 150 bugiye bufite ibisobanura bitandukanye, mbere yo kugira uwo uha izi ndabo biba byiza kubanza kumenya icyo rusobanuye.
Amafaranga, kutanyurwa kw’abagabo; bimwe mu byihishe inyuma y’umubano w’ingaragu n’abubatse ingo.
Hari abatekereza ko kuba umugabo n’umugore bakubaka umuryango bituma batuza bakareka kujarajara mu bandi, na cyane ko umuco udashyigikira ingeso zirimo gucana inyuma kw’abashakanye, ariko iyo witegereje muri ibi bihe, usanga ibintu byarahinduye isura.
Bashobora no kuba abicanyi: Ubuzima bushaririye bw’abana bakurira mu miryango irimo amakimbirane.
Magingo aya biragoye ko hashira iminsi ibiri cyangwa itatu hatumvikanye inkuru y’umugabo cyangwa umugore wishe uwo bashakanye biturutse ku makimbirane arangwa mu miryango.
Iyi miryango igira amakimbirane kugeza ayigejeje ku kwicana iba ifite abana kandi ubwo bwumvikane buke hagati y’ababyeyi, buba bari kureba, bikaba byabatera ibibazo by’ihungabana.
Abahanga mu buzima bwo mu mutwe, bavuga ko abana bavuka ku babyeyi bagiranye amakimbirane arimo no kwicana, bahura n’ibibazo byo mu mutwe bibatera kujya mu mihanda, kunywa ibiyobyabwenge n’indi mico iterwa n’agahinda gakabije baba bagize.
Umuhanga mu mitekereze akaba n’umuganga mu bitaro bya Gihundwe, Mucyo Aline, yatangaje ko abana bavuka mu miryango iba yarabayemo ubwicanyi bahura n’ingaruka z’igihe kirekire zishobora kubaviramo guhinduka abagizi ba nabi.
Ati “Umwana uturuka muri iyi miryango usanga akura afite ipfunwe ryo kwegera abandi, aba yumva ko nawe bamubona nk’umwicanyi bigatuma ashaka ubundi buhungiro akajya mu biyobyabwenge ntiyegere abantu.”
“Kubera kugenda yihunza abantu, hari aho bigera agatangira kugira ihungabana, akagira uburwayi bwo mu mutwe, akaba yatangira kugirira nabi abantu ndetse no guhinduka umwicanyi.”
Kuba abana bahura n’izi ngaruka bituruka ku kuba batarakurikiranywe n’umuryango, abaganga ndetse n’inzego za leta kugira ngo umwana wahuye n’ibi bibazo aganirizwe areke kugira ihungabana.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Imikurire no kurengera umwana, kivuga ko mu nzego z’ibanze hari abantu baba bagenewe kuganiriza abana bahuye n’ibyo bibazo.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Imikurire no kurengera umwana, Dr. Anitha Asiimwe, yabwiye TV1 ko bakunda guhura n’ibibazo by’abana baba basizwe n’ababyeyi babo muri ubu buryo, ariko hari uburyo bafashwamo.
Ati “Buriya ku mudugudu habamo abo twita inshuti z’umuryango kuri buri mudugudu, haba hari babiri bahuguriwe ibijyanye no kurengera umwana iyo byabaye, ni bo bafata iya mbere mu kureba uko byifashe.”
“Aba bakorana n’inzobere mu buzima bwo mu mutwe baba bari mu bitaro bakaba bafasha umwana mu bijyanye n’imitekereze ndetse n’iyo adafite umuryango umwakira ahabwa ba malayika murinzi bakaba bamurera mu gihe tugishaka igisubizo kirambye.”
Kuba iyo habayeho kwicana hagati y’ababyeyi hakurikiraho gukurikirana uwakoze icyaha agafungwa ariko hakirengagizwa ingaruka zigera ku bana nabyo bituma abana bahura n’ihungabana. Ibi bitanga umukora ku miryango irengera abana wo kujya bakurikirana abana bo mu miryango irimo amakimbirane.
Baptiste izina ry’umuhungu urangwa n’umutuzo.
Baptiste ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umuhungu rikaba rikomoka ku ijambo ry’ikigereki baptizein, risobanura kwiyandikisha mu masakaramentu y’abakirisutu ubwo ni nko kubatizwa.
Baptiste arangwa n’amahoro n’umutuzo. Buri igihe aba afite ibyiringiro by’ibintu byiza,ni umuntu ukunda kumvikana bikamufasha kumvikanisha ibitekerezo bye. Akunda kuba ari wenyine ari gutekereza cyane bigatuma agenzura ibintu byose.
Ni umuntu abandi bagisha inama kandi agakunda gukemura amakimbirane, nta kintu afata nk’icyoroheje icyo yinjiyemo cyose agikorana imbaraga ze zose kuko yizera ko ibintu byose biva mu gukora cyane.
Hari bimwe mu byamamare byagiye byitwa iri zina nka Baptiste de Ville d’Avray umufaransa wamenyekanye mu gufotora, n’umunyamideli akaba n’umuririmbyi w’umufaransa Baptiste Giabiconi. Undi wamenyekanye cyane ni umukinyi wa ruhago Baptiste Martin.
Baptiste izina ry’umuhungu urangwa n’umutuzo
Baptiste ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umuhungu rikaba rikomoka ku ijambo ry’ikigereki baptizein, risobanura kwiyandikisha mu masakaramentu y’abakirisutu ubwo ni nko kubatizwa.
Baptiste arangwa n’amahoro n’umutuzo. Buri igihe aba afite ibyiringiro by’ibintu byiza,ni umuntu ukunda kumvikana bikamufasha kumvikanisha ibitekerezo bye. Akunda kuba ari wenyine ari gutekereza cyane bigatuma agenzura ibintu byose.

Kuki abakobwa benshi bakunda kugira ikibuno kinini?
Kugira amabere mato, mu nda zeru, ikibuno kinini ni ibintu biba ku mitima y’abakobwa benshi, aho usanga bamwe banywa ibinini byongeresha ikibuno, abandi bakiteresha inshinge, yewe hari n’abishyura akayabo muri ‘gym’ kugira ngo bakunde batere uko babyifuza.
Ushobora kwibaza impamvu ibitera, kuko uretse no mu Rwanda, usanga no hanze yarwo nko muri Amerika hari ibyamamare bivugwa ko byiyongeresheje ikibuno nka Cardi-B, Nicki Minaj, Iggy Azalea, Kim Kardashian, Kylie Jenner, Khloé Kardashian n’abandi.
Abakobwa bamwe babakurikira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, iyo babonye ukuntu bajegeza Isi, bafite ibihumbi by’abantu babakurikirana bumva bashatse kumera nkabo, bagakora ibishoboka byose ngo bagire ikibuno kinini, ari naho usanga hari abanyweye ibinini, abiteresha inshinge, abandi gym yarahindutse nk’akazi.
N’ejo bundi aha Kicukiro, twumvise aho abagore n’abakobwa bari barayobotse bashaka kongeresha ikibuno, bigaragaza ko urukundo rwacyo rutari urw’imahanga gusa, n’aha iwacu rwose agatima kararehareha.
Uretse abakobwa babikunda, abahungu nabo ngo babikunda kurushaho ari nayo impamvu benshi bifuza kugira ikibuno kinini, kugira ngo bagire umubiri ukurura abahungu.
Kenshi uzasanga amafoto y’abakobwa batari bake ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bifotoje basa nkabacyerekana, yaba afite ikibuno kinini cyangwa gito akora ku buryo kigaragara mu ifoto.
Mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Kaminuza ya Texas muri Austin, ku bagabo 100 bari hagati y’imyaka 17 na 34, bwagaragaje ko abagabo bakunda abakobwa bafite umugongo muto wihese kuri dogere 45 kuva aho urangirira kugeza ku kibuno.
Niba utabyumva neza ariko ukaba uzi uko Kim Kardashian ateye, wamaze kubona neza ishusho y’uko biba bimeze.
Daily Mail ivuga ko impamvu abakobwa bakiri bato babaye imbata yo kugira ikibuno kinini. Uwitwa Beth Cobb w’imyaka 24 yavuze ko babiterwa no kubona ibyamamare ku mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Yagize ati “Urungano rwanjye 100% bashishikajwe n’imiterere y’ikibuno kuruta iy’amabere, kubera ko tubona ibyamamare byinshi bicyerekana kuri Instagram’.
Ikinyamakuru MTL Blog kivuga ko impamvu abakobwa bakunda kugira ikibuno kinini, ari ukubera ko bigaragara neza, bikurura abagabo, ndetse bifasha umukobwa mu gihe atwite kutagira imvune kuko ikibuno kimufasha kutaremerwa n’inda ndetse n’ibindi.
Icyo abahanga bavuga ku bakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini
Mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe na Sosiyete yitwa Elsevier yo mu Buholandi mu 2008, bwagaragaje ko abakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini bagira ubwenge bwinshi kuruta abafite gito.
Ibi bikaba biterwa n’uko ibinure biba ku kibuno bibamo ibyitwa ‘Omega-3’ bisanzwe biboneka mu birirwa birimo ifi, byagaragaye ko bifasha mu gukura k’ubwonko.
Abakobwa bafite ikibuno kinini, baba bafite amahirwe yo kutarwara indwara z’umutima n’umwijima nk’uko ubushakashatsi bwakozwe na cell metabolism bubivuga.
Ibi biterwa ahanini n’uko ibinure biguma ku kibuno gusa, ntibikomeze kuzenguruka mu mubiri. Ubu bushakashatsi kandi bukomeza buvuga ko ibinure byo ku kibuno atari bibi ku buzima bw’umuntu.
Ubundi bushakashatsi bwakozwe bwagaragaje ko ikibuno kibamo ibinure birimo ingano ya Cholesterol ihagije ku rugero rwiza, ituma imitsi y’amaraso izibuka, bikarinda indwara z’umutima.
Abahanga mu bya siyansi muri Kaminuza ya Harvard, bo bagaragaje ko ubwoko bw’ibinure biba ku kibuno bigabanya ingaruka zo kurwara diabète yo mu bwoko bwa 2, kubera ko ibyo binure biba munsi y’uruhu byongera imikorere myiza y’umusemburo wa insuline wifashishwa mu kugena isukari umubiri ukeneye.
Icyo wakora ngo ugire ikibuno kinini
Niba udafite ikibuno kinini ukaba wifuza kukigira, bisaba ko gushirika ubute ukabikorera.
Insaf Aouadi umutoza ukomeye wa siporo mu Bufaransa, afite umwihariko wo gutoza abakobwa bashaka kugira ikibuno kinini, avuga ko abakobwa bakora imyitozo yahimbwe n’umutoza witwa Gady, y’iminota 15 gatatu mu cyumweru.
Iyi myitozo irimo gukora ‘squats’ 20, zikorwa uhagarara ukongera ugasa nk’uwicara ariko ntugere hasi, ariko ukicara ushyize ikibuno inyuma. Ukabikora inshuro 20.
Bakongera bagakora ‘squats’ 10 basimbuka, aho guhagarara ukongera ukicara ahubwo urasimbuka ukicara kwa kundi twavuze haruguru, ukabikora inshuro 10.
Izindi ‘sport’ bakora ni izitwa ‘hip thrusts’. Ufata igikoresho kimeze nk’intebe irambuye ariko kigufi, ugashikamizaho amaboko, ugashyira ikibuno hasi ugahina amavi, ukajya uzamuka ukongera ukamanuka inshuro 20.
Insaf Aouadi avuga ko bakora iyo myitozo itatu bakaruhuka umunota umwe, bakabikora inshuro eshanu.
Hari abatoza benshi bagira uburyo bwabo bwo gukoresha izi sport zituma umuntu azana ikibuno, ndetse no mu rugo wabigerageza gusa zigomba guherekezwa no kurya ibiryo birimo poroteyine zifasha kongera umubiri.
Ushaka kumenya byinshi ku byerekeye indyo na sport wakora kugira ngo ugire ikibuno kinini, wasoma igitabo kitwa ’Grossir les fesses’ cya Natacha J.C cyangwa ukazasoma icyitwa ‘Fesses bombées’ cy’umufaransa witwa Valérie Orsoni kizasohoka tariki 11 Werurwe 2021 kuri Amazon.
Ibyo kwitaho mbere yo gusubira mu rukundo nyuma ya gatanya.
Gatanya ni ikintu gikomeye kuri buri muntu yaba ari wowe yaturutseho cyangwa ari mugenzi wawe,buri muntu ajya gushinga urugo yifuza kugira umuryango kandi wishimye iyo habayeho gutandukana ubabazwa n’uko ya ntego itagezweho.
Nyuma ya gatanya umuntu anyura mu bihe bikomeye ariko usanga biba bimuganisha aheza, ni ibisanzwe ku muntu kugira amarangamutima atandukanye bitewe n’icyamubayeho.
Kubwa Elisabeth Kubler Ross, inzobere mu bibanire y’abantu avuga ko hari ibyiciro umuntu anyuramo nyuma ya gatanya birimo kutumva ibyabaye, uburakari, kumvikana n’uwo mwatandukanye, kugira agahinda gakabije no kwiyakira.
Nubwo biba ari ibihe bitoroshye ariko ubuzima burakomeza ndetse ukaba wakongera no kujya mu rukundo ko gutandukana nti bisobanuye ko ubuzima bw’urukundo burangiye.
Gusa gutangira undi mubano bisaba kwitonda kugira ngo uwo utangiye utazahungabana bitewe n’ibisigisi by’uwa mbere. Dore ibintu bitanu ukwiye kwitaho mbere yo gutangira urukundo rushya.
Igihe ni ingenzi mu kumenya niba witeguye kujya mu rukundo rushya. Icyo bigufasha ni ukureba niba warihaye igihe gihagije cyo kwiyakira kuri gatanya wagize.
Biba byiza iyo uvuye mu rukundo kudahita utangira urundi rushya kuko ushobora gusanga utarakira ko rwa rundi rwarangiye bikaba byatuma n’urushya ugiyemo rwangirika kuko uvanga ibishya n’ibyashize.
Iyo wihaye igihe kirekire cyo kubanza kwiyakira, bituma ukora ibyo watekereje ugafata n’umwanya wo gutekereza ku mukunzi mushya naho iyo uhubutse ushobora gufata uwo ubonye cyangwa utamukunze ari ubuhungiro ushaka.
Nubwo ibijyanye n’urukundo rwawe ari ubuzima bwawe bwite ariko rushobora kugira aho ruhurira n’abakuri hafi, niba uwo mwatandukanye mwari mufitanye abana kujya mu rukundo rushya biragusaba kubanza kwitonda.
Iyo ababyeyi batandukanye ntibituma n’abana batandukana n’ababyeyi babo baba bagomba gukomeza kubabona nkuko bikwiye, kandi bisaba no gukomeza kubereka urukundo ko bo ntibaba bumva uburyo mwatandukanye.
Iyo ugiye mu rundi rukundo rushya abana bawe batarakira itandukana ryanyu bishobora kubagora kubereka undi mukunzi wawe utandukanye n’umubyeyi wabo, bikaba byabaviramo kumwanga bumva ariwe ntandaro ya gatanya y’ababyeyi babo.
Bisaba kwitonda abana bakabanza bakabyakira ndetse ukamenya n’uko bazabana n’umubyeyi wabo n’umukunzi wawe nta kibazo biteje.
Nubwo mujya guhana gatanya mwabyumvikanyeho ariko uwo mwahoze mubana iyo yumvise ko uri mu rukundo bishobora kumutera gufuha, bikaba byatuma akwima uburenganzira ku bana abereka ko ari wowe wisangiye abandi.
Bisaba kugira uko ubyitwaramo kuburyo umubano wawe mushya utazamutera ishyari, ndetse ukareba neza niba mudashobora kwiyunga no gusubirana mbere yo kujya ahandi biba byiza kugutekereza kuwo mwatandukanye.
Gatanya ituma amarangamutima yawe ahungabana bikaba byagutera kwiyanga no kwitakariza icyizere. Hari abagira agahinda gakabije bitewe no kwigaya ko batabashije kurinda umuryango wabo gutandukana.
Mbere yo gushaka umuntu mwakundana banza wikunde wowe ubwawe wongere wigirire icyizere, ndetse umenye n’uruhare wagize muri gatanya kugira ngo utazongera gukora ayo makosa nanone.
Numara kongera kwikunda uzabona uko ukunda mugenzi wawe, kuko bitabaye ibyo bizatuma utigirira icyizere bikaba byatuma wumva udakunzwe n’umubano mushya watangiye ukagupfira ubusa.
Kwakira ko utakiri kumwe nuwo mwatandukanye
Iyo wakunze umuntu cyane biragora kumva ko mutakiri kumwe hari n’abahora bategereje ko yazabagarukira, umenya ko wamaze kubyakira iyo wumva wabana n’undi kandi umwizeye kandi ko uwo mwatandukanye utamukeneye nk’umukunzi wawe.
Biba byiza kubanza kwikuramo uwa mbere iyo utangiye urukundo rushya ukimutekereza bituma utangira kugereranya abantu babiri, ibi bituma uwo muri kumwe atanezerwa ndetse nawe ukabona utanyuzwe.
Musanze: Ntibanika afite imyaka 106 n’abamukomokaho 102 kandi aracyakomeye; ibanga ryo kuramba.
Ntibanika Agnes, ni umwe mu Banyarwanda bake bariye ingoma ya Yuhi V Musinga kuri ubu bakaba bari no gusogongera ku byiza bya Leta y’Ubumwe. Afite imyaka irenga 100 kuko yavutse mu 1915 nk’uko bigaragara mu byangombwa by’irangamimerere.
Uyu mukecuru utuye mu Karere ka Musanze, Umurenge wa Rwaza mu Kagari ka Kabushinge avuga ko atibuka neza igihe yavukiye gusa ibyangombwa bye bigaragaza ko yavutse mu 1915, ubwo Intambara ya mbere y ’Isi yari irimbanyije, bivuze ko afite imyaka 106.
Yabaye mu Rwanda rutagira imodoka, rutagira umujyi, rutagira inkweto ndetse rutarangwamo n’urukarango, none ubu imihanda y’umukara yo mu Karere ka Musanze arayogoga nk’abandi. Yariye Ingoma araziyongeza.
Kuramba ni umugisha ndetse abandi babibona nk’amahirwe cyane cyane iyo bigeze mu bihugu bikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere aho na 40 kuyirenza aba ari Imana bitewe n’ubuzima bugoranye abaturage babyo banyuramo umunsi ku munsi.
Ku Isi yose byumvikana nk’igitangaza ko umuntu arengeje imyaka 100 y’amavuko kuko uhiga abandi ari Umuyapanikazi, Kane Takana w’imyaka 118.
Mu kiganiro kirambuye uyu mukecuru yagiranye na IGIHE yahishuye byinshi mu buzima bwe yemeza ko ari byo byamufashije kuramba.
IGIHE: Ese waba wibuka igihe wavukiye?
Ntibanika: Nakwibuka se gute? Ntabwo nibuka igihe navukiye; cyakora ba mama bambwiraga ko navutse inzara yarateye ariko icyo nibuka ni uko navukanye n’undi twari impanga ngo njye nasigaye mu nda mvuka bukeye undi yaraye hanze.
IGIHE: Wibuka se aho wavukiye?
Ntibanika: Navukiye Kirama ( Ubu Ni mu Murenge wa Gacaca muri Musanze) hakurya y’uruzi rwa Mukungwa.
Ntibanika: Oya hasigaye umukobwa umwe abandi baratashye.
IGIHE: Tubwire muri make uko ubayeho kuri uyu musozi?
Ntibanika: None se mbayeho ku bwanjye? Mbayeho ku bw’ Imana; Nyagasani niwe umbeshejeho n’abangaba ( Yavugaga abagore b’abuzukuru be bari aho).
IGIHE: Nonese, ni utekereza ari iki cyatumye ugira imyaka 100?
Ntibanika: Umva nariye neza kandi n’aha nashakiye umugabo nashatse yandishije neza!
IGIHE: Ni iki wakundaga kurya?
Ntibanika: Sinakunze kurya ibidasanzwe kuko twaryaga byinshi twiyejereje, gusa naryaga n’akanyama, umuceri yewe nariye neza ntacyo nigeze nicuza kuko byose twabaga tubifite.
IGIHE: Naho mu byo kunywa wakundaga iki?
Ntibanika: Nakundaga kunywa akagwa kuko twari dufite urutoki rwera cyane, tugakama kandi kera ntibasengerezaga (Kugurisha inzoga), abagabo bacu bari abantu bashyize hamwe bagatumirana, bakanywa, tugateka ibishyimbo, amateke, ibihaza, ibijumba n’ibindi kandi n’ubu ni uko sinigeze mbura ibyo kurya rwose.
IGIHE: Ni gute kera mwarimbaga ?
Ntibanika: Ni impu twambaraga zivuye ku ntama bakazinyuka zanoga tukazambara n’imishumi, tugashyiraho ingimba n’imihagatiro mu mutwe. Twiyambariraga impu rwose.
IGIHE: Ni iyihe nama wagira urubyiruko rw’ubu ugendeye ku mahirwe ubona ahari?
Ntibanika: Urubyiruko rw’ubu rufite amahirwe menshi tutigeze tugira ariko bararangaye!
Twe kera ntitwigaga ariko bo bariga bakagera n’aho baba Abaminisitiri, Abadepite bakaba n’abategetsi bakomeye, gusa icyo nababwira gikomeye urubyiruko ry’ubu ni rwirinde ubusambanyi.
None ubu abakobwa bariraye, bari kubyara uko bishakiye, abahungu bari kubatera inda bakiri bato bikabicira ubuzima, bitware nk’uko twitwaraga.
IGIHE: Ni iki wumva wicuza utakoze mu buzima bwawe wumva wicuza?
Ntibanika: Ntacyo! Ntacyo nicuza rwose!
Kuba kwitwara neza Ntibanika avuga byatuma umuntu aramba binemezwa n’impuguke mu by’ubuzima Dr. Nduwumukiza Olivier uvuga ko igihe umuntu amara ku Isi kigenwa n’uko yitwaye.
Yagize ati " Ni ukuvuga ngo ibijyanye n’imisazire y’umuntu cyangwa umubiri biterwa n’uburyo umuntu aba yaritwaye mu buzima busanzwe; ibi bijyana n’imirire, iminywere n’uko yitwaye mu guhangana n’ibibazo biterwa n’umunaniro. Ibyo rero ntabwo ari buri wese ubasha kumenya uburyo yabyitwaramo"
"Ku bijyanye n’imirire, turabyiga ariko usanga akenshi na kenshi ababyize aribo babirengaho"
Yakomeje ati “Tuvuze ku guhangayika (Stress), nabyo byongera ibibazo mu mubiri, iyo ukora akazi cyane cyane ak’ijoro nturuhuke nabyo byaba intandaro."
"Ibi nabyo bisaba kumenya ngo ni gute nakwitwara mu gihe cyo guhangayika ariho hakenewe ibiribwa bifite intungamubiri”

Valentin izina ry’umuhungu ugira urukundo.
Valentin ni izina rihabwa umwana w’umuhungu rikaba rikomoka ku ijambo ry’ikiratini Valens bisobanura imbaraga.
Ba Valentin ni abantu bafite impano y’urukundo kandi bakita ku bantu batizigamye, akaba ari abantu b’abanyembaraga kuko bakunda guhatana ndetse iyo bamaze kumenya umuhamagaro wabo bashyiramo imbaraga zabo zose mu kuwukirikira.
Iri zina akenshi rifatwa nk’iry’urukundo bitewe na mutagatifu Valentin wapfuye kubera urukundo. Hari ibindi byamamare byagiye byitwa iri zina nka Valentin Sardou, umukinnyi w’amafilimi ndetse akaba n’umunyarwenya ukomeye.
