Inategura ibitaramo muri Ghana n’ibindi bihugu bikomeye ndetse yanatangiye ibirori birimo Kigali International Fashion Week ibera mu Buholandi, u Bubiligi, u Budage n’u Bwongereza.
Uyu mwaka bazatangira ibindi birori birimo ibizabera i New York, Tokyo, Thailanda na Singapore.
Ati “Mu Bubiligi ntitwiga byinshi byerekeye u Rwanda, twiga amateka make mu muryango ariko ubukungu ntacyo twiga, politike ntacyo twiga, amateka yo aba ari make cyane. Ubu ndishimye cyane.”
Ibyo Louise yavuze abihuriyeho na Mike nawe utuye mu Bubiligi, aho yemeza ko urugendo yagize rwasize amenye byinshi ku gihugu akomokamo.
Ati “Ntababeshye iyi ndi mu rugo ababyeyi banjye ntibajya bavuga u Rwanda cyane, kuri iyi nshuro nagize amahirwe yo kwiga byinshi ku butaka nkomokaho ni nsubira mu Bubiligi nzaba nzi byinshi ku gihugu cyanjye kandi ndabyishimiye.”
Aba bombi hamwe na bagenzi babo bahuriza ku kuba nibasubira mu bihugu baturutsemo bazagira uruhare mu gusangiza abandi ukuri k’u Rwanda kandi bakabashishikariza kuba nabo barusura.
Biteganyijwe ko uru rubyiruko ruzakomeza gusura ibice bitandukanye by’Igihugu birimo Inzu Ndangamurage y’u Rwanda, Pariki y’Akagera n’ibyiza nyaburanga bigize ikiyaga cya Kivu.
Iyi kipe yatsindiwe ku mukino wa nyuma mu 2019, yakomeje gusatira ndetse yabonye uburyo bwiza bwageragejwe na Gianluca Lapaduka, umunyezamu Ederson Morães atabara izamu rya Brésil.
Gutsinda uyu mukino byatumye Brésil igera ku mukino wa nyuma wa Copa América yimuriwe muri uyu mwaka nyuma y’uko itabaye mu 2020 kubera COVID-19.
Aganira n’itangazamakuru nyuma y’umukino, rutahizamu wa Brésil, Neymar, yavuze ko yifuza guhura na Argentine ku mukino wa nyuma.
Ati “Ndashaka Argentine ku mukino wa nyuma. Ni yo nshyigikiye kuko mfitemo inshuti nyinshi. Ku mukino wa nyuma, Brésil izatsinda.”
Umukino wa nyuma wa Copa América, uzabera kuri Stade Maracanã saa Munani z’ijoro rishyira ku Cyumweru, tariki ya 12 Nyakanga 2021.
Kuki Police FC yaryumyeho kuri Muhadjiri?
Ku wa 2 Nyakanga ni bwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko Hakizimana Muhadjiri yamaze gusinyira Police FC amasezerano y’umwaka umwe, agahabwa miliyoni 15 Frw, akanemererwa umushahara wa miliyoni 1 Frw buri kwezi.
Gusa, ubwo aya makuru yamenyekanaga, ubuyobozi bwa Police FC bwahakanye ko koko Muhadjiri yamaze gusinyira iyi kipe nk’uko Umunyamabanga Mukuru wayo, CIP Bikorimana Obed, yabibwiye IGIHE.
Ati “Ntabwo ari byo, gusa na we ni umwe muri benshi twifuza kandi nta n’ikipe itakwifuza umukinnyi mwiza.”
Kugeza ubu ntabwo Police FC iremeza aya makuru yaba ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo cyangwa biciye mu buyobozi bwayo nk’uko byagiye bigenda ku bandi bakinnyi yagiye isinyisha, ari na yo mpamvu bikomeje guteza urujijo.
Gusa, ubwo hari hashize amasaha make hagiye hanze amakuru y’isinyishwa rya Hakizimana Muhadjiri, kuri Twitter ya Police FC, hashyizweho ifoto y’umukinnyi utaragaragajwe, ashyira umukono ku masezerano, bikurikizwa amagambo agira ati "Mufore uwo ari we?"
Amakuru IGIHE yamenye, avuga ko uyu mukinnyi ashobora kuba yarahawe sheki yo kuzabikuza ku wa Gatatu, tariki ya 7 Nyakanga.
Amakuru avuga ko impamvu yo kuba ubuyobozi bwa Police FC butaremeza iby‘isinya rya Hakizimana Muhadjiri, ari uko hari ibitarasobanuka neza hagati y‘impande zombi birimo kuba uyu mukinnyi atarabona amafaranga yasezeranyijwe.
Ibinyujije kuri Twitter, AS Kigali yasezeye kuri Hakizimana Muhadjiri ku Cyumweru, imwifuriza amahirwe ahandi azerekeza nyuma y’umwaka umwe yayikiniye, aho yayifashije kugera mu ijonjora rya nyuma rigana mu matsinda ya CAF Confederation Cup ya 2020/21 ndetse akaba yarasize ibonye itike yo gukina iri rushanwa Nyafurika mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Uyu mukinnyi w’imyaka 27 ku byangombwa akiniraho, amaze mu Rwanda umwaka umwe yakiniyemo AS Kigali nyuma yo gutandukana na Emirates Football Club yakiniye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Abarabu mu mwaka w’imikino wa 2019/20.
Yerekeje muri Asia nyuma y’imyaka itatu akinira APR FC yari yaragezemo muri Nyakanga 2016 avuye muri AS Kigali, na yo yari yamuguze muri Mukura Victory Sports.
Hakizimana Muhadjiri uvukana na Kapiteni w’Amavubi, Haruna Niyonzima, yatowe nk’umukinnyi mwiza w’umwaka w’imikino wa 2017/18 mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kuzamurwa n’umutoza Mungo Jitiada ‘Vigoureux’, Muhadjiri yakiniye Etincelles, ayivamo yerekeza muri Kiyovu Sports, nyuma ajya gukinira Mukura Victory Sports yamazemo imyaka ibiri mbere yo kugurwa na AS Kigali FC atakiniye igahita imutanga muri APR FC.
Manchester City na Tottenham ni andi makipe yo mu Bwongereza aheruka gukorwaho filimi mbarangankuru nk’iyo.
Mu mwaka utaha w’imikino wa 2021/22 uzatangira muri Kanama,Arsenal ni yo kipe izaba igezweho muri All or Nothing, aho izajya yemerera camera za Amazon gufata amashusho atandukanye yo hanze y’ikibuga no kuri Emirates Stadium.
Iyi gahunda ya televiziyo ikunzwe n’abatari bake, izaba igaragaza imikorere y’imbere y’iyi kipe y’umupira w’amaguru irimo uburyo abakinnyi bitwara mu rwambariro mbere na nyuma y’umukino ndetse hazaganirizwa n’abafite amazina akomeye bo muri Arsenal barimo abakinnyi n’abatoza.
Manchester City na Tottenham zagarutsweho mu bice byabanje by’iyi filimi mbarankuru ndetse kuri ubu Arsenal itegerejweho kuva mu makipe yo hagati ku rutonde, ni yo izaba igezweho mu mwaka utaha w’mikino.
All or Nothing ni iki?
All or Nothing ni filimi mbarankuru ikorwa na Amazon, ikagaruka ku buzima bw’imbere mu makipe atandukanye akomeye mu mupira w’amaguru.
Amakipe aheruka kuyigaragaramo arimo umukeba wa Arsenal mu Majyaruguru ya Londres, Tottenham, na Manchester City yatwaye igikombe giheruka cya Premier League. Hari kandi na Juventus na Bayern Munich zikomeye i Burayi.
Uruhererekane rwayo rwatangiye gukorwa mu 2015 haherewe ku makipe yo muri NFL (umupira w’amaguru wo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika), ariko kuri ubu yaguriwe mu mupira w’amaguru w’i Burayi nyuma y’uko ikigo cya Amazon cyaguye ibikorwa byacyo bikajyamo no kwerekana imikino ya Premier League kuri Amazon Prime.
Umuyobozi w’Itumanaho n’itangazamakuru muri Arsenal, Mark Gonnella, yagize ati “Twiteguye guha abafana bacu bari hirya no hiryo ku Isi ishusho yihariye y’imbere mu ikipe n’uburyo ikora umunsi ku munsi. All or Nothing izaha abafana bacu n’abakunzi bacu amahirwe yo kumenya ikigira Arsenal ikipe idasanzwe, amateka yacu yo gutwara ibikombe n’intego dufite ngo twitware neza ahazaza.”
Dani Grabiner uhagarariye ibiganiro bya Amazon mu Bwongereza, yavuze ko Arsenal ari ikipe y’amateka ndetse biteguye kugeza ku bakunzi bayo urugendo rwayo rwose mu mwaka utaha w’imikino.
Filimi mbarankuru izakorwa kuri Arsenal, izagaragara kuri Prime Video mu 2022. Izakorerwa ahantu hatandukanye harimo kuri Emirates Stadium, ku kibuga cy’imyitozo no hanze yacyo, aho hazarebwa n’uburyo abayigize babaho mu buzima busanzwe.
Inkoramutima za APR FC zashimiwe kuzirikana abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu (Amafoto)
Ku Cyumweru, tariki ya 4 Nyakanga 2021, ni bwo abagize Inkoramutima za APR FC basuye abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bo mu Murenge wa Muyumbu, babagenera ibiribwa n’ubwisungane mu kwivuza bwahawe abantu 180.
Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rwamagana, Mbonyumuvunyi Radjab, yashimiye Inkoramutima za APR FC ndetse n’ubuyobozi bw’iyi kipe ku gikorwa cy’urukundo bakoze, abasaba ko cyaba ngarukamwaka.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Muyumbu, Bahati Bonny, yavuze ko igikorwa cyakozwe n’Inkoramutima za APR FC akigereranya n’icy’ubutwari.
Ati “Ni igikorwa gishimishije buri muntu wese yaba ari umuyobozi cyangwa undi wese yakwishimira. Byaradushimishije kuko byakozwe ku munsi wo Kwibohora, bikorerwa abamugariye ku rugamba n’ubundi bagize uruhare mu Kwibohora. Mu by’ukuri njye ni igikorwa mbona nk’icy’ubutwari.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Buri mwaka ubuyobozi bw’Umurenge dufatanye n’ubw’Akarere, ku munsi wo Kwibohora dutegura igikorwa cyo kwishimana na bariya bamugariye ku rugamba kugira ngo turebeke ko tubaha agaciro kandi ko uyu munsi igihugu gitekanye kubera bo. Twifuza ko ibikorwa nk’ibi byakomeza.”
Umuyobozi w’Inkoramutima za APR FC, Sam Friend, yavuze ko impamvu bahisemo kwifanya n’abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ari uko ibimaze kugerwaho babigizemo uruhare.
"Twashatse kwifatanya na bo ku munsi wo kwibohora ariko tunabagaragariza ko tuzirikana ubutwari bwabo mu rugamba rwo kwibohora."
Murigande Charles uhagarariye abamuriye ku rugamba, na we yashimiye cyane Inkoramutima za APR FC ku gikorwa cy’urukundo zaberetse, ababwira ko aho bari hose na bo ari APR FC ku mutima, anaboneraho kubasaba kubashimirira cyane ubuyobozi bw’Ikipe y’Ingabo.
Mu Murenge wa Muyumbu habarizwa abamugariye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bari mu miryango igera kuri 81, batujwe mu midugudu ibiri kuva mu myaka itandatu ishize. Mu mwaka ushize, ubuyobozi bw’uyu Murenge bwatanze inka ku miryango itanu.
Izabiriza ati “Kuba ikiri urwego rusa nka ngishwanama nibyo bigitera ibyo bibazo, kuko bicaye hamwe bakiga ibibazo byose. Kuba ayo masezerano atarasinywa ntabwo ishobora kujyaho ngo ikore nk’izindi nteko.”
PAP ntabwo iratangira gutora amategeko, icyo ikora ni ugutora imishingashusho y’itegeko ritanga imirongo migari (Model law) bitewe n’ikibazo gihari bashaka gukemura. Iyo umushingashusho umaze gutorwa muri PAP, wohererezwa AU, hanyuma byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu bihugu kugira ngo byemezwe burundu bitangire gukurikizwa.
Ibyitezwe ku mubano w’u Rwanda na Tanzania ku buyobozi bwa Suluhu.
U Rwanda nk’igihugu, rufite Tanzania nk’umuturanyi wo mu Burasirazuba bwarwo ariko by’umwihariko ibihugu byombi bifitanye amateka n’umubano wihariye haba mu buhahirane, politiki, ibikorwaremezo, ubukungu n’umutekano.
Mu myaka itanu ishize ubwo Tanzania yayoborwaga na Dr John Pombe Magufuli [aruhukire mu mahoro], u Rwanda n’igihugu cye byagaragaje ubushake buhambaye bw’ubufatanye mu nzego zitandukanye.
Paji nshya y’ubufatanye hagati y’ibihugu byombi yagaragaye cyane kuva mu myaka ya 2015, ubwo Dr Magufuli yari amaze gutorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu ndetse muri Nyakanga 2016, Perezida Kagame yagiye i Dar es Salaam muri Tanzania, aho yafunguye ku mugaragaro imurikagurisha rya 40 ryiswe ‘Dar es Salaam International Trade Fair (DITF)’. Muri urwo ruzinduko hasinywe amasezerano y’ubufatanye mu nzego z’ubuhahirane.
Mu mpera z’uwo mwaka kandi itsinda ry’intumwa z’u Rwanda ryagiye muri Tanzania riganira n’ubuyobozi bwaho ku kuzamura ubucuruzi bw’ibihugu byombi no kwigira hamwe uko hakemurwa amananiza mu bucuruzi yagaragaraga cyane ku ruhande rwa Tanzania nk’ahantu abacuruzi bo mu Rwanda banyuraga kugira ngo bagere ku cyambu cya Dar es Salaam.
Mu 2018, nibwo ibihugu byombi byasubukuye umushinga mugari wa Gari ya Moshi wari waratangiye kuganirwaho muri za 2000 ariko abari abayobozi ba Tanzania barakomeje kugenda biguru ntege mu ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryawo.
Muri uwo mwaka wa 2018, nibwo kandi bahise basinya amasezerano yo kubaka uyu muhanda w’ibilometero 532, yashyizweho umukono ku wa 9 Werurwe 2018. Uyu mushinga wagombaga gutwara miliyari 3,6$.
Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, inzira umuhanda uzanyuramo yerekana ko uzanyura ku Rusumo ukagera mu Mujyi wa Kigali [ahari Dubai Ports muri Kicukiro] ariko hakiyongeraho agace k’ibilometero 18 kagera ku Kibuga cy’Indege cya Bugesera.
Mu myaka 10 Kikwete yayoboye Tanzania, ubucuruzi hagati y’ibihugu byombi bwabarirwaga muri miliyoni 5.7$ ku mwaka. Mu mwaka wa mbere wa Magufuli bwarazamutse bugera kuri miliyoni 17,6 $. Imibare yo mu 2019, igaragaza ko u Rwanda rwoherezaga muri Tanzania ibicuruzwa bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 5,1$ mu gihe Tanzania yacuruzaga mu Rwanda ibifite agaciro ka miliyoni 224,54$.
Ku wa 17 Werurwe nibwo Perezida Dr Magufuli yatabarutse azize indwara y’umutima, asimburwa na Samia Suluhu Hassan wabaye umuperezida wa gatandatu wa Tanzania na Perezida wa mbere w’umugore uyoboye icyo gihugu.
Mu muhango wo gusezera kuri Magufuli ku wa 22 Werurwe, Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Rwanda, Dr Ngirente Edouard yavuze ko ku buyobozi bwe, yaharaniye ukwishyira hamwe kw’ibihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, EAC, kandi aharanira kwaguka no gutera imbere umubano w’u Rwanda na Tanzania.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Leta y’u Rwanda yatewe ishema no gukorana bya hafi na Magufuli, nk’uwaharaniye ukwishyira hamwe k’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba ndetse akanagira uruhare runini mu gukomeza umubano hagati y’u Rwanda na Tanzania. Ibikorwa bye byiza bizibukwa ibihe byose.”
Perezida Suhulu yitezweho gushyigikira ibyagezweho
Perezida mushya wa Tanzania, Samia Suluhu Hassan, azayobora icyo gihugu kugeza mu 2025 ubwo manda yari iya John Pombe Magufuli yari kuzaba irangiye. Magufuli yari muri manda ye ya kabiri yatangiye muri 2020.
Impuguke muri Politiki akaba by’umwihariko akurikiranira hafi iyo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Nizeyimana Alexis, yabwiye IGIHE ko politiki ya Perezida Suluhu itazatandukana cyane n’iya Magufuli cyane ko bose ari abo mu Ishyaka rya CCM [Chama Cha Mapinduzi].
Ati “Yatangiye gufungura imibanire y’igihugu cye n’ibindi, Tanzania ubona ko iri mu murongo w’uko ikomeza bwa buryo bwayo bwo kubakira ubukungu bwayo imbere ariko bakareba no hanze ku buryo mu mibanire ya Tanzania n’amahanga bizagenda neza.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Perezida Suluhu ubona ari umuntu ushaka gufungura amarembo bitabangamiye ya politiki yari isanzwe ya CCM, yo kuvuga ngo ni ukubakira igihugu ku banye-Tanzania ariko ubona yaramaze kumenya ko Isi isa n’aho yegeranye.”
Nizeyimana yavuze ko ikintu cy’ibanze Perezida Suluhu yahise akora ari ugusura ibihugu byo mu karere byari bidafitanye umubano mwiza n’uwo yasimbuye cyangwa hari amasezerano yadindiye. Mu bihugu yasuye harimo Uganda na Kenya.
Ati “Iyo ugiye kureba yihutiye kubanza kugira ibyo akemura cyane cyane ku bihugu navuga ko bari bafitanye akangononwa, nka Uganda hari amasezerano y’umuyoboro wa Peteroli uwamubanjirije hari ibyo ibihugu byombi bitabashije kumvikanaho ariko ejo bundi Perezida Suluhu yahise ajya muri Uganda basubukura ibiganiro ndetse hari byinshi bumvikanyeho.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ni umuntu kandi ubona ko ibyo yatangaje mu bihe bitandukanye, ashyize imbere kubana neza n’ibihugu byo mu Karere harimo n’u Rwanda cyane ko ku Rwanda ho basanzwe babanye neza.”
Samia Suluhu Hassan yari asanzwe ari Visi Perezida wa Tanzania, ndetse yaherukaga mu Rwanda mu 2016, aho yari yahagarariye Umukuru w’Igihugu mu Nama ya 27 y’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.
Ubwo yageraga mu Rwanda ari ku wa 17 Nyakanga 2016, Suluhu Hassan yakiriwe na Francis Gatare wari Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB, [kuri ubu ayobora Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Peteroli, Gazi na Mine] ndetse na Mukaruliza Monique wari Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali, ubu ni Umujyanama muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga.
Umwarimu muri Kaminuza, Umwanditsi w’ibitabo akaba n’Umunyamakuru ndetse wakurikiraniye hafi politiki y’ishyaka rya CCM dore ko yabaye muri Tanzania, Prof Malonga Pacifique, yabwiye IGIHE ko n’ubwo u Rwanda rusanzwe rufitanye umubano mwiza na Tanzania ariko bigaragara ko Perezida Suluhu hazabaho impinduka zigamije kuwushimangira.
Ati “Ntabwo bariya bantu bagendera kuri politiki yabo nk’abantu, bagendera kuri politiki ya CCM, ariko itari imwe ya cyera, ni CCM nshya igezweho igendera ku bitekerezo by’igisekuru gishya. CCM nshya rero ishyira imbere kubana neza n’ibihugu bigize akarere kandi wabonye ko u Rwanda ari igihugu kibanye neza na CCM muri iyi myaka.”
Prof Malonga kandi avuga ko azi neza Perezida Suluhu nk’umugore uvuga make ariko akarasa ku ntego ndetse agahagarara ku ijambo. Ikindi kimugira umuntu udasanzwe ngo ni ukuba yarabashije gukorana na Magufuli imyaka itanu, ibintu ahuza no kuba azi neza icyerekezo uyu mugabo yari afite.
Ati “Politiki ye [Suluhu] ntabwo ari nshya, ni imwe ya Magufuli, ariko yoroshya ibintu bimwe na bimwe birimo no kuba mwabonye uburyo yahinduye intekerezo kuri Covid-19, ariko muri rusange politiki ni ya yindi ikomeza.”
Umunsi uzaba mwiza uboneka mu gitondo…
Muri Werurwe 2021, ubwo Perezida Suluhu yarahiriraga kuyobora Tanzania, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ushinzwe Umuryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Prof Nshuti Manasseh, yahagarariye u Rwanda ndetse mu minsi ishize Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo z’u Rwanda, Gen Jean Bosco Kazura n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CG Dan Munyuza bagiriye uruzinduko muri iki gihugu.
Ku ruhande rwa Polisi z’ibihugu byombi, ni uruzinduko rwari rugamije gukomeza gushimangira imikoranire isanzwe hagati yazo cyane ko hari amasezerano ibihugu byombi bisanzwe bifitanye ajyanye n’imikoranire hagamijwe kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka.
CG Munyuza yashimangiye ko Polisi y’u Rwanda na Leta y’u Rwanda muri rusange bafite ubushake bwo kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka y’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Polisi y’u Rwanda ndetse na Leta y’u Rwanda muri rusange dufite ubushake n’umuhate mu kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya ibihugu byacu byombi. Guhanahana amakuru, guhuza ibikorwa ku mipaka, guhanahana amahugurwa n’imyitozo, gukorana inama kenshi mu byiciro byose ni bimwe mu bizadufasha gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano y’ubufatanye dufitanye."
Umuyobozi wa Polisi ya Tanzania, IGP Simon Nyakoro Sirro, yashimiye Umuyobozi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda kuba yigomwe umwanya we akajya muri Tanzania. Yavuze ko ibihugu byombi bisangira byinshi harimo no gufatanya kurwanya ibyaha.
Ati “Ibi bihugu byacu bisangira byinshi harimo kurwanya ibyaha, ariko cyane cyane hakenewe imbaraga n’ubufatanye mu kurwanya ibyaha byambukiranya imipaka, tugomba gukorera hamwe mu gushimangira umutekano ku mipaka yacu mu rwego rwo kugabanya ibyaha byambukiranya ibihugu byaciyemo. Ibi tugomba kubigeraho dushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano y’ubufatanye asanzwe hagati ya Polisi zacu y’u Rwanda na Tanzania.”
Izi nzego zombi zemeranyije guhanahana amakuru ku bijyanye n’iterabwoba n’ibindi byaha byambukiranya imipaka, gufatanya kugenzura umutekano wo ku mipaka hagamijwe kugabanya ibibazo byateza umutekano muke, guhanahana abanyabyaha, gushyiraho gahunda yo kurwanya ubutagondwa no gushyiraho ikigo gifasha abagizweho ingaruka n’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba n’ibindi byaha.
Prof Malonga Pacifique yabwiye IGIHE ko uru ruzinduko rusobanuye byinshi mu bijyanye n’imibanire y’ibihugu kuko Umukuru Mukuru w’Ingabo n’Umuyobozi wa Polisi bagiye muri Tanzania bahagarariye u Rwanda ndetse n’abo bagiranye nabo ibiganiro bakaba ari abahagarariye icyo gihugu kandi bafite n’ijambo rikomeye.
Prof Malonga avuga ko kuba u Rwanda na Tanzania bisanzwe bifitanye umubano, igikwiye gukurikiraho ubu ari uko abakuru b’ibihugu byombi baganira bakarebera hamwe icyakorwa ngo uyu mubano wongere usubukurwe cyangwa ushyirwemo ibirungo.
Ati “Ku rwego rw’u Rwanda, ntabwo nzi muri dipolomasi ngo ni nde utangira cyangwa uhamagara undi, njyewe nkanjye mbona intambwe yakurikiraho ari uko u Rwanda rwatumira Perezida Suluhu akaza mu gihuhu akagirana ibiganiro na mugenzi we bakareba uko basubukura ibikorwa n’imishinga ibihugu byombi bihuriyeho.”
Prof Malonga agaragaza ko ariko kugeza ubu ibihugu byombi bibanye neza ndetse abavandimwe b’abanyarwanda baba muri Tanzania, bakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ndetse ku mupaka wa Rusumo, urujya n’uruza rukomeje kunyuzwaho ibicuruzwa byaba ibiva mu Rwanda cyangwa ibiva muri Tanzania bigana mu Rwanda.
Perezida Kagame yavuze kuri Coup d’Etat muri Mali n’ibyakurikiye urupfu rwa Idriss Déby.
Yabitangaje mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na TV5 Monde muri Village Urugwiro, nyuma y’uruzinduko rwa Perezida Emmanuel Macron i Kigali.
Ku mapaji y’imbere mu binyamakuru byo ku Isi muri iki Cyumweru, inkuru y’ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi muri Mali iri mu zikomeye ziri kuvugwaho. Ni ihirikwa ryabaye ku wa Mbere w’icyumweru gishize ubwo Perezida w’inzibacyuho Bah Ndaw na Minisitiri we w’Intebe Moctar Ouane bafungirwaga mu Kigo cya Gisirikare cya Kati, bugacya begura bashinjwa gufata ibyemezo batagishije inama Visi Perezida Colonel Assimi Goita.
Colonel Assimi Goita wanagize uruhare mu ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi bwa Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta mu 2020, yahise yigira Perezida asezeranya amatora mu mwaka utaha.
Ibihugu bitandukanye n’imiryango mpuzamahanga byamaganye iryo hirikwa ry’ubutegetsi, ndetse inzego zitandukanye zirimo Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe ziri mu buhuza bugamije gusubiza ibintu ku murongo muri Mali.
Perezida Kagame yabajijwe icyo avuga kuri iryo hirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ribaye hashize amezi icyenda habaye irindi mu gihugu nka Mali, cyazahajwe n’ibibazo by’umutekano bishingiye ku mitwe y’iterabwoba.
Yavuze ko icyangombwa abantu bagakwiriye kurebaho, ari umutekano w’abaturage n’ububabare bari kunyuramo kubera ibyabaye, mbere yo kwamagana cyangwa kutamagana ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi.
Ati “Ntabwo ntekereza ko umuyobozi uwo ari we wese wo muri Afurika cyangwa se undi muturage wo muri Afurika yakwishimira umutekano muke nk’uriya. Abantu bavuga ku ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi, bakavuga ku bayobozi n’ibindi ariko ikintu gikomeye gikwiriye kuduhangayikisha, ni ububabare abaturage bari kunyuramo kubera ibyo.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikibazo cyo kumenya byimbitse ngo ni ibiki byabaye, ni nde wabikoze? Ibyo abantu babivugaho ariko igikomeye ubu ni umutekano muke n’ububabare bw’abaturage, ni bariya bantu batabona neza ejo hazaza. Ni byiza ko twishyira mu mwanya w’abaturage ba Mali.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kubyamagana cyangwa kutabyamagana mu matangazo gusa, ntacyo byamarira abaturage, ahubwo igikenewe ari icyakorwa ngo basubirane amahoro.
Mu 2007, Kigali yari yihariye 44 % by’abakozi ba Leta bose, 50 % by’ibikorwa by’abikorera n’inganda. Mu mashuri makuru na za Kaminuza byari mu gihugu, ane muri atandatu yari muri Kigali. Kuko ariho hari amahirwe, benshi mu barangiza Kaminuza bagumaga muri Kigali bashakisha imirimo.
Mu cyerecyezo 2050, byitezwe ko u Rwanda ruzaba rutuwe n’abaturage basaga miliyoni 22, barimo 70% bazaba batuye mu mijyi bavuye kuri 18.7 % batuye mu mijyi kuri ubu.
Mu kubigeraho imijyi yo mu Rwanda yagabanyijwemo ibyiciro bitanu birimo Umujyi wa Kigali, imijyi itatu igaragiye Umujyi wa Kigali, imijyi umunani yunganira uwa Kigali, imijyi 16 iciriritse y’uturere n’imijyi mito (santeri) 73.
Manzi Rugirangoga yanditse igitabo La légende d’Havilah kivuga ku buzima bwe muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Iki gitabo cya Rugirangoga cyasohowe n’inzu ye itunganya ibitabo, Maison d’Edition Elimu. Cyanditse mu buryo bw’ibarankuru (fiction), aho avuga amateka ashaririye yanyuzemo by’umwihariko ajyanye na Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE avuga ku mpamvu yanditse iki gitabo, Rugirangoga yagize ati “Nari mfite imyaka ibiri nibwo nabashije kurokoka mpungira mu Bufaransa, nkomeza kujya nibaza byinshi nti kuki ari twe byabayeho? Mu bitekerezo byanjye hakagarukamo kenshi kuki ? Kuki ari twebwe tugirirwa ubugome butagira ubutabera, ibi byose bigaragara mu gitabo cyanjye.”
Uyu musore wiciwe abarimo mama we muri Jenoside, yavuze ko yanditse iki gitabo ashaka gufasha abandi bari mu kigero cye gukunda gusoma no kwandika, gusobanukirwa amateka ariko by’umwihariko gushishikariza Abanyarwanda kwiyandikira amateka yabo.
Ati “ Njye n’urungano rwanjye twakuze tubona ibitabo by’amashusho n’amafilimi y’Abanyamerika n’Abayapani, kuburyo najyaga nibaza uko bo babigenza ngo basangize abandi umuco wabo gutyo bikatugiraho ingaruka, tukabikunda kandi turi Abanyarwanda cyangwa Abanyafurika muri rusange. Nibwo nagize nti natwe ibi twabikora kuko dufite amateka yo kuba twavuga iwacu tubwira Isi.”
Manzi Rugirangoga yavuze ko kwandika byamufashije kuruhuka mu mutwe, no kumva atari wenyine kuko ibimurimo aba abisangije abandi.
Yavuze ko Abanyarwanda n’Abanyafurika bakwiriye kwandika amateka yabo kandi ko bidakomeye nkuko bamwe babikeka.
Ati “ Ntibyoroshye ariko birashoboka kuko icya mbere ni ugutangira ukabishyira ku rupapuro. Nubwo wabikora ukajya ubyihorera ariko ukazagaruka kongera, ariko nturekere iyo. Nk’iki gitabo nacyanditse imyaka myinshi. Kwandika bisaba gukunda gusoma no kwandika kandi bifungura n’ibitekerezo. Kwandika ni ukwemera gukora amakosa kandi ugafata umwanya wo kuyakosora , ukagira ukwihangana muri wowe cyane.”
Manzi Rugirangoga yize amashuri yisumbuye mu Rwanda, ajya kwiga uburezi muri Kaminuza yo mu Bufaransa. Kubera inzu yandika ibitabo ‘Elimu’ yashinze mu Rwanda, bituma ahaza kenshi.
Yavuze ko yifuza ko inzu ye y’ibitabo yazaba inzu ikomeye kandi ifasha benshi mu bandika haba mu Rwanda no muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko nubwo La légende d’Havilah aricyo gitabo asohoye bwa mbere, atari cyo cya nyuma kuko azasohora ibindi byinshi.
Igitabo cya Manzi Rugirangoga uwagishaka yagisanga hano: 
Reba ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Manzi Rugirangoga
Amateka y’icyemezo cyavaga mu Bubiligi kigahesha Abanyarwanda guhinduka no gusangira n’abazungu.
Hari abazi ko ivangura ku birabura ari Apartheid yabaye ikimenyabose muri Afurika y’Epfo, nyamara no mu Rwanda yarahabaye cyane cyane guhera mu 1916 ubwo Abadage basimburwaga n’Ababiligi.
Igitabo ‘Ibitaramo ku mateka y’u Rwanda’ cya Zephrin Kagiraneza, kigaragaza ko abazungu bakigera mu Rwanda, baranzwe no gusuzugura cyane abo basanze, Abanyarwanda bagafatwa nk’abashenzi, bari mu mwijima kandi bakeneye urumuri.
N’uyu munsi hari abafata kwitwara ruzungu nk’ubusirimu n’ubujijuke, mu gihe hari abagishinja abazungu ko ibyo bakoze byari bigamije gusenya umuco nyarwanda.
Kagiraneza avuga ko abazungu bamaze kugera mu Rwanda, Abanyarwanda baciwemo ibice binyuze no mu buryo bw’imibereho kugeza aho hashyizweho utubari na hoteli abirabura batemerewe kwinjiramo, mu gihe babaga batarahabwa icyangombwa cyatangwaga n’umwami w’u Bubiligi kibemerera kwitwa Abazungu.
Iyo migenzereze yigeze kurakaza umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, ubwo yavumburaga ko kuri hotel Faucon i Butare handitse ko nta mbwa cyangwa umwirabura wemerewe kuhinjira.
Icyangombwa cyo kwita umuzungu ngo usangire nabo
Mu gitabo cya Kagiraneza cyasohotse mu 1990, havugwamo uburyo nyuma y’uko amashuri amaze kwiyongera hirya no hino mu Rwanda, abayavuyemo batangiye kugira imyitwarire irenze gato iy’ababyeyi babo n’abavandimwe babaga batarayagezemo.
Byatumye mu Rwanda rw’icyo gihe, abazungu bahimba amagambo agamije gushyira abahindutse mu byiciro. Abaturage basanzwe, bamwe batageze mu ishuri bitwaga ‘Indigènes’, naho ababaga bakubutse mu mashuri batangiye kwitwara kizungu bavuga n’Igifaransa, abo bitwaga évolués , abanyarwanda baje kubahimba imvuruwe.
Abenshi muri abo babaga barangije amashuri, babaga bafite imirimo runaka bakora banahemberwa itandukanye no korora no guhinga byakorwaga na rubanda rusanzwe. Imirimo yabo akenshi yabaga ifite aho ihuriye n’iy’abazungu dore ko aribo ahanini babagenzuraga.
Nubwo abazungu babaga baziranye, abo birabura b’imvuruwe ntibabaga bemerewe gusabana, kugenderana no gusangira n’abazungu, keretse ababaga bafite icyangombwa cyatanzwe n’umwami w’u Bubiligi kibahindura abazungu.
Kagiraneza mu gitabo cye agaragaza ko no mu rusengero abazungu, imvuruwe n’abaturage basanzwe babaga batandukanye.
Agira ati “I Kigali mu Kiliziya y’Umuryango Mutagatifu ba évolués bagenerwaga umwanya wabo, bagateganyirizwa n’intebe zegamirwa bityo bakaba batandukanye n’abakirisitu bo muri rubanda. Abazungu nabo bagiraga uruhushya rwabo bagategurirwa n’udusego two gupfukumaho. Utwo dusego tukabatandukanya na ba évolués .”
Ubwo mu Rwanda utubari na hoteli byari bitangiye kuhagera, ntabwo Abanyarwanda babaga bemerewe kunywera aho abazungu banyweraga cyangwa bariraga.
Igitabo cya Kagiraneza kivuga ko nk’akabari kitwaga Café Impala kabaga i Kigali cyangwa muri hoteli Faucon i Butare hagitangira, nta munyafurika wakandagiragamo uretse umwami gusa.
Umukambwe Dr. Venant Ntabomvura, akaba uwa Mbere wiyandakishije kwiga muri Kaminuza Nkuru y’u Rwanda ubwo yatangiraga muri 1963, muri 2016 yabwiye IGIHE ko ubwo umwami Rudahigwa yamenyaga ko nta Munyarwanda wemerewe kwinjira muri hotel Faucon byamubabaje cyane.
Yagize ati “Sinzi neza niba Rudahigwa yari azi amakuru y’uko abirabura basuzugurwa ako kageni bagahezwa kuhinjira […] ubwo yari avuye i Burundi, yarahageze ashaka kuharuhukira gato, nibwo we n’abo bari kumwe babonye ya magambo avuga ngo ‘Entrée interdit aux noirs et chiens’. Umwami yahise arakara bituma yinjirana ingufu, […] hari n’abavuga ko yakubise urushyi umuzungu wari ahacunze umutekano ashatse kumubuza kwinjira."
Kugira ngo ushyikirane n’abazungu, musangire, mugenderane wagombaga kugira icyangombwa cyanditse cyerekana ko nawe wabaye umuzungu. Icyo cyangombwa cyitwaga carte du mérite civique. Icyo cyemezo cyanahabwaga abaturage bo muri Congo babaga bagaragaza kwitwara nk’abazungu.
Itegeko rigishyiraho ryari riri mu mategeko mbonezamubano ya Congo Mbiligi yasohotse mu 1948.
Iyo umunyarwanda yashakaga gufatwa nk’umuzungu, hakorwaga akanama kazajya kugenzura ko yitwara kizungu. Abagize ako kanama bazaga iwe mu rugo kureba uko yitwara, bakareba niba atunze intebe nziza mu nzu, niba afite ameza, utubati, imashini yo kudoda imyenda yacitse n’ibindi.
Kagiraneza agaragaza ko banarebaga uko we n’umugore n’abana bambaye haba imyenda n’inkweto, basanga bambaye nabi bakavuga ko bakiri abaturage.
Mu byagenzurwaga kandi harimo uburyo usaba icyemezo yitwara mu gihe ari kurya we n’umuryango we. Uwo basangaga arisha intoki yabaga atakaje amanota. Barebaga ko iwe barya amagi, ko banywa icyayi, ko barya imigati, niba anywa umuvinyo.
Uwo bazaga kugenzura akagira umwaku bakahasanga urwagwa cyangwa amarwa, yabaga avuye mu mubare w’abazitwa abazungu.
Mu gihe isuzuma ryabaga rirangiye, abagize akanama bakoraga raporo ikoherezwa i Bruxelles mu Bubiligi, icyemezo kigatangwa n’umwami w’u Bubiligi. Uwabaga amaze kugihabwa, yajyaga kucyandikisha mu rukiko rwa teritwari, agahabwa na nimero imuranga.
Uwahabwaga icyangombwa, yagengwaga n’amategeko agenga abazungu, agahembwa umushahara umwe nabo, akaregwa mu nkiko zifite ububasha bwo kuburanisha abazungu n’ibindi.
Igitabo ‘Ibitaramo ku mateka y’u Rwanda, kivuga ko atari Abanyarwanda benshi babashije gutambuka icyo kizamini. Abazwi babashije kubona icyo cyangombwa kibemerera gushyikirana n’abazungu harimo nka Prosper Bwanakweli waje kuba mu ishyaka RADER, Alexis Karekezi wahoze mu nama nkuru y’igihugu kubw’umwami Mutara II Rudahigwa, Anastase Makuza wabaye Minisitiri muri Guverinoma ya Kayibanda Gregoire, na Lazaro Ndazaro na we wabaye muri RADER.
Umusaza Ntabomvura Venant yavuze ko umwami Rudahigwa amaze gukubitira umuzungu kuri Faucon, yatangiye no kujya ahakoreshereza inama z’abatware ndetse akanabakiriramo.
Nubwo Rudahigwa yabikoraga kugira ngo Abanyarwanda bahatinyuke, Ntabomvura avuga ko bakomeje kuhatinya. Ubwoba bwo kujya muri izo hoteli zitwaga ko zigenewe abazungu, Abanyarwanda batangiye kubushira gahoro gahoro nyuma ya 1962 u Rwanda rumaze kubona ubwigenge.
Yavuze ko hari izindi ndirimbo kugeza ubu ari gutunganya muri studio ariko zo zikazasohokana n’amashusho.
Ati “Hari izindi ndirimbo turimo gutunganya mu buryo bw’amajwi nyinshi kandi nziza, nizirangira tuzazikorera amashusho kandi nizera ko bizagenda neza mbifashijwe n’Imana.”
Yavuze ko nyuma yo gushyira hanze amashusho y’iyi ndirimbo ye ya mbere abantu bayakiriye neza kandi akaba atekereza ko n’izindi azashyira hanze mu minsi iri mbere zizakirwa neza.
Uwera Sarah Sanyu azwi cyane muri Ambassadors of Christ kubera ijwi rye ryuje ubuhanga kandi rikundwa n’abatari bake bafashwa n’indirimbo z’iyi korali, aririmbanamo na musaza we Nelson Manzi.
Yamenyekanye cyane atera mu ndirimbo zirimo “Birakwiye gushima”, “Yesu we” n’izindi. Yatangiye kuririmba muri Ambassadors of Christ mu mpera za 2006 akiga mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Yafungiwe gutunga imbunda atarayibonesha amaso! Ubuzima bushaririye Padiri Ubald yanyuzemo n’umurage yasize.
Padiri Ubald Rugirangoga washyinguwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri, ni umwe mu Banyarwanda banyuze muri ubwo buzima bushaririye ariko aza kubirenga ababarira abamwiciye umuryango w’abantu 86 ndetse arihira amashuri abana babo.
Padiri Ubald ni mwene Kabera Jacques na Mukaruhamya Anesia, yavukanye n’abana batatu na we wa kane. Babiri baracyariho, umwe yazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatusti hamwe na nyina mu gihe hasigaye murumuna we na mushiki we.
Umuhango wo kumusezeraho wabaye mu byiciro bitatu harimo icyabereye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, icyabereye i Kigali muri Paruwasi Regina Pacis ndetse n’icyo kumusezeraho bwa nyuma cyabereye kuri ‘Centre Ibanga ry’Amahoro’ ari naho yashyinguwe kuri uyu wa 2 Werurwe 2021.
Umuhango wo kumusezerano witabiriwe n’Umuyobozi w’Akarere ka Rusizi, Kayumba Ephrem wari uhagarariye leta ndetse n’Abepiskopi Gatolika batatu barimo Musenyeri Sinayobye Edouard uherutse kuragizwa Diyosezi ya Cyangugu ari nayo Ubald yakoreragamo umurimo.
Hari kandi Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Ruhengeri, Musenyeri Harorimana Vincent ndetse n’Umushumba wa Diyosezi ya Gikongoro, Musenyeri Hakizimana Célestin [ni na we umaze igihe ari Umuyobozi wa Diyosezi ya Cyangugu mu gihe yari itegereje Umwepiskopi usimbura Musenyeri Bimenyimana Jean Damascène witabye Imana mu myaka ibiri ishize].
Ubuhamya bwatanzwe kuri Ubald bwagarutse ku buzima bwamuranze kuva akiri umwana kugeza aho amaze kuba Umusaseridoti, hibandwa ku bikorwa by’isanamitima no gushishikariza abantu ubumwe n’ubwiyunge byamuranze nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Murumuna we, Rugwizangoga Revelien wavuze mu izina ry’umuryango wa Padiri Ubald akomokamo, yashimiye Abanyarwanda bose, abaje kwifatanya na bo mu kumusezeraho ndetse n’Umuryango mugari w’Abihayimana Ubald yabarizwagamo.
Yavuze ko kubura Ubald ari igihombo gikomeye ku muryango n’igihugu muri rusange ku buryo bitoroshye gusobanura icyo yari avuze ku muryango Nyarwanda.
Yagize ati “Ntibyoroshye kubona amagambo yo kuvuga nyuma yo gutakaza umuvandimwe, by’umwihariko umuvandimwe nka Padiri Ubald. Kuri njye, yari Mukuru wanjye, yari umubyeyi, yari inshuti nziza akaba n’umujyanama w’ikirenga kubera ubunararibonye yari afite.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Kandi nk’Umusaseridoti mwiza, nzi neza ko yabaye umubyeyi wa bose, inshuti ya bose, umujyanama wa bose. Umutima we wahoraga ufunguye kuri bose, imiryango y’urugo rwe yahoraga ifunguye kuri bose; abato n’abakuru, abakomeye n’aboroheje, abakire n’abakene.”
Padiri Ubald yavukiye mu muryango w’abakirisitu bubaha Imana kandi bayikunda ku buryo yakuze bamutoza kuvuga ishapure buri mugoroba. Ibi ariko byiyongeraga ku kuba nyina yarabarizwaga muri Rejiyo Mariya mu gihe se yari umuririmbyi muri Korali.
Papa wa Ubald yaje kwicwa mu 1963 azize amacakubiri yariho aho Abatutsi bicwaga, bagasenyerwa abandi bakameneshwa.
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko “Padiri Ubald rero yabyirukiye mu mibereho myiza y’icyo gihe kuko Se yari umwarimu mu mashuri gusa siko byakomeje kuko Se yaje kwicwa mu 1963, Ubald akiri umwana muto w’imyaka irindwi.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ubwo Ubald yasigaranye na nyina nawe ukiri muto, muziko kera bashakaga bakiri bato. Kuva icyo gihe Ubald yatangiye inzira y’umuruho, ni umwana w’imfura ubwo ahindutse umugabo mu rugo aho yafashaga nyina kurera abo bavukana. Agafatanya ishuri n’imirimo yo mu rugo kenshi ivunanye ariko ariwe, ari nyina nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite.”
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko Ubald kuva icyo gihe ariwe wahindutse nk’umugabo mu rugo, akaba umujyanama wa nyina ndetse uko yakuraga akagenda arushaho kubyitwaramo neza.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko nubwo Padiri Ubald yakuriye mu muruho, urwango rushingiye ku macakubiri, itotezwa n’ibindi bibazo, ibyo byose yarabyihanganiye arabirenga, akurana umutima mwiza, wuzuye urukundo, urugwiro, ubusabane n’impuhwe nyinshi kandi kuri bose.
Murumuna we avuga ko ibyo byose ari imico yatojwe na nyina n’Imana yamuhanze kuko ni yo yari izi icyo yamuteguragamo.
Yashinjwe gutunga imbunda!
Mu 1973, ni bwo Ubald yari mu mashuri yisumbuye aho yigaga mu Iseminari yo ku Nyundo gusa yaje kuvayo ahunze abanyeshuri biganaga bari bamaze kwishakamo igico cyo kwica bagenzi babo bishingiye ku macakubiri.
Imodoka yacikishije Ubald na bagenzi be yamugejeje ku Kibuye [I Karongi], ibavanye i Gisenyi ku Nyundo, ubundi bakomeza n’amaguru bakora urugendo rw’iminsi itatu batarya, batanywa, bataryama. Icyo gihe Ubald yari afite imyaka 15.
Murumuna we ati “Ageze mu rugo, icyo gihe nyina yishimiye kumwakira ariko ibihe ntabwo byari byoroshye kuko yasanze barahunze inzu zabo barara mu bihuru, barahunze ibitero by’abaturanyi babo bashakaga kubica.”
Padiri Ubald na nyina na barumuna we na mushiki we bahungiye i Burundi, ni ho yashoboye gukomereza amashuri mu Iseminari ya Ngozi ari naho yarangirije amashuri mu 1978.
Yaje kugaruka mu Rwanda ashaka gukomereza amashuri mu Iseminari Nkuru ya Nyakibanda ubwo yashakaga kuba Padiri.
Murumuna we ati “Icyo gihe yarambwiye ati, Papa yishwe kubera urwango, twahunze kubera urwango, nsubiye mu Rwanda kwigisha urukundo kuko ineza itsinda inabi.”
Mu 1984, ubwo yari amaze kuba Umusaseridoti yabaye Padiri muri Paruwasi ya Nyamasheke kugeza mu 1994. Yitangiye iyo paruwasi atizigama n’umutima mwiza, ubushake n’imbaraga.
Mu 1992, igihe hirya no hino mu Rwanda, hatangiraga igeragezwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi nanone urwango rwageze kuri Padiri Ubald inzu yari yarubakiye nyina iratwikwa, bukeye ajya gutabara ahageze aravuga ati ‘Abakoze ibi ndabababariye’.
Murumuna we ati “Nyuma yaho, Padiri Ubald yaje gufungwa bamubeshyeye ko yatunze imbunda kandi mu buzima bwe ntabwo yigeze yiga kurasa.”
Uko Padiri Ubald yaje kuba rusumbanzika!
Muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, abahigwaga bagera ku bihumbi 45 i Nyamasheke bamuhungiyeho kuva tariki 8 Mata kugeza 13 Mata 1994 yari kumwe nabo, amarana nabo iyo minsi yose bahanganye n’Interahamwe zifite intwaro bo bafite amabuye n’amatafari gusa.
Padiri Ubald yaje guhungishirizwa i Cyangugu icyo gihe abo bari baje kumuhungiraho basigarana agahinda bazi ko bagiye kwicwa cyane ko uwarimo abafasha mu rugamba rwo guhangana n’abo bantu yari agiye.
Rugwizangoga bavukana yakomeje ati “Padiri Ubald yababajwe cyane n’ukuntu yitangiye Paruwasi ya Nyamasheke atizigama akabigisha ineza n’urukundo bikarangira mu 1994, abakirisitu bishe abakirisitu bagenzi babo. Avuye muri ubu buzima bikimushegesha cyane cyane ko abasabye imbabazi bakiri mbarwa.”
Muri Gicurasi 1994, Padiri Ubald yabashije guhungira mu Bufaransa anyuze muri Repubulika Iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo. Ageze mu Bufaransa yakiriwe n’inshuti ze zimuha buri kimwe cyose ariko ntiyanyuzwe yagarutse mu Rwanda kwigisha urukundo n’amahoro.
Rugwizangoga yavuze ko mu 1995, aribwo Ubald yamuhamagaye akamubwira ko agiye kugaruka ariko ngo ageze mu Rwanda kubera ihungabana rikomeye yari agifite byatumye adahita asubira i Cyangugu ahubwo aba muri Paruwasi St André.
Padiri Ubald yaje kugirwa Padiri Mukuru wa Paruwasi Mushaka ari nabwo yatangiye kumenyekana mu bikorwa byo gusengera abantu bagakira indwara zitandukanye akaba ari naho yatangirije urugendo rw’isanamitima n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge.
Ahagana mu 2000, Padiri Ubald yamenyekanye cyane mu bikorwa bya Gacaca ya Gikristu yiswe Sinodi, akajya asaba abantu kuvugisha ukuri ari abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ari abayirokotse n’ababirebaga bose bakavugisha ukuri kw’ibyabaye.
Muri iyi paruwasi ya Mushaka kandi ni ho Padiri Ubald yahise atangirira ibikorwa byo gushishikariza abantu gusaba imbabazi ari uwakoze Jenoside agasaba imbabazi uwo yayikoreye kandi bakiyunga.
Muri iyi paruwasi ya Mushaka yahuje abishe n’abiciwe bagera muri 446 bibumbiye mu matsinda 10.
Murumuna we ati “Padiri Ubald yarabahuje mu rugendo rw’isanamitima, gusaba imbabazi no gutanga imbabazi biganisha ku kuruhuka byatanze umusaruro kandi ingero ni nyinshi. I Mushaka umusore w’umusirikare yababariye umugabo wishe se kugeza n’aho ashakanye n’umukobwa we, Padiri Ubald arabashyingira ndetse anabyara umwana muri batisimu.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Padiri Ubald ibyo yigishaga yarabyemeraga, nawe ubwe yababariye uwamarije umuryango we wari ugizwe n’abantu 86 barimo nyina umubyara. Imbabazi yamugiriye zaherekejwe n’ibikorwa by’impuhwe birimo kurihira amashuri abana b’uwo mugabo ndetse umwana umwe w’umukobwa ubu ni dogiteri.”
Mu 2015, Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Ubumwe n’Ubwiyunge yahaye Padiri Ubald Umudali w’Umurinzi w’Igihango nk’uwimakaje ibi bikorwa by’isanamitima n’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge.
Rugwizangoga ati “Icyakora agiye akibona ko ibyo yari amaze gukora bikiri nk’agatonyanga mu nyanja.”
Padiri Ubald yabonye izuba muri Gashyantare 1955, yavukiye mu yahoze ari Segiteri ya Rwabidege muri Paruwasi ya Mwezi, Komini ya Karengera, Perefegitura ya Cyangugu. Yagizwe umupadiri mu 1984 ubwo yari afite imyaka 29 y’amavuko.
Uko umuhango wo gushyingura mu cyubahiro Padiri Rugirangoga Ubald wagenze (Amafoto na Video).
Kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 2 Werurwe 2021, nibwo habaye umuhango wo kumusezeraho bwa nyuma no kumushyingura mu cyubahiro, mu Karere ka Rusizi ahazwi nko ku Ibanga ry’Amahoro.
Centre Ibanga ry’Amahoro, ni agasozi gaherereye mu Kagari ka Kamatita, Umurenge wa Gihundwe, Akarere ka Rusizi mu Burengerazuba. Ni muri Diyosezi Gatolika ya Cyangugu, Paruwasi Nkanka, Santarari Muhari. Ni agasozi gafite ubuso busaga hegitari 25 ndetse hari ibikorwa yagizemo uruhare.
Ibikorwa byo gusengera abarwayi bagakira indwara zitandukanye zirimo ibyorezo n’izindi zabaga zarabaye akarande, Padiri Ubald ntabwo yabikoreraga mu Rwanda gusa kuko n’umunsi yandura Coronavirus ari nayo yaje kugeza ku rupfu rwe yari amaze iminsi muri Amerika mu bikorwa by’amasengesho.
Uretse muri Amerika, Padiri Ubald yatumirwaga henshi mu bihugu by’amahanga mu bikorwa byo gusengera abarwayi no kubibutsa ko abantu bose ari bene mugabo umwe bakwiye kubana mu mahoro n’urukundo.
Ni nayo mpamvu umuhango wo kumuherekeza iyo bitaza kuba icyorezo cya COVID-19, wari kwitabirwa n’ingeri nyinshi z’abantu baturutse imihanda yose haba mu Rwanda no hanze yarwo.
Ababanye na we bose batanze ubuhamya bugaruka ku mirimo yakoze ndetse yashimiwe umurage yasigiye abakirisitu n’Abanyarwanda muri rusange ushingiye ku ndangagaciro yo guca bugufi no guharanira amahoro. Abo mu muryango we bakomoje ku buryo yababereye urugero rwiza rw’umuntu urangwa n’urukundo.
UKO IGIKORWA CYO GUSEZERA BWA NYUMA NO GUSHYINGURA MU CYUBAHIRO PADIRI UBALD CYAGENZE
Twamwakiriye nk’umwana mu rugo: Abanya-Gihundwe bishimiye umushumba mushya Past Nsabayesu.
Imitima yabo yari ishimishijwe no kuba ururembo rugiye kuyoborwa n’umwana wabo, kuko muri Gihundwe ariho yakuriye ndetse akahakora n’imirimo itandukanye mu itorero.
Byari ibyishimo bikomeye kuri iki Cyumweru ku bakirisitu b’i Gihundwe kongera kubonana n’umwana wabo bakoranye umurimo w’Imana mu gihe cy’imyaka myinshi, ubu bakaba bamwakira nk’umushumba w’ururembo rwabo.
Pasiteri Nsabayesu yakuriye mu Itorero rya Gihundwe kuko ariho yakirijwe afite imyaka 11, ahakorera imirimo itandukanye. Nyuma kubera impamvu z’ubuzima yaje kuhava ariko akomeza gukurikirana uko imirimo igenda muri iri torero.
Bamwe mu bakirisitu bo mu itorero rya Gihundwe baganiriye na IGIHE, bavuze ko bishimiye kubona umwana wabo aje kubabera umushumba.
Majyambere Cyprien yagize ati “Ni ishimwe rikomeye. Twarishimye cyane kubona Nsabayesu ari we uje kutubera umushumba. Ni umuntu utuzi neza, bizadufasha gutera imbere. Kuba kandi ari umuntu ukiri muto ni byiza buri wese bazabasha kumvikana.”
“Haba abakuru bazumvikana kuko ni umwana wabo bareze baramuzi neza ndetse natwe urubyiruko tuzumvikana kuko turi bamwe. Ni ishimwe rikomeye kuri twe kubona umuntu nk’uyu ukunda Imana kandi uzi n’ubwenge, bizadufasha mu iterambere.”
Ibi byishimo abihuje na Twagira Pierre wavuze ko ari Imana ibikoze kuko nta mwana wakifuriza ibibi iwabo.
Ati “Imana iradushumbushije. Buriya nta mwana utifuriza iwabo ibyiza turabihamya tudashidikanya ko tuzabana neza. Nka Korali Bethania twese byaradushimishije nubwo afite inshingano nyinshi ariko azadufasha muri korali.”
Pasiteri Nsabayesu Aimable na we ibyishimo ni byose kongera gusubira ku ivuko ari umushumba. Yavuze ko azakorana n’abavandimwe bakoranye umurimo kuva kera mu gushaka icyateza imbere itorero.
Ati “Nanejejwe no guhabwa inshingano zo kuba Umushumba w’Ururembo navukiyemo, nakuriyemo kandi nakoreyemo umurimo w’Imana igihe kirekire.”
“Ndashimira abambanjirije kandi nanjye niteguye gutanga umusanzu wanjye mu gihe cyanjye tukamamaza ubwami bw’Imana kandi tukarushaho no kwiteza imbere dutegereje kugaruka kwa Yesu Kirisitu.”
Yakomeje avuga ko icyo ashyize imbere ari uko amaparuwasi yose ya Gihundwe uko ari 71 atera imbere mu buryo bw’umwuka ndetse no mu bw’umubiri.
Ati “Turifuza Gihundwe ifite ububyutse budasanzwe bwuzuyemo kwigaragaza kw’Imana mu mibereho y’abantu, ifite ubwiza bugaragarira amaso y’abantu bugatera abandi kuhabenguka, kandi ifite iterambere ryuzuye kuri roho no ku mubiri.”
“Tuzashyira imbaraga mu ivugabutumwa rizana benshi kuri Kirisitu no kubungabunga intama turagijwe, nazo zifite ubugingo buzima mu mibiri mizima. Tuzita ku kuzamura umutungo mu rwego rwo guca ubukene mu itorero. Ikindi ni ukugarura urukundo n’ubumwe mu itorero.”
Yongeyeho ko byose bazabifashwa no gusenga cyane, gukora cyane no gukiranuka.
Pasiteri Nsabayesu yari ayoboye Umudugudu wa Kacyiru muri ADEPR akaba asanzwe ari umuhanga mu bijyanye n’umuziki kuko ari umwarimu mu Ishuri ry’Umuziki rya Nyundo.
Reba indirimbo "Umbe Hafi" Pasiteri Nsabayesu yakoranye n’umuryango we
Igihe nk’iki mu 1900! Dutembere Kiliziya ya mbere yubatswe mu Rwanda.
Ni aho byahereye ngo uyu munsi benshi tube twarabatijwe, tube turi abakirisitu. Abo Bapadiri bahereye i Save muri Diyosezi ya Butare, bahavuye bakomereza i Zaza, Nyundo, Mibirizi, Kabgayi n’ahandi hose maze inkuru nziza ikwira i Rwanda.
Nyuma y’imyaka 43 gusa bari bamaze kugera n’ibwami, bumvisha Umwami Rudahigwa ko akwiriye kubatizwa maze ku wa 17 Ukwakira 1943, atega uruhanga rwe Musenyeri Léon Classe amusukaho amazi ahera ko abona izina ry’irikirisitu rya Charles Léon Pierre, ni uko u Rwanda rwegurirwa Kirisitu Umwami gutyo.
Rudahigwa icyo gihe yabyawe muri Batisimu na Guverineri Mukuru wa Congo Mbiligi na Rwanda-Urundi, Pierre Ryckmans, abatiranwa na nyina, Umugabekazi Nyiramavugo Kankazi, wiswe Radegonde.
Kiliziya Gatolika ni uko yashinze imizi mu Rwanda, bihera aho bigera mu buzima busanzwe bwa buri munsi bw’abanyarwanda iva mu iyobokamana igera no mu bikorwa by’iterambere nk’amashuri aho ubu ariyo ifite menshi mu gihugu, yubaka ibitaro n’ibindi bikorwa remezo byinshi.
Mu 2019, IGIHE yakoze urugendo i Save ku isoko ya Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda, aho abamisiyoneri ba mbere bicaye bavuye ibwami, bamaze kuganira n’Umwami Musinga, baba ariho bubaka Kiliziya.
Iyo Kiliziya yubatswe muri Gashyantare 1900, nta gihe cya nyacyo kizwi ariko amateka menshi asobanura ko hari ku itariki ya munani ubwo ibuye rya mbere ryagerekwaga ku rindi.
Icyo gihe Kiliziya yubatswe yari iy’ibyatsi ariko nyuma hubakwa iy’amatafari ahiye. Byinshi mu bikoresho byarimo n’ubu biracyahari, urugero nk’iriba rya Batisimu ryakoreshwaga mu kubatiza, inanga yakoreshwaga mu gucuranga mu kiliziya yakoreshwaga n’abantu batatu bahagaga umwuka kugira ngo ikore.
Padiri Mukwiye Fidèle yantembereje muri iyi kiliziya aho yari iri hose, anyereka ikibindi kimaze iyo myaka yose cyashyirwagamo amazi yo kubatiza. Ati “Ababatijwe bwa mbere ni kiriya gikoresho bakoreshaga, yari kiliziya nini cyane.”
Yari ifite inkingi 24, ubu hafi ya zose zaraguye hasigara imwe ari nayo ifite agace gato ka Chapelle gakoreshwa nk’urwibutso rw’iyo kiliziya ya kera.
Ati “Kahindutse ak’abantu bashaka gusenga no gushimira Imana ko yatumye aha hantu haba ahantu urebye abantu ba mbere babatirijwe, baherewe amasakaramentu.”
Imbere muri iyo chapelle nta bintu bya kera bikihagarara gusa hifashishwa nk’uburyo bwo kwiga amateka.
Abakirisitu bo muri Paruwasi ya Save mu bijyanye n’imyemerere nyobokamana, ntabwo batandukanye n’ab’ahandi ariko hari umwihariko.
Ati “Hari utuntu tugaragaza ko bafite umuco wa Gikirisitu, nko guhabwa isakaramentu rya Penetensiya kenshi, umuntu yumva ko hatashira ukwezi, ibyumweru bibiri atayihawe. Ni cyo kintu nabonye barusha ahandi. Ikindi ni ugukunda misa.”
Mu bihe bisanzwe kuri Paruwasi ya Save hasomwa misa enye, abantu barenga ibihumbi bibiri baba buzuye.
Yakomeje agira ati “Iyo bafite umuntu urwaye, babona yarembye, bahamagara umupadiri kugira ngo ajye kumuha amasakaramentu ya nyuma, nta rugo na rumwe haba hari umuntu urembye ngo azitabe Imana adahawe amasakaramentu.”
Padiri Mukwiye avuga ko bikwiye ko Save ibungabungwa, amateka yayo ajyanye n’uko Kiliziya yageze mu Rwanda ntasibangane.
Kiliziya iri gutekereza icyo St Michel izakoreshwa nyuma yo kwimurira Cathédrale ahahoze 1930.
Ubusanzwe Cathédrale ya Kigali iherereye mu Kiyovu mu Karere ka Nyarugenge ahari Paruwasi ya St Michel, ahantu iherereye hakaba ari hato, hatisanzuye kandi hegeranye n’umuhanda ku buryo ibikorwa byo kuyagura bisa n’ibidashoboka.
Muri Mutarama 2019, nibwo Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda by’umwihariko Arikidiyosezi ya Kigali yasabye Umukuru w’Igihugu ubufasha mu kubaka Cathédrale ijyanye n’igihe.
Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Antoine Cardinal Kambanda yavuze ko “Kuva cyera uko Umujyi ugenda ukura, Kigali yari ifite umushinga wo kubaka Katederali nini kuko iyi aho iri nta bwinyagamburiro, nta buryo bwo kubaka buhari cyangwa kwaguka.”
Muri Mutarama 2020, nibwo byatangajwe ko ubutaka bw’ahahoze Gereza ya Nyarugenge bungana hegitari 5.5, Kiliziya Gatolika mu Rwanda yabwemerewe, aho yasabwaga gukora igenamigambi ry’uko yabukoresha.
Cardinal Kambanda yavuze ko kuba ikibanza baragihawe, ubu ikigezweho ari ugukora inyigo ijyanye n’igishushanyo mbonera kandi nayo yatangiye gukorwa.
Ati “Icyakurikiyeho ni ugukora inyigo, ubu inyigo niyo irimo gukorwa. Tugenda rero dutangariza abantu aho bigeze.”
Yavuze ko n’ubwo hagiye kubakwa Cathédrale nshya ya Kigali, bitavuze ko iyari isanzwe iri ahubatse Paruwasi St Michel izahita isenywa ahubwo hari gushakwa icyo hazakoreshwa.
Yakomeje agira ati “Ibya hano St Michel irahari, ariko uko igenamigambi ry’Umujyi n’uko abantu bagenda bimuka cyangwa bagana ahantu, ibyo byose nibyo bigenda bigira […] ntabwo ari ibintu wavuga ngo bizagenda gutya.”
Yavuze ko ashyigikiye inzira yatangijwe n’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yo kumvikanisha impande zitavuga rumwe muri Mali, umutekano n’ituze rusange bikagaruka.
Ibya Tchad aba mbere bireba ni Abanya-Tchad
Tariki 20 Mata 2021, inkuru itunguranye yaturutse i Ndjamena ivuga ko uwari Perezida wa Tchad, Idriss Déby Itno yapfuye biturutse ku bikomere by’amasasu yarasiwe ku rugamba.
Déby wari umaze imyaka 30 ku butegetsi, yapfuye ku munsi Komisiyo y’Amatora yari yatangarijeho ko ari we watsinze amatora yari aherutse kuba.
Igisirikare cyahise gitangaza ko umuhungu we Mahamat Idriss Déby ari we umusimbura, akayobora Komisiyo idasanzwe ya gisirikare mu gihe hagitegurwa amatora mashya ya Perezida.
Ni umwanzuro utaravuzweho rumwe haba imbere muri Tchad no hanze yayo, bamwe bavuga ko ari ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi kuko Itegeko Nshinga Tchad yagenderagaho rivuga ko iyo Perezida apfuye asimburwa n’Umuyobozi w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Ubutegetsi bwa Tchad bwo bwatangaje ko Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yanze izo nshingano, bikaba ngombwa ko zifatwa n’igisirikare kugira ngo ubuzima bukomeze.
TV5 Monde yabajije Perezida Kagame icyo avuga kuri ibyo bibazo byakurikiye urupfu rwa Déby, maze avuga ko igikwiriye kwitabwaho ari ukuri kw’ibiri kubera muri Tchad, no guha umwanya abaturage b’icyo gihugu bakagira uruhare rukomeye mu gukemura ibibazo byabo.
Yagize ati “Mu bihugu byose haba hari ibiri kuba ariko icyo tugomba kwitaho ni ibiri kubera aho hantu, duti ese uyu ari gukora iki mubo bireba? Tukagendera ku biri kubera imbere mu banya-Tchad ubwabo. Ni inshingano za mbere z’abaturage ba Tchad hanyuma twe tukaza dufasha.”
Mu ntangiriro za Gicurasi 2021, Perezida Kagame yakiriye mu biro bye Abdelkerim Déby Itno, Umuyobozi w’Ibiro bya Perezida w’Urwego rwa Gisirikare ruyobora Tchad by’agateganyo, akaba murumuna wa Mahamat Déby uyobora igihugu nyuma y’urupfu rwa se.
Mu buzima ibintu ntibitungana ijana ku ijana- Kagame avuga ku bataranyuzwe n’imbabazi Macron yasabiye i Kigali.
Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron yagiriye uruzinduko rw’iminsi ibiri mu Rwanda ku wa 27-28 Gicurasi 2021.
Mu bikorwa yakoze ahageze harimo gusura Urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali aho yavugiye imbwirwaruhame yari itegerejwe na benshi nyuma y’imyaka 27 y’umwuka mubi hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa.
Muri iyi mbwirwaruhame, Macron yemeye uruhare rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda, nk’uko byari biherutse gushyirwa ahagaragara muri raporo Duclert yakozwe ku busabe bwe na raporo Muse yakozwe ku busabe bwa leta y’u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Mpagaze aha nciye bugufi kandi niyoroheje, nazanywe no kwemera uruhare rwacu. Kwemera ibyabaye, ni no kwemera ko ubutabera bukomeza duharanira ko nta n’umwe mu bakekwaho ibyaha bya Jenoside uzacika ubutabera.”
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde yabajijwe uko yakiriye amagambo ya Macron n’agaciro yayahaye. Yavuze ko nubwo urugendo rukiri rurerure amagambo ya Macron ari ukuri kuzifashishwa mu gukomeza kuzahura umubano.
Yagize “Ntushobora kubona ibyo ushaka mu buryo bwuzuye 100%, ubuzima niko bumeze. Ibyo Macron yavuze ni ukuri. Kwemera uruhare ni ikintu gikomeye.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Tugomba kumva neza aho tuvuye, imyaka 27 irashize duhuye n’aya mahano, abantu barahizwe baricwa nk’uko mubizi. Kuba Macron yaje akavugira ijambo rye ahantu hari ikimenyetso cy’ibyabaye ntiyabikoreye ubusa. Yabivuganye amarangamutima.”
Nubwo hari abantu bavuga ko ibyo yavuze bidahagije, Perezida Kagame yasobanuye ko icyo aha agaciro ari intambwe Macron yateye asura u Rwanda. Ku bwe ngo abantu ntibashobora kunyurwa ku rugero rungana, ikindi ni uko ngo urugendo rwo kuvugurura umubano w’ibihugu byombi rudahagarariye aho.
Ati “Umuhate we watumye ibintu bigera ku rwego nishimira. Ni icyerekezo cyiza tugomba gukomeza, ntabwo turasoza urugendo, tuzakomeza, turi mu nzira nziza. Ku bwanjye kwemera uruhare ni ikintu gikomeye.”
Ibi ariko ntibivuze ko yanyuzwe 100% nk’umuntu ufite ubushobozi bwo gusesengura ibifatika n’ibidafatika ahubwo nk’umunyapolitiki ngo hari uburyo bwo kuganisha ibintu aho bikwiye kugana kandi amateka “ntareberwa mu cyerekezo kimwe.”
Ati “Sinanyuzwe 100%. Nta muntu unyurwa 100%; ubuzima niko bumera, tugomba gukomeza kubaho twifashishije ibyo dufite, ibyo twabonye. Haracyari ibyo gukora, nta ‘formule’ ihari kugira ngo tubone ibisubizo.”
Ku bandi bavuga ko imbabazi Macron yasabye zidahagije, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ari byiza kubaha uburyo babonamo ibintu. Ati “Niko bigenda mu buzima hari abantu batajya banyurwa. Haracyari ibyo gukora, nta ‘formule’ ihari kugira ngo tubone ibisubizo, tugomba kureba ibintu mu buryo bwagutse.”
“Ku bijyanye n’ingaruka byatugizeho icyo navuga ni uko aho twavuye ari kure, hari abagizweho ingaruka mu buryo ndengakamere, turabatekereza, agahinda kabo turakumva ariko murabizi niko ubuzima bumeze. Mu buzima ntabwo ibintu bitungana.”
Perezida Macron niwe wa mbere mu bayoboye u Bufaransa nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, wemeye uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, akanasaba imbabazi ndetse agafata ingamba zigamije gusubiza mu murongo umubano mwiza.
Perezida Kagame yatabarije abari mu kaga batewe n’iruka rya Nyiragongo.
Hashize icyumweru kirenga Ikirunga cya Nyiragongo giherereye muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru muri Congo cyongeye kuruka nyuma y’ibyabaye mu 2002.
Aya makuba yabaye bitunguranye yangije imitungo, bene yo bamwe barapfa abandi barakomereka hatibagiranye n’abatesetse bagerageza gukiza amagara yabo.
Hari abageze ku butaka bw’u Rwanda bahamara igihe gito basubira iwabo nyuma yo kumva amakuru ko Nyiragongo yatanze agahenge ariko bagezeyo baragaruka mu kwirinda ingaruka z’iki kirunga na none.
Kugeza ku wa Kane tariki 27 Gicurasi 2021, Abanye-Congo bari bagihunga aho abasaga 8.735 binjiriye ku mupaka wa Grande Barrière, 5.100 binjirira kuri Petite Barrière naho 60 binjirira ku mupaka wa Busasamana.
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde yagaragaje ubukana bw’ibibazo byasizwe n’iruka rya Nyiragongo ku baturage b’ibihugu byombi. Yavuze ko bitoroshye guhangana n’ibiza nk’ibi biza bitunguranye kandi bigashegesha abantu benshi.
Ati “Turimo gukora ibishoboka ngo duhangane n’iki kibazo cy’iruka ry’Ikirunga cyashegeshe RDC ariko bikagera no ku Rwanda. Hari urujya n’uruza rw’abantu bahunga hanyuma bakongera bagasubirayo, ni abantu bahungabanyijwe n’aya makuba. Hari icyo kibazo cyo gutungurana no kuba umubare w’abantu ari munini, ni ibihumbi by’abantu baza imbokoboko biruka.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko inzego z’u Rwanda zakoranye n’iza Congo kugira ngo abavanywe mu byabo “tubasaranganye ibyo dufite mu bushobzi bwacu buke tugerageza kubashakira aho bacumbika, tubagaburira, tubavuza.”
Kuba byarabaye bitunguranye byatumye n’uburemere bwabyo bwiyongera burenga ubushobozi bw’ibihugu byombi, ibi bikaba ari byo bituma ahamagarira amahanga kubatera ingabo mu bitugu.
Ati “Imiterere y’ikibazo ubwacyo ikwiye gutuma amahanga ahaguruka agafasha natwe tuzabatabariza kuko ni ibigaragara ko uburemere bw’ikibazo burenze ubushobozi bw’u Rwanda na Congo, Isi yose ikurikira ibiri kuba kuri aba baturage bari mu kaga ikwiye guhaguruka.”
Imibare y’agateganyo y’abamaze guhitanwa n’iruka rya Nyiragongo igaragaza abarenga 32. Bamwe batwitswe n’amazuku, abandi bicwa n’imyotsi. Hari abaguye mu mpanuka z’imodoka bahunga, abaguye mu mubyigano n’ibindi.
Ni mu gihe imitungo irimo inzu yahiye igasiga benshi mu kangaratete. By’umwihariko ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda mu Karere ka Rubavu inzu zibarirwa hejuru ya 1200 zarasenyutse kubera imitingito ya hato na hato, ibitaro bya Gisenyi n’amwe mu mashuri birafungwa, bamwe mu baturage basabwa kwimuka aho bari batuye kubera imitutu yashoboraga gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga. Hari kandi imirima yatwikiriwe n’amakoro mu Murenge wa Cyanzarwe.
Perezida Kagame yavuze icyo u Rwanda rwiteze kuri ‘Centre Culturel Francophone’ yafunguwe i Kigali.
‘Centre Culturel Francophone’ ni ikigo giherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali ku Kimihurura cyasimbuye icyitwaga ‘Centre d’Echanges Culturels Franco-Rwandais’ cyari giherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali rwagati.
Iki kigo gishya kiragutse kurushaho kuko ibihugu bihuriye ku rurimi rw’Igifaransa bizajya bicyibonamo nk’uko byatangajwe na Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron ubwo yagifunguraga ku wa 27 Gicurasi 2021, mu ruzinduko rw’iminsi ibiri aheruka kugirira mu Rwanda.
Yavuze ko icyo kigo gikwiriye kuba ahantu ho guteza imbere indangagaciro ziri mu Gifaransa n’abakoresha urwo rurimi hirya no hino ku Isi, abantu bakahakorera ibikorwa by’ubuvumbuzi iby’umuco no guteza imbere urubyiruko by’umwihariko.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na TV5 Monde, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko ari iby’ingirakamaro kuba u Rwanda rufite ikigo nk’iki afata nk’umuryango uzakomeza guhuza u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa.
Ati “Twishimiye cyane kuba dufite ikigo cya Francophonie mu Rwanda. Nk’urugero dufite umuturage wacu uyobora Umuryango Mpuzamahanga w’Ibihugu bikoresha Igifaransa, Louise Mushikiwabo, ndakeka ko ari ibintu byumvikana. Ni ikintu cy’ingenzi mu gihe turimo kugerageza kongera kuzahura umubano wacu n’u Bufaransa mu bya dipolomasi, ni nk’umuryango uzakomeza kuduhuza.”
Mu ijambo Emmanuel Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, ku wa 27 Gicurasi 2021, yagarutse ku mateka yaranze Politiki y’u Bufaransa ku Rwanda aho yemeye ko iki gihugu cyagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, avuga ko nubwo aya mateka adashobora gusibangana hakiri amahirwe y’ubufatanye nka bumwe mu buryo bwo kuzirikana abahitanywe na yo bakavutsa ahazaza habo.
Ati “Ndagira ngo uyu munsi nizeze urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda ko kongera gukorana bishoboka. Hari andi mahirwe y’ubufatanye bwiyubashye, butanga inyungu ku mpande zombi hagati y’urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda n’urw’u Bufaransa. Ni uburyo bwo guha agaciro abo twibuka bavukijwe ahazaza habo dufiteho inshingano zo kubaka.”
Aya magambo yongeye kuyashimangira ubwo yafunguraga ku mugaragaro ‘Centre Culturel Francophone’ agira ati “Ndifuza ko urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rubyaza umusaruro aha hantu. Hazatangirwa amasomo, hazigishirizwa kandi hari buruse tuzajya dutanga mu myaka iri imbere. Hari byinshi tutarabona urubyiruko ruzavumburira aha.”
Centre Culturel Francophone yagombaga kuzura ikanatahwa mu 2020 ariko imirimo yayo yadindijwe n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 bituma irangira muri Mata uyu mwaka.
Yimanye inkoni yo kumukubitisha mu Bufaransa - Amarangamutima ku ruzinduko rwa Macron i Kigali.
Kuri iyi tariki nibwo Perezida w’u Bufaransa Emmanuel Macron bwa mbere yemeye uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri ayo mateka ashaririye u Rwanda rwanyuzemo.
Mu marangamutima menshi, Macron nyuma yo gusura urwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, yagize ati “Mpagaze aha imbere yanyu nciye bugufi kandi niyoroheje, nazanywe no kwemera uruhare rwacu.”
Macron ntiyeruye ngo asabe imbabazi mu buryo butomoye ariko imbwirwaruhame ye uburyo yari iteguye yumvikanishije ko igihugu cye gishaka imbabazi ziturutse ku ‘barokotse Jenoside’.
Yagize ati “Kwemera aya mateka n’uruhare rwacu, ni ikimenyetso kidashidikanywaho. Tubikoze ku bushake, tubyikorera. Ni umwenda ku nzirakarengane nyuma y’igihe kirekire ducecetse. Ni impano ku bakiriho bagifite ububabare baramutse babitwemereye, twafatanya kubagabanyiriza umubabaro.”
“Iyi nzira yo kuzirikana, binyuze mu madeni n’impano zacu, biraduha icyizere ko tuzayasohokamo twese dufatanyije. Muri iyo nzira, abanyuze muri iri joro ribi nibo bashobora kutubabarira, bakaduha impano y’imbabazi."
Yari afite amarangamutima no kwicisha bugufi
Imbwirwaruhame ya Macron ntabwo yavuzweho rumwe mu Rwanda. Hari abumvise ibyo yakoze bihagije bakurikije uburyo ari we watinyutse kwemera uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside. Hari abandi bavuga ko bidahagije kuko ateruye ngo avuge ko ‘u Bufaransa busabye imbabazi’, ibyo yakoze bakabifata nko gucenga inkurikiza zakurikira kwemera urwo ruhare.
Umunyamategeko w’Umunyarwanda uba mu Bufaransa, Richard Gisagara yabwiye IGIHE ko ijambo rya Macron ryari riteguye neza kandi ryumvikana.
Yagize ati “Ijambo rya Macron narishimye rwose, ryari ijambo ryiza cyane kandi ryateguwe umwanya munini. Ntabwo ari ijambo rihutiyeho, yafashe umwanya ashaka amagambo agomba kuvuga , ni ikintu cy’amateka . Icya mbere nashimye ni ukunamira inzirakarengane yamara kubunamira akicisha bugufi akavuga ko akababaro kabo yakumvise, kandi ko hari uruhare rw’u Bufaransa.”
Kuba ateruye ngo avuge ko asabye imbabazi bitomoye, Gisagara ntabibonamo ikibazo. Yavuze ko abantu badakwiriye kwibagirwa ko Macron ari umunyapolitiki.
Ati “Yabonye ubundi buryo bwo kubivuga. Yavuze ko abakorewe icyaha aribo bonyine bashobora kugira umutima wo kubabarira ariko ntabwo yeruye ngo avuge ati ‘mbasabye imbabazi’. Wenda nka Perezida w’ u Bufaransa ni umunyapolitiki afite aho agarukira ariko muri rusange ijambo narishimye.”
Umuyobozi w’Umuryango w’abapfakazi ba Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Avega-Agahozo, Mukabayire Valérie yavuze ko nk’abarokotse Jenoside, bishimiye cyane ijambo Macron yavugiye ku Gisozi.
Nk’umwe mu bari begereye Macron ubwo yavugaga ijambo ku Gisozi, Mukabayire yavuze ko ibyo yatangaje byaturukaga ku ndiba y’umutima.
Ati “Twe twanamurebaga hafi yari afite amarangamutima ubona ko bimuri ku mutima. Yavuze ko anemera uruhare rw’u Bufaransa, aganisha no ku mwenda u Bufaransa bufite kandi anavuga ko ba bandi baraye ijoro ari bo bakwiriye gutanga imbabazi, ko nibabona ko bakwiriye kuzitanga bazazitanga.”
Kuba atatomoye ngo avuge ko asabye imbabazi z’uruhare rw’u Bufaransa mu mateka mabi y’u Rwanda, Mukabayire ntabwo abibonamo ikibazo.
Ati “Ni uburyo bwe bwo kuvuga, hari aho yavuze ko Jenoside nta magambo wabona yo kuvuga usaba imbabazi kuri Jenoside, abarokotse bo bafite uko babyumva nibo batanga imbabazi. Ni amagambo ye yashatse kubinyuzamo ariko ni intambwe.”
No kuba yavugiye ijambo ku rwibutso rwa Gisozi, ngo ni intambwe ikomeye kuko nta bandi bayobozi bakuru bagiye basura urwibutso, ngo bahavugire ijambo rikomeye nk’iryo.
Mukabayire kandi yongeyeho ko ijambo rya Macron ritanga icyizere ku busabe u Rwanda rwari rumaze igihe rutanga bwo gufata abakekwaho Jenoside bihishe muri icyo gihugu.
Ati “Birwaga badusekera, batwishongoraho no kudukina ku mubyimba bazi ko ntawe uzabakoraho. Macron yavuze ko nta n’umwe uzacika ubutabera, ni ikintu cyiza.”
Yimanye inkoni yo kumukubitira mu Bufaransa
Umwaka utaha wa 2022, hateganyijwe amatora ya Perezida mu Bufaransa kandi biteganyijwe ko Macron azongera kwiyamamaza kuko Itegeko Nshinga ribimwemerera.
Amatora yo muri icyo gihugu aba akomeye cyane by’umwihariko ku bakandida kuko ikosa rimwe rishobora gutuma abari bamushyigikiye bamushiraho.
Macron n’ubusanzwe igikundiro cye mu Bafaransa kimaze iminsi kidahagaze neza ahanini bitewe n’ibibazo birimo iby’iterabwoba, ubukungu n’ibindi bimaze igihe.
Kwemera ku mugaragaro uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bishobora guha icyuho abatavuga rumwe na we cyane cyane abahoze mu butegetsi bwagize uruhare muri Jenoside bagifite ijambo rikomeye muri politiki y’u Bufaransa.
Umusesenguzi mu bya Politiki, Albert Rudatsimburwa yabwiye IGIHE ko Macron yari afite impamvu mu kwirinda gutomora neza uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside kugira ngo itaba inkoni izifashishwa n’abamurwanya mu matora ataha.
Ati “Uburyo yabivuze hari abaza kumunenga mu Bufaransa ariko ntabwo yabahaye inkoni yo kumukubita. Na we arabizi ko udapfa guhindura ibintu byageze ku mugaragaro, kuvuga ko abawe bafitemo uruhare, ni guhita ukurura abazakurwanya.”
“Bishobora gutuma abura amahirwe yo gutorwa cyangwa akabona abantu benshi bamurwanya. Aramutse atongeye gutorwa twaba tubihombeyemo kuko afite icyerecyezo kandi yashatse kwerekana ko yubaha u Rwanda, ko anumva aho u Rwanda rwigeje nyuma y’ibyo byose.”
Rudatsimburwa yavuze ko no kuba byonyine yemeye ko u Bufaransa bwagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ari ikintu gikomeye ndetse kirenze ibindi bihugu byasabye imbabazi.
Ati “Kuri twebwe ni ikintu gikomeye kurusha n’abandi bose baje. Icyo u Bufaransa bwakoze ni akataraboneka kuko bo bari ku ruhembe, si nka ba bandi bavuga ngo mutubabarire kuko tutahabaye, bo bari bahari bari ku rundi ruhande. Ibyo byose kubihakana arabihagaritse.”
Nubwo yanyuzwe, Richard Gisagara we yavuze ko atishimiye uburyo Macron yongeye gusubiramo ko abayobozi b’u Bufaransa bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, babikoze ‘buhumyi’ batabizi.
Gisagara yavuze ko ibimenyetso byose bihari byerekana ko Perezida François Mitterrand n’ibyegera bye bari bazi ibyaberaga mu Rwanda ariko bagahitamo guceceka no gufasha Leta yateguraga Jenoside.
U Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda inkunga ya miliyoni 60 z’amayero azifashishwa mu kurwanya Covid-19 n’ingaruka zayo.
Amasezerano yashyizweho umukono na Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD, Rémy Rioux.
Mu rwego rw’ubuzima, iyi nkunga izatanga umusanzu muri gahunda y’igihugu yo kurwanya icyorezo cya Covid-19 hagurwa inkingo igihugu gikeneye, gushyigikira ibikorwa bizatuma intego yo kongera ubushobozi bwo gusuzuma no kwita ku barwayi cyane cyane abagore batwite igerwaho.
Iyi nkunga yitezweho kandi gufasha mu gutera inkunga abatishoboye binyuze muri gahunda ya VUP n’izindi zifasha abo mu byiciro biciriritse kubona serivisi z’ubuzima n’uburezi bw’ibanze.
Minisitiri w’Imari n’Igenamigambi, Dr Uzziel Ndagijimana, yavuze ko u Rwanda rushaka kuzahura ubukungu bwarwo no kugaruka mu bihe bisanzwe nyuma ya Covid-19.
Yagize ati “Iyi nkunga izongera ubushobozi bwacu mu kugura inkingo, kongera ingufu mu bikorwa bizamura urwego rw’ubuzima no gufata ingamba zikwiye mu guhangana na Covid-19, abaturage batishoboye batibagiranye.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa AFD, Rémy Rioux, we yavuze ko izafasha mu gukemura ibibazo by’abaturage barimo abakozi bo mu nzego ziciriritse [zitanditse] ubukungu bwabo bwazahajwe na Covid-19.
Ati “Nubwo impfu ziturutse kuri Covid-19 zabashije gukumirwa mu gihugu kubera ingamba zikomeye kandi z’intangarugero, ingaruka ku bukungu n’imibereho y’abaturage cyane ku bakora mu nzego ‘zitanditse’ zigomba gukemurwa. AFD ibinyujije muri porogaramu yayo yo gushyigikira gahunda z’ubuzima, yiyemeje gutera inkunga u Rwanda mu ngamba zarwo zo kurengera imibereho hagamijwe kugabanya ingaruka z’ibibazo abaturage batishoboye bahuye na byo.”
Kuva icyorezo cya Covid-19 cyatera, u Bufaransa bwarushijeho gushimangira ubufatanye n’u Rwanda. Kugeza ubu AFD imaze gutanga inkunga ya miliyoni 40 z’amayero kandi ibihugu byombi biri gushaka uko bifatanya mu nzego zitandukanye zirimo ingufu, uburezi, ubuzima, urwego rw’abikorera n’izindi.
Mu yindi mishinga u Bufaransa bwateye inkunga harimo iyo gukwirakwiza amashanyarazi yashyizwemo miliyoni 80 z’amayero na miliyoni 5.8 yo guteza imbere uburezi mu mashuri y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro.
AFD kandi yasinyanye amasezerano na Minisiteri y’Uburezi arimo umushinga wo gutangiza ishami ryigisha ibijyanye n’ikoranabuhanga rihuza ’électronique’ na ’mécanique’ ibizwi nka ’Mécatronique’ muri Tumba College of Technology, ishuri riherereye mu Karere ka Rulindo.
Amafaranga u Bufaransa bwahaye u Rwanda akubiye mu bufatanye ibihugu byombi byashyizeho umukono uyu munsi, ni inguzanyo izishyurwa ku nyungu iciriritse, azatangira kwishyurwa nyuma y’imyaka itandatu.
U Bufaransa kandi bwahaye u Rwanda inkunga ya dose ibihumbi 100 by’inkingo za Covid-19, yazanywe na Perezida Emmanuel Macron ubwo yagiriraga uruzinduko muri iki gihugu.
Icyo Perezida Macron agiye gukora ngo abarimo Agatha Kanziga bafatwe.
Agathe Kanziga ashyirwa mu majwi cyane nk’umwe mu bantu bari ku ruhembe rw’abagize uruhare mu itegurwa rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi dore ko yabaga mu “Akazu” kari kagizwe n’abakomokaga mu Majyaruguru y’Uburengerazuba bw’u Rwanda, by’umwihariko mu zahoze ari Perefegitura za Ruhengeri na Gisenyi.
Hashize igihe kinini aba mu Bufaransa bwaranze kumwohereza mu Rwanda kugira ngo akurikiranyweho ibyaha bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi ashinjwa.
Mu ijambo Macron yavugiye ku Rwibutso rwa Jenoside rwa Kigali, yemeye uruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda maze yiyemeza ko azatanga umusanzu we kugira ngo abakekwaho Jenoside bagezwe mu butabera.
Ibi nibyo itangazamakuru ryuririyeho mu kiganiro yagiranye na ryo, rimubaza icyo yiteguye gukora kugira ngo Agatha Kanziga atabwe muri yombi.
Perezida Macron yasubije ko atari uwo gusa ahubwo muri rusange hazabaho kuvugurura imikoranire hagati y’inzego z’ubutabera bw’ibihugu byombi kugira ngo n’abandi bihishe muri iki gihugu bafatwe.
Yagize ati “Ntacyo navuga ku muntu ku giti cye kuko ni akazi kareba ubutabera ariko icyo twiyemeje gukora nk’abakuru b’ibihugu ni ugushyiraho uburyo bwose bw’ubufatanye mu by’ubutabera n’ibisubizo byoroshya ugushyira ukuri ahabona, kugeza mu butabera no koherezwa abakekwaho Jenoside.”
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na France 24, na we yagarutse ku kibazo cya Agatha Kanziga, avuga ko u Bufaransa ari bwo buzamufataho icyemezo.
Yagize ati “Yaba Agatha cyangwa abandi, urutonde ni rurerure, ari ku isonga ryarwo, u Bufaransa buzafata umwanzuro w’icyo bugomba gukora kuri we. Simbategeka icyo bakora, icyo nakora ni ukubisaba kandi kubisaba bikorwa ku mugaragaro.”
U Bufaransa buvugwaho kuba buri mu bihugu bicumbikiye benshi mu bakekwaho uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda, nyamara abamaze kugezwa mu butabera ni mbarwa.
Urugero nk’Ikinyamakuru Médiapart kimenyereweho gucukumbura amakuru ku Banyarwanda bakoze Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda bihishe mu Bufaransa, mu minsi minsi ya vuba cyatahuye amazina y’abantu batatu bakekwaho ibyaha bikomeye bya Jenoside bamaze igihe kinini bihishe muri iki gihugu.
Barimo Hyacinthe Bicamumpaka wahoze ari umunyamakuru wa Radio Rwanda, Joseph Mushyandi na Anastase Rwabizambuga.
Biteganywa ko iyo Cathédrale nshya igomba kuba ijyanye n’igihe, yajya yakira abantu nibura ibihumbi bitanu, hanyuma ikagira n’imbuga yayo nini ku buryo mu gihe habaye nk’iminsi mikuru abantu bashobora kuyiteraniramo bageze nko ku bihumbi 10 kugera kuri 20.
Aline Gahongayire yafashije Jackson Jack mu ndirimbo yo guhigurira umuhigo Imana.
Indirimbo nshya Aline Gahongayire yahuriyemo na Jackson Jack yiswe ‘Nyemerera’. Iyi ndirimbo y’amashusho igizwe n’iminota itanu n’amasegonda 38.
Aba bahanzi hari igice baririmbamo bavuga bati “Kubyirengagiza byamvunnye. Ibicuro byanyuzuye mu mutima, uyu munsi sinawurenza ntavuze kugira neza ku buzima bwanjye […] ongera unyemerere ngushime, tega amatwi wumve indirimbo naguhimbiye, nyemerera ukunde uyakire.”
Mu kiganiro Aline Gahongayire yahaye IGIHE yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayihimbye nyuma yo kwibuka ibyo Imana yagiye ibakorera ariko ntibayishime, kandi byari ngombwa cyane.
Yagize ati “Hari ibintu byinshi umuntu ahigira Imana ari mu bihe bigoye ntabashe kuyisohoza. Numvaga mfitiye Imana ideni. Naravugaga nti ‘icyampa rero Imana ikaduha amahirwe tukongera kuyishima.’”
Sinzoyiheba Jackson Jack ubusanzwe aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, yahuje imbaraga na Aline Gahongayire uri mu bafite igikundiro mu muziki uhimbaza Imana mu kurushaho kwegereza abakunzi be ibihangano bihembura imitima yabo.
Indirimbo ‘Nyemerera’ mu buryo bw’amajwi yakozwe na Boris, naho amashusho yafashwe na Bob Chris Raheem na Dieudonne Nb.
Jackson Jack amaze isaga itatu atangiye umuziki nk’umuhanzi wigenga. Uyu muhanzi yavukiye muri Tanzania ku babyeyi bafite inkomoko mu Burundi. Afite intego yo gukora umuziki wubahisha Imana mu mfuruka zose z’Isi.
Mu gihe amaze mu muziki yashyize hanze ibihangano birimo ‘Wema Wako’, ‘Tawala Yesu’, ‘Nitainuliwa’, ‘Wavuze’ yakoranye na Karim n’izindi.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga: Ubucuruzi bwitwikiriye umutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Niba ukoresha internet usoma amakuru, ukora ubushakashatsi, uhaha cyangwa ukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu buryo butandukanye, ujya ubona ubutumwa bwamamaza bwikubise mu byo warimo usoma cyangwa ubona amakuru akwizaniye atari mu byo washakaga ako kanya.
Ingero, ushobora kuba uri gusoma amakuru ku rubuga rwa internet, uri kureba amashusho kuri YouTube ukabona hari ubutumwa bwikubisemo; ku rukuta rwawe rwa Facebook cyangwa Twitter, ujya uzasangaho ubutumwa bw’abantu cyangwa ibigo bitari mu bo ukurikira cyangwa abagukurikira (Followers).
Ubwo ni uburyo bwo kwamamaza hakoreshejwe internet, kandi mbere y’uko utangira gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, wabanje gusinya amasezerano wemera ko ubwo butumwa uzajya ububona, nubwo abenshi basinya ayo masezerano batabanje kuyasoma.
Ushobora kuba wibaza uti ‘izi mbunga nkoranyambaga ko tuzikoresha ku buntu, ba nyirazo bunguka iki?’Hari n’abatekereza ko amafaranga bishyura ku mirongo y’itumanaho icuruza internet, agera kuri banyir’imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye.
Kugira ngo usobanukirwe neza uburyo abashinze imbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse n’imbuga za internet (websites and social media) bunguka, nabigusobanurira mu buryo bworoshye.
Abakoresha internet n’imbuga nkoranyambaga, bameze nk’abantu bazana amazi bakayasuka mu ruhombo runini ariko ku yindi mpera y’urwo ruhombo, aho badashobora kureba, hakaba hari abantu bateze ibivomesho ayo mazi yisukamo, bagahita bayajyana ku isoko kuyagurisha.
Muri make, igihe cyose ukoresha internet, waba usoma amakuru cyangwa uganira n’inshuti ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ni amafaranga uba utanga. Ibi rero bishimangira ko abakoze imbuga za internet n’imbuga nkoranyambaga n’ingufu bahora bashyiramo mu kuzivugurura kugira ngo zirusheho kunezeza abazikoresha, ntabwo bashishikajwe cyane no guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo ndetse no guhuza abantu. Intego nyamukuru ni ubucuruzi kandi bwunguka cyane.
Ni byo koko imbuga nkoranyambaga n’itangazamakuru ryo kuri internet byagize uruhare rufatika mu guteza imbere ubwisanzure mu gutanga ibitekerezo. Uyu munsi, umuntu wese ashobora gufungura umuyoboro we agatangaza ibyo atekereza ku buryo bumworoheye kurusha uko byari bimeze mu bihe byashize.
Ariko ibitekerezo byose bitangwa muri ubwo bwisanzure, aho bibikwa hahinduka ikirombe gicukurwamo zahabu ibyara amafaranga menshi ku bashinze izo mbuga nkoranyambaga.
Ibi bigaragazwa n’uko ibigo bifite imbuga nkoranyambaga biri mu bikize kuri iyi si. Amakuru y’urubuga  agaragaza agaciro k’imigabane y’Ikigo Aplhabet Inc (gifite urubuga rwa Google rurimo YouTube n’izindi) ku isoko ry’Imari n’Imigabane ( Market Cap) kageze kuri Tiliyari ($1 Trillion) y’Amadolari y’Amerika muri 2020, aho urubuga rwa Google rwonyine rwari wihariye hafi 80%. Iki kikaba cyarabaye ikigo cya kane mu bigo bicuruza ikoranabuhanga byesheje uwo muhigo muri Amerika.
Imibare igagagazwa n’urubuga  kandi igaragaza ko agaciro k’imigabane ya Facebook yari ku isoko ry’imari n’imigabane mu mpera za Kamena 2020 kari Miliyari 984 z’Amadolari ya Amerika ($984.00 Billion)
Ako gaciro k’imigabane y’ibyo bigo karuta cyane umusaruro mbumbe (GDP) w’ibihugu bimwe na bimwe bibarizwa muri 20 bikize ku isi (G20) birimo nka Arabia Soudite ( Miliyari 793 $), Afurika y’Epfo (Miliyari 351.) cyangwa Singapore( Miliyari 372$).
Ikindi kigaraza ko imbuga nkoranyambaga ari ubucuruzi bukomeye ni uko banyirazo bari mu baherwe ba mbere ku isi. Urubuga rwa Forbes rugaragaza ko kugeza muri Kamena 2021, Mark Zuckerberg washinze Facebook yari uwa gatanu ku rutonde rw’abaherwe ku isi aho umutungo we ubarirwa kuri Miliyari 97 z’Amadolari ya Amerika (97$Billion), mu gihe Larry Page uri mu bashinze Google ari ku mwanya wa munani n’umutungo wa Miliyari 91.5 z’amadolari (91.5$Billion) akurikiwe na mugenzi bafatanije gushinga urwo rubuga, Sergey Brin n’umutungo wa Miliyari 89 Z’amadolari ya Amerika (89$Billion).
Ibi bigo amafaranga biyakura cyane cyane mu kwamamaza binyuze kuri izo mbuga nkoranyambaga ndetse no mu gucuruza amakuru. Amakuru yose abantu binjiza ku mbuga zitandukanye hariho ikoranabuhanga riyakusanya rikayasesengura, akagurishwa ku babafite ibigo by’ubucuruzi kugira ngo bashobore gukora ibicuruzwa na serivisi bihwanye n’ibyifuzo by’abaguzi.
Urugero, ikigo cy’ubucuruzi gishobora gushingira ku makuru abanyarwanda binjiza bakora ubushakashatsi, bashaka ibikoresho, serivisi cyangwa baganira ku mu mbuga nkoranyambaga, kikamenya ubwoko, amabara, impuzandengo y’igiciro cy’ibikoresho (imodoka, imyenda, mudasobwa n’ibindi) abanyarwanda bakunda kugura. Ibyo bikagifasha gukora ibijyanye n’ibyifuzo by’abanyarwanda mu gihe gishaka gucuruza mu Rwanda.
Ibyo mu gihe byasabaga gukora ubushakashatsi buhenze bunatwara igihe ku bashinzwe guteza imbere ubucuruzi, ubu ntibigoye, ayo makuru yose aba ahari kuri buri wese ayageraho bitewe n’ayo yifuza kandi kuyagura birahendutse kurusha gukora ubushakashatsi. Ikindi ni uko ayo makuru yizewe cyane kuko agaragaza ibyo abantu bakeneye, aho baherereye, ikigero cy’imyaka yabo, igitsina, ubushobozi bwabo, uko imibare yabo igenda ihindagurika n’ibindi.
Ubu bucuruzi bw’imbuga nkoranyambaga ntabwo bugaburira ba nyirazo gusa. Ubu noneho batangiye no kuvunguriraho n’abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga mu rwego rwo kubatera akanyabugabo ngo bazikoreshe cyane haboneke ibitekerezo byinshi, byumvikana ko hakenewe amakuru menshi agurishwa.
Muri iki gihe abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bafite ababakurikira benshi na bo bahabwa amafaranga, hashingiwe ku mubare w’ababakurikira, igihe abareba ibyo bashyiraho bamara n’ibindi. Iyi miyoboro y’imbuga nkoranyambaga ikurikirwa na benshi igakoreshwa mu kwamamaza.
Ibigo by’ubucuruzi utaretse n’ibya Leta n’imiryango itari iya Leta ubu bitanga amafaranga ku bantu bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga cyane kugira ngo babafashe kwamamaza ibicuruzwa cyangwa gutanga ubutumwa ku babakurikira (ibyitwa influencer marketing). Ibi rero ni byo bihindura za mbuga nkoranyambaga uburucuruzi kuruta ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Ubu bucuruzi ni bwo bituma abantu bahururira mu gushyira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zabo ibiganiro n’amakuru bishitura abantu, bibakurura kugira ngo bagire ababakurikira benshi (subscribers and views) bityo bibonere umugati.
Uzasanga ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bashyiraho imitwe y’inkuru zishitura abantu, ariko nufungura usange ibivugwa bitandukanye n’ibyanditse. Uzabona inkuru z’impimbano nyamara zitangazwa nk’aho ari ukuri, ubuhamya butangwa n’abantu ariko budafitiwe ibimenyetso ndetse n’ababutangaza ntibite ku kubugenzura, ahubwo bakita ku kuba bukurura abantu.
Ubu noneho bamwe mu bafite imiyoboro y’imbuga nkoranyambaga na bo bungutse ubundi bwenge aho bishyura abantu kugira ngo babakurikire ndetse barebe ibyo bakora. Ubu hari abantu bishyurwa kugira ngo bafate umwanya wabo barebe amashusho kuri YouTube, basangize abandi amakuru kugira ngo banyirabyo bagwize ababakurikira bityo bongere amafaranga binjiza.
