Ubushakashatsi buto nakoze ku miyoboro 15 ya YouTube (channels) natoranije nkurije iyo nkuze gukurikira hano mu Rwanda nifashishije urubuga rwa  bwangaragarije umuyoboro winjiza menshi muri iyo ari ibihumbi 30 y’Amadolari (30,000$) ku kwezi mu gihe uwinjiza make ari 1,200 y’amadolari ya Amerika (1200$) ku kwezi.
Aya mafaranga avomwa mu gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga niyo ari inyuma y’ubushake n’ububyutse mubona muri iyi minsi bw’abantu bahururiye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga mu Rwanda, cyane cyane YouTube, ntabwo ari uko abantu basobanukiwe n’uruhare rwabo mu gutanga ibitekerezo kurushaho. Ikindi ni uko bidasaba igishoro kinini kuko telefone igendanwa irahagije kugira ngo umuntu akore Televiziyo ikorera kuri YouTube.
Gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bikaba byaguha amafaranga si bibi, yewe byaba n’igisubizo ku bibazo by’ubushomeri byugarije urubyiruko. Imbuga nkoranyambaga ntizitangaza ibibi gusa n’ibyangiza byonyine. Hari n’andi makuru menshi zitangaza ajijura abantu.
Gusa, birakwiye ko abantu basobanukirwa ko imbuga nkoranyambaga zidakwiye gukomeza kureberwa mu mutaka wo guteza imbere ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo gusa, kuko abazishinga si cyo kibashishikaje cyane. Ni abacuruzi bakomeye kuruta uko ari impirimbanyi z’uburenganzira bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
Uko zigenda zigwiza amafaranga niko zigira imbagara zikomeye ndetse zishobora kugera n’aho zihanga na za guverinoma mu gihe zashyizeho amabwriza cyangwa amategeko abangamira inyungu zabo. Abakoresha izi mbuga nkoranyambaga na bo kuba baratangiye kwinjiza agatubutse, bakora bagamije kwinjiza menshi, bityo ibituma bakurikirwa na benshi ni byo bibashishikaje cyane, batitaye ku kuba byangiza cyangwa bikayobya sosiyete muri rusange.
Birakwiye ko abantu babyaza umusaruro amahirwe atangwa no gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga ariko bigakorwa hirindwa kuyoborwa n’inda bigatuma abantu batangaza ibinyoma, ibihuha n’ibindi ibyangiza rubanda. Birashoboka cyane gutangaza ibyubaka ndetse n’ayo mafaranga ukayakorera.
Abasoma n’abakurikira ibitangazwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga na bo bakwiye gushishoza cyane, ntibemere ibyo babonye byose cyangwa ngo babikwirakwize batabanje kugenzura byimbitse.
Daily Monitor n’abayobozi ba Uganda bafata abatuye EAC nk’abadatekereza neza.
Iyo usomye ibitangazamakuru byo muri Uganda, ushobora kubona ko nta bushake ku ruhande rw’abayobozi ba Uganda bwo kuzahura umubano w’iki gihugu n’u Rwanda nubwo hari imbaraga nyinshi zashyizwemo n’abahuza barimo Angola na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Abayobozi ba Uganda bakomeje gutsimbarara ku ngingo zabo bakomeje kuzamura na mbere zirimo ibijyanye n’uko ngo u Rwanda rwafunze umupaka bakirengagiza umuzi w’ikibazo, ariwo mugambi umaze igihe wo guhungabanya u Rwanda.
Inkuru iheruka ya Daily Monitor yari ifite umutwe ugira uti “Umupaka wa Katuna umaze imyaka ibiri ufunzwe kuva ibiganiro byatangira”, yashushe nk’iyobya uburari inatanga n’amakuru atari ukuri ku mpamvu y’umwuka mubi umaze igihe hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ikinyoma cya mbere cyari muri iyo nkuru ya Daily Monitor ni uko ngo igikorwa Uganda yakoze cyo kwambura Pasiporo abayobozi b’Umutwe w’Iterabwoba wa RNC ariyo nzitizi yonyine yari isigaye mu rugendo rwo gusubiza umubano ku murongo.
Daily Monitor iherutse kwandika ku nama yo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2021 yabereye i Gatuna n’ibijyanye no kwambura Charlotte Mukankusi Pasiporo yari yarahawe na Uganda. Icyo kinyamakuru cyagize kiti “Icyo gikorwa kigomba kuzagenzurwa, bikemezwa na Komisiyo yo ku rwego rwa ba minisitiri ihuriweho mu gushyira mu bikorwa amasezerano ya Luanda... mu gihe uyu mwanzuro ushyizwe mu bikorwa bikamenyeshwa abakuru b’ibihugu, abahuza bazahura mu minsi 15 mu nama izabera Gatuna/Katuna mu gufungura umupaka no gusubiza mu buryo umubano w’ibihugu byombi.”
Mukankusi ni Umuyobozi muri RNC, Umutwe w’Iterabwoba ufite uruhare mu bikorwa bitandukanye by’ibitero bya grenade byagabwe mu Mujyi wa Kigali mu 2010.
Perezida Museveni yemeye ko bahuye ku bw’impanuka hamwe n’abandi bayobozi ba RNC ubwo bapangaga guhungabanya u Rwanda.
Gusa, kwambura Mukankusi Pasiporo ntabwo byigeze bivugwa mu myanzuro y’inama ya Gatuna. Ikibazo nyamukuru cyagombaga kugenzurwa na Komisiyo ya ba Minisitiri cyari “ibirego by’u Rwanda ku bikorwa Uganda ikorera ku butaka byayo bigamije guhungabanya u Rwanda”.
Itangazo rigira riti “Mu gihe ibi birego bigaragaye, Guverinoma ya Uganda izafata ingamba zose mu kubihosha no guharanira ko bitongera kubaho ukundi”.
Ryongeraho ko Uganda ifite igihe cy’ukwezi ko kugenzura niba koko ibyo ishinjwa bifite ishingiro.
Umwaka urashize ariko ibinyamakuru byo muri Uganda ntibishaka kubaza Guverinoma yabo ibyo idashyira mu bikorwa. Ahubwo, byahisemo inzira yo kuyobya ababikurikira ku bijyanye n’imyanzuro y’Inama yabereye Gatuna ari nayo nzira yonyine izakemura ibibazo byose Uganda yaba ifite ku cyiswe ‘ibibazo by’umupaka’.
Biragaragara ko ikibazo Uganda ifite atari ibirego by’ubutasi [yashinja Abanyarwanda] yananiwe no gutangira ibimenyetso ndetse Perezida wayo ubwe akemera mu ibaruwa yandikiye mugenzi we w’u Rwanda ko byari ‘ibihuha bisa’.
Ikibazo nyamukuru ntabwo kigeze gihinduka. Ni umugambi kirimbuzi wa Uganda wo gufasha imitwe yihebeye guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda n’ibikorwa byo gukomeza gutoteza no gufunga Abanyarwanda b’inzirakarengane. Umunsi ibi bibazo bizaba byakemuwe, Komisiyo ihuriweho y’abaminisitiri izagenzura niba koko Uganda yarahagaritse ubufatanye na RNC n’indi mitwe, hanyuma mu minsi 15 inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu izaterana nyuma y’ishyirwa hanze ry’imyanzuro y’inama y’abaminisitiri.
Daily Monitor rero ikwiriye guhagarika gufata abasomyi bayo nk’injiji, ibabwize ukuri nkuko yirirwa ibyigamba mu kivugo cyayo ngo ‘Ukuri buri Munsi’.
Inkotanyi ni amasomo kuri twese
Icyizwi ku bayobozi bayoboye kuri Repubulika ya mbere n’iya kabiri, ni uko bose baranzwe n’imitegekere mibi ibiba amacakubiri n’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside mu Banyarwanda.
Iyo mitegekere mibi yabyaye kwirukana mu gihugu Abatutsi,kubatwikira, kubamenesha ndetse no kubagira impunzi. Abahunze bahungiye mu bihugu nka Tanzania,Uganda,Congo, Burundi n’ahandi.
Amacakubiri n’imitegekere mibi yari mu Rwanda yabyaye Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu mwaka wa 1994 aho Abatutsi barenga Miliyoni bishwe bazira ubusa,bazira uko basal,bazira uko bavutse.
Ku itariki 25 Ukuboza mu mwaka 1987 havutse Umuryango RPF-Inkotanyi ugamije kuzura u Rwanda no kubohora Abanyarwanda.
Inkotanyi zaranzwe n’ubutwari, umutima ukomeye, Urukundo rw’u Rwanda n’urw’Abanyarwanda ndetse no kurwanya imitegekere mibi yose yari mu Rwanda.
Zashyize imbere guharanira ko iyo miyoborere mibi yari mu Rwanda icika kandi zabigezeho zibohora u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda, zibavana kuri iyo ngoyi. Uretse iyo miyoborere mibi, Inkotanyi zanahagaritse Jenoside yakorerwaga Abatutsi, zirokora abicwaga.
Hari amsomo menshi abanditsi ndetse n’Abanyarwanda twigira ku Nkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda.
Muri ayo masomo twavuga nko Gukunda u Rwanda n’Abanyarwanda. Iri ni isomo rikomeye ko twese dukwiriye gukomeza kurangwa n’urukundo rw’u Rwanda nkuko byaranze Inkotanyi bakemera gusiga byose, bakaza ku rugamba rwo kubohora u Rwanda.
Inkotanyi kandi tuzigiraho indangagaciro y’ubutwari. Nubwo bari bato, ntibatinye amasasu ubwo urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiraga, ntibatinye inzara cyangwa imvura. Bahisemo gukotanira kuzura u Rwanda. Iri ni isomo ku banyarwanda ko dukwiriye kuba Intwari muri byose tukubaka u Rwanda, nta gucika intege kabone n’iyo byaba bisaba ubwitange.
Inkotanyi zaranzwe n’indangagaciro yo kureba kure, guca bugufi,kujya inama, kwihuta,kutazarira no gutekereza ku buryo bwagutse.
Izi ndangagaciro zose zaranze Inkotanyi Abanyarwanda muri rusange dukwiriye kuzimakaza kugira ngo bidufashe kugera ku ntsinzi yo kubaka u Rwanda ababohoye u Rwanda bifuzaga.
Abanyarwanda dukwiriye kwishimira ko twabonye abo twigiraho imikorere myiza n’imyifatire bibereye Intore z’u Rwanda.
Dukwiriye rero gukomeza kuzirikana ko dufitanye igihango n’Inkotanyi cyo kuba abarinzi b’ibyagezweho kandi tukabyubakiraho ibindi bikorwa byinshi.
Abanyarwanda twese tuzirikane indangagaciro dukesha Inkotanyi zaduhaye Ubuzima. Tujye duhora tuzirikana ko hari za kirazira zabafashije kubohora u Rwanda zirimo kudatatira Igihango, cyaraziraga kumena amaraso ya mwene Kanyarwanda, cyaraziraga kubiba amacakubiri muri bene Kanyarwanda, cyaraziraga kuba Ikigwari,cyaraziraga kugambanira mwene Kanyarwanda n’ibindi byabaye imbarutso yo gutsinda urugamba.
Inkotanyi ni indorerwamo yacu twese mu mitekereze,imyifatire ndetse n’ibikorwa byose bigamije kubaka u Rwanda. Dukomere ku ndangagaciro na Kirazira twigira ku Nkotanyi bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse n’Afurika dushaka.
Urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda rurahirwa kuko Inkotanyi zaranzwe n’izo ndangagaciro. Dukomere kuri icyo Gihango bizadufasha kubaka u Rwanda ndetse n’Afurika twifuza!
Raporo ya ‘Rwanda Vital Statistics’ y’Ikigo cy’Igihugu Gishinzwe Ibarurishamibare (NISR), yo mu 2019, hagaragajwe ko mu mwaka wa 2019, gatanya zatanzwe mu Rwanda mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko zari 8.941.
Ni imibare yazamutse cyane kuko mu 2018 hari hatanzwe gatanya 1311, ni ukuvuga ko zikubye inshuro 6.8. mu Mujyi wa Kigali hatanzwe gatanya 2400, mu Majyepfo hatangwa gatanya 1989, mu Burengerazuba hatanzwe gatanya 1820, mu Burasirazuba hatanzwe 1482 naho mu Majyaruguru hatangwa gatanya 1250.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga: Birakwiye ko ziba gasenyamiryango?
Imibare ya NISR igaragaza ko ufashe gatanya zatanzwe mu 2019 ukagereranya n’imiryango yashyingiwe mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko uwo mwaka, wavuga ko nibura mu miryango 100, imiryango 18.4 yatandukanye.
imibare yatanzwe n’Urukiko rw’Ikirenga umwaka ushize igaragaza ko imanza za gatanya zakiriwe hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga mu 2016 zari 21, mu 2018 ziba 69 naho 2018 zigera 1311.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga ziratungwa agatoki?
Muri iyi minsi turi mu bihe by’ikoranabuhanga, hari benshi bemeza ko izi gatanya zifitanye isano n’ikwirakwira ry’ikoranabuhanga cyane cyane imbuga nkoranyambaga, kuko bamwe ribashuka bakarikoresha mu bikorwa by’ishimishamubiri, bakamenyaniraho n’abantu bazatuma imiryango yabo isenyuka, mbega ugasanga ryababereye ikibazo aho kubabera igisubizo.
Mu by’ukuri ikoranabuhanga si igikoresho cya Satani nk’uko bamwe babikeka, ahubwo ni igikoresho cyakomotse ku bwenge Imana yahaye abantu, cyagakwiye no kuba igituma ubuzima bwabo burushaho kuba bwiza, aho kubusenya.
Uretse kuba imbuga nkoranyambaga zisigaye zisenya imiryango myinshi, zanahungabanyije uburere bw’abana kuko zisigaye zituma imiryango itakibona umwanya wo kuganira, abana bakabura umwanya wo kwisanzura ku babyeyi babo nyamara uruhare rw’umubyeyi ku burere bw’umwana rukaba ari ntasimburwa.
Imbuga nkoranyambaga zabaye nk’irangamuntu nshya, kuko hari ubwo usanga umuntu utajya abwira umukunzi we ko amukunda, ashobora kugira atya akabimubwirira ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, cyangwa se umuntu udafite ubumenyi buhagije mu kintu runaka ugasanga yabaye inararibonye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ari gusobanura uko ibintu bikorwa n’uko bigenda nyamara nta bumenyi abifiteho.
Izi mbuga kandi zabaye inzira yo gukwirakwiza imico mibi iganisha ku busambanyi, aho usanga umugabo cyangwa umugore azirirwaho yibwira ko aganira n’abantu bamukunda, nyamara wajya kureba neza ugasanga abo bantu atanabazi, ari uko gusa bahuriye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, yarakuruwe gusa n’ikimero n’ibindi birungo byisigwa n’abo bantu.
Abantu bakunze kwirengagiza ko izi mbuga zitwara ni umwanya munini abazikoresha, kandi buryo ugutwaye umwanya aba agutwaye ubuzima. Dukwiriye rero kwisuzuma tukareba uburyo dukoresha izi mbuga, tukareba niba zituzanira inyungu cyangwa igihombo.
Niba ziguteranya n’uwo mwashakanye cyangwa zigatuma ubura umwanya uha abana n’abandi bantu, ni ikimenyetso cy’uko ukwiye kugerageza ukagabanya igihe uzimaraho.
Mu gitabo cy’Umubwiriza mu gice cya Gatatu, yaravuze ngo “Buri kintu kigira umwanya wacyo, kandi icyo uha agaciro nicyo uha umwanya munini”, niyo mpamvu dukwiye kwisuzuma tukareba niba abantu b’ingenzi mu buzima bwacu tukibaha umwanya, cyangwa tuwumara ku bantu batatwitayeho muri rusange.
Mu by’ukuri imbuga nkoranyambaga ni nziza kuko zidufasha byinshi, ndetse wavuga ko ubuzima bwacu busigaye buzishingiyeho. Birakwiye ko dukomeza kuzibyaza umusaruro, tukamenyana n’abantu kandi tukamenya amakuru arimo Ijambo ry’Imana, ariko ntidukwiye kuzemerera kutubera imbogamizi mu buzima bwacu, kugira ngo ejo n’ejo bundi tutazasanga twarabaye ingaruzwamuheto ya Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Instagram n’izindi.
Uwanga u Rwanda arakabura u Rwanda, arushakire aho atazarubona.
Buri mwaka tariki ya 4 Nyakanga twizihiza Umunsi wo Kwibohora. Uyu munsi hashize imyaka 27 u Rwanda rwibohoye. Ariko rwakwibohora rwagira ruracyari mu rugendo rwo gukomeza kwibohora, ntabwo rurarangiza kuko rwageze kure hatagira kure handi hashoboka. Rwibohoye amacakubiri mu bana barwo, ari na yo yarugejeje aho rwari ruri. Abana babo basubizwa agaciro k’Ubunyarwanda rwari rwaranyazwe n’abanzi b’amahoro yarwo.
Urugendo rutoroshye rwo kwibohora ruracyakomeza nubwo aho rugeze ari aho kwishimirwa. Nidukomerereze aho tubohore imyumvire yacu. Iyo myumvire twapakiwemo imyaka myinshi, tukabuzwa gutekereza ngo duhitemo icyiza twemye. Iyo myumvire y’ubuhezanguni, henshi yigwaga mu mashuri kandi ubuhezanguni iyo buguheranye buvamo indwara idakira imunga ubwonko ikabusiga butagikora, budashobora kukuyobora neza.
Turacyari mu rugendo rwo kwibohora ubukene. Muri urwo rugendo rw’inkubiri, twibohore igihatse byose, ari cyo ingengabitekerezo y’urwango, ari yo yavuyemo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi. Ingangabitekerezo yahekuye benshi kandi hari abo yagize imbata. Tutayiranduye burundu twazasubizwa muri ya minsi icuraburindi ryasimbuye izuba, ijoro ridacya rigasimbura umucyo. Nitutayirwanya ngo tuyitsinde, nitutayitaho ngo tuyibohore n’ibyo twibohoye twabiha ingufu zo kugaruka, tugasubira aho tutazikura. Ntitwibagirwe aho twavuye, ejo tutazasubirayo, agaciro twihaye kakazapfa ubusa.
Rubyiruko rwacu ni mwe mizero dufite, muzirinde kwikorera amateka mabi, mutigeze mugiramo uruhare. Mumenye kwibohora ubujiji, amateka mabi agumane banyirayo. Nimwibohore ingoyi y’ubujiji ni cyo mukeneye mbere y’ibindi. Igihugu kikujijura kiba kikwifuriza gutera imbere. Ndabifuriza kutagira ababyeyi gito bazabaraga ubuhezanguni kuko burya umubyeyi gito araga abana ibyamunaniye.
Aho turi hose turate u Rwanda, burya igihugu kiruta byose. Uyu munsi tuzahore tuwuzirikana kuko twawugezeho twabiruhiye. Kugira ngo uyu munsi ushoboke watwaye ibitambo byinshi. Kubyibagirwa ni ukwiyahura. Abana b’u Rwanda bahasize ubuzima kandi nta cyabusimbura. Ntitugomba kwibagirwa uyu munsi, watumye abana b’u Rwanda bagarura ubumuntu, amahoro agasimbura amahano, ubuhezanguni bukaba icyaha kuko nta wuhitamo aho avuka.
Ku Munsi nk’uyu wo Kwibohora, ntidukangwe n’ibihinda by’inyangabirama zisebya u Rwanda ziririmba Jenoside ebyiri. Niba atari injiji mu mitwe ni injiji mu mitima cyangwa ubugome bwasimbuye ubwenge bakibagirwa amateka bazaraga urubyiruko.
Urugero muri nyinshi nabaha ni uru: hashize imyaka 75, Jenoside yakorerwaga Abayahudi mu Burayi ihagaritswe n’ingabo za Amerika zagombye gutabara iz’u Burayi mu ntambara ya kabiri y’isi yose. Izo ngabo zatwitse umugi wa Dresden uri mu majyepfo y’u Budage. Bivugwa kandi ko uwo mujyi warimo inganda nyinshi, zicura intwaro zajyanwaga kurimbura Abayahudi.
Tariki ya 13 Gashyantare 1945, ingabo za Amerika n’iz’u Bwongeleza zishyize hamwe zitwikisha za bombe uwo mujyi, ibyarimo byose birashya ndetse n’abantu. Tariki ya 14 Gashyantare indege ziragaruka zihatera noneho toni 750 za bombe. Bivugwa ko hatewe toni 2978 mu mujyi wa Dresden. Hapfuye inzirakarengane zitabarika zirenga miliyoni, zirimo n’Abayahudi bari bahahungiye Jenoside yabakorerwaga kuko intambara itarobanura.
Ubu amagambo avuga ko habaye Jenoside mu mujyi wa Dresden, asigaye mu bahezanguni bakumbuye ubutegetsi bw’Abanazi twagereranya na Hutu pawa mu Rwanda. Abo na bo kandi bahaguruka iyo icyunamo cy’Abayahudi cyegereje. Nyamara ibyo byatangiye kuvugwa, iyo Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi igihagarikwa n’ingabo z’isi yose zishyize hamwe, ntibyatumye habaho ihakana n’ipfobya bya Jenoside yabakorewe, kandi ntibivuze ko habaye Jenoside yakorewe Abadage.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatututsi yakozwe n’Abanyarwanda, ihagarikwa n’abana barwo nta munyamahanga ubafashije. Ahubwo amahanga yari kubafasha ni yo yabarwanyaga ngo idahagarara kubera kuyigiramo uruhare. Ni yo mpamvu kuvuga ko mu Rwanda habaye Jenoside ebyiri bitagomba kugira uwo bikanga kuko ari intambara tuzarwana igihe isi izaba ikimeze uko imeze none. Amateka akwiye kutubera urugero.
Uyu munsi ukwiye kuba uwo kwibaza uko twahangana n’ipfobya n’ihakana bya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi kuko ari yo ntwaro abanzi basigaye bakoresha basebya igihugu cyacu n’ubuyobozi bwacyo.
Ntidukwiye gutega amatwi abatubeshya demokarasi iwabo nta yihari, usinziriye atabibona ni uwisinzirije. Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukubaha amateka n’indangagaciro byacu tuzaraga abo tubyara. Demokarasi ya mbere ni ukuba ufite ubuzima, icyo urya n’aho uryama. Demokarasi ya mbere ni amahoro n’umutekano.
Indangagaciro z’ababivuga si zo zacu. Indangagaciro zabo ni nyamwinshi. Nyamwinshi yabo kandi si amoko ni politiki na yo bahora bahindura uko bashaka kuko buri wese areba inyungu. Nyamwinshi yabo zi ubwoko badupfunyikiye kuko turi ubwoko bumwe, twese turi bene Kanyarwanda. Iyo nyamwinshi badupfunyikiye ntayo iba mu Rwagasabo kuko turi ubwoko bumwe Nyarwanda. Badupfunyikiye nyamwinshi na bo batasobanukiwe, nyamwinshi y’ibitekerezo bayihindura nyamwinshi y’ubwoko buhimbano bwadutesheje agaciro bukatwambura Ubunyarwanda. Ubumuntu batwambuye bakatugira ikintu, uyu munsi twarabwisubije tububumbatire butaducika.
Ni nde wakwibagirwa uyu munsi muri 1994, abantu bakicwa bazira uko bavutse? Hashize imyaka 27, ubwirakabiri bwabyaye umucyo.
Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho inkotanyi zakuye u Rwanda? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zatanze ibitambo byinshi kugira ngo u Rwanda rutazimangana ku ikarita y’isi? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ko zazanye amahoro amahanga aturebera, nubwo abenshi twasigaye mapfubyi? Ni nde? Ni nde? Ni nde wakwibagirwa bigakunda, uretse uwarwifurizaga kuba umuyonga?
Nkotanyi bana b’u Rwanda, ni nde wakwibagirwa igiciro mwatanze, cyo gusiga ibyanyu mugasiga abanyu, mukitanga mutizigama inzara n’inyota bitagira urugero, mugasiga imiryango mugasiga byose kugira ngo urwa Gasabo rugire ituze? Ni nde wakwibagirwa urubyiruko rutabonye intsinzi, rukagwa mu mashyamba rurwanira amahoro, ababyeyi bakamarira abana ku rugamba, hakaba hari abasigaye bigunze kandi bari barabyaye?
Gutanga umwana byasimburwa n’iki? Gutanga amaraso ngo urokore ayandi twabinganya iki? Ni nde wakwibagirwa agaciro mwatweretse ko kudahora nyamara urwango rukiri rwose? Ni nde wakwibagirwa aho mwakuye impunzi mutibagiwe n’abahekuye u Rwanda? Ni nde wakwibagirwa ubumuntu mwashubije inzirabwoba, maze mukishyira hamwe mukiyunga, mukatubera urugero rwo kubana nk’Abanyarwanda, Ubwiyunge bukava mu byiyumviro bukaba bwarahindutse ihame nubwo urugendo rukiri rwose?
Muzabyare muzaheke, muzasubize ingobyi imugongo, maze mwuzukuruze ingoma ibihumbi, u Rwanda rukomeze rwibaruke intwari.
Gutuka Perezida wa Repubulika ni ukwikenya
bikaba akaga gakomeye iyo umututse aba yitirirwa izina ry’Imana cyangwa ushyira Bibiliya imbere akayikurikirisha amagambo ameze nk’ubumara bwica abayumva.
Ikindi kandi twabonye ko yaba mu mategeko mbonezamubano, muri za kirazira z’umuco Nyarwanda no mu ijambo ry’Imana kubaha ni ibwiriza mbonezabupfura, bikaba inkomoko y’umugisha k’ubikoze kandi gutukana bikaba icyaha, byagera ku gutuka ukuruta byo bikakubera akaga kagukururira umuvumo n’urupfu.
Muri iki gice cya kabiri tugiye kurebera hamwe uburyo Imana ibona kandi ifata Perezida wa Repubulika mu buryo bwihariye, ingaruka zizanwa no kumutuka haba ku muntu ku giti cye (umututse), ku babyumva bakabishyigikira no ku gihugu muri rusange.
Umwanditsi w’igitabo cy’Umubwiriza muri Bibiliya igice cya 10:16-17, avuga uburyo Imana ifata umuyobozi mukuru w’igihugu, ibyago n’amahirwe abagituye bagira bitewe n’imyitwarire ye.
Yagize ati "Wa gihugu we, iyo ufite umwami ari umwana muto, kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikaba ibiryakare, uba ubonye ishyano. Wa gihugu we, ube uhiriwe iyo ufite umwana w’imfura ho umwami, kandi ibikomangoma byawe bikarya mu gihe gikwiriye, kugira ngo bigire amagara bitarimo isindwe."
Uyu mwanditsi akomeza asaba abantu kwirinda gutuka umwami. Agira ati “Ntugatuke umwami ndetse ntukabitekereze, ntugatuke abakire uri mu nzu uryamamo, kuko inyoni yo mu kirere yagurukana ijwi ryawe, kandi igifite amababa cyabyamamaza.” (Umubwiriza 10:20).
Ubu butumwa bujya gusa neza n’uburi muri 1 Timoteyo 2:1;2 hagira hati “Irya mbere ya byose ndaguhugurira kwingingira abantu bose no kubasengera no kubasabira no kubashimira ariko cyane cyane abami n’abatware bose kugira ngo duhore mu mahoro tutabona ibyago, twubaha Imana kandi twitonda rwose.’’
Perezida wa Repubulika ni umuntu umwe rukumbi mu gihugu ufite inshingano zihariye, udafite undi wagereranya nawe, ni ikirango gikuru cy’igihugu, akaba n’umurinzi w’ibindi birango by’igihugu. Ni umugaba mukuru w’ikirenga w’ingabo z’igihugu, ni umurinzi w’itegeko risumba ayandi mu gihugu n’andi mategeko arishamikiyeho. Uretse Imana yo mu ijuru, Perezida ni we wenyine mu gihugu uca iteka ry’urupfu n’ubuzima bikaba bityo.
Imana ifata Perezida wa Repubulika nk’umuyoboro w’ibyago cyangwa amahirwe nk’uko twabisomye mu Umubwiriza kandi imufata nk’umusingi w’amahoro ku gihugu nk’uko Timoteyo abivuga. Iyo igihugu gifite Umukuru w’Igihugu mwiza kandi wubashywe n’abenegihugu, kibona amahirwe n’amahoro.
Intumwa Pawulo mu rwandiko yandikiye Itorero ry’i Roma, yahuguriye abakirisitu kubaha ubuyobozi, ababwira ko kubaha ubuyobozi ari imwe mu nzira yo kubaho neza kandi ari uburyo bwo kubaha Imana ariko ku rundi ruhande yaberetse n’ingaruka zizagera ku muntu wese utazubaha ubuyobozi.
Yabisobanuye muri aya magambo, agira ati “Umuntu wese agandukire abatware bamutwara, kuko ari nta butware butava ku Mana, n’abatware bariho bashyizweho n’Imana. Ni cyo gituma ugandira umutware aba yanze itegeko ry’Imana, kandi abaryanga bazatsindwa n’urubanza. Abatware si abo gutinywa n’abakora ibyiza, keretse abakora nabi. Mbese ushaka kudatinya umutware? Kora neza na we azagushima, kuko ari umukozi w’Imana uguhesha ibyiza. Ariko nukora nabi utinye, kuko adatwarira inkota ubusa. Ni umukozi w’Imana, uhoresha umujinya ukora nabi." (Abaroma 13:1;4).
Mu mpuguro Pawulo yahaye Abanyeroma yabagaragarije ko umwami (Perezida) ari umukozi w’Imana washyizweho nayo kandi ikamushyiriraho kugira ngo ihe ituze abayubaha inahoreshe umujinya wayo kubakora ibibi niyo mpamvu usuzuguye umwami aba yanze itegeko ry’Imana.
Imana ifata Perezida nk’umuntu udasanzwe kandi wihariye, uri mu mwanya ukwiye wo gukoreshwa mu gutanga ibyiza, mu gusendereza umugisha n’amahoro ku batuye igihugu.
Ariko na none ikamubona nk’umuntu ukwiye wo guhoresha umujinya ku muntu wese ukora ibibi. Utuka Perezida, ntiyubahe abamukuriye azatsindwa n’urubanza.
Mu nshingano z’umunyagihugu wese harimo kubaha amategeko n’abayobozi b’igihugu by’umwihariko Perezida wa Repuburika kuko ni umuntu wihariye uba waratoranyijwe n’Imana agahabwa inshingano zihariye. Dawidi ni icyitegererezo cyiza cyo kwerekana uburyo umwami akwiye kubahwa kabone nubwo hari ibyo waba ubona bitakunyuze mu bikorwa nawe cyangwa abatware, ibyo uvuga byose, mu guharanira uburenganzira bwawe, mu gukora imirimo ya Politiki n’ibindi hagomba kubamo kubaha umwami.
Nubwo Sawuli yariho ahiga Dawidi ngo amwice, nubwo Dawidi yagize amahirwe menshi yo kuba yahitana Sawuli, nubwo Dawidi yari afite abamushyigikiye benshi bamwerekaga ko hari icyo yakora kuri Sawuli, yirinze kugira ikibi amukoraho, yirinze kugira amagambo mabi amuvugaho. Yahamagariye abantu bari bamushyigikiye kubaha umwami kumwumvira no kumuramya kugeza igihe Imana yamushyiriye ku ngoma ibonye ko ari ngombwa gushyira iherezo ku gihe cye cyo gutwara.
Kubaha Umukuru w’Igihugu ni ihame rituma Imana ikubonamo kuba igisonga cyiza cyaragizwa ibyananiye abandi. Ni urufunguzo rugukingurira imiryango itandukanye yo kurama no kubaho unezererewe ibyiza byo mugihugu.
Ni ukugandukira no kumvira Imana yamwimitse nk’umukozi wayo wo gusohoza ibyiza no guhoresha umujinya abakora ibibi. Igihugu gifite abanyagihugu bubaha kandi bingingira Umuyobozi wabo baba mu mahoro n’ibyishimo ariko igihugu gifite abanyagihugu batubaha kandi bagandira umuyobozi wabo, bahora mu marira n’imiborogo. Imana igufashe gusobanukirwa ihame ryo kubaha umuyobozi mukuru w’igihugu naho kumutuka burya ni ukwikenya.
“Irya mbere ya byose ndaguhugurira kwingingira abantu bose, no kubasengera no kubasabira no kubashimira, ariko cyane cyane Abami n’abatware bose kugira ngo duhore mu mahoro tutabona ibyago, twubaha Imana kandi twitonda rwose.” (1 Timoteyo 2:1;2).
Ibikubiye muri iyi nyandiko ni ibitekerezo bwite bya Urinzwenimana Mike
Inkuru ya The WSJ yerekana ko USA n’u Bubiligi bikwiye gushyira hanze ukuri ku iterabwoba rya Rusesabagina.
Inkundura zitagira iherezo zo gukomeza gusaba ko Paul Rusesabagina arekurwa zikomeje kugenda zitera ishozi umunsi ku munsi. Vuba aha The Wall Street Journal (WSJ), ikindi kinyamakuru cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika gikomeje gutesha agaciro amahame agenga itangazamakuru, cyatanze umwanya ku mbaga y’abashyigikiye iterabwoba, ibintu kitashoboraga gukora iyo umwe mu bantu icyenda bahitanywe n’ibitero by’Umutwe w’Iterabwoba wa FLN ya Rusesabagina aza kuba Umunyamerika.
Pearson na Zoellner mu nkuru yahawe umutwe ugira uti “kuva muri Hotel Rwanda ujya mu ibagiro” basabye Perezida Biden gushyira igitutu ku Rwanda kugira ngo rurekure umugabo wagizwe uruhare mu iyicwa ry’Abanyarwanda b’inzirakarengane.
Wenda, iki ni cyo gihe ngo Abanyarwanda basabe abayobozi ba Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Bubiligi gusangiza abatuye Isi amakuru bafite ku byaha byatumye Rusesabagina ajya muri gereza.
Icya mbere izi guverinoma zafasha gushyira iherezo ku bivugwa ko Rusesabagina ari gukurikiranwa kubera ko gusa anenga Guverinoma y’u Rwanda. Ibi birego, byateguwe na Pierson na Zoellner byoroshye kunyomozwa n’uwari we wese uha agaciro ukuri.
Ku rundi ruhande, ibimaze iminsi biba byerekana ko Abanyarwanda bakwiye guhaguruka bagasaba Guverinoma za Amerika n’u Bubiligi gusangiza abandi amakuru zifite kuri iki kirego.
Urugero, mu minsi mike ishize, ibihuha byatijwe umurindi n’umunyamakuru wa New York Times, bivuga ko Rusesabagina “yimwe ibiryo, amazi n’ubuvuzi” byanyomojwe n’itangazo rigufi rya Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ya Amerika, bituma Rusesabagina, umuryango we, abamushyigikiye n’ibinyamakuru birangwa n’ubunebwe byo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi bigorora imvugo yabyo irimo ibinyoma ndetse igamije no kurwanya u Rwanda.
Kuva ibi binyamakuru bigayitse byo mu Burengerazuba bw’Isi bibona ko ibyo guverinoma z’ibihugu byabyo bitangaza kuri Rusesabagina ari ibyo kwizerwa kurusha ibitangazwa n’inzego z’u Rwanda, abizerwa nk’abavuga ukuri ntibagomba kugira icyo basiga inyuma.
Ku rundi ruhande abanyura mu nkuru mbere y’uko zitangazwa, barimo n’abo kuri The Wall Street Journal bafite inshingano zo kugenzura amakuru atariyo ari mu nyandiko zabo. Akazi kabo ku bijyanye n’iki kibazo by’umwihariko ntigashimishije.
Icya kabiri, izi guverinoma ziramutse zikoreye mu mucyo ku bijyanye n’iki kibazo, byasobanura neza ikikigaragara nk’amayobera kuri Pierson na Zoellner ku mpamvu “Guverinoma ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika idashyira igitutu ku Rwanda ngo rurekure Paul Rusesabagina” nk’uko aba banditsi babiri b’iyi nkuru yamamaza iterabwoba babyibaza.
Impamvu isa n’aho yigaragaza ku muntu wese ushyira mu gaciro. Hejuru y’ibi byose niba Amerika itirengagiza ibirego bya Human Rights Watch bidafite agaciro bijyanye n’ihonyora ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu kuki yaterwa isoni no guhagarara ku muntu wayo watsindiye ‘Presidential medal of freedom’ no gutegeka ko Rusesabagina arekurwa?
Hejuru ya byose, itabwa muri yombi rye ni ikimenyetso gifatika, bitandukanye n’ibirego bidafite ishingiro bya Human Rights Watch. Ese ntibigaragarira buri wese ushyira mu gaciro ko ubuyobozi bwa Amerika buzi ko Rusesabagina atari utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi gusa wagaragajwe na Pearson na Zoellner.
Mu by’ukuri ahubwo, mu myaka 10 ishize, inzego za Amerika zitungiwe agatoki na Professor Michelle Martin, Umunyamerika wahoze ari umukorerabushake muri Rusesabagina Foundation zatangije iperereza ku byaha bya Rusesabagina.
FBI yabonye ibimenyetso by’uko Rusesabagina yoherereje amafaranga abayobozi ba FDLR, umutwe wakoze Jenoside wanashyizwe ku rutonde rw’imitwe y’iterabwoba na Amerika. Ibyavuye muri iri perereza byakusanyirijwe hamwe mu ibaruwa yo ku wa 4 Ukwakira 2013 Minisiteri y’Ubutabera ya Amerika yoherereje Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda.
Mu byumvikana, Pierson na Zoellner bagomba kumenya ko bidashoboka ko igihugu cyavumbuye ibyakoreshejwe nk’ibimenyetso mu rubanza rukiri kuba gishobora kugira ikindi gisaba kirenze guhabwa ubutabera bukwiye.
Hejuru y’ibi niba ubutabera bukwiye, aho gusaba kurekurwa ako kanya ku muyobozi w’umutwe w’iterabwoba aricyo kibazo, iburanisha riri kuba rikwiye gukomeza kugeza ripfundikiwe.
Uretse imbaraga zikomeje gukomeza gushyirwa mu kugaragaza u Rwanda nk’igihugu kitagendera ku mategeko, turakoze bihagije byo kumenya ko mu myaka itatu gusa ishize ndetse hanashingiwe kuri raporo ya Word Economic Forum u Rwanda rwashyizwe ku mwanya wa mbere muri Afurika n’uwa 23 ku Isi mu bihugu bifite ubutabera bukora neza cyane cyane mu bijyanye n’ubwigenge bw’urwego rw’ubutabera.
Mu yandi magambo, u Rwanda rwakoze neza kurenza bimwe mu bihugu itangazamakuru rirurwanya riturukamo.
Kimwe na Amerika, abayobozi b’u Bubiligi bagize uruhare mu isakwa ryakorewe mu rugo rwa Rusesabagina mu Bubiligi bafite amakuru bakwiye gusangiza ariko bahaye abatuye Isi amakuru atariyo.
Ndacyahamya ko Guverinoma ya Amerika n’iy’u Bubiligi bafite inshingano zo gusobanura impamvu baruciye bakarumira kuva Rusesabagina yatabwa muri yombi, niba badafite inyungu muri gahunda y’itangazamakuru yo guharabika u Rwanda.
Abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi, nta n’isoni bafite bamaganye u Rwanda kubera ibikorwa Komisiyo y’u Burayi ishinzwe Uburenganzira bwa Muntu yagaragaje nk’ibyubahirije amategeko mu kibazo cya “Walter stocke n’u Budage."
Guverinoma ya Amerika n’u Bubiligi ntizishobora guha ikaze igitutu cy’abashyigikiye iterabwoba. Ndetse n’u Rwanda ntirwabikora.
Gushyigikira Rusesabagina byatumye "Lantos Foundation" iba nka cya gisiga kimennye inda
Nyuma y’urupfu rwa Tom Lantos wari wararokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abayahudi ndetse akaba n’umwe mu bari bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika aho yari Umuyobozi wa Komite ishinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga, abari bamushyigikiye batangiye Umuryango bise Lantos Foundation for Human Rights and Justice.
Uyu muryango utandukanye na "Tom Lantos Human Rights Commission" wavuze ko intego zawo "ari ukugeza ibijyanye n’uburenganzira bw’ikiremwa muntu muri buri nguni y’Isi."
Buri mwaka, Lantos Foundation itanga ibihembo bijyanye n’iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu. Gusa gake cyane ni bwo ikora ibisa n’ibyihariye nk’uko bikunze kugenda ku yindi miryango nk’iyi, itanga ibihembo ku bantu basa n’aho bamaze kumenyekana ndetse bakaba barahawe ibindi bihembo n’abafite amazina akomeye abaterankunga bazamenya ubundi bakayihundagazaho amafaranga.
Byashoboka ko ari no muri ubu buryo mu 2011, uyu muryango wahaye Paul Rusesabagina, wabaye ikimenyabose mu 2004 nyuma y’uko hasohotse filimi ya Hotel Rwanda yamukinweho. Byashoboka ko guha iki gihembo Rusesabagina bishobora kuba byarumvikanaga muri icyo gihe: Kubera ko Perezida George W. Bush yari yaramaze guha uyu mugabo umudali uzwi nka ’Presidential Medal of Freedom’. Muri uwo mwaka nabwo Rusesabagina yahawe ’Wallenberg Medal’ na ’National Civil Rights Museum Freedom Award’.
Ikibazo ni uko uku kugirwa igitangaza byahishuye imigambi ya Rusesabagina. Yashakaga kugera ku butegetsi, kunanirwa kubigeraho mu nzira za demokarasi, byatumye akoresha ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka. Ibimenyetso birivugira.
Rusesabagina yashyize imbere ibikorwa by’ubugizi bwa nabi. Amagambo ye ntiyari agamije impaka zisanzwe. Yatanze inkunga ku mitwe yagabye ibitero biteye ubwoba. Iyi mitwe ntiyibasiye abayobozi b’u Rwanda cyangwa igisirikare ahubwo yibasiye abahinzi, abaturage n’imodoka, aho bishe urw’agashinyaguro abaturage b’inzirakarengane.
Muri Kanama 2020, Rusesabagina yarabeshywe yisanga mu ndege yari igiye i Kigali. Nyuma yo kuhagera yatawe muri yombi. Ubu ari kuburanishwa.
Enter Katrina Lantos Swett, umukobwa wa Lanto’s akaba na Perezida wa Lantos Foundation, mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi yasabye ko Amerika igendera kuri ’Magnitsky Act ’ igafatira ibihano abagize uruhare mu itabwa muri yombi rya Rusesabagina.
Magnitsky Act ni itegeko rihereza Perezida uburenganzira bwo gufatira igihugu ibihano bitandukanye ahanini biturutse ku birego byo guhonyora uburenganzira bwa muntu na ruswa.
Igitekerezo cy’uyu mukobwa, gisa n’icyivuguruza ibyo se yubatse ndetse n’ibyo yemeraga. Swett ntatesha gusa agaciro ibimenyetso birimo n’amagambo Rusesabagina yavugiye mu ruhame ashyigikira imitwe y’iterabwoba n’inyemezabwishyu za Western Union zerekana ko Rusesabagina ku giti cye yateye inkunga iyo mitwe, ahubwo arengaho akavuga ko ibyo Rusesabagina aregwa "Bidafite ishingiro ndetse ko yagejejwe mu Rwanda mu buryo buhamanye n’amategeko mpuzamahanga."
Ntari mu kuri. Hari ingero nyinshi zemewe n’inkiko zikurikirana ibijyanye n’uburenganzira bwa muntu, aho abakekwako ibyaha bagiye babeshywa kugira ngo bagezwe imbere y’ubutabera kandi bikemezwa nk’ibyubahirije amategeko.
Lantos yakunze kumvikana avuga uburyo Adolf Eichmann wari mu bikomerezwa by’Aba-Nazi wagize uruhare rukomeye mu byaha by’intambara, yagiye muri Hungary mu 1994 gutegura umugambi wo gutsemba Abayahudi. Byatumye Lantos yisaga mu nkambi zakorerwagamo imirimo y’uburetwa aho yaje kuva ari nta nkuru.
Ku wa 11 Gicurasi 1960, Inzego z’ubutasi za Israel zashimuse Eichmann zimukuye i Buenos Aires zimujyana muri Israel ngo ashyikirizwe ubutabera. Ese Swett yemera ko ishimutwa rya Eichmann ritesha agaciro ibyaha yakoze ku bw’ibyo akaba yaheraho yemeza ko ifatwa rye atari ikintu cyari gikwiye gukorwa? Aho niho uyu mugore yahisemo kubakira Lantos Foundation.
Kugereka ibyaha kwa Swett kuri Perezida w’u Rwanda Paul Kagame kubera kugira icyo avuga kuri Rusesabagina nabyo ntibyumvikana. Ese kuba Perezida Joe Biden yasaba ko hakwiye gufatwa ’umwanzuro ukwiye’ bya impamvu yo kwirengagiza ikirego cy’ubwicanyi Derek Chauvin akurikiranyweho ?
Rimwe na rimwe, bibaho ko abantu badakwiriye begukana ibihembo. Umunyarwenya Bill Cosby yabonye ibihembo byinshi birimo na ’Presidential Medal of Freedom’, ibi byose byari mbere y’uko ahamywa ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu. Bamwe batanze ibitekerezo bagaragaza ko Cosby akwiye kwamburwa ibi bihembo.
Ibi ni nako byagenze ku kanama gashinzwe gutanga ibihembo bya Nobel ubwo kagihaga Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed ariko katazi ko ashobora guhinduka umwe mu bijandika mu byaha by’intambara ku Mugabane wa Afurika. Kuri aka kanama Abiy ashobora kuba ari igisebo ariko mu kwikuraho ikosa ntigashobora gushyigikira ibyaha akora cyangwa ngo kabihakane.
Nta na kimwe muri ibi kigamije kuvuga ko iburanishwa rya Rusesabagina ari nta makemwa. Haracyari byinshi bikwiriye kunozwa mu butabera bw’u Rwanda. Urugaga rw’Abanyamategeko bo muri Amerika rwagaragaje hamwe mu hakwiriye amavugurura cyane cyane "mu bijyanye no gutandukanya ibimenyetso bidashidikanywaho n’ibindi."
Kugeza na n’ubu, imiryango iharanira uburenganzira bwa muntu yitesha agaciro iyo ishyira imbere politiki n’ubwibone kurenza amahame abagenga. Kwanga Kagame si impamvu yasobanura iterabwoba nk’uko kwanga uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu, bidashobora kuba impamvu yo kwemera ibikorwa na Hamas.
Ku bw’amahirwe make bitewe no kwitiranya ibimenyesto no gushyira amarangamutima mu rubanza rwa Rusesabagina byatumye Lantos Foundation iba nka cya gisiga cy’urwara rureru kimennye inda ndetse mu buryo bwagutse byangiza ibijyanye n’ubuvugizi mu iyubahirizwa ry’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Imyaka ijana irashize ishyaka CPC riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa ridatezuka ku ntego zaryo.
Harabura iminsi mike gusa ngo ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Bushinwa [Communist Party of China:CPC] ryizihize imyaka ijana rimaze ribayeho. Ushobora kuba uzi byinshi ku iterambere ryihuta ry’u Bushinwa ndetse n’ubukungu bwabwo buhamye muri iki gihe ariko utazi urugendo iki gihugu cyanyuzemo mu myaka ijana ishize ngo kibe kiri aho kiri ubu.
U Bushinwa bwarwanye intambara ikomeye yo kubaho nk’igihugu cyakoronizwaga ndetse kibaho mu buhake. Ku ruhande rumwe ibihugu bikize byarabwigabije byubaka amazu mu mijyi, bizana ingabo bitangira kunyunyuza ubukungu bwabwo. Ku rundi ruhande abatware babwo barwana hagati yabo, bituma igihugu kigwa mu manga ndetse n’abaturage b’u Bushinwa barahazaharira.
Ibi byatumye abakunda igihugu bashakisha inzira zo kukizahura no gukura abaturage mu bibazo, ariko ntibyaborohera kuko yaba gukura abaturage mu bukene, gukora impinduka, gushyiraho amategeko agenga ingoma y’ubwami ndetse no gushyiraho impinduka za demokarasi byose byaranze.
Iki gihe ni bwo ishyaka rya CPC ryavutse muri Nyakanga 1921. Guhera ubwo iri shyaka ryafashije abaturage kugera ku byishimo nyabyo ndetse no guhindura igihugu gishya.
Mu 1949, ishyaka rya CPC ryashyize hamwe imbaraga riyobora abaturage ku ntsinzi y’intambara y’Abayapani bashakaga gutwara tumwe mu duce tw’u Bushinwa bakatwomeka ku Buyapani ndetse iri shyaka ryatsinze ubutegetsi bw’igitugu bwari buyobowe n’ishyaka rya Kuomintang rishyiraho Repubulika y’Abaturage b’u Bushinwa, igihugu gitangira kunamuka.
Mu 1978 iri shyaka rya CPC ryafashe umwanzuro udasanzwe wazanye impinduramatwara, riyobora igihugu ku rugendo rurerure rwa ‘socialism’ [politike yo gusangira ubukungu] ishyize imbere inyungu z’Abashinwa.
Mu myaka 40 yakurikiye, iyi politiki yatumye ubukungu bw’iki gihugu bushinga imizi, ndetse urugendo rwo gushyira imbere inyungu z’abaturage b’u Bushinwa rurabahira. Ubukungu bw’u Bushinwa bwiyongeragaho 9% buri mwaka, bukora igitangaza cyo kuba igihugu cyihuta cyane mu bukungu kandi mu gihe gito cyane ko cyari kikiri mu nzira y’amajyambere.
Kugeza ubu, u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu cya kabiri gikize ku Isi ndetse kikaba n’igihugu cya mbere ku Isi giteye imbere mu by’inganda, aho kigize hafi 30% y’izamuka ry’ubukungu bw’Isi. Amafaranga umuturage yinjizaga ku mwaka yavuye ku madolari 200 mu 1980 agera ku bihumbi 10 by’amadolari mu 2020.
Ni ikinyejana cyari cyuzuye amarira, ibyuya n’amaraso ariko nanone cyaranzwe n’umuhate, ubwenge ndetse n’imbaraga. Mu gihe cy’ibibazo, abarwanashyaka ba CPC ntibigeze bacika intege. Ntibahwemye gushakira igihugu inzira iboneye no gushaka icyatera ibyishimo abaturage no guteza imbere u Bushinwa.
Icya mbere, CPC yari ishishikariye gushaka inzira iboneye igihugu cy’u Bushinwa cyanyuramo ngo gitere imbere. Mu myaka ya mbere y’ubuyobozi bwayo, yakoresheje inzira z’abandi mu buryo bw’imikoreshereze y’abakozi mu mijyi iteye imbere ariko bigenda byanga. Nyuma yo kugerageza bikanga, CPC yabonye uburyo bushya buboneye buganisha ku mpinduramatwara y’u Bushinwa. Ubwo buryo bwari ukwiyunga n’abakozi ndetse n’abaturage, imijyi izengurutswa uburinzi, hatangira intambara z’amasasu.
Mu myaka ya 1950 na 1970, ishyaka rya CPC ryahuye n’imbogamizi nyinshi mu miyoborere y’igihugu kubera ko yari iri kugihindura ngo kigendere ku matwara ya socialism no kucyubaka bundi bushya, ndetse kubera ubunararibonye budahagije mu miyoborere no gukopera imiyoborere y’abasoviyete byatumye intangiriro yayo igorana. Gusa nyuma yo kunyura muri byinshi no gukurikira intero igira iti “bohora ibitekerezo, ushakire ukuri ku bimenyetso”, CPC yafashe umwanzuro wo gukora impinduka no kuvuga byose bigamije gukuraho ubukungu bw’u Bushinwa.
Icya kabiri, CPC ntiyigeze ihindura icyerekezo, yagumanye intego yatangiranye yo guteza imbere abaturage. Kuko iterambere rishyirwaho n’abaturage, rikaba iry’abaturage kandi rigasangirwa n’abaturage. Kurwanya ubukene ni kimwe mu ngero zifatika zigaragaza uku kudatezuka ku cyerekezo cyayo.
Mu 2012, u Bushinwa bwatangije intambara ku bukene. Mu mpera za 2020 hafi miliyoni 100 z’abaturage bavanywe mu bukene [ni ukuvuga abantu binjizaga 1,90$ ku munsi]. Amafaranga yinjizwaga n’abaturage batuye mu bice by’ibyaro yikubye inshuro zirenga ebyiri aba amadolari 1900. Imiryango miliyoni 7,9 yimuriwe mu mazu meza afite umutekano; imihanda ireshya na kilometero miliyoni 1,1 yaravuguruwe; hubakwa inzira za gari ya moshi nshya zingana n’ibirometero 37.00o. Abaturage batuye mu bice by’ibyaro hafi ya bose babonye umuriro w’amashanyarazi uhoraho.
Mbere y’imyaka icumi yari yarateganyijwe, u Bushinwa bwabashize kugera ku ntego yo kurwanya ubukene bukabije, imwe muri gahunda yashyizweho n’ Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo kugera ku majyambere arambye mu 2030. Ku nshuro ya mbere mu mateka y’imyaka ibihumbi iki gihugu kimaze, u Bushinwa bwakuyeho burundu ubukene bukabije.
Icya Gatatu, CPC yagize uruhare mu iterambere ry’ikiremwamuntu. Ititaye ku bihe, CPC yagumye mu nzira yo gushaka iterambere rinyuze mu mahoro, ishyigikira amahame yo kubaho mu mahoro ndetse n’ubu iracyashishikajwe n’uko isi igira amahoro, binyuze mu guteza imbere inyungu rusange no kubaka umuryango usangiye ejo hazaza.
Dufashe urugero, u Bushinwa bwatanze inguzanyo itagira inyungu igera hafi kuri miliyoni 406$ yo gufasha kubaka umuhanda wa gari ya moshi Tanzania-Zambia mu 1970 ndetse bwohereza n’abahanga mu by’ubwubatsi n’abatekinisiye hafi 50.000.
Ubwo uyu mushiga wamurikwaga mu 1970, umusaruro mbumbe w’u Bushinwa wari miliyari 93$ gusa. Uretse n’ibyo mu myaka mike ishize, u Bushinwa bweguriye 50% by’umwenda w’imishinga ibihugu bitandukanye byari bibubereyemo, ndetse n’ubu buri gukorana na Tanzania na Zambia mu kuvugurura umuhanda wa gari ya moshi.
Ubu mu gihe Isi ihanganye n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, u Bushinwa bwatanze ubufasha butandukanye mu guhungana n’iki cyorezo. Ubufasha burimo inkunga ya miliyari 22o z’udupfukamunwa, miliyari 2,25 z’imyenda yambarwaga bikingira Coronavirus ndetse n’udukoresho two gupima iyi virus tungana na miliyari 1.02. Ibi byose yabitanze mu bihugu birenga 150 harimo n’u Rwanda ndetse n’imiryango mpuzamahanga.
U Bushinwa bwakoze uko bushoboye mu gutanga inkingo hirya no hino ku Isi, bunagira uruhare mu gukora ubushakashati ku nkingo za Covid-19, ndetse gahunda yo gutangira kuzikora iri mu hafi gushyirwa mu bikorwa mu bihugu birenga icumi.
Uruhare rw’u Bushinwa mu iterambere rya Afurika na rwo ni urundi rugero. Mu myaka 12 ishize, u Bushinwa ni cyo gihugu kigira ubuhahirane cyane n’ibihugu bya Afurika kuruta ibindi. Ubuhahirane hagati ya Afurika n’u Bushinwa bwarenze miliyari 200$ mu 2019, ishoramari ryabwo muri Afurika rigera kuri miliyari 3 mu 2020.
Nubwo Covid-19 yateje ingaruka ku bukungu muri rusange, imishinga 1.100 ihuriweho yakomeje gushyirwa mu bikorwa. Kugeza ubu u Bushinwa na Afurika bishyize hamwe bimaze kubaka ibilometero birenga 6000 by’inzira zo mu kirere n’iza gari ya moshi, byubatse kandi ibyambu hafi 20 kimwe n’ingomero z’umuriro w’amashanyarazi zirenga 80.
Dusibije amaso inyuma, u Bushinwa n’u Rwanda bifite amateka amwe, kuko bihuje kuba bifite iterambere ryihuta mu gihe gito, ndetse bikaba bisangiye umwuka wo kwigenga no kwigira. Turebye mu gihe kizaza, amashyaka ari ku butegetsi mu bihugu byombi, Communist Party of China ndetse na Rwanda Patriotic Front bifite intego imwe yo guteza imbere igihugu no kugihindura gishya.
Uyu mwaka hazizihizwa imyaka ijana ishize ishyaka rya CPC rishinzwe ndetse n’imyaka 50 umubano w’u Bushinwa n’u Rwanda utangiye.Ibihugu byombi n’amashyaka yombi bizakomeza gutsura umubano no gufatanya mu bikorwa bibyara inyungu, bikomeze bishimishe abaturage b’ibihugu byombi. Nizeye ko ubuyobozi bushikamye bw’aya mashaka [CPC na RPF] buzatuma ibihugu byombi biguma mu nzira yo guharanira ibyiza.
Iyi nkuru ni igitekerezo cya Rao Hongwei, Ambasaderi w’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda.
The Daily Monitor na The New Vision byinjijwe mu mugambi wo guharabika u Rwanda.
Ku Cyumweru tariki ya 13, 2021, Uganda yinjiye mu icengezamatwara riteye isoni ubwo u Rwanda rwasubizaga Umusirikare w’Ingabo za Uganda wari winjiye ku butaka bwarwo. Inkuru nyinshi zirimo iyanditswe na New Vision n’iya Daily Monitor imwe ifite umutwe ugira uti "Uganda irashaka ko u Rwanda ruyisubiza umusirikare wayo" n’indi ifite uvuga ngo "U Rwanda rwarekuye umusirikare wa UPDF wafatiwe ku mupaka".
Izi nkuru zose zivuga ko u Rwanda rwashimuse umusirikare wa UPDF ubwo yari ari kugenzura umutekano ku mupaka ku wa Gatandatu.
Ku rundi ruhande, Ukuri kwari aho ibintu byabereye kwerekana ko uyu musirikare wa UPDF, Pte Baruku Muhuba, yarenze imbibi za Uganda akinjira mu Rwanda atabizi, ibi ni ibintu yiyemereye ubwo yagiranaga ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru mbere y’uko asubizwa mu gihugu cye. Nyuma yasubijwe muri Uganda, mu gikorwa cyari kitabiriwe n’abakozi ba gasutamo ku mpande zombi ndetse n’abayobozi b’ingabo mu turere twa Kisoro na Cyanika.
Umuyobozi mu Karere ka Kisoro, Peter Mugisha yasabye imbabazi mu izina ry’uyu musirikare ndetse ashimira bagenzi babo b’u Rwanda kuba iki kibazo baracyitwayemo kinyamwuga ndetse n’uburyo bafashemo umusirikare wabo wari warenze imbibi.
Ati "Twishimiye cyane kwakira umusirikare wacu watubwiye ko atigeze ahohoterwa cyangwa ngo akomeretswe. Badusubije kandi PK Machine gun iri kumwe n’amasasu yayo 100, byose byari bifitwe n’uyu musirikare mbere y’uko afatwa." Mugisha yongeyeho ko UPDF ikwiye gutangira gukoresha ikoranabuhanga rya GPS kugira ngo yirinde amakosa nk’aya no mu minsi iri imbere.
Bigaragarira amaso ko iri hererekanya ryabayeho hagati y’abayobozi ba gasutamo b’ibihugu byombi ryerekana ubushake bwiza, ariko itangazamakuru rya Uganda ritanga isura mbi ikomeza gushimangira gahunda yo kugaragaza u Rwanda nk’umwanzi wa gahunda yo kubanira neza abaturanyi.
Ibinyoma byabo bigamije gukomeza kurenganya u Rwanda hejuru y’amakosa akorwa n’ubuyobozi bw’i Kampala ndetse no mu gihe bwo bwemeye amakosa y’umusirikare wabo.
Hejuru y’ibi, ibirego by’Abanya-Uganda bakoraga ubucuruzi bwa magendu barashwe bikabaviramo urupfu, ubwo bageragezaga kurwanya polisi yari iri mu kazi byahindutse intero mu itangazamakuru rya Uganda, byahisemo guha ishingiro no kwamamaza ibyaha, mu gihe bishobora gukoresha ijambo bifite mu kurwanya no gukora ubukangurambaga ku cyaha cy’ubucuruzi bwa magendu.
Daily Monitor binyuze mu nkuru zayo ebyiri zijyanye n’ikibazo cy’uyu musirikare warenze imbibi ikomeza guhuza ishimutwa ry’ikinyoma ry’uyu musirikare wa UPDF n’itotezwa ry’abaturage b’u Rwanda bari Uganda (U Rwanda rwabujije abaturage barwo kujya Uganda kuko umutekano wabo utizewe igihe bariyo), ibintu itangazamakuru rya Uganda rikwiye kuryoza Guverinoma yabo, nk’uko ribigenza igihe abashyigikiye abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi bashimuswe ku manyarwa y’ihangu, bakabura cyangwa bakicwa.
Aho gukora ibi, itangazamakuru rya Uganda ryahisemo gukoreshwa n’ubuyobozi bw’i Kampala mu guhuza iki kibazo kibangamiye imibereho y’abaturage b’Abanyarwanda bari Uganda n’impamvu za politike zidafite ishingiro.
Ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, rwakomeje gufata Abanya-Uganda mu buryo bwubahirije amategeko ndetse no mu gihe baba bakoze ibyaha nk’uko binerekanwa n’ikibazo cy’uriya musirikare warenze imbibi z’igihugu cye. Ibi bitandukanye no gukomeza gukurikirana Abanyarwanda b’inzirakarengane cyangwa Abanya-Uganda bafite inkomoka mu Rwanda, icyaha cyabo kikaba gusa ubwenegihugu.
Abanyarwanda bibasiwe n’itotezwa, gufatwa mu buryo bwa kinyamaswa, iyicarubozo n’itabwa muri yombi binyuranyije n’amategeko bikorwa n’Inzego z’umutekano za Uganda zitumwe n’abayobozi ba Uganda bicyeka umwanzi na maneko muri buri nguni z’umuhanda.
Abanyarwanda bagiye bagira amahirwe yo kuva mu maboko y’aba bahohotera bagiye bajugunywa ku mupaka, bacucuwe utwo bari batunze. Kandi iki ni kimwe mu bindi bibazo bikomeje gutuma umubano w’ibihugu byombi udasubira mu buryo.
Gahunda y’itangazamakuru rya Uganda yo gukomeza gukwirakwiza ibihuha no kubeshya yerekana umugambi mubi no kutagira ubushake ku ruhande rw’ubuyobozi bwa Uganda ku bijyanye no gukemera ikibazo cya Uganda n’u Rwanda, ariko ubushotoranyi bwabo ntibuzabuza u Rwanda gukomeza gufata neza Abanya-Uganda ndetse n’abasirikare ba UPDF nka Private Baruku nubwo Guverinoma yabo ikomeje gutsimbarara ku mugambi wo guhohotera Abanyarwanda bari Uganda.
Frédéric Martel yavuye imuzi ikendera rya burundu ry’amatwara yiswe "Védrinisme" ku Rwanda.
Umwanditsi, umunyamakuru n’umwarimu muri ‘Université des Arts i Zürich’ mu Busuwisi, Frederic Martel, yavuze uko amatwara ya Hubert Védrine yiswe ‘Védrinisme’ ku Rwanda, yakubiswe inshuro kuva ubwo Perezida w’u Bufaransa, Emmanuel Macron, agiriye uruzinduko mu Rwanda.
Védrine yari umujyanama wa Perezida François Mitterrand mu bya dipolomasi, yabaye Umunyamabanga Mukuru muri Perezidansi y’u Bufaransa aza no kuba Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga ku bwa Minisitiri w’Intebe, Lionel Jospin, guhera mu 1997 kugeza mu 2002.
Anengwa kugerageza guhisha ukuri ku ruhare rw’igihugu cye muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kugabanya uburemere bwayo no kwifatanya n’abayihakana.
Mu gihe abandi bayobozi bakomeye barimo n’abaminisitiri bo ku butegetsi bwa Miterrand bagaragaje ko igihugu cyabo cyari gifite akaboko muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, Védrine we yakomeje kwinangira ndetse agakora icengezamatwara ryo guhisha ukuri nk’uko uyu mwanditsi abisobanura.
Nka Michel Rocard, umwe mu bari bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi, yavugiye mu Nteko mu 1998 yemeza ko ibikorwa by’u Bufaransa mu Rwanda bigaragaramo imyitwarire ikemangwa.
Icyo gihe yagize ati “Twaribeshye dushyigikira igihe kirekire ubutegetsi bubi.”
Ni mu gihe kandi hari abandi Bafaransa batunguwe no gutahura ko u Bufaransa bwateye inkunga ubutegetsi bwishe Abatutsi basaga miliyoni mu mezi atatu gusa, kandi imikoree mibi ikaba yaraturutse mu nzego zo hejuru Hubert Védrine yabarizwagamo.
Ni mu gihe Védrine yari afite ijambo ku gisirikare no ku Badipolomate by’umwihariko mu gihe Mitterrand yari afite uburwayi bukomeye mu 1994.
Anengwa kugira dipolomasi itarimo indangagaciro n’ubumuntu bidafite aho bihuriye na kimwe mu byo u Bufaransa bwimakaza, guhohotera uburenganzira bwa muntu nk’uko byagenze muri Yougoslavie aho igihugu cye cyivanze muri politiki yaho buhumyi nk’uko byagenze mu Rwanda.
Muri Yougoslavie, Védrine ngo yashyigikiye umunyagitugu Milosevic n’inyeshyamba z’aba-Serbe i Vukovar, Sarajevo na Kossovo.
Uruhare rwa Védrine rwanagaragariye no mu gushaka gutinza uko byagenda kose Abanyamerika ngo badatabara muri Bosnia.
Ngo yari umuntu wifata nk’umunyambaraga mu banyantege nke n’umunyantege nke mu bakomeye.
Uyu mwanditsi avuga ko Macron yerekanye ko ari mu murongo w’ibintu bifatika, yitaye ku buremere bwabyo no kubungabunga inyungu z’igihugu ariko indagagaciro zacyo zidahungabanye, mu gihe kuri Védrine izo ndangagaciro nta gaciro zifite.
Ku Rwanda ‘Védrinisme’ yari amatwara yo guhakana, n’imyumvire y’ubuhangange bw’igihugu cye bivanze no kwishima hejuru y’abagezweho n’ingaruka.
Ati “Niba u Bufaransa butarigeze butegura jenoside yahitanye abasaga miliyoni bishwe n’abasirikare n’intagondwa z’abahutu, bwatumye ishoboka. Hatariho ibitekerezo, ntiyari gushoboka, niba nta ruhare rufatika bwari bufitemo inyungu zabwo. Ni yo mpamvu Védrine azahora afatwa nk’umugome ukomeye muri dipolomasi y’u Bufaransa.”
Uyu mwanditsi asobanura ko Védrinisme yarandutse bya nyabyo ku ya 27 Gicurasi 2021. Ubwo Emmnanuel Macron yavugiraga imbwirwaruhame y’amateka mu Rwanda yemera uruhare rukomeye rw’u Bufaransa muri Jenoside.
Hubert Védrine wahoze ari umunyamabanga mukuru wa Perezida Mitterand akaba Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga kuva mu 1997 kugeza mu 2002, ubwo yaganiraga na Komisiyo ya Paul Quilès yavuze ko nta kosa igihugu cye cyakoze mu gufasha Habyarimana.
Yagize ati “Kuba Perezida Habyarimana yari umuhutu ntabwo byari ikibazo kuko abahutu bagize 80 % by’abaturage. Ubwo u Bufaransa bwari gushingira kuki bushyigikira abashaka kumuvanaho?
Frederic Martel wavuze ku myitwarire ye ni umwanditsi, umunyamakuru n’umwarimu muri Université des Arts i Zürich. Ayobora ikiganiro cyitwa ‘Soft Power’ kuri ‘France Culture’ Yanditse ibitabo birimo icyitwa ‘Sodoma’, ‘Mainstream’ na ‘Le Rose et le Noir’.
Ibinyoma bya Abdi Latif bigaragaza umurongo wa The New York Times kuri Afurika.
Muri Nyakanga 2019 ubwo The New York Times (NYT) yarimo gushaka umunyamakuru uzakora ku Biro byayo biri i Nairobi, abayobozi bayo bagaragaje neza ubwoko bw’inkuru bari biteze ku munyamakuru wari buhabwe akazi, wagombaga “Gushaka amakuru mu bihugu bitandukanye, kuva mu butayu bwa Sudani n’ihembe rya Afurika, kumanuka kugera mu mashyamba ya Congo n’inkombe za Tanzania.”
Bamwe mu Banyafurika babonye iri tangazo, barivugiyeho karahava, bavuga bishimiye uburyo Umunyamakuru wa NYT yari buzagenzure ubutayu n’ibihugu bya Afurika bitagira amategeko, ndetse akajya atangaza “Inkuru zitunguranye zitanga icyizere” ku Mugabane wa Afurika.
Abakwennye iri tangazo, bahuje ubutumwa bwaryo n’imitekerereze ishingiye ku kwemera ko abazungu bashoboye kurusha Abirabura kandi ko ibyo Abirabura bifuza gukora neza bigomba kugenzurwa n’abazungu.
Nyuma yo kunengwa mu buryo bukomeye, iri tangazo ryaje gukurwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za NYT, ariko imitekerereze n’umurongo w’inkuru zikorwa n’iki kinyamakuru kuri Afurika byagumyeho.
Abdi Latif Dahir ni we wabonye ako kazi k’indyankurye kandi na we yakinjiyemo abizi, azana amatwara n’amashagaga mashya mu rwego rwo kwemeza abamukuriye.
Inkuru aherutse kwandika ifite umutwe ugira uti “Hoteli Rwanda utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi yimwe ibiryo n’imiti muri gereza, nk’uko umuryango we wabitangaje." Iyi nkuru yakabirizaga ubuzima Rusesabagina abayemo kandi bisa nk’aho Latif ari kuregera abazungu.
Uwa mbere ibi byagizeho ingaruka ni Paul Rusesabagina nyirizina, wizeye ikabyankuru ry’abazungu mu butwari bwe bwakabirijwe bw’uko yarokoye Abatutsi muri hoteli. Mu mezi icyenda ashize, uyu Rusesabagina yarimo kuvuga ko afashwe neza muri kasho ya Polisi y’u Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro na The East African, ari na cyo cya mbere Rusesabagina yari agiranye n’itangazamakuru kuva yagezwa mu Rwanda, yagize ati “Nafashwe neza, mu ijoro ryakeye nariye amakaroni ubu nanyoye igikoma. Mfite imiti yanjye kuko ngendana ibipimo by’umuvuduko w’amaraso ndetse n’akuma gapima uko umutima wanjye uri gutera.”
Ibi kandi yabisubiyemo mu kiganiro cya kabiri yahaye itangazamakuru, icyo gihe akaba yaraganiraga na Latif wari uhagarariye NYT, na bwo Rusesabagina yaragize ati “Ntacyo nanenga, ndi kurya ibyo buri Munyarwanda arya, mpabwa ibyo nifuza byose. Rero mfashwe nk’undi muntu usanzwe.”
Muri ibyo bihe, Rusesabagina yasaga nk’ufite icyizere cyo kuzatsinda urubanza, kuko yabwiye The East African ati “Harabura igihe gito nkajya mu Rukiko kandi niteguye kwiregura ku byaha by’iterabwoba ndi kuregwa.”
Birumvikana ko Rusesabagina n’abunganizi be banyuze muri paji ibihumbi y’ikirego cye ndetse ntibanyurwa n’ibyo babonye. Ntibari biteze kuzabona abatangabuhamya b’ubushinjacyaha bizewe kandi bazi gusobanura ibyo bavuga.
Kuva kuri Visi Perezida akaba n’umuvugizi wa FLN, Callixte Sankara, kugera kuri Michelle Martin, Umunyamerika wakoze nk’umukorera bushake mu Muryango wa Rusesabagina; ubuhamya bwabo ni bumwe, aho bugaragaza ko Rusesabagina yatanze inkunga y’amafaranga n’iy’ibitekerezo ku mitwe y’iterabwoba, ari yo FDLR na FLN.
Ibi byose byagize ingaruka zikomeye ku izina rya Rusesabagina ndetse binagaragarira mu nyandiko ya NTY iherutse, kuko batakimwita ‘intwari’, ahubwo basigaye bamwita ‘utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi’.
Ku ruhande rwa Rusesabagina n’umuryango we, barabizi ko badashobora kuzatsinda iki kirego, ari na yo mpamvu bakoresha abazungu bizeye ko bazahatira Leta y’u Rwanda kurekura Rusesabagina nyamara yaragize uruhare mu bwicanyi bwakorewe abaturage b’inzirakarengane.
Aba batangiye basaba ko Rusesabagina arekurwa kubera uburwayi bwe nubwo nyirubwite yari yavuze ko abona imiti akeneye ndetse agahura n’abaganga; ibi nyuma biza guhindurwa, bavuga ko indi mpamvu akwiye kurekurwa ari icyorezo cya Covid-19, gishobora kumwica kuko afite indwara karande.
Igitangaje ni uko abasabaga ko Rusesabagina arekurwa kubera gutinya icyorezo cya Covid-19, babivugiraga muri Amerika aho icyo cyorezo cyari gikaze nyamara gereza zo mu Rwanda icyo gihe zikaba zitari zakagize ubwandu bwa Covid-19.
Rusesabagina yaje kubona urukingo rwa Covid-19 mbere y’uko n’abamuvugiraga bari mu mahanga barubona.
Nyuma, aba bigize abavugizi ba Rusesabagina bazanye andi mayeri bavuga ko Leta y’u Rwanda ifite umugambi mubisha wo kwica Rusesabagina, kandi yari imaze kumuha urukingo. Birumvikana ko iki kinyoma kitamaze kabiri kuko aba bananiwe gusobanura uburyo Leta ifite uwo mugambi kuko iyo iza kubishaka, byari koroha kumureka ntakingirwe maze yazahura na Covid-19 ikamuzahaza kuko asanganwe indwara z’akarande.
Mu minsi ishize, Rusesabagina usa nk’uwatewe akanyamuneza n’urukingo yabonye, yanenze icyumba yagenewe kirimo ibintu birenze ibiri mu byumba by’abandi bagororwa, avuga ko ‘yafungiwe muri gereza yihariye’.
Urwego rw’Imfungwa n’Abagororwa (RCS), rwasobanuye ko “Rusesabagina yari yaragenewe icyumba n’ifunguro byihariye ubwo yimurirwaga muri Gereza ya Nyarugenge. Rusesabagina aherutse gushyirwa mu cyumba rusange gihuriweho n’abagororwa benshi, nyuma y’uko anenze icyumba yari yarahawe acyita ‘gereza yihariye’, kandi zitabaho mu Rwanda. Ubu ari guhabwa amafunguro nk’ay’abandi bagororwa kandi ashobora kubona umuganga igihe cyose amukeneye, nk’uko byari bisanzwe.”
Amakuru yavugaga ko impamvu Rusesabagina yimwe ibiryo n’imiti, bigamije kumuhatira gusubira mu rubanza yikuyemo ariko umuntu akibaza impamvu Leta y’u Rwanda yahatira umuntu kwiregura.
Mu 2010, Ingabire Victoire na we yagerageje gukoresha ubu buryo maze yikura mu rubanza, ahari atekereza ko ibihugu bimwe by’i Burayi bizakora ibishoboka byose bikamurokora ariko ibi byari ukwibeshya kuko yamaze imyaka umunani afunzwe, akaza kurekurwa ku mbabazi za Perezida.
Ibi na byo bisa nk’ibyabaye kuri Ingabire, uretse ko imbaraga ziri gushyirwamo zitandukanye aho bigaragara ko izigamije kugumisha Rusesabagina mu makuru abantu babona ari nyinshi. Impungenge ziri ku ruhande rw’abashyigikiye Rusesabagina, ni uko mu gihe yareka kuvugwa mu Burayi na Amerika, u Rwanda narwo rudafite inyungu mu gukomeza kuvuga izina rye, rumwereka uruhande rushyigikiye ibinyoma bye ariko rwaranze kureba ku bagizweho ingaruka z’ibitero bye ndetse no kwemera ko ibyaha yakoreye mu Rwanda abiryozwa imbere y’ubutabera.
Abdi Latif Dahir wa NYT ntiyigeze anagenzura inyandiko y’Urwego rwa Amerika Rushinzwe Ububanyi n’Amahanga, rwavuguruje ayo makuru mu buryo bufatika.
Itangazo ry’urweo rwego ryaragiraga riti “Ambasade yacu i Kigali yavuganye n’ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda, abadipolomate baturutse mu Bubiligi ndetse n’abanyamategeko ba Rusesabagina, bose bemeje ko Rusesabagina akomeje guhabwa ibiryo, amazi ndetse n’imiti. Leta y’u Rwanda ikomeje guha abakozi ba ambasade uburenganzira bwo gukomeza gusura Rusesabagina.”
Birakwiye ko Latif yigira kuri izi nkuru zamukojeje isoni, ubundi akongera kwita ku mahame agenga umwuga w’itangazamakuru. Ikindi kandi akwiye kumenya ni uko abayobozi b’u Rwanda badashobora kubona umwanya wo kujya basubiza buri gihuha cyose kigiye kwandikwa muri NYT.
Icya nyuma ni uko abanyamategeko b’i Burayi na Amerika bakwiye kumenya ko, nk’uko iyo abanyamategeko b’Abanyafurika batitega ko abakiliya babo bafungurwa, ni nako bakwiye kwitega ko Leta y’u Rwanda ishinzwe kureberera Abanyarwanda bagizweho ingaruka n’ibitero byashyigikiwe na Rusesabagina, izahindura umuvuno kubera igitutu cyabo.
Uburenganzira bwemerera abanyamategeko b’abanyamabanga kuburanira mu Rwanda ntibutangwa bishingiye ku cyo umuntu ari cyo, hari inzira bigomba kunyuramo yubahirije amategeko kandi bitandukanye n’abayobozi ba NYT, u Rwanda ni igihugu kiyobowe n’amategeko.
Nyuma y’u Bwongereza, abatekamutwe b’Abanyarwanda badukiriye na Australia.
Hashize igihe René Mugenzi yigaragaza nk’utavuga rumwe na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda kugeza n’ubwo yigeze kuvuga ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga. Polisi y’i Londres yatekewe umutwe ibyinjiramo, Mugenzi abyina intsinzi.
Icyakora intsinzi ntiyamaze akanya, agakino ke Polisi yaje kukavumbura. Yaje gutabwa muri yombi ku butekamutwe yakoreye Abongereza abacucura amafaranga yari ashinzwe kubika muri Paruwasi.
Yari amaze imyaka igera ku icumi abiba rwihishwa nyamara akigaragaza nk’umuturage w’intangarugero. Umucamanza Katharine Moore na we yaje kwanzura ko ubwoba Mugenzi yavugaga ko aterwa na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda nta buhari, ko ari ibinyoma bisa bidafite ishingiro. Byagaragaye ko yari amayeri kugira ngo yigarurire icyizere cy’abaturage b’u Bwongereza, ngo abone uko abacacura.
Kuri ubu noneho, undi munyarwanda uba muri Australia yinjiye mu gakino nk’aka Mugenzi. Tariki 9 Kamena, ikinyamakuru The Sydney Morning Herald cyatangaje inkuru ifite umutwe ugira uti “Australian citizen asks for UN’s help to locate missing brothers in Rwanda” (Umuturage wa Australia arasaba ubufasha bwa Loni ngo abashe kubona abavandimwe be baburiwe irengero mu Rwanda”.
Uyu mugabo Noel Zihabamwe avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda na Ambasade yabwo muri icyo gihugu byamugezeho bishaka “kumwiyegereza ngo ababere umukangurambaga muri Australia”. Ngo yarabyanze, maze “abavandimwe be baburirwa irengero nyuma y’ukwezi atangaje inkuru ye muri ABC muri Kanama 2019.”
Nta n’umwe wakwemera ibyo binyoma ko Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ishobora gushimuta abaturage bayo kuko gusa ngo banze kuba abakangurambaga. Wibuke ko ari igihugu aho abana b’umuyobozi wa FDLR bahawe buruse zo kwiga muri Kaminuza nziza mu Rwanda no mu mahanga.
Igitangaje kurushaho, Zihabamwe yanumvishije Polisi ya Australia ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga. Ikigaragara, René Mugenzi ari muri gereza mu Bwongereza ariko hari undi Mugenzi uri mu ishusho ye muri Australia yiyise Noel Zihabamwe.
Nkuko Mugenzi yabigenje agamije guhishira ubuhakanyi bwe bwa Jenoside, Zihabamwe na we afite icyo ahishe.
Uyu Zihabamwe ni umunyamuryango w’imandwa za RNC, Ihuriro ryiyise Alliance for National Pact (RANP-Abaryankuna) ryashinzwe na Cassien Ntamuhanga nyuma yo gutoroka gereza mu Rwanda akanyura muri Uganda kugeza ubwo yageraga muri Afurika y’Epfo. Ni aho bahereye bashakisha abanyamuryango cyane cyane mu Burayi na Australia.
Ni ibintu bizwi ko Abaryankuna bakomeje gushakisha abanyamuryango bifashishije uburyo Ntamuhanga yakoresheje anyura i Kampala. Aho niho bamara igihe bategereje kubona impapuro z’inzira zibageza muri Afurika y’Epfo, u Burayi na Australia.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bufite amakuru ko hari amagana y’Abaryankuna binjijwe muri uyu mutwe ubu bari i Kampala bategereje kujyanwa mu bice bitandukanye by’Isi.
Kuba Zihabamwe yaragiye muri The Sydney Morning Herald ni byiza kuko ubu noneho Leta y’u Rwanda izi ko bishoboka cyane kuba yaba yarinjije abavandimwe be muri uwo mutwe w’iterabwoba, akaba azi aho baherereye. Ahubwo mu magambo yoroshye, ari kugaragaza ibyaha byabo.
Ni ukuri kwigaragaza ko ahubwo atari umuvandimwe wabo gusa ushingiye ku nshingano afite mu Baryankuna aho ari umuhuzabikorwa, umukangurambaga n’umuterankunga w’uyu mutwe w’iterabwoba ugamije kuzana akavuyo mu Rwanda nk’uko icengezamatwara banyuza ku mbuga nkoranyambaga cyane cyane YouTube ribigaragaza.
Zihabamwe avuga ko ubuzima bwe buri mu kaga kuko yamaze kubona abandi bagerageje guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda bakisanga i Kigali mu butabera. Arabizi ko amahitamo ari abiri, kureka iterabwoba cyangwa se akazisanga imbere y’inkiko haba muri Australia cyangwa i Kigali.
Mugenzi arimo yigana, aho ari ubu harazwi, ni muri gereza mu Bwongereza. Abanya-Australia bakwiriye kumenya neza aba batekamutwe.
Igitutu cy’iterabwoba no guhimba ibinyoma mu gushaka gufunguza abakora ibikorwa by’iterabwoba ku Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’umutwe w’iterabwoba yisanze mu Rwanda, ubwo yerekezaga mu Burundi, ubu akaba ari muri Gereza ya Nyarugenge i Mageragere. Yakomeje gukoresha uburyo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo akureho uburyo bwo gukurikiranwa n’Inzego z’ubutabera bw’u Rwanda.
Mu rubanza yazanyemo inzitizi nyinshi, ahabwa n’umwanya wo kuzisobanurira ubucamanza, agamije kutaburanishwa n’ubucamanza bw’u Rwanda, ndetse akanasaba ko ahita afungurwa kubera ko uko yageze mu Rwanda, akisanga mu maboko y’Ubutabera, abyita gushimutwa.
Izi ni zimwe mu nzitizi yumvaga ko zifite ingingo zitakwigobotorwa yazanye mu rubanza ariko biza kurangira zihanduwemo inenge yazo, ubucamanza bwanzura ko aburanishwa n’ubucamanza bw’u Rwanda kubera ko bubifitiye ububasha ntakuka.
Uwo muyobozi w’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba yaje kwikura mu rubanza, bamwe tubibona nko kwirinda kumwarira mu Rukiko imbere y’amahanga n’abo yayoboraga bigeze kumwubaha.
Iki kimwaro ntabwo yabashije kugisimbuka, urubanza rwarakomeje abatangabuhamya n’abo bafatanyije gukora ibyaha, bamushinja ku buryo buziguye n’ubutaziguye uruhare runini yagize mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba byahekuye u Rwanda, ubwo abari mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa FLN, bateraga mu bice byo mu Majyepfo, mu Murenge wa Nyabimata, Akarere ka Nyaruguru no mu bice by’Akarere ka Nyamagabe ndetse no mu Karere ka Rusizi.
Iki ni igisebo gikomeye cyane ku muntu wigize, akanitirirwa ibikorwa by’ubutwari, akanabyambarira umudari, awambitswe na Perezida w’Igihugu gikomeye. Ni igisebo kandi kugaragara ko yabeshye amahanga, akabikora imyaka myinshi, yigaragaza nk’intungane yavamo umunyapolitiki mwiza wayobora u Rwanda.
Mu bo yabeshye hari ababyemeye bamutera inkunga. Hari abamuteye inkunga nka Fondasiyo yari igamije ibikorwa byiza, hari n’abamuteye inkunga bazi neza ko aje gukuraho Ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda, yasebeje imyaka myinshi ashaka kubusiga icyasha ko ari ubuyobozi bw’igitugu.
Uwitwaga Intwari yaje kuvamo icyihebe, umugome, umuhemu wahekuye igihugu cyamubyaye. Abanyarwanda benshi banabonye ko n’ibyo yitaga ko arwanira, atari byo ko ahubwo akomeje gukuza inda, ubwikanyize n’umururumba wo gutunga ibya Mirenge.
Abo bafatanyije muri ibi bikorwa by’iterabwoba harimo abagaragaje ububisha bwe no gukeza ba mpatsibihugu bagamije kurimbura Abanyafurika, bifashishe inkozi z’ibibi zishyira inyungu zazo imbere, nka ba mpemuke ndamuke. Uwo muyobozi w’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba ageze muri Gereza uwiyitaga umukobwa we, ariko bikaza kugaragara ko ari umutsindirano, yakomeje kuvugira uwo yita se w’intwari.
Abenshi bakamwereka ko nta ntwari igira imigambi yo kwica, kwihakana aho avuka no guhekura igihugu cyamubyaye. Uyu muterabwoba yakomeje gucuya no guta izina mu ruhando mpuzamahanga, abamwizeraga, bakamwizeza no kumufasha kumufunguza bakomeje kubona ko ari umubeshyi, atunzwe no guhimba ibinyoma bigamije kuzuza inda ye idahaga.
Bamwe mu Bunyamahanga bitabiriye urubanza rwe mu itangira, uko rwakomeje ntibahagarutse nk’ikimenyetso cyo kugaragaza ko batashyigikira inkozi z’ibibi. Bamwe mu banyapolitiki bo mu mahanaga bashatse kwivanga mu Butabera bw’u Rwanda, bakuyemo akarenge kabo, bamaze kubona ko gushyigikira Umuyobozi w’umutwe w’iterabwoba, byabasigira inenge n’igisebo.
Uburyo bushya bwuzuye ikinyoma bwo gushaka impamvu zafunguza umuterabwoba
Kubera ko hari abantu benshi baharanira ukuri kandi badashyigikira umuco wo kudahana, bongeye kugaragaza ko u Rwanda rubifitiye uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana imitwe y’iterabwoba nk’intego Isi isangiye. Wa muyobozi w’umutwe w’iterabwoba yahinduye umuvuno. Aho atangiye kugaragaza ko abayeho nabi, ko yamenyeshwejwe ko ashobora kwimwa uburyo bwo guhabwa ifunguro, akomeza abeshya ko adahabwa ibimufasha bihagije mu buzima bwe.
Yongeyeho ko arimo gufatwa nabi mu kwivuza aho avuga ko nk’umuntu usanzwe urwaye umutima, akaba yaranarokotse kanseri ko ashobora kuhaburira ubuzima. Urwego Rushinzwe Imfungwa n’Abagororwa mu Rwanda rwagaragaje ko rufata Abafungwa n’Abagororwa bose kimwe kandi neza. Ubuyobozi bwa Gereza ya Nyarugenge bwagaragaje ko ahabwa ifunguro ndetse agahabwa n’uko agera kwa Muganga.
Ibi ni ibinyoma birimo gucurwa kugira ngo barebe ko noneho hari icyo byamara ngo afungurwe. Ubwe yisabiye abana be kuvuza induru bamamaza ibi binyoma. Ibi kandi barabikoresha nk’iterabwoba bifashishije abanyamakuru b’ibinyamakuru mpuzamahanga, imiryango mpuzamahanga idafashije, Inganga z’Abavoka buzuye agasuzuguro gashingiye ku gutesha agaciro Abanyafurika no kutumva ko nta butabera buba mu bihugu bya Afurika.
Abazi uyu Muyobozi w’ibyihebe, bavuga ko ari umuntu ushobora guhimba ikinyoma cyose ariko akabaho, bakomeza bavuga ko ari umuntu wuzuye ubutiriganya, amafuti, uburyarya n’ubugome, akaba adatinya guhemuka no kwihekura. Kuri we yakora ibibi byose bishoboka ariko akabaho. Bavuga kandi ko azi kwibonekeza, kwivuga ibyiza no kwigira umunyabwenge agamije gusebya abandi no kubatesha agaciro. Inyungu rusange ntacyo zimubwiye, amahoro mu Rwanda ntacyo amubwiye mu gihe abona ko konti ze za banki, zidashishe amadolari amuhundagazaho indonke no kugwiza imitungo ivuye mu buhemu.
Uku kutagira umutima, guha icyicaro ububisha abihuriyeho n’abo yareze ndetse n’abamukomokaho, bashyize imbere guhimba ibinyoma byinshi bakwirakwiza hirya no hino ku Isi ibihuha, bagamije gukura icyaha cy’ubugome ku muyobozi w’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba, bakabyambika Leta y’u Rwanda.
Bize no gukoresha ikinyoma nk’iterabwoba bumva ko bazatera Ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bukaba bwakwivanga mu kazi k’ubutabera kugira ngo uyu muterabwoba afungurwe.
U Rwanda ruyobowe n’Abayobozi baharaniye uburenganzira bw’Abanyarwanda, harimo kuringaniza Abanyarwanda imbere y’amategeko. Nta gihangange imbere y’Amategeko y’u Rwanda. Bigaragara ko u Rwanda rwarakoze uko rushoboye ntirwivanga mu miburanishirize y’izi manza zirimo abibumbiye mu mitwe y’iterabwoba ihungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Ikigaragara kandi, Ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda bwimye amatwi abashaka kurukoresha amakosa kugira ngo rwivange muri izi manza. Harimo ubwisanzure no kubahiriza uburenganzira bwa muntu imbere y’amategeko.
Urubyiruko ruba mu Budage rwasubije Minisitiri Bamporiki.
Ubwanditsi: Hashize ukwezi n’iminsi mike, Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard, yanditse ibaruwa igenewe Abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga by’umwihariko urubyiruko, abasaba kwitandukanya n’inyigisho z’ubugome zikomoka kuri bamwe mu babyeyi babo, buganisha ku ipfobya rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi no guharabika u Rwanda.
Icyahagurukije Bamporiki ni uburyo ibikorwa byo guhakana no gupfobya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bikomeje gukaza umurego cyane cyane hifashishijwe imbuga nkoranyambaga, urubyiruko rukaba rubyishoramo ku bwinshi mu gihe harimo n’urwavutse nyuma ya Jenoside.
Bigaragara ko ubutumwa Bamporiki yatanze bwageze ku bo bugenewe bamwe bakaba batangiye kumusubiza na bo babinyuje mu ibaruwa bamugeneye bamwizeza ko batari mu mubare w’abagomera urwababyaye.
Ibaruwa urubyiruko rw’Abanyarwanda baba mu Budage banditse basubiza Bamporiki
Nyakubahwa muyobozi wacu twishimiye intashyo mwaduhaye zuje ubwema n’ubwenge.
Turabashimira kutuzirikana mukagera aho muduha inama nyinshi ndetse n’impanuro zikubiye mu ibaruwa muherutse kutwandikira.
Twebwe urubyiruko ruba mu Budage (Rwanda Youth Transformers) twishimiye kubasubiza tugira tuti “Murakarama!”
Nyakubahwa nk’uko mutwibutsa amateka y’igihugu cyacu kuva mu ihangwa ryacyo kugeza none, aho turi mu mahanga duhora dukotanira gusigasira umuco, indangagaciro na kirazira by’aho dukomoka nk’uko twatongerewe n’Umwami Gihanga Ngomijana gushakira u Rwanda imbuto n’amaboko.
Nyakubahwa muragira muti “Abanyarwanda bo hambere aha batatiriye igihango, bagasemura ubwiru, umuco ugaca injishi, kirazira ikimukira ikizira! Twebwe urubyiruko amaboko y’igihugu mizero yacyo, twiyemeje gukurikiza urugero rw’abimanye u Rwanda ari bo bato batari gito, Inkotanyi zabohoye u Rwanda zikanahagarika Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994.
Nyakubahwa ntitwirengagije ko hari abasoroma imbuto z’ubuyobe bakomora ku bataramana u Rwanda aho kurutarama.
Twe nk’urubyiruko ruba mu Budage twumva byinshi birimo n’ihakana rya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Abandi na bo bakavuga ko habaye Jenoside ebyiri.
Ariko kubera ko tuzi ko umuti w’ikibazo uhera mu kukimenya no kugisobanukirwa, twiyemeje guhagarara ku kuri no kurwanya abo bose bagoreka ayo mateka baharanira inyungu zabo bwite no guhunga ingaruka z’ibyo basize bakoze.
Ibyabaye mu Rwatubyaye ni amahano ariko ntibigasubire: Nk’uko Umukuru w’Igihugu cyacu ahora abisubiramo, ntitwasubiza isaha inyuma ngo duhindure amateka yaranze u Rwanda rw’ejo hashize ariko Urwatubyaye tuzi neza ko turufite mu maboko yacu. Nirweme! Dufite rero uruhare mu kugena ejo hazaza harwo.
Duharanira u Rwanda rutarangwamo ivangura rishingiye ku cyo ari cyo cyose, u Rwanda rw’abanyarwanda rwimakaza ubumwe n’iterambere. Ndi Umunyarwanda ni yo ntero kandi idufasha gusobanurira Abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga batarasobanukirwa aho u Rwanda rugeze n’icyerekezo cyarwo.
Nyakubahwa, mwe dufata nk’indorerwamo yacu, tubijeje ko mu byatujyanye tuzahaha, duhahira u Rwanda, tukaniyungura ubumenyi tubigiriye aho dukomoka.
Abazadutinza mu nzira badushukisha ibishashagirana tuzabazwira tuti “Turihuta.” Kandi tuzihuta tudasize u Rwanda inyuma tutazamera nk’aka wa mukozi wakoraga mu ndege akayigurutsa yasize igitabo cy’ingenzi. Twiyemeje kuba ba Mutagoma. Twakiranye amaboko yombi impanuro zanyu, ibyo mudusaba twiyemeje kubikora kuko biri mu nyungu zacu, iz’abanyarwanda ndetse n’abazadukomokaho.
Ubufatanye namwe, kugendera kure ikibi n’ababi no gukora ibyungura u Rwanda turemera neza ko ari ibuye ry’ifatizo rizadufasha kuba abahuza b’ibihe turimo n’ibizaza bityo natwe tukazasigira abazadukomokaho umurage mwiza natwe dukomora ku bari kurenga mu gihe twe duhinguka. Ndetse n’urumuri rw’ikizere duhabwa n’intore izirusha intambwe tuzaruhererekanye uburaherezo maze imirasire y’umucyo warwo isakare ku Banyarwanda aho bari hose.
Murakoze tubifurije ubuzima buzira umuze.
Ingurube zica abantu muri Uganda ni iza Museveni, u Rwanda ni urwitwazo.
Umwe mu bacengezamatwara ba Leta ya Uganda, Charles Kazooba ufite urubuga rwa Internet rwitwa Skynewsug.com aherutse kwandika inkuru avuga abo akeka kuba inyuma y’umugambi wo gushaka guhitana abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu.
Muri iyo nkuru yatangajwe hashize iminsi itatu hageragejwe umugambi wo kwica Minisitiri w’Umurimo n’Ubwikorezi muri Uganda, Gen. Wamala Katumba, Kazooba atondekanya ibyo akeka byateye umutekano muke muri Kampala. Mu byo avuga hari aho abihuza n’umubano mubi uri hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda kugira ngo ace ku ruhande ikibazo cya nyacyo giteje umutekano muke muri Uganda. Ni ukuvuga ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Museveni.
Nkuko asanzwe abigenza, Museveni avuga kuri ubwo bwicanyi yagaragaje ko ababikoze ari ‘ingurube’ ziri kwica Abanya-Uganda ariko akagerageza kwivanaho uruhare rwe nubwo bitanyuze amatwi y’abaturage b’igihugu cye. Benshi bahise bajya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bavuga ko abicanyi ba nyabo babazi. Abo ni abishe Kaweesi, Abiriga, Kirumira, Annie Kagezi, abayobozi muri Islam n’abandi. Ingurube abo baturage bavuze ko ziri imbere muri ‘Guverinoma ya Uganda’.
Bati “kuki nyuma y’ibi byose, nta n’umwe uragezwa mu butabera?” Kuki inzego z’umutekano za Uganda n’amafaranga yose zikoresha nta n’umwe zirageza mu butabera kuri ubu bwicanyi bwakorewe abahoze ari abayobozi?’’
Nk’urugero, abishe AIGP Andrew Kaweesi wahoze ari Umuvugizi wa Polisi, bari bari kuri moto, bamwicira muri metero nke uvuye kuri Sitasiyo ya Polisi banakoresha imbunda zo mu bwoko bumwe n’izikoreshwa n’Umutwe udasanzwe urinda Museveni.
Nyamara na Kazooba yemeza ko hari ibibazo no kutumvikana mu butegetsi bwa Museveni. Avuga ko harimo ruswa no kutavuga rumwe k’uzasimbura Museveni, ibyo bishobora kuba bifite uruhare muri ibyo bibazo by’umutekano muke.
Mu mwaka wa 2005, Gilbert Bukenya wari Visi Perezida yavuze ku mugaragaro ko hari za ‘mafia’ zishaka agahanga ke. Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Imari n’Ishoramari, Evelyn Anite na we yatanze intabaza nk’iyo, ko ubuzima bwe buri mu mazi abira kubera za ‘mafia’. Ubu ikigezweho ni Gen Katumba wasimbutse urupfu.
Mu buryo budasubirwaho, aha Kazooba avuga ko mu butegetsi bwa Uganda hashobora kuba harimo ikibazo. Mu nkuru ye kandi, avuga ko umutwe w’iterabwoba wa ADF ushobora kuba wihishe inyuma y’ibyo bitero. Kuri ibi, mu buryo butunguranye kandi bwo gukeka, yongeraho ko ngo ‘ADF iterwa inkunga n’u Rwanda’. Ni ikirego gikomeye nyamara atagaragariza ibimenyetso.
Mu byo Kazooba avuga n’ibimenyetso agaragaza birahabanye. Uti kuki? Hagaragajwe ko imbunda yakoreshejwe bagaba igitero kuri Katumba ari ubwoko bw’imbunda ADF yakoreshejwe hicwa Maj Kiggundu mu Ugushyingo 2016. Kazooba avuga ko iyo mbunda yasizwe aho icyaha cyabereye mu myaka itanu ishize.
Mu buryo budasanzwe, mu ijambo Museveni yagejeje ku baturage tariki 4 Kamena 2021, yavuze ko iyo mbunda ari nayo yakoreshejwe mu gitero cyari kigamije guhitana Katumba.
Mu yandi magambo, iyo mbunda yari iri mu maboko y’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda kuva mu 2016, yongeye gukoreshwa mu 2021. Ibi ni ibimenyetso simusiga ko iyo Museveni avuga ‘ingurube’, nta handi ziri atari mu butegetsi bwe. Birashoboka ko zihishe mu nzego z’umutekano za Uganda.
Ku kibazo cy’umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda, umwanditsi avuga ko Abanyarwanda baba muri Uganda bagiye bibasirwa, nyamara abyica aho akomeza avuga ko “hari Abanyarwanda batawe muri yombi bakekwaho ubutasi bakoherezwa mu gihugu cyabo.” Ibi ni ibinyoma bisa by’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda.
Ibihumbi by’Abanyarwanda (si amagana nkuko Kazooba abivuga) mu myaka ine ishize bagiye bashimutwa n’inzego z’umutekano za Uganda, bagafungirwa ahantu hatazwi mu mabohero y’inzego z’umutekano. Bagiye bashinjwa ‘ubutasi’, ‘gutunga intwaro mu buryo butemewe’, ‘ishimuta’ n’ibindi. Icyo Kazooba yibagiwe kuvuga, ni uko nta n’umwe wigeze ahabwa amahirwe yo kwiregura mu rukiko. Bakorewe ihohoterwa ngo bemere ku ngufu ibyaha bahimbiwe, bamwe bakanagwa ku mupaka ari intere nabwo kubera igitutu cy’u Rwanda.
Ni inzirakarengane z’ibinyoma byacuriwe i Kampala bigamije kuyobya rubanda, ari naho habarizwa icy’uko u Rwanda rukorana na ADF.
Leta ya Uganda n’inzego zayo z’umutekano ku isonga CMI, ari nazo zicura ibinyoma bigamije kwangiza isura y’u Rwanda, zakunze guhirikira ubwo bwicanyi bw’abayobozi bakuru kuri Leta y’u Rwanda, nyamara bwakozwe n’ubutegetsi bwa Museveni. Kuri iyi nshuro, n’igitambambuga nticyapfa kwemera ibyo binyoma.
Imikoreshereze y’ubutaka ikwiriye guhinduka, Intara y’Amajyepfo igahabwa umurwa mukuru w’ubucuruzi.
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bituwe cyane muri Afurika. Ibarura rusange ryakozwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare mu 2012, ryagaragaje ko Abanyarwanda bari bageze kuri miliyoni 10.5, mu gihe biteganyijwe ko muri 2032 bazaba babarirwa hagati ya milioni 15,4 na 16,9 naho mu 2050 bakazaba bari hagati ya miliyoni 23 na 25.
Muri 2015 ubucucike kuri kilometero kare bwari buhagaze kuri 461 mu gihe muri 2050 buzaba buhageze kuri 934. Ubu bwiyongere bw’abaturage bujyana no gukenera ubutaka bwo guturaho no gukoreraho ibikorwa by’iterambere bitandukanye, twavuga nk’ubuhizi n’ubworozi, ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro n’ibindi.
Bitewe n’ubu bwiyongere bw’abaturage, ahakabaye hakorerwa ibikorwa by’ubuhinzi kandi bitanga n’umusaruro harimo haraturwa ku muvuduko wo hejuru. Urugero twavuga ni nk’igice kinini cy’Intara y’u Burasirazuba ndetse n’Akarere k’Ibirunga bizwiho kuba ari byo bigize Ikigega cy’igihugu mu biribwa.
Nta gikozwe ubu butaka bugakomeza guturwaho ku muvuduko biriho ubu, byazagira ingaruka mu gihe kirekire mu kwihaza mu biribwa kw’igihugu.
Ese ubwiyongere bw’abaturage muri utu turere tw’ubuhinzi buva he?
Intara y’Iburasirazuba
Nkuko bigaragara mu bushakashatsi bwakozwe n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibarurishamibare (NISR-EICV-4), ndetse na raporo ya Banki y’Isi (World bank report) muri iki gihe usanga abaturage bava mu duce tw’imisozi miremire kandi yagundutse, abandi bakava mu duce dufite amasambu mato cyane.
Aha twavuga nk’uturere twa Gakenke, Muhanga, Rulindo, Gicumbi, Nyamagabe, Burera, Nyaruguru, Gasabo na Nyamasheke berekaza aho bashobora kubona amasambu manini kandi atanga umusaruro cyane cyane mu gace k’iburasirazuba mu turere twa Nyagatare, Gatsibo, Kayonza na Rwamagana.
Muri utu turere abaturage bavamo ntibaba bagishobora kubona umusaruro uhagije watunga ingo zabo bityo bagafata icyemezo cyo gusuhuka.
